atk-s0503a:297_11: handa naṃ saṃvejetvā buddhuppādaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti tāvadeva brahmalokato otaritvā rattibhāge suppārakapaṭṭane dārucīriyassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
atk-s0503a:297_12: Bāhiyo attano vasanaṭṭhāne uḷāraṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti bahi nikkhamitvā olokento ākāse ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:297_13: mahābrahmānaṃ disvā añjaliṃ paggayha “ke tumhe”ti pucchi.
atk-s0503a:297_14: Athassa so brahmā “ahaṃ te porāṇakasahāyo tadā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā brahmaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0503a:297_15: tvaṃ pana kiñci visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto tadā puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā saṃsaranto idāni titthiyavesadhārī
atk-s0503a:297_16: anarahāva samāno ‘arahā aha’nti imaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā vicarasīti ñatvā āgato,
atk-s0503a:297_19: mā te ahosi dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya,
atk-s0503a:298_2: Purimapadena cettha bāhiyassa dukkhāpanayanakāmataṃ tassā devatāya dasseti,
atk-s0503a:298_8: Tenupasaṅkamīti seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0503a:298_10: evameva brahmaloke antarahito bāhiyassa purato pātubhavanavasena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:298_11: Etadavocāti “ye kho keci loke arahanto vā”tiādipavattamicchāparivitakkaṃ bāhiyaṃ sahoḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya “neva kho tvaṃ, bāhiya,
atk-s0503a:298_12: arahā”tiādikaṃ etaṃ idāni vuccamānavacanaṃ brahmā avoca.
atk-s0503a:298_14: arahāti etena tadā bāhiyassa asekkhabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0503a:298_15: nāpi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannoti etena sekkhabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:298_18: yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannoti iminā panassa kalyāṇaputhujjanabhāvampi paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0503a:299_1: “Appicchatāya santuṭṭhitāya sallekhatāya dīgharattaṃ katādhikārattā tadaṅgappahānavasena kilesānaṃ vihatattā arahattādhimāno uppanno”ti keci vadanti.
atk-s0503a:299_3: tasmāssa vikkhambhanappahānena kilesānaṃ asamudācārato arahattādhimāno uppajjatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:299_4: Tadubhayampi tesaṃ matimattameva “sambhāvanādhippāyo lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā.
atk-s0503a:300_0: Atha bāhiyo ākāse ṭhatvā kathentaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ oloketvā cintesi –
atk-s0503a:300_4: atthi nu kho loke koci arahā”ti?
atk-s0503a:300_7: “atha ke carahi devate loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā”ti.
atk-s0503a:301_4: bhājanalokabhūte sakalasmiṃ jambudīpatale kasmiṃ ṭhāne arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā etarahi viharanti,
atk-s0503a:301_5: yattha mayaṃ te upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissāmāti.
atk-s0503a:302_1: Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre ṭhito maggena savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā.
atk-s0503a:302_3: Bhagavatā hi kilesārayo anavasesato ariyamaggena hatā samucchinnāti.
atk-s0503a:302_5: Yañca avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhi puññādiabhisaṅkhārāraṃ jarāmaraṇanemi āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā
atk-s0503a:302_7: Tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakarañāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā sabbepi arā hatā vihatā viddhaṃsitāti.
atk-s0503a:302_9: Bhagavā hi sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyattā uḷāre cīvarādipaccaye pūjāvisesañca arahati.
atk-s0503a:302_11: Tathāgato hi sabbaso samucchinnarāgādikilesattā pāpakilesassāpi asambhavato pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahanti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:305_0: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:306_1: akusale dhamme sāvajjadukkhavipākatotiādinā sabbattikadukādivasena ayamattho netabbo.
atk-s0503a:306_2: Iti aviparītaṃ sayambhuñāṇena sabbākārato sabbadhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0503a:306_5: Dhammaṃ desetīti ādikalyāṇādiguṇavisesayuttaṃ sīlādipaṭipadādhammaṃ samathavipassanādhammameva vā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ upadisati katheti.
atk-s0503a:307_3: sammāsambuddhañca loke uppajjitvā dhammaṃ desentaṃ na jāniṃ,
atk-s0503a:307_8: Suppārakā pakkāmīti buddhoti nāmamapi savanena uppannāya buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā saṃvegena ca codiyamānahadayo
atk-s0503a:307_10: Sabbattha ekarattiparivāsenāti sabbasmiṃ magge ekarattivāseneva agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:308_3: “Sabbattha ekarattiparivāsenā”ti pana vuttattā maggassa ca vīsayojanasatikattā antarāmagge gāmanigamarājadhānīsu yattha yattha rattiyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0503a:308_4: tattha tattha dutiyaṃ aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā sabbattha ekarattivāseneva sāvatthiṃ upasaṅkamīti ayamattho dīpito hotīti.
atk-s0503a:308_6: Sabbasmiṃ vīsayojanasatike magge ekarattivāsenāti imassa atthassa adhippetattā.
atk-s0503a:308_7: Ekarattimattaṃ so sakalasmiṃ tasmiṃ magge vasitvā pacchimadivase pubbaṇhasamaye sāvatthiṃ anuppattoti.
atk-s0503a:309_0: Bhagavāpi bāhiyassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā “na tāvassa indriyāni paripākaṃ gatāni,
atk-s0503a:309_1: khaṇantare pana paripākaṃ gamissantī”ti tassa indriyānaṃ paripākaṃ āgamayamāno mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tasmiṃ khaṇe sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0503a:309_2: So ca jetavanaṃ pavisitvā bhuttapātarāse kāyālasiyavimocanatthaṃ abbhokāse caṅkamante sambahule bhikkhū
atk-s0503a:309_3: passitvā “kahaṃ nu kho etarahi bhagavā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0503a:309_4: Bhikkhū “bhagavā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti vatvā pucchiṃsu “tvaṃ pana kuto āgato”ti?
atk-s0503a:309_7: tāva pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā thokaṃ vissamāhi,
atk-s0503a:309_10: ekarattenevamhi katthacipi ciraṃ aṭṭhatvā anisīditvā vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgato,
atk-s0503a:309_11: satthāraṃ passitvāva vissamissāmī”ti vatvā taramānarūpo sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā anopamāya buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ passi.
atk-s0503a:309_12: Tena vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū abbhokāse caṅkamanti.
atk-s0503a:309_13: Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:310_5: Mayañhi taṃ bhagavantaṃ andho viya cakkhuṃ,
atk-s0503a:310_12: mahāsamudde bhinnanāvo viya mahākullaṃ passituṃ upasaṅkamituñca icchāmāti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:311_1: attano sarīrasobhāsampattiyā rūpakāyadassanabyāvaṭassa janassa sabbabhāgato pasādāvahaṃ.
atk-s0503a:311_3: buddhadhammappabhutiaparimāṇaguṇagaṇasamannāgatāya dhammakāyasampattiyā sarikkhakajanassa pasādanīyaṃ pasīditabbayuttaṃ pasādārahaṃ vā.
atk-s0503a:311_6: Uttamadamathasamathamanuppattanti lokuttarapaññāvimutticetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ uttamaṃ damathaṃ samathañca anuppatvā adhigantvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:311_7: Dantanti suparisuddhakāyasamācāratāya ceva hatthapādakukkuccābhāvato davādiabhāvato ca kāyena dantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:311_8: Guttanti suparisuddhavacīsamācāratāya ceva niratthakavācābhāvato davādiabhāvato ca vācāya guttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:311_9: Yatindriyanti suparisuddhamanosamācāratāya ariyiddhiyogena abyāvaṭaappaṭisaṅkhānupekkhābhāvato ca manindriyavasena yatindriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:311_13: punabbhavassa ca agamanatoti imehi kāraṇehi nāgaṃ.
atk-s0503a:311_14: Ettha ca pāsādikanti iminā rūpakāyena bhagavato pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0503a:311_17: Tena catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse anavasesato sattānaṃ bhagavato pamāṇabhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:312_0: Evaṃbhūtañca bhagavantaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “cirassaṃ vata me sammāsambuddho diṭṭho”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0503a:312_1: pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭasarīro pītivipphāritavivaṭaniccalalocano diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0503a:312_2: oṇatasarīro bhagavato sarīrappabhāvemajjhaṃ ajjhogāhetvā tattha nimujjanto bhagavato samīpaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:312_3: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā bhagavato pāde sambāhanto paricumbanto “desetu me, bhante,
atk-s0503a:313_8: Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gato,
atk-s0503a:313_10: Sundarañcesa ṭhānaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā sugato.
atk-s0503a:313_11: Sammā ca gatattā sugato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna apaccāgamanato.
atk-s0503a:314_1: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato.
atk-s0503a:315_0: Atha vā sammā gatattāti tīsupi avatthāsu sammāpaṭipattiyā gatattā,
atk-s0503a:315_2: Dīpaṅkarapādamūlato hi paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhimaṇḍā tāva samatiṃsapāramipūritāya sammāpaṭipattiyā ñātatthacariyāya
atk-s0503a:315_3: lokatthacariyāya buddhatthacariyāya koṭiṃ pāpuṇitvā sabbalokassa hitasukhameva paribrūhanto sassataṃ
atk-s0503a:315_4: ucchedaṃ kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime ante anupagacchantiyā anuttarāya bojjhaṅgabhāvanāsaṅkhātāya
atk-s0503a:315_5: majjhimāya paṭipadāya ariyasaccesu tato paraṃ samadhigatadhammādhipateyyo sabbasattesu avisayāya sammāpaṭipattiyā
atk-s0503a:315_6: ca gato paṭipannoti evampi sammā gatattā sugato.
atk-s0503a:315_7: Sammā cesa gadati yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva vācaṃ bhāsatīti sugato.
atk-s0503a:316_5: nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhita”nti.
atk-s0503a:320_0: Yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti yaṃ dhammassa upadisanaṃ cirakālaṃ mama jhānavimokkhādihitāya tadadhigantabbasukhāya ca siyā.
atk-s0503a:320_1: Akālo kho tāva bāhiyāti tava dhammadesanāya na tāva kāloti attho.
atk-s0503a:320_2: Kiṃ pana bhagavato sattahitapaṭipattiyā akālopi nāma atthi,
atk-s0503a:320_5: Yasmā pana tadā bāhiyassa attano indriyānaṃ paripakkāparipakkabhāvo dubbiññeyyo,
atk-s0503a:320_6: tasmā bhagavā taṃ avatvā attano antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitabhāvamassa kāraṇaṃ apadisanto āha “antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhamhā”ti.
atk-s0503a:320_8: Jīvitantarāyānanti jīvitassa antarāyakaradhammānaṃ vattanaṃ avattanaṃ vāti vattukāmo sambhamavasena “jīvitantarāyāna”nti āha.
atk-s0503a:320_9: Tathā hi anekapaccayappaṭibaddhavuttijīvitaṃ anekarūpā ca tadantarāyā.
atk-s0503a:322_0: Na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:323_4: Na hi tesaṃ appattaarahattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hoti.
atk-s0503a:323_5: Kiṃ pana kāraṇā bhagavā tassa dhammaṃ desetukāmova dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipi?
atk-s0503a:323_6: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “imassa maṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ,
atk-s0503a:323_8: dhammaṃ sutvāpi na tāva sakkhissati paṭivijjhituṃ.
atk-s0503a:323_11: vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ āgatattā darathopissa kāye balavā,
atk-s0503a:323_14: Keci pana “dhammassavane ādarajananatthaṃ bhagavā evamakāsī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:323_15: Tatiyavāraṃ yācito pana majjhattupekkhaṃ darathappaṭipassaddhiṃ paccupaṭṭhitañcassa jīvitantarāyaṃ disvā
atk-s0503a:323_16: “idāni dhammadesanāya kālo”ti cintetvā “tasmā tihā”tiādinā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0503a:324_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā tvaṃ ussukkajāto hutvā ativiya maṃ yācasi,
atk-s0503a:324_2: indriyāni ca te paripākaṃ gatāni, tasmā.
atk-s0503a:324_4: Teti tayā evanti idāni vattabbākāraṃ vadati.
atk-s0503a:325_0: Sikkhitabbanti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ tissannampi sikkhānaṃ vasena sikkhanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:326_0: Tattha diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattanti rūpāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhamattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:326_1: Yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpe rūpamattameva passati,
atk-s0503a:326_4: Cakkhudvārikaviññāṇena hi me diṭṭhamattameva bhavissatīti sikkhitabbanti attho.
atk-s0503a:326_5: Atha vā diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena rūpavijānananti attho.
atk-s0503a:326_10: yathā āpāthagate rūpe cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na rajjati,
atk-s0503a:326_13: evaṃ rāgādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattameva me javanaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:327_0: Atha vā diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0503a:327_5: evaṃ āpāthagate rūpe teneva sampaṭicchanādippamāṇena javanaṃ uppādessāmi,
atk-s0503a:327_6: nāhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjanādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:327_9: Viññāte viññātamattanti ettha pana viññātaṃ nāma manodvārāvajjanena viññātārammaṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:327_14: evaṃ rajjanādivasena ca uppajjituṃ adatvā āvajjanappamāṇeneva cittaṃ ṭhapessāmīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0503a:327_16: sikkhitabbanti evaṃ imāya paṭipadāya tayā, bāhiya,
atk-s0503a:328_0: Iti bhagavā bāhiyassa saṃkhittarucitāya chahi viññāṇakāyehi saddhiṃ chaḷārammaṇabhedabhinnaṃ vipassanāya
atk-s0503a:328_1: visayaṃ diṭṭhādīhi catūhi koṭṭhāsehi vibhajitvā tatthassa ñātatīraṇapariññaṃ dasseti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0503a:328_2: Ettha hi rūpāyatanaṃ passitabbaṭṭhena diṭṭhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0503a:328_5: na ettha koci kattā vā kāretā vā,
atk-s0503a:328_8: avasavattanaṭṭhena anattāti kuto tattha paṇḍitassa rajjanādīnaṃ okāsoti?
atk-s0503a:329_0: Idāni ñātatīraṇapariññāsu patiṭṭhitassa upari saha maggaphalena pahānapariññaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:329_9: tava yasmiṃ kāle yena vā kāraṇena diṭṭhādīsu mayā vuttavidhiṃ paṭipajjantassa aviparītasabhāvāvabodhena diṭṭhādimattaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:329_10: tasmiṃ kāle tena vā kāraṇena diṭṭhādipaṭibaddhena rāgādinā saha na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:329_11: ratto vā duṭṭho vā mūḷho vā na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:329_12: pahīnarāgādikattā tena vā diṭṭhādinā saha paṭibaddho na bhavissasīti.
atk-s0503a:329_14: na tatthāti yadā yasmā vā tvaṃ tena rāgena vā ratto dosena vā duṭṭho mohena vā mūḷho na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:329_15: tadā tasmā vā tvaṃ tattha diṭṭhādike na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:329_16: tasmiṃ diṭṭhe vā sutamutaviññāte vā “etaṃ mama,
atk-s0503a:329_18: eso me attā”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi allīno patiṭṭhito na bhavissasi.
atk-s0503a:329_19: Ettāvatā pahānapariññaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā khīṇāsavabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0503a:330_1: nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarenāti yadā tvaṃ, bāhiya,
atk-s0503a:330_2: tena rāgādinā tattha diṭṭhādīsu paṭibaddho na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:330_3: tadā tvaṃ neva idhaloke na paraloke na ubhayatthāpi.
atk-s0503a:330_4: Esevanto dukkhassāti kilesadukkhassa ca vaṭṭadukkhassa ca ayameva hi anto ayaṃ parivaṭumabhāvoti ayameva hi ettha attho.
atk-s0503a:330_5: Ye pana “ubhayamantarenā”ti padaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ nāma icchanti,
atk-s0503a:331_0: Atha vā antarenāti vacanaṃ pana vikappantarābhāvadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:331_4: Yepi ca “antarāparinibbāyī sambhavesī”ti ca imesaṃ suttapadānaṃ atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “atthiyeva antarābhavo”ti vadanti,
atk-s0503a:331_5: tepi yasmā avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarā aggamaggādhigamena anavasesakilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0503a:331_13: Catūsu vā yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujasattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
atk-s0503a:331_15: aṇḍakosato vatthikosato ca bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0503a:331_16: Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesī nāma,
atk-s0503a:331_23: Sati hi ujuke pāḷianugate atthe kiṃ aniddhāritasāmatthiyena antarābhavena parikappitena payojananti.
atk-s0503a:332_0: Ye pana “santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvo diṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:332_2: evaṃ saviññāṇakasantānepi avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:332_5: Tena hi iddhimato cetovasippattassa cittānugatikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa khaṇena brahmalokato idhūpasaṅkamane ito vā brahmalokagamane yutti vattabbā.
atk-s0503a:332_6: Yadi sabbattheva avicchinnadese dhammānaṃ pavatti icchitā,
atk-s0503a:332_13: Tathā hi mukhaghosādīhi paccayehi aññasmiṃ dese ādāsapabbatappadesādike paṭibimbapaṭighosādikaṃ paccayuppannaṃ nibbattamānaṃ dissati,
atk-s0503a:332_14: tasmā na sabbaṃ sabbattha upanetabbanti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0503a:332_15: Vitthāro pana paṭibimbassa udāharaṇabhāvasādhanādiko antarābhavakathāvicāro kathāvatthupakaraṇassa ṭīkāyaṃ gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:333_10: Evaṃ tāva “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā diṭṭhādivasena catudhā tebhūmakadhammā saṅgahetabbā.
atk-s0503a:333_14: na tenā”ti iminā rāgādīnaṃ samucchedassa adhippetattā maggo.
atk-s0503a:334_0: Imāya saṃkhittapadāya desanāya tāvadevāti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe,
atk-s0503a:334_3: Āsavehīti ābhavaggaṃ āgotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādiāsavasadisatāya ca “āsavā”ti laddhanāmehi kāmarāgādīhi.
atk-s0503a:334_4: Vimuccīti samucchedavimuttiyā paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā ca vimucci nissajji.
atk-s0503a:334_5: So hi satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto eva sīlāni sodhetvā yathāladdhaṃ cittasamādhiṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0503a:334_6: khippābhiññatāya tāvadeva sabbāsave khepetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:334_7: So saṃsārasotaṃ chinditvā katavaṭṭapariyanto antimadehadharo hutvā ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇāsu pavattāsu
atk-s0503a:334_10: Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesā”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:335_0: So kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane vīsavassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karonto “bhikkhunā nāma attanā paccaye
atk-s0503a:335_1: labhitvā yathādānaṃ karontena attanāva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekassa bhikkhussapi pattena vā cīvarena
atk-s0503a:335_5: “so kira buddhasuññe loke coro hutvā dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvā araññe corikaṃ karonto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:335_6: disvā pattacīvaralobhena taṃ usunā vijjhitvā pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0503a:335_8: satthā taṃ ñatvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ na adāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:335_9: Tampi pattacīvarapariyesanaṃ caramānaṃ ekā dhenu vegena āpatantī paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0503a:335_10: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:336_0: Tattha acirapakkantassāti na ciraṃ pakkantassa bhagavato.
atk-s0503a:336_3: Jīvitā voropesīti purimasmiṃ attabhāve laddhāghātatāya diṭṭhamatteneva vericittaṃ uppādetvā siṅgena paharitvā jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0503a:337_0: Satthā piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nagarato nikkhamanto bāhiyassa sarīraṃ
atk-s0503a:337_3: ekasmiṃ gharadvāre ṭhatvā mañcakaṃ āharāpetvā idaṃ sarīraṃ nagarato nīharitvā jhāpetvā thūpaṃ karothā”ti,
atk-s0503a:337_5: Katvā ca pana vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attanā katakiccaṃ ārocetvā tassa abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:337_6: Atha nesaṃ bhagavā tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0503a:337_10: “Mama dhammaṃ sutakāle”ti ca vutte “kadā panassa tumhehi dhammo kathito”ti?
atk-s0503a:337_16: mama dhammaṃ ‘appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā’ti pamiṇatha,
atk-s0503a:337_18: atthanissitaṃ pana ekampi gāthāpadaṃ seyyo”ti dassento –
atk-s0503a:339_0: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. –
atk-s0503a:340_0: Dhammapade imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā “na kevalaṃ so parinibbānamattena,
atk-s0503a:340_1: atha kho mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggabhāvenapi pūjāraho”ti dassento “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0503a:340_4: yadidaṃ bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti taṃ āyasmantaṃ etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:341_5: Thūpañcassa karothāti assa bāhiyassa sarīradhātuyo gahetvā cetiyañca karotha.
atk-s0503a:341_11: yaṃ tumhe seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmaṃ adhisīlādipaṭipattidhammaṃ sandiṭṭhaṃ caratha,
atk-s0503a:341_12: taṃ so tumhehi samānaṃ brahmaṃ acarīti sabrahmacārī maraṇakālassa pattiyāva kālakato,
atk-s0503a:342_0: Tassa kā gatīti pañcasu gatīsu tassa katamā gati upapatti bhavabhūtā,
atk-s0503a:342_2: ariyo puthujjano vāti kā niṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0503a:342_4: Kiñcāpi tassa thūpakaraṇāṇattiyāva parinibbutabhāvo atthato pakāsito hoti,
atk-s0503a:342_5: ye pana bhikkhū tattakena na jāniṃsu,
atk-s0503a:342_7: Pākaṭataraṃ vā kārāpetukāmā tathā bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:343_0: Paṇḍitoti aggamaggapaññāya adhigatattā paṇḍena ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito.
atk-s0503a:343_6: Na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇanti dhammadesanāhetu na ca maṃ vihesesi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattā.
atk-s0503a:343_7: Yo hi satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā gahetvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjati,
atk-s0503a:343_12: Atha vā na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇanti na ca imaṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:343_14: vaṭṭadukkhato niyyānahetubhūtaṃ imaṃ mama sāsanadhammaṃ suppaṭipannattā na viheseti.
atk-s0503a:343_15: Duppaṭipanno hi sāsanaṃ bhindanto satthu dhammasarīre pahāraṃ deti nāma.
atk-s0503a:343_16: Ayaṃ pana sammāpaṭipattiṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0503a:344_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ therassa bāhiyassa anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:344_1: tathā parinibbutānañca khīṇāsavānaṃ gatiyā pacurajanehi dubbiññeyyabhāvaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:344_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ appatiṭṭhitaparinibbānānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:345_0: Tattha yatthāti yasmiṃ nibbāne āpo ca na gādhati,
atk-s0503a:345_1: pathavī ca tejo ca vāyo ca na gādhati,
atk-s0503a:345_4: Na hi tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ lesopi sambhavati.
atk-s0503a:345_7: Ādicco nappakāsatīti tīsu dīpesu ekasmiṃ khaṇe ālokapharaṇasamattho ādiccopi ābhāvasena na dibbati.
atk-s0503a:345_8: Na tattha candimā bhātīti satipi bhāsurabhāve kantasītalakiraṇo candopi tasmiṃ nibbāne abhāvato eva attano juṇhāvibhāsanena na virocati.
atk-s0503a:345_10: lokantaro viya niccandhakārameva taṃ bhaveyyāti āsaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha “tamo tattha na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:345_11: Sati hi rūpābhāve tamo nāma na siyā.
atk-s0503a:346_1: muni monena brāhmaṇoti catusaccamunanato monanti laddhanāmena maggañāṇena kāyamoneyyādīhi ca samannāgatattā
atk-s0503a:346_2: “munī”ti laddhanāmo ariyasāvakabrāhmaṇo teneva monasaṅkhātena paṭivedhañāṇena yadā yasmiṃ kāle aggamaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0503a:346_3: attanā sayameva anussavādike pahāya attapaccakkhaṃ katvā nibbānaṃ vedi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0503a:346_7: sukhadukkhā pamuccatīti athāti tassa nibbānassa jānanato pacchā.
atk-s0503a:346_9: tena pañcavokārabhavo ekavokārabhavo ca gahito hoti.
atk-s0503a:346_18: Evametasmā sakalatopi vaṭṭato accantameva muccatīti gāthādvayenapi bhagavā “mayhaṃ puttassa bāhiyassa evarūpā nibbānagatī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:351_1: Mucalindavaggassa paṭhame mucalindamūleti ettha mucalindo vuccati nīparukkho.
atk-s0503a:351_5: taṃ vanajeṭṭhakatāya pana mucalindoti vutta”nti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:351_7: So hi gimhānaṃ pacchime māse sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūrento udapādi.
atk-s0503a:351_8: Sattāhavaddalikāti tasmiṃ uppanne sattāhaṃ avicchinnavuṭṭhikā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:351_9: Sītavātaduddinīti sā ca sattāhavaddalikā udakaphusitasammissena sītavātena samantato paribbhamantena dusitadivasattā duddinī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0503a:351_10: Mucalindo nāma nāgarājāti tasseva mucalindarukkhassa samīpe pokkharaṇiyā heṭṭhā nāgabhavanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0503a:351_13: Sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvāti sattavāre attano sarīrabhogehi bhagavato kāyaṃ parivāretvā.
atk-s0503a:351_14: Uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ vihaccāti bhagavato muddhappadesassa upari attano mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ pasāretvā.
atk-s0503a:352_0: Tassa kira nāgarājassa etadahosi “bhagavā ca mayhaṃ bhavanasamīpe rukkhamūle nisinno,
atk-s0503a:352_3: So sattaratanamayaṃ pāsādaṃ nimminituṃ sakkontopi “evaṃ kate kāyasāro gahito na bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:352_4: dasabalassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā dhāresi.
atk-s0503a:352_7: “Icchiticchitena iriyāpathena satthā viharissatī”ti kira nāgarājassa ajjhāsayo.
atk-s0503a:352_9: Tañca ṭhānaṃ supihitavātapānaṃ suphusitaaggaḷadvāraṃ kūṭāgāraṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0503a:352_10: Mā bhagavantaṃ sītantiādi tassa tathā karitvā ṭhānakāraṇaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:352_11: So hi “mā bhagavantaṃ sītaṃ bādhayittha, mā uṇhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:352_12: mā ḍaṃsādisamphasso bādhayitthā”ti tathā karitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:353_3: tampi mā bādhayitthāti evaṃ tassa cintetuṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:353_4: Keci panettha vadanti “uṇhaggahaṇaṃ bhogaparikkhepassa vipulabhāvakaraṇe kāraṇakittanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:353_5: Khuddake hi tasmiṃ bhagavantaṃ nāgassa sarīrasambhūtā usmā bādheyya,
atk-s0503a:353_6: vipulabhāvakaraṇena pana tādisaṃ ‘mā uṇhaṃ bādhayitthā’ti tathā karitvā aṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:355_0: Etamatthanti vivekasukhappaṭisaṃvedino yattha katthaci sukhameva hotīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārena jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:355_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ vivekasukhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:356_0: Tattha sukho vivekoti nibbānasaṅkhāto upadhiviveko sukho.
atk-s0503a:356_5: taṃ sabbaṃ attano vīriyabalādhigatena ñāṇacakkhunā passantassa.
atk-s0503a:356_8: Pāṇabhūtesu saṃyamoti sattesu ca saṃyamo avihiṃsanabhāvo sukhoti attho.
atk-s0503a:357_0: Sukhā virāgatā loketi vigatarāgatāpi loke sukhā. Kīdisī?
atk-s0503a:357_5: Asmimānassa yo vinayoti iminā pana arahattaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:360_1: Dutiye sambahulānanti vinayapariyāyena tayo janā “sambahulā”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0503a:360_7: Sā hi dhammaṃ desetuṃ āgatassa tathāgatassa bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṭṭhānanti “upaṭṭhānasālā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:360_8: Atha vā yattha bhikkhū vinayaṃ vinicchinanti,
atk-s0503a:360_13: Tatthāpi hi buddhāsanaṃ niccaṃ paññattameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:360_16: Sannipatitānanti tato tato āgantvā sannipatanavasena sannipatitānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:360_17: Atha vā buddhāsanaṃ purato katvā satthu sammukhe viya ādaruppattiyā sakkaccaṃ nisīdanavasena sannisinnānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:360_18: samānajjhāsayattā aññamaññasmiṃ ajjhāsayena suṭṭhu sammā ca nipatanavasena sannipatitānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:360_22: sāyaṃ labhitabbassa dhammassavanassa ca antarā pavattattā antarākathā,
atk-s0503a:360_23: samaṇasamācārasseva vā antarā pavattā aññā ekā kathāti antarākathā.
atk-s0503a:361_1: Mahaddhanataro vātiādīsu pathaviyaṃ nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitaṃ sattaratananicayasaṅkhātaṃ mahantaṃ dhanaṃ etassāti mahaddhano,
atk-s0503a:361_7: Devasikaṃ pavisanaāyabhūto mahanto koso etassāti mahākoso.
atk-s0503a:361_8: Apare pana “devasikaṃ pavisanaāyabhūtaṃ maṇisārapheggugumbādibhedabhinnaṃ pariggahavatthu dhanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:361_9: tadeva sāragabbhādīsu nihitaṃ koso”ti vadanti. Vajiro, mahānīlo, indanīlo, marakato, veḷuriyo,
atk-s0503a:361_20: Satta lohāni kahāpaṇo ca sāro nāma.
atk-s0503a:361_23: Tattha purimena ādisaddena sālivīhiādimuggamāsādipubbaṇṇāparaṇṇabhedaṃ dhaññavikatiṃ ādiṃ katvā yaṃ sattānaṃ upabhogaparibhogabhūtaṃ vatthu,
atk-s0503a:361_28: Icchitanibbattisaṅkhātā puññakammanipphannā mahatī iddhi etassāti mahiddhiko.
atk-s0503a:361_29: Tejasaṅkhāto ussāhamantapabhusattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo.
atk-s0503a:362_7: aṭṭhamena pabhāvasampadā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ pakāsitā hoti.
atk-s0503a:363_0: Dānādīhi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ rañjetīti rājā.
atk-s0503a:363_2: Mahatiyā senāya samannāgatattā seniyagottattā vā seniyo.
atk-s0503a:363_10: Ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antarākathā aniṭṭhitāti attho.
atk-s0503a:364_1: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti tato tato rūpādiārammaṇato cittassa paṭisaṃharaṇato paṭisallānasaṅkhātāya phalasamāpattito yathākālaparicchedaṃ vuṭṭhito.
atk-s0503a:364_2: Bhagavā hi pubbaṇhasamayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā bhikkhūnaṃ sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā
atk-s0503a:364_3: katabhattakicco bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sāvatthito nikkhamitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā gandhakuṭippamukhe ṭhatvā
atk-s0503a:364_4: vattaṃ dassetvā ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsamuṭṭhitaṃ sugatovādaṃ datvā tesu araññarukkhamūlādidivāṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:364_5: uddissa gatesu gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattisukhena divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā yathākālaparicchede
atk-s0503a:364_7: “mayhaṃ upagamanaṃ āgamayamānā catasso parisā sakalavihāraṃ paripūrentiyo nisinnā,
atk-s0503a:364_8: idāni me dhammadesanatthaṃ dhammasabhāmaṇḍalaṃ upagantuṃ kālo”ti āsanato vuṭṭhāya,
atk-s0503a:364_9: kesarasīho viya kañcanaguhāya surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā yūthaṃ upasaṅkamanto mattavaravāraṇo viya
atk-s0503a:364_12: chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjentiyā acinteyyānubhāvāya anupamāya buddhalīlāya samannāgatāya rūpakāyasampattiyā
atk-s0503a:365_0: Evaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ dassetvā nisinne te bhikkhū tuṇhībhūte disvā “mayi akathente ime bhikkhū buddhagāravena
atk-s0503a:365_3: Tattha kāya nutthāti katamāya nu bhavatha.
atk-s0503a:365_10: katamāya nāma kathāya idha sannisinnā bhavatha,
atk-s0503a:365_11: katamā ca tumhākaṃ kathā mamāgamanapaccayā aniṭṭhitā,
atk-s0503a:366_14: tumhe neva rājābhinītā na corābhinītā na iṇaṭṭā na jīvitapakatā pabbajitā,
atk-s0503a:366_15: atha kho saddhāya agārato nikkhamitvā mama sāsane pabbajitā,
atk-s0503a:366_16: tumhe etarahi evarūpiṃ rājappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ katheyyātha,
atk-s0503a:366_18: etaṃ tumhākaṃ na kho patirūpaṃ na yuttamevā”ti.
atk-s0503a:367_0: Evaṃ sannipatitānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ appatirūpaṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni nesaṃ patirūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ anujānanto “sannipatitānaṃ vo,
atk-s0503a:367_2: dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:367_4: Karaṇīyanti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā kattari sāmivacanametaṃ,
atk-s0503a:367_13: Keci pana “vacīsaṅkhārapaṭipakkhabhāvato dutiyajjhānaṃ ariyo tuṇhībhāvo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:367_17: cittavivekassa paribrūhanatthaṃ vivekaṭṭhakāyā suññāgāre viharantā sace kadāci sannipatatha,
atk-s0503a:367_18: evaṃ sannipatitehi tumhehi ‘assutaṃ sāveti sutaṃ vā pariyodapetī’ti vuttanayena aññamaññassūpakārāya
atk-s0503a:368_0: Tattha purimena karaṇīyavacanena anotiṇṇānaṃ sāsane otaraṇūpāyaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0503a:368_4: Atha vā purimena sammādiṭṭhiyā paṭhamaṃ uppattihetuṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0503a:369_2: hetū dve paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya parato ca ghoso,
atk-s0503a:370_1: pacchimena lokuttarasammādiṭṭhiyā mūlakāraṇanti evamādinā ettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:371_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti tehi bhikkhūhi kittitakāmasampattito jhānādisampatti santatarā ceva paṇītatarā cāti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:371_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ ariyavihārasukhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:372_0: Tattha yañca kāmasukhaṃ loketi lokasaddo “khandhaloko āyatanaloko dhātuloko”tiādīsu saṅkhāresu āgato.
atk-s0503a:377_1: “Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento”tiādīsu sattesu.
atk-s0503a:377_2: Idha pana sattaloke okāsaloke ca veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:377_3: Tasmā avīcito paṭṭhāya upari brahmalokato heṭṭhā etasmiṃ loke yaṃ vatthukāme paṭicca kilesakāmavasena uppajjanato kāmasahagataṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:377_4: Yañcidaṃ diviyaṃ sukhanti yañca idaṃ divi bhavaṃ dibbavihāravasena ca laddhabbaṃ brahmānaṃ manussānañca rūpasamāpattisukhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:377_6: taṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā taṇhāya ca paṭipassambhanavasena pavattaphalasamāpattisukhaṃ taṇhakkhayasukhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0503a:378_2: cakkavattisukhaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbasmiṃ manussaloke manussasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:378_4: cātumahārājikādidevaloke chabbidhaṃ kāmasukhanti yaṃ ekādasavidhe kāmaloke uppajjantaṃ kāmasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:378_5: yañca idaṃ rūpārūpadevesu dibbavihārabhūtesu rūpārūpajjhānesu ca uppannattā “diviya”nti laddhanāmaṃ lokiyajjhānasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:378_6: sakalampi tadubhayaṃ taṇhakkhayasukhasaṅkhātaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ soḷasa bhāge katvā tato ekabhāgaṃ
atk-s0503a:378_7: soḷasabhāgaguṇe laddhaṃ ekabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ kalaṃ na agghatīti.
atk-s0503a:379_1: Pāḷiyaṃ avisesena taṇhakkhayassa āgatattā paṭhamaphalasamāpattisukhassāpi kalaṃ lokiyaṃ na agghati eva.
atk-s0503a:383_2: rājā cakkavattī catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāretvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ
atk-s0503a:383_3: saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahabyataṃ,
atk-s0503a:383_4: so tattha nandane vane accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti,
atk-s0503a:384_2: ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ…pe...
atk-s0503a:384_10: Imehi catūhi dhammehi samannāgato hoti. Yo ca,
atk-s0503a:384_14: catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ paṭilābho catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭilābhassa kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti.
atk-s0503a:385_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbattha lokiyasukhaṃ sauttaraṃ sātisayaṃ,
atk-s0503a:388_2: Antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca jetavananti antarāsaddo “tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya,
atk-s0503a:388_7: aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe.
atk-s0503a:388_12: tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare.
atk-s0503a:388_14: Tasmā sāvatthiyā ca jetavanassa ca vivareti,
atk-s0503a:388_16: Antarāsaddayogato cettha upayogavacanaṃ “antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca jetavana”nti.
atk-s0503a:388_17: Īdisesu ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca gacchatī”ti ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti,
atk-s0503a:389_0: Ahiṃ daṇḍena hanantīti bilato nikkhamitvā gocarāya gacchantaṃ kaṇhasappaṃ chātajjhattaṃ anubandhitvā yaṭṭhīhi pothenti.
atk-s0503a:389_1: Tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya gacchanto antarāmagge te dārake ahiṃ daṇḍena hanante disvā
atk-s0503a:389_2: “kasmā kumārakā imaṃ ahiṃ daṇḍena hanathā”ti pucchitvā “ḍaṃsanabhayena,
atk-s0503a:389_3: bhante”ti ca vutte “ime attano sukhaṃ karissāmāti imaṃ paharantā nibbattaṭṭhāne dukkhaṃ anubhavissanti,
atk-s0503a:390_0: Tattha etamatthaṃ viditvāti “ime dārakā attasukhāya paradukkhaṃ karontā sayaṃ parattha sukhaṃ na labhissantī”ti etamatthaṃ jānitvāti evameke vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0503a:390_1: Aññesaṃ duppaṭipannānaṃ sukhapariyesanaṃ āyatiṃ dukkhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0503a:390_3: Tasmā “paravihesāvinimuttā accantameva sukhabhāgino vata mayhaṃ ovādappaṭikarā”ti somanassavasenevetampi satthā udānaṃ udānesīti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:390_4: Apare pana bhaṇanti “evaṃ tehi kumārakehi pavattitaṃ paraviheṭhanaṃ sabbākārena ādīnavato viditvā paravihesāya
atk-s0503a:390_5: parānukampāya ca yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:391_0: Tattha sukhakāmānīti ekanteneva attano sukhassa icchanato sukhānugiddhāni.
atk-s0503a:391_2: Yo daṇḍena vihiṃsatīti ettha daṇḍenāti desanāmattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:391_6: yo sukhakāmāni sabbabhūtāni jātiādinā ghaṭṭanavasena vacīdaṇḍena vā pāṇimuggarasatthādīhi pothanatāḷanacchedanādivasena
atk-s0503a:391_7: sarīradaṇḍena vā sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā ṭhāpanavasena dhanadaṇḍena vāti imesu daṇḍesu yena kenaci daṇḍena
atk-s0503a:391_10: pecca so na labhate sukhanti so puggalo attano sukhaṃ esanto gavesanto patthento pecca paraloke manussasukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:391_11: dibbasukhaṃ nibbānasukhanti tividhampi sukhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0503a:391_12: aññadatthu tena daṇḍena dukkhameva labhatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:392_0: Pecca so labhate sukhanti yo khantimettānuddayasampanno “yathāhaṃ sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo,
atk-s0503a:392_1: evaṃ sabbepī”ti cintetvā sampattaviratiādīsu ṭhito vuttanayena kenaci daṇḍena sabbānipi bhūtāni na hiṃsati na bādhati,
atk-s0503a:392_5: Ettha ca tādisassa puggalassa avassaṃbhāvitāya taṃ sukhaṃ paccuppannaṃ viya hotīti dassanatthaṃ “labhate”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:395_1: Catutthe tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hotīti kappānaṃ satasahassādhikesu catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu
atk-s0503a:395_2: paripūritassa puññasambhāravisesassa phalabhūtena “ito paraṃ mayhaṃ okāso natthī”ti ussahajātena viya
atk-s0503a:395_3: uparūpari vaḍḍhamānena sakkārādinā bhagavā sakkato hoti.
atk-s0503a:395_4: Sabbadisāsu hi yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmā”ti
atk-s0503a:395_11: Sakaṭasatehi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇepi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ āhacca
atk-s0503a:395_12: tiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya.
atk-s0503a:395_13: Sabbaṃ taṃ khandhake tesu tesu ca suttesu āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:396_1: etarahi saṅghā vā gaṇā vā loke uppannā, nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0503a:397_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ udakogho viya appameyyo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:397_2: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti…pe…
atk-s0503a:398_0: Titthiyā pana pubbe akatapuññatāya ca duppaṭipannatāya ca asakkatā agarukatā,
atk-s0503a:398_1: buddhuppādena pana visesato vipannasobhā sūriyuggamane khajjopanakā viya nippabhā nittejā hatalābhasakkārā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:398_2: Te tādisaṃ bhagavato saṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṃ asahamānā issāpakatā “evaṃ ime pharusāhi vācāhi ghaṭṭetvāva
atk-s0503a:398_3: palāpessāmā”ti usūyā visuggāraṃ uggirantā tattha tattha bhikkhū akkosantā paribhāsantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:398_7: Atha kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā bhagavato sakkāraṃ asahamānā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gāme ca araññe
atk-s0503a:398_8: ca bhikkhū disvā asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesentī”ti.
atk-s0503a:399_0: Tattha asabbhāhīti asabhāyoggāhi sabhāyaṃ sādhujanasamūhe vattuṃ ayuttāhi,
atk-s0503a:400_0: Kathaṃ panete samantapāsādike bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca akkosādīni pavattesunti?
atk-s0503a:400_1: Bhagavato uppādato pahīnalābhasakkāratāya upahatacittā pathaviṃ khaṇitvā pakkhalantā viya avaṇe veḷuriyamaṇimhi
atk-s0503a:400_2: vaṇaṃ uppādentā viya ca sundarikaṃ nāma paribbājikaṃ saññāpetvā tāya satthu bhikkhūnañca avaṇṇaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0503a:400_4: Taṃ panetaṃ sundarīvatthu parato sundarīsutte pāḷiyaṃyeva āgamissati,
atk-s0503a:401_0: Bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattimārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:401_2: “atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu…pe…
atk-s0503a:402_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ issāpakatānaṃ titthiyānaṃ vippaṭipattiṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:402_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ tehi kate vippakāre pasannacittehi ca parehi kate upakāre tādibhāvānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:403_0: Tattha gāme araññe sukhadukkhaphuṭṭhoti gāme vā araññe vā yattha katthaci sukhena dukkhena ca phuṭṭho sukhadukkhāni anubhavanto,
atk-s0503a:403_6: parenidaṃ mayhaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ uppādita”nti ca neva attato na parato taṃ sukhadukkhaṃ ṭhapetha. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:403_7: Na hettha khandhapañcake ahanti vā mamanti vā paroti vā parassāti vā passitabbayuttakaṃ kiñci atthi,
atk-s0503a:403_8: kevalaṃ saṅkhārā eva pana yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjitvā khaṇe khaṇe bhijjantīti.
atk-s0503a:404_0: Idāni tassa attato parato ca adahanassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti “phusanti phassā upadhiṃ paṭiccā”ti.
atk-s0503a:404_1: Ete sukhavedanīyā dukkhavedanīyā ca phassā nāma khandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ upadhiṃ paṭicca tasmiṃ sati yathāsakaṃ visayaṃ phusanti,
atk-s0503a:404_3: Adukkhamasukhā hi vedanā santasabhāvatāya sukhe eva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti duvidhasamphassavasenevāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā katā.
atk-s0503a:405_0: Yathā pana te phassā na phusanti,
atk-s0503a:405_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “nirupadhiṃ kena phuseyyuṃ phassā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:405_2: Sabbaso hi khandhūpadhiyā asati kena kāraṇena te phassā phuseyyuṃ,
atk-s0503a:405_4: Yadi hi tumhe akkosādivasena uppajjanasukhadukkhaṃ na icchatha,
atk-s0503a:405_5: sabbaso nirupadhibhāveyeva yogaṃ kareyyāthāti anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā gāthaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:408_1: Pañcame icchānaṅgalakoti icchānaṅgalanāmako kosalesu eko brāhmaṇagāmo,
atk-s0503a:408_2: taṃnivāsitāya tattha vā jāto bhavoti vā icchānaṅgalako.
atk-s0503a:408_3: Upāsakoti tīhi saraṇagamanehi bhagavato santike upāsakabhāvassa paveditattā upāsako pañcasikkhāpadiko buddhamāmako,
atk-s0503a:408_8: Ayaṃ kira upāsako pubbe abhiṇhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsati,
atk-s0503a:408_9: so katipayaṃ kālaṃ bahukaraṇīyatāya satthu dassanaṃ nābhisambhosi.
atk-s0503a:409_5: idha mama santike āgamanāya yo ayaṃ ajja kato vāro,
atk-s0503a:409_6: taṃ imaṃ cirena papañcaṃ katvā akāsīti.
atk-s0503a:409_10: Atha vā kehici kehicīti yehi vā tehi vā.
atk-s0503a:409_12: Satthari abhippasannassa hi satthudassanadhammassavanesu viya na aññattha ādaro hoti.
atk-s0503a:409_20: Evāhanti evaṃ iminā pakārena ahaṃ nāsakkhiṃ upasaṅkamituṃ,
atk-s0503a:410_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti dullabhe buddhuppāde manussattalābhe ca sattānaṃ sakiñcanabhāvena kiccapasutatāya kusalantarāyo hoti,
atk-s0503a:410_2: Imaṃ udānanti tadatthaparidīpanameva imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:411_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vata tassa na hoti kiñcīti yassa puggalassa kiñci rūpādīsu ekavatthumpi “mameta”nti taṇhāya
atk-s0503a:411_1: pariggahitabhāvena na hoti natthi na vijjati,
atk-s0503a:411_6: Keci pana na hoti kiñcīti padassa “rāgādikiñcanaṃ yassa na hotī”ti atthaṃ vaṇṇenti,
atk-s0503a:411_7: taṃ na sundaraṃ pariggahadhammavasena desanāya āgatattā.
atk-s0503a:411_8: Rāgādikiñcananti pariggahetabbassāpi saṅgahe sati yuttameva vuttaṃ siyā atha vā yassa puggalassa kiñci
atk-s0503a:411_9: appampi kiñcanaṃ palibodhajātaṃ rāgādikiñcanābhāvato eva na hoti,
atk-s0503a:411_10: taṃ tassa akiñcanattaṃ sukhassa paccayabhāvato sukhaṃ vataṃ,
atk-s0503a:411_12: Kassa pana na hoti kiñcananti ce,
atk-s0503a:411_14: Yo catūhipi maggasaṅkhāhi soḷasakiccanipphattiyā saṅkhātadhammo katakicco,
atk-s0503a:412_0: Iti bhagavā akiñcanabhāve ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā sakiñcanabhāve ādīnavaṃ dassetuṃ “sakiñcanaṃ passā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:412_3: sakiñcanattā eva aladdhānañca laddhānañca kāmānaṃ pariyesanārakkhaṇahetu kiccakaraṇīyavasena “ahaṃ mamā”ti
atk-s0503a:412_4: gahaṇavasena ca vihaññamānaṃ vighātaṃ āpajjamānaṃ passāti dhammasaṃvegappatto satthā attano cittaṃ vadati.
atk-s0503a:412_5: Jano janasmiṃ paṭibandharūpoti sayaṃ añño jano samāno aññasmiṃ jane “ahaṃ imassa,
atk-s0503a:412_6: mama aya”nti taṇhāvasena paṭibandhasabhāvo hutvā vihaññati vighātaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0503a:414_0: Attā hi attano natthi, kuto puttā kuto dhana”nti. –
atk-s0503a:418_1: Chaṭṭhe aññatarassa paribbājakassāti ekassa kuṭumbikassa paribbājakassa.
atk-s0503a:418_6: Upavijaññāti ajja suveti paccupaṭṭhitavijāyanakālā hotīti sambandho.
atk-s0503a:418_7: So kira brāhmaṇajātiko sabhariyo vādapatthassame ṭhito,
atk-s0503a:418_11: Telasīsena cettha yaṃ yaṃ vijātāya pasavadukkhappaṭikāratthaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:418_13: Yaṃ me vijātāya bhavissatīti yaṃ telādi mayhaṃ vijātāya bahinikkhantagabbhāya upakārāya bhavissati.
atk-s0503a:418_16: yato ñātikulā vā mittakulā vā telādiṃ āhareyyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:418_18: Telaṃ āharāmīti vattamānasamīpatāya vattamānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:418_20: Samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā sappissa vā telassa vāti ca samuccayattho vā-
atk-s0503a:418_21: saddo “aggito vā udakato vā mithubhedā vā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0503a:418_22: Sappissa vā telassa vāti paccatte sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:418_23: sappi ca telañca yāvadatthaṃ pātuṃ pivituṃ dīyatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:418_24: Apare pana “sappissa vā telassa vāti avayavasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:418_25: Sappitelasamudāyassa hi avayavo idha yāvadatthasaddena vuccatī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:418_26: No nīharitunti bhājanena vā hatthena vā bahi netuṃ no dīyati,
atk-s0503a:418_29: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ahaṃ rañño koṭṭhāgāraṃ gantvā telaṃ kaṇṭhamattaṃ pivitvā tāvadeva gharaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0503a:418_30: ekasmiṃ bhājane yathāpītaṃ vamitvā uddhanaṃ āropetvā pacissāmi,
atk-s0503a:418_33: telaṃ pana gahetvā imissā paribbājikāya kamme upanessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:419_1: Na pana adhoti viriñcanavasena heṭṭhā nīharituṃ na pana sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:419_2: So hi “adhikaṃ pītaṃ sayameva mukhato niggamissatī”ti pivitvā āsayassa arittatāya aniggate vamanavirecanayogaṃ
atk-s0503a:419_3: ajānanto alabhanto vā kevalaṃ dukkhāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭho āvaṭṭati ca parivaṭṭati ca.
atk-s0503a:419_8: Āvaṭṭatīti ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne anipajjitvā attano sarīraṃ ito cito ākaḍḍhanto āvaṭṭati.
atk-s0503a:419_9: Parivaṭṭatīti ekasmiṃ padese nipannopi aṅgapaccaṅgāni parito khipanto vaṭṭati,
atk-s0503a:420_1: akiñcanassa pana sabbaso ayaṃ natthī”ti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato jānitvā tadatthappakāsanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:421_0: Tattha sukhino vatāti sukhino vata sappurisā.
atk-s0503a:421_3: ye rāgādikiñcanassa pariggahakiñcanassa ca abhāvena akiñcanā,
atk-s0503a:421_7: tena vā vedena nibbānaṃ gatāti vedaguno,
atk-s0503a:421_8: te ariyajanā khīṇāsavapuggalā anavasesarāgādikiñcanānaṃ aggamaggena samucchinnattā akiñcanā nāma.
atk-s0503a:421_9: Asati hi rāgādikiñcane kuto pariggahakiñcanassa sambhavo.
atk-s0503a:421_10: Evaṃ gāthāya purimabhāgena arahante pasaṃsitvā aparabhāgena andhaputhujjane garahanto “sakiñcanaṃ passā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:424_9: kālena vā maccunā kato naṭṭho adassanaṃ gatoti kālaṅkato,
atk-s0503a:425_0: Sambahulā upāsakāti sāvatthivāsino bahū upāsakā mataputtaupāsakassa sahasokībhāvena yāva āḷāhanā pacchato
atk-s0503a:425_1: gantvā matasarīrassa kattabbaṃ kāretvā paṭinivattā yathānivatthāva udakaṃ otaritvā sīsaṃnhātā vatthāni
atk-s0503a:425_2: pīḷetvā anotāpetvāva ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā upāsakaṃ purato katvā “sokavinodanaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:426_7: tasmā jānantoyeva bhagavā kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchanto “kiṃ nu kho tumhe upāsakā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:426_9: tumhe upāsakā aññesu divasesu mama santikaṃ āgacchantā otāpitasuddhavatthā sāyanhe āgacchatha,
atk-s0503a:426_10: ajja pana allavatthā allakesā ṭhitamajjhanhike kāle idhāgatā,
atk-s0503a:426_12: Tena mayanti tena puttaviyogajanitacittasantāpena balavasokābhibhūtatāya evaṃbhūtā mayaṃ idhūpasaṅkamantāti.
atk-s0503a:427_1: asati piyavatthusmiṃ sabbaso ete na santīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato jānitvā tadatthappakāsanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:428_0: Tattha piyarūpassādagadhitāseti piyasabhāvesu rūpakkhandhādīsu sukhavedanassādena gadhitā paṭibaddhacittā.
atk-s0503a:430_0: Thiyo bandhū puthu kāme, yo naro anugijjhatī”ti ca. ;
atk-s0503a:431_0: Tasmā tesu piyarūpesu assādena giddhā mucchitā ajjhāpannāti attho.
atk-s0503a:431_1: Ke pana te piyarūpassādagadhitāti te dasseti “devakāyā puthumanussā cā”ti,
atk-s0503a:431_2: cātumahārājikādayo bahudevasamūhā ceva jambudīpakādikā bahumanussā ca.
atk-s0503a:431_6: Atha vā kāmañcekantasukhasamappitānaṃ devānaṃ dukkhajarārogā na sambhavanti,
atk-s0503a:431_8: Tesampi vā pubbanimittuppattiyā paṭicchannajarāya cetasikarogassa ca vasena dukkhādīnaṃ sambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:431_9: Maccurājassa vasaṃ gacchantīti piyavatthuvisayāya taṇhāya appahīnattā punappunaṃ gabbhūpagamanato dhātuttayissaratāya
atk-s0503a:432_0: Ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni “ye ve divā”tiādinā vivaṭṭaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:432_1: Tattha ye ve divā ca ratto ca appamattāti “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:432_2: vuttanayena divasabhāge rattibhāge ca daḷhaṃ appamattā appamādappaṭipadaṃ pūrenti.
atk-s0503a:432_3: Jahanti piyarūpanti catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggādhigamena piyarūpaṃ piyajātikaṃ
atk-s0503a:432_6: maccuno āmisaṃ durativattanti te ariyapuggalā aghassa vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0503a:432_8: ito bahiddhā kehicipi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi nivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya durativattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:434_0: Appamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:438_2: Kuṇḍadhānavaneti tassa nagarassa avidūre kuṇḍadhānasaṅkhāte vane.
atk-s0503a:439_0: Pubbe kira kuṇḍo nāma eko yakkho tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0503a:439_1: kuṇḍadhānamissakena ca balikammena tussatīti tassa tathā tattha baliṃ upaharanti,
atk-s0503a:439_4: sāpi tassa yakkhassa āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne niviṭṭhattā teneva paripālitattā kuṇḍikāti voharīyittha.
atk-s0503a:439_7: Tasmiñca vanasaṇḍe koliyarājāno bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vasanatthāya vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:439_9: Atha bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caranto anukkamena taṃ vihāraṃ patvā tattha vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:440_2: Sā hi bhagavato aggupaṭṭhāyikā paṇītadāyikānaṃ sāvikānaṃ etadagge ṭhapitā sotāpannā ariyasāvikā.
atk-s0503a:440_3: Yañhi kiñci bhagavato yuttarūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ bhesajjaṃ vā na tattha aññāhi saṃvidhātabbaṃ atthi,
atk-s0503a:440_4: sabbaṃ taṃ sayameva attano paññāya vicāretvā sakkaccaṃ sampādetvā upaneti.
atk-s0503a:440_6: Yo koci bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā taṃ kulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho rittahattho na gacchati.
atk-s0503a:440_7: Evaṃ muttacāgā payatapāṇī vossaggaratā yācayogā dānasaṃvibhāgaratā.
atk-s0503a:440_8: Assā kucchiyaṃ purimabuddhesu katādhikāro pacchimabhaviko sāvakabodhisatto paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:440_9: Sā taṃ gabbhaṃ kenacideva pāpakammena satta vassāni kucchinā parihari,
atk-s0503a:441_5: Gabbho hi paripakko sampajjamāno vijāyanakāle kammajavātehi sañcāletvā parivattito uddhaṃpādo adhosiro hutvā yonimukhābhimukho hoti,
atk-s0503a:441_6: evaṃ so katthaci alaggo bahi nikkhamati.
atk-s0503a:441_7: Vipajjamāno pana viparivattanavasena yonimaggaṃ pidahitvā tiriyaṃ nipajjati,
atk-s0503a:441_9: so tattha kammajavātehi aparāparaṃ parivattamāno byākulo mūḷhagabbhoti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:442_3: mātu cassāpi sotāpannāya ariyasāvikāya tathā dukkhānubhavanaṃ jātanti? Vuccate –
atk-s0503a:442_4: atīte kāsikarāje bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārente eko kosalarājā mahantena balenāgantvā bārāṇasiṃ gahetvā taṃ
atk-s0503a:442_5: rājānaṃ māretvā tassa aggamahesiṃ attano aggamahesiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:442_6: Bārāṇasirañño pana putto pitu maraṇakāle niddhamanadvārena palāyitvā attano ñātimittabandhave ekajjhaṃ
atk-s0503a:442_7: katvā anukkamena balaṃ saṃharitvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā avidūre mahantaṃ khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā tassa rañño
atk-s0503a:442_10: Rājakumārassa mātā sāsanaṃ sutvā “yuddhena kammaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:442_12: tato dārūdakabhattaparikkhayena kilantā nagare manussā vināva yuddhena rājānaṃ gahetvā dassantī”ti paṇṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0503a:442_13: So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā cattāri mahādvārāni rakkhanto satta vassāni nagaraṃ uparundhi,
atk-s0503a:442_14: nagare manussā cūḷadvārena nikkhamitvā dārūdakāni āharanti,
atk-s0503a:443_0: Atha rājakumārassa mātā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “bālo mama putto upāyaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0503a:443_2: assa cūḷadvārāni pidhāya nagaraṃ uparundhatūti vadethā”ti puttassa gūḷhasāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0503a:443_3: So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā satta divase tathā akāsi.
atk-s0503a:443_4: Nāgarā bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhantā sattame divase tassa rañño sīsaṃ gahetvā kumārassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:443_6: So tadā satta vassāni nagararundhanakammanissandena etarahi satta vassāni mātukucchisaṅkhātāya lohitakumbhiyā vasi,
atk-s0503a:443_7: avasesato pana sattāhaṃ nagarūparundhanena sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvaṃ āpajji.
atk-s0503a:443_8: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “satta divasāni nagaraṃ rundhitvā gahitakammanissandena sattavassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:443_10: Yaṃ pana so padumuttarasammāsambuddhapādamūle “lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti mahādānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0503a:443_11: yañca vipassissa bhagavato kāle nāgarehi saddhiṃ sahassagghanikaṃ guḷadadhiṃ datvā patthanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0503a:443_14: tātā”ti pesitabhāvena satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhājātā.
atk-s0503a:443_15: Evaṃ te mātāputtā attano kammassa anurūpaṃ īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvediṃsu.
atk-s0503a:444_4: nibbānassa ca dukkhanissaraṇabhāvaṃ anussarantī attano uppajjamānadukkhaṃ amanasikaraṇeneva abhibhavitvā khamati.
atk-s0503a:445_2: yo bhagyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā lokanātho sammā aviparītaṃ sāmaṃ sayameva sabbadhamme aho vata buddho,
atk-s0503a:445_3: so bhagavā evarūpassa etarahi mayā anubhaviyamānassa aññassa ca evaṃjātikassa sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0503a:445_7: Tassa yathāvuttaguṇassa bhagavato dhammassavanante jātattā sīladiṭṭhisāmaññena saṃhatattā ca sāvakasaṅghoti
atk-s0503a:445_8: laddhanāmo aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūho suppaṭipanno vata aho vata sammā paṭipanno,
atk-s0503a:445_9: yo ariyasaṅgho evarūpassa īdisassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pahānāya anuppādanirodhāya anivattipaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0503a:445_10: Susukhaṃ vata aho vata suṭṭhu sukhaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:445_11: yasmiṃ nibbāne īdisaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ na upalabbhatīti.
atk-s0503a:445_12: Ettha ca paṭipajjamānāpi paṭipannā icceva vuttā paṭipattiyā anivattibhāvato.
atk-s0503a:445_13: Atha vā uppannasaddo viya paṭipannasaddo vattamānatthopi veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:446_2: Mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhīti mayhaṃ vacanena cakkalakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitāni vikasitapadumasassirīkāni
atk-s0503a:446_6: yā ekadese uppajjitvāpi sakalasarīraṃ ayapaṭṭena ābandhitvā viya gaṇhati.
atk-s0503a:446_15: Gilānasseva ca uṭṭhānaṃ nāma garukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:446_17: tasmā niggelaññatāya lahuparivattisaṅkhātaṃ kāyassa lahuṭṭhānaṃ sarīrabalañca pucchāti vadati.
atk-s0503a:446_18: Phāsuvihāranti ṭhānanisinnagamanasayanasaṅkhātesu catūsu iriyāpathesu sukhavihārañca pucchāti vadati.
atk-s0503a:447_5: Sukhinī hotūti sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo satthā suppavāsāya pesitavandanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:447_6: attano mettāvihārasaṃsūcakaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ sukhūpasaṃhāraṃ tassā sāmaññato pakāsetvā puna tassā puttassa
atk-s0503a:448_2: tasmiṃyeva kāle tampi kammaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:448_3: Tassa parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ oloketvā satthā tathā abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:448_6: tato parampi kiñci kālaṃ tassā taṃ dukkhaṃ anubandhissā.
atk-s0503a:448_7: Yasmā pana bhagavatā “sukhinī arogā arogañca puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:448_8: tasmā tassa vacanasamakālameva so gabbho byākulabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sukheneva bahi nikkhami,
atk-s0503a:448_11: Yathā hi paṭācārāya piyavippayogasambhūtena sokena ummādaṃ patvā –
atk-s0503a:449_0: “Ubho puttā kālakatā, panthe mayhaṃ patī mato;
atk-s0503a:450_0: Mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitakamhi jhāyare”ti. –
atk-s0503a:451_0: Vatvā jātarūpeneva carantiyā “satiṃ paṭilabhāhi bhaginī”ti bhagavato vacanasamanantarameva ummādo vūpasami,
atk-s0503a:451_1: tathā suppiyāpi upāsikā attanāva attano ūruyaṃ katena mahāvaṇena vuṭṭhātuṃ asakkontī sayanapiṭṭhe nipannā
atk-s0503a:451_2: “āgantvā maṃ vandatū”ti vacanasamanantarameva vaṇe pākatike jāte sayameva gantvā bhagavantaṃ vandīti
atk-s0503a:452_1: yathā bhagavā saputtāya mātuyā arogabhāvaṃ āsīsanto āha –
atk-s0503a:452_4: Na hi kadāci buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ vacanassa aññathābhāvoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:452_7: Abhinanditvāti karavīkarutamañjunā brahmassarena bhagavatā vuccamāne tasmiṃ vacane pītisomanassapaṭilābhato abhimukhabhāvena nanditvā.
atk-s0503a:452_11: Sakaṃ gharaṃ paccāyāsīti attano gharaṃ paṭigacchi.
atk-s0503a:453_2: Acchariyanti andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:455_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatāti.
atk-s0503a:455_5: Yathā ca te bhagavanto dānapāramiṃ pūretvā sīlanekkhammapaññāvīriyakhantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāpāramīti imā dasa pāramiyo,
atk-s0503a:455_7: dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā pubbayogapubbacariyadhammakkhānañātatthacariyādayo
atk-s0503a:455_10: Yathā ca te bhagavanto cattāro satipaṭṭhāne…pe…
atk-s0503a:455_11: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgatā,
atk-s0503a:456_1: Yathā sampatijātā te bhagavanto samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukhā sattapadavītihārena gatā,
atk-s0503a:456_3: āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsiṃsu loke attano jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ pakāsentā,
atk-s0503a:456_4: tañca nesaṃ gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena,
atk-s0503a:456_6: tañcassa gamanaṃ kathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ tesaññeva visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0503a:457_0: Yathā vā te bhagavanto nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gatā,
atk-s0503a:457_7: aṭṭhasamāpattīhi aṭṭhārasahi mahāvipassanāhi catūhi ca ariyamaggehi taṃ taṃ paṭipakkhaṃ pahāya gatā,
atk-s0503a:458_24: amatogadhassa nibbānassāti evaṃ tassa tassa dhammassa yaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:458_25: taṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:460_0: Apica jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…
atk-s0503a:460_3: jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho,
atk-s0503a:461_2: sadevamanussāya pajāya aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0503a:461_4: Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:461_5: yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0503a:461_6: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvipaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tathameva hoti,
atk-s0503a:462_3: sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0503a:463_0: Evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. Tattha tathadassīatthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:464_1: Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0503a:464_3: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakālaṃ yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ suttageyyādi,
atk-s0503a:464_4: sabbaṃ taṃ parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ rāgamadādinimmathanaṃ ekasadisaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:465_3: yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0503a:466_0: Gadaattho ettha gatasaddo. Evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:467_2: Tatho avitatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:468_8: vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti tathāgato. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:471_1: Yasmā upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati
atk-s0503a:471_3: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0503a:471_4: atha kho atulo appameyyo anuttaro devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko,
atk-s0503a:472_2: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavatti,
atk-s0503a:473_3: Tena so mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0503a:473_4: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho avitatho aviparīto yathāvuttova agado etassāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:474_2: Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:474_3: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:474_4: Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:474_5: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:477_0: Kathaṃ tathāya āgatoti tathāgato? Yā sā bhagavatā sumedhabhūtena dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle –
atk-s0503a:481_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhāraṃ sampādentena “ahaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tiṇṇo tāressāmi,
atk-s0503a:490_0: Taṃ panetaṃ mahāpaṭiññaṃ sakalassāpi buddhakaradhammasamudāyassa pavicaya paccavekkhaṇasamādānānaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:490_1: avisaṃvādetvā lokanāyako yasmā mahākappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:490_9: tasmā tasseva sā mahāpaṭiññā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
atk-s0503a:490_12: kassapo bhagavāti ime catuvīsati sammāsambuddhā paṭipāṭiyā uppannā “buddho bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:490_13: Evaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo ye te katābhinīhārehi bodhisattehi laddhabbā ānisaṃsā,
atk-s0503a:490_14: te labhitvāva āgatoti tāya yathāvuttāya mahāpaṭiññāya tathāya abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ āgato adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:491_1: Yāya mahākaruṇāya lokanātho mahādukkhasambādhappaṭipannaṃ sattanikāyaṃ disvā “tassa natthañño koci paṭissaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:491_2: ahameva namito saṃsāradukkhato mutto mocessāmī”ti samussāhitamānaso mahābhinīhāramakāsi.
atk-s0503a:491_3: Katvā ca yathāpaṇidhānaṃ sakalalokahitasampādanāya ussukkamāpanno attano kāyajīvitanirapekkho paresaṃ
atk-s0503a:491_4: sotapathāgamanamattenapi cittutrāsasamuppādikā atidukkarā dukkaracariyā samācaranto yathā mahābodhiyā
atk-s0503a:491_5: paṭipatti hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na hoti,
atk-s0503a:491_7: tathā paṭipajjamāno anupubbena niravasese bodhisambhāre sampādetvā abhisambodhiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:491_8: Tato parañca tāyeva mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso pavivekaratiṃ paramañca santaṃ vimokkhasukhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0503a:491_9: bālajanabahule loke tehi samuppāditaṃ sammānāvamānavippakāraṃ agaṇetvā vineyyajanassa vinayanena niravasesaṃ
atk-s0503a:491_11: Tattha yo bhagavato sattesu mahākaruṇāya samokkamanākāro,
atk-s0503a:491_13: Yathā ca buddhabhūtassa lokanāthassa sattesu mahākaruṇā,
atk-s0503a:491_14: evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassapi mahābhinīhārakālādīsūti sabbattha sabbadā ca ekasadisatāya tathā avitathā anaññathā,
atk-s0503a:491_15: tasmā tīsupi avatthāsu sabbasattesu samānarasāya tathāya mahākaruṇāya sakalalokahitāya gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:492_5: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti evaṃ sabbañeyyadhammasaṅgāhakānaṃ pavattinivattitadubhayahetubhūtānaṃ
atk-s0503a:492_6: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:492_9: maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetvaṭṭho dassanaṭṭho ādhipateyyaṭṭhotiādīnaṃ tabbibhāgānañca yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodhavibandhakassa
atk-s0503a:492_10: saṃkilesapakkhassa samucchindanena paṭiladdhāya tattha asammohābhisamayasaṅkhātāya aviparītākārappavattiyā
atk-s0503a:492_11: dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
atk-s0503a:492_12: tāni bhagavā anaññaneyyo sayameva āgato adhigato,
atk-s0503a:493_1: evaṃ bhagavato tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni catupaṭisambhidāñāṇāni catuvesārajjañāṇāni pañcagatiparicchedañāṇāni
atk-s0503a:494_1: yañhi kiñci aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ hīnādibhedabhinnāsu atītāsu khandhāyatanadhātūsu
atk-s0503a:494_3: Anindriyabaddhesu ca atisukhumatirohitavidūradesesupi rūpadhammesu yo taṃtaṃpaccayavisesehi saddhiṃ paccayuppannānaṃ
atk-s0503a:494_5: tattha sabbattheva hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalake viya paccakkhato appaṭihataṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0503a:494_6: tathā anāgatāsu paccuppannāsu cāti imāni tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:496_0: Tāni panetāni tattha tattha dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
atk-s0503a:497_0: Tathā atthappaṭisambhidā dhammappaṭisambhidā niruttippaṭisambhidā paṭibhānappaṭisambhidāti catasso paṭisambhidā.
atk-s0503a:499_0: Ettha ca hetuanusārena araṇīyato adhigantabbato ca saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ attho nāma.
atk-s0503a:499_1: Pabhedato pana yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:499_4: Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0503a:499_6: So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
atk-s0503a:499_8: pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattanako hetu ariyamaggo bhāsitaṃ kusalaṃ akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammo,
atk-s0503a:499_9: taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0503a:501_2: Ye dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0503a:501_4: Yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0503a:501_9: jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā. Jātiyā, bhave, upādāne, taṇhāya, vedanāya, phasse,
atk-s0503a:502_0: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ,
atk-s0503a:502_2: So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho,
atk-s0503a:503_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0503a:503_2: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha,
atk-s0503a:504_0: Yā panetasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca sabhāvanirutti abyabhicāravohāro abhilāpo,
atk-s0503a:504_1: tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe māgadhikāya sabbasattānaṃ mūlabhāsāya “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti,
atk-s0503a:504_3: Yathāvuttesu tesu ñāṇesu gocarakiccato vitthārato pavattaṃ sabbampi taṃ ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0503a:504_5: Iti imāni cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni sayameva bhagavatā adhigatāni atthadhammādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attano
atk-s0503a:504_6: visaye avisaṃvādanavasena aviparītākārappavattiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:505_1: sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā sabbākārena ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ adhigataṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:505_2: Tathā hissa abhiññeyyā dhammā abhiññeyyato buddhā,
atk-s0503a:505_7: yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā “ime nāma te dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:506_1: sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavato anavasesato bodhimūleyeva pahīnaṃ anuppattidhammaṃ,
atk-s0503a:506_2: na tassa pahānāya uttari karaṇīyaṃ atthi.
atk-s0503a:506_12: brahmā vā “ime nāma te kilesā appahīnā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:507_3: brahmā vā “nālaṃ te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:508_0: Yo ca bhagavatā niravasesavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya sīlasamādhipaññāya saṅgaho sattakoṭṭhāsiko sattatiṃsappabhedo
atk-s0503a:508_5: brahmā vā “niyyāniko dhammoti tayā desito na niyyātī”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthīti.
atk-s0503a:508_7: “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:508_8: Evametāni attano ñāṇappahānadesanāvisesānaṃ avitathabhāvāvabodhanato aviparītākārappavattitāni bhagavato
atk-s0503a:509_11: Khuppipāsitattā paradattūpajīvinijjhāmataṇhikādayo dukkhabahulatāya pākaṭasukhato itā vigatāti petā,
atk-s0503a:509_14: Parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ jambudīpādicatumahādīpavāsino manaso ussannatāya manussā,
atk-s0503a:509_16: Cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagāti ime chabbīsati devanikāyā dibbanti attano iddhānubhāvena kīḷanti jotanti cāti devā,
atk-s0503a:510_0: Tā panetā gatiyo yasmā taṃtaṃkammanibbatto upapattibhavaviseso,
atk-s0503a:510_1: tasmā atthato vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ.
atk-s0503a:510_2: Tattha “ayaṃ nāma gati iminā nāma kammunā jāyati,
atk-s0503a:510_3: tassa ca kammassa paccayavisesehi evaṃ vibhāgabhinnattā visuṃ ete sattanikāyā evaṃ vibhāgabhinnā”ti yathāsakaṃ
atk-s0503a:510_4: hetuphalavibhāgaparicchindanavasena ṭhānaso hetuso bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
atk-s0503a:511_8: yathā paṭipanno ca kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati,
atk-s0503a:512_0: Tāni panetāni bhagavato ñāṇāni tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye aviparītākārappavattiyā avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:514_27: na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgato”tiādinā ca sattānaṃ āsayādīnaṃ yathābhūtaṃ vibhāvanākārappavattaṃ bhagavato āsayānusayañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:516_1: lomakūpehi ca aggikkhandhūdakadhārāpavattanaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vividhavikubbaniddhinimmāpanakaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0503a:518_0: Yañca rāgādīhi jātiādīhi ca anekehi dukkhadhammehi upaddutaṃ sattanikāyaṃ tato nīharitukāmatāvasena nānānayehi
atk-s0503a:518_1: pavattassa bhagavato mahākaruṇokkamanassa paccayabhūtaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:519_1: Bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati,
atk-s0503a:519_2: āditto lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati. Uyyutto, payāto,
atk-s0503a:519_8: ūno loko atitto taṇhādāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.
atk-s0503a:520_5: avijjāgato lokasannivāso aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho tantākulakajāto kulaguṇḍikajāto muñjapabbajabhūto apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattati,
atk-s0503a:523_0: “Jātiyā anugato, jarāya anusaṭo, byādhinā abhibhūto, maraṇena abbhāhato, dukkhe patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0503a:525_1: āditto lokasannivāso rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
atk-s0503a:525_2: unnītako lokasannivāso haññati niccamatāṇo pattadaṇḍo takkaro,
atk-s0503a:526_0: “Andho acakkhuko, hatanetto apariṇāyako, vipathapakkhando añjasāparaddho, mahoghapakkhando.
atk-s0503a:527_29: lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.
atk-s0503a:528_17: parinibbuto parinibbāpetunti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:530_0: Yaṃ pana yāvatā dhammadhātuyā yattakaṃ ñātabbaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatādikassa sabbassa paropadesanirapekkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:530_4: Ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ visayappavattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ duvidhena uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:530_6: na ca taṃ yuttaṃ kiñcāpi imāya yuttiyā.
atk-s0503a:532_0: Evametāni bhagavato chaasādhāraṇañāṇāni aviparītākārappavattiyā yathāsakavisayassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:534_17: ariyasāvako vā yathāvuttāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā bodhīti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:534_18: tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā”ti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato.
atk-s0503a:535_2: cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā”tiādinā sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ aññamaññopakāravasena ekakkhaṇe pavattidassanato,
atk-s0503a:535_7: atthi bahiddhā dhammesu satī”tiādinā tesaṃ visayavibhāgena pavattidassanato.
atk-s0503a:535_10: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmi”ntiādinā bhāvanāvidhidassanato.
atk-s0503a:535_12: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti…pe…
atk-s0503a:535_13: tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti satisambojjhaṅgo…pe…
atk-s0503a:535_17: anussatī”tiādinā channavutiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti evaṃ nānākārato pavattāni bhagavato sambojjhaṅgavibhāvanañāṇāni
atk-s0503a:535_18: tassa tassa atthassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:537_5: Sabbakilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalappaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo,
atk-s0503a:537_9: sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti maggoti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato.
atk-s0503a:537_18: Sammādiṭṭhi aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0503a:537_24: Sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā visuṃ visuṃ dukkhādiārammaṇā hutvā maggakāle ekakkhaṇā nibbānameva
atk-s0503a:537_25: ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati,
atk-s0503a:537_26: sammāsaṅkappādayopi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā nānārammaṇā maggakāle ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā.
atk-s0503a:538_0: Tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati,
atk-s0503a:538_1: sammāvācādayo tayo pubbabhāge musāvādāveramaṇītiādivibhāgā viratiyopi cetanāyopi hutvā maggakkhaṇe viratiyova,
atk-s0503a:538_2: sammāvāyāmasatiyo kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhanti.
atk-s0503a:538_3: Sammāsamādhi pana maggakkhaṇepi paṭhamajjhānādivasena nānā evāti evaṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu pavattivibhāgato, “idha,
atk-s0503a:538_9: tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo”tiādinā caturāsītiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti
atk-s0503a:538_10: evaṃ anekākārato pavattāni bhagavato ariyamaggavibhāvanañāṇāni atthassa avisaṃvādanato sabbānipi tathāni
atk-s0503a:539_0: Tathā paṭhamajjhānasamāpatti yā ca nirodhasamāpattīti etāsu anupaṭipāṭiyā viharitabbaṭṭhena samāpajjitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:539_1: ca anupubbavihārasamāpattīsu sampādanapaccavekkhaṇādivasena yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena ca pavattāni bhagavato
atk-s0503a:539_4: idaṃ aṭṭhāna”nti aviparītaṃ tassa tassa phalassa kāraṇākāraṇajānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:539_5: tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ atītādibhedabhinnassa kammasamādānassa anavasesato yathābhūtaṃ vipākantarajānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:539_6: āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva tassa tassa sattassa “ayaṃ nirayagāminī paṭipadā…pe…
atk-s0503a:539_8: 0.khandhāyatanādīnaṃ upādinnānupādinnādianekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca tassa lokassa “imāya nāma dhātuyā
atk-s0503a:539_9: ussannattā imasmiṃ dhammappabandhe ayaṃ viseso jāyatī”tiādinā nayena yathābhūtaṃ dhātunānattajānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:539_13: sattānaṃ aparimāṇāsu jātīsu tappaṭibandhena saddhiṃ anavasesato pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatijānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:539_15: “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva catusaccajānananti imāni bhagavato dasabalañāṇāni avirajjhitvā
atk-s0503a:539_16: yathāsakaṃ visayāvagāhanato yathādhippetatthasādhanato ca yathābhūtavuttiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:540_0: “Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:542_2: paññāvisesānaṃ vasena bhagavā tathāni ñāṇāni āgato adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:543_1: Yā sā bhagavato abhijāti abhisambodhi dhammavinayapaññāpanā anupādisesanibbānadhātu, sā tathā.
atk-s0503a:543_3: Yadatthaṃ lokanāthena abhisambodhi patthitā pavattitā ca,
atk-s0503a:543_4: tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā avisaṃvādanato aviparītatthavuttiyā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:543_5: Tathā hi ayaṃ bhagavā bodhisattabhūto samatiṃsapāramiparipūraṇādikaṃ vuttappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ buddhattahetuṃ
atk-s0503a:543_6: sampādetvā tusitapure ṭhitova buddhakolāhalaṃ sutvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi ekato sannipatitāhi
atk-s0503a:546_0: Āyācito uppannapubbanimitto pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā “idānāhaṃ manussayoniyaṃ uppajjitvā abhisambujjhissāmī”ti
atk-s0503a:546_1: āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya sakyarājakule mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse devamanussehi
atk-s0503a:546_2: mahatā parihārena parihariyamāno visākhapuṇṇamāya paccūsasamaye abhijātiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:547_0: Abhijātikkhaṇe panassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakkhaṇe viya dvattiṃsapubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:547_1: Ayañhi dasasahassī lokadhātu kampi saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi,
atk-s0503a:547_3: tassa taṃ siriṃ daṭṭhukāmā viya jaccandhā cakkhūni paṭilabhiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:547_17: aghaṭṭitāni eva manussānaṃ hatthūpagādīni ābharaṇāni madhurenākārena raviṃsu,
atk-s0503a:547_25: upakkilesavimutte sūriye dissamāne eva ākāsagatā sabbā jotiyo jaliṃsu,
atk-s0503a:547_26: ṭhapetvā arūpāvacare deve avasesā sabbe devā sabbepi nerayikā dissamānarūpā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:547_31: mahāsamuddo sabbatthakameva pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannatalo ahosi,
atk-s0503a:547_36: mahītale silātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari satta satta hutvā daṇḍapadumāni nāma nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:547_40: sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamālāguḷaṃ viya uppīḷetvā baddhamālākalāpo viya alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0503a:547_41: mālāsanaṃ viya ca ekamālāmālinī vipphurantavāḷabījanī pupphadhūpagandhaparivāsitā paramasobhaggappattā ahosi,
atk-s0503a:547_42: tāni ca pubbanimittāni upari adhigatānaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ nimittabhūtāni eva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:547_43: Evaṃ anekacchariyapātubhāvappaṭimaṇḍitā cāyaṃ abhijāti yadatthaṃ anena abhisambodhi patthitā,
atk-s0503a:547_44: tassā abhisambodhiyā ekantasiddhiyā tathāva ahosi avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:548_1: te sabbepi anavasesato sayameva bhagavatā vinītā.
atk-s0503a:548_3: tepi sāvakādīhi vinītā vinayaṃ gacchanti gamissanti cāti yadatthaṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhi abhipatthitā,
atk-s0503a:548_4: tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā abhisambodhi tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:549_0: Apica yassa yassa ñeyyadhammassa yo yo sabhāvo bujjhitabbo,
atk-s0503a:549_1: so so hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya āvajjanamattappaṭibaddhena attano ñāṇena aviparītaṃ anavasesato
atk-s0503a:549_2: bhagavatā abhisambuddhoti evampi abhisambodhi tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:550_0: Tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ tathā tathā desetabbappakāraṃ tesaṃ tesañca sattānaṃ āsayānusayacaritādhimuttiṃ
atk-s0503a:550_1: sammadeva oloketvā dhammataṃ avijahanteneva paññattinayavohāramaggaṃ anatidhāvanteneva ca dhammataṃ vibhāvantena
atk-s0503a:550_2: yathāparādhaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ yathādhammañca anusāsantena bhagavatā veneyyā vinītā ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpitāti
atk-s0503a:550_3: dhammavinayapaññāpanāpissa tadatthasiddhiyā yathābhūtavuttiyā ca tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:551_0: Tathā yā sā bhagavatā anuppattā pathaviyādiphassavedanādirūpārūpasabhāvavinimuttā lujjanabhāvābhāvato
atk-s0503a:551_1: lokasabhāvātītā tamasā visaṃsaṭṭhattā kenaci anobhāsanīyā lokasabhāvābhāvato eva gatiādibhāvarahitā appatiṭṭhā
atk-s0503a:551_2: anārammaṇā amatamahānibbānadhātu khandhasaṅkhātānaṃ upādīnaṃ lesamattassapi abhāvato anupādisesāti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:552_3: yattha neva pathavī na āpo na tejo na vāyo na ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ na viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ na ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0503a:552_4: na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nāyaṃ loko na paro loko na ca ubho candimasūriyā,
atk-s0503a:552_7: neva āgatiṃ vadāmi na gatiṃ na ṭhitiṃ na cutiṃ na upapattiṃ,
atk-s0503a:553_6: accantasantilakkhaṇoti yathāvuttasabhāvassa kadācipi avisaṃvādanato tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:553_7: Evametā abhijātiādikā tathā gato upagato adhigato paṭipanno pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:554_4: Yathāvidhā te bhagavanto maggasīlena phalasīlena sabbenapi lokiyalokuttarasīlena,
atk-s0503a:554_21: na pana sīlavisuddhiyādīsu visuddhīsu samathavipassanāpaṭipattiyaṃ attanā paṭiladdhaguṇesu ca kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ atthi.
atk-s0503a:554_22: Atha kho majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ nibbisesā te buddhā bhagavanto.
atk-s0503a:554_27: tathā hi lokiyā vidhayuttagatasadde pakāratthe vadanti.
atk-s0503a:555_1: Anaññasādhāraṇena iddhānubhāvena samannāgatattā atthappaṭisambhidādīnaṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā anāvaraṇañāṇappaṭilābhena
atk-s0503a:555_2: ca bhagavato kāyappavattiyādīnaṃ katthaci paṭighātābhāvato yathā ruci tathā gataṃ gati gamanaṃ kāyavacīcittappavatti
atk-s0503a:556_1: Bodhisambhārasambharaṇe tappaṭipakkhappavattisaṅkhātaṃ natthi etassa gatanti agato.
atk-s0503a:556_2: So panassa agatabhāvo maccheradānapāramiādīsu aviparītaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇādinayappavattehi ñāṇehīti tathehi ñāṇehi agatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:557_0: Atha vā kilesābhisaṅkhārappavattisaṅkhātaṃ khandhappavattisaṅkhātameva vā pañcasupi gatīsu gataṃ gamanaṃ etassa natthīti agato.
atk-s0503a:557_1: Saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānappattiyā svāyamassa agatabhāvo tathehi ariyamaggañāṇehīti evampi bhagavā tathehi agatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:558_1: Tathā gatabhāvenāti ca tathāgatassa sabbhāvena atthitāyāti attho.
atk-s0503a:558_5: Saddhammo hi ariyamaggo tāva yathā yuganaddhasamathavipassanābalena anavasesato kilesapakkhaṃ samūhanantena samucchedappahānavasena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:558_7: Phaladhammo yathā attano maggānurūpaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānavasena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:558_9: Nibbānadhammo pana yathā gato paññāya paṭividdho sakalavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamāya sampajjati,
atk-s0503a:558_11: Pariyattidhammopi yathā purimabuddhehi suttageyyādivasena pavattiādippakāsanavasena ca veneyyānaṃ āsayādianurūpaṃ pavattito,
atk-s0503a:558_12: amhākampi bhagavatā tathā gato gadito pavattitoti vā tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:558_14: tathā bhagavato sāvakehi gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:559_1: evaṃ ariyasaṅghopi yathā attahitāya parahitāya ca paṭipannehi suvisuddhaṃ pubbabhāgasamathavipassanāpaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0503a:559_5: tathāva buddhattā tathā gadanato ca tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:560_1: sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0503a:560_3: tassa appamādapadassa viya tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ yuttito atthabhāvena āharanto “atitthena dhammakathiko pakkhando”ti na vattabboti.
atk-s0503a:610_2: Cirakālasambhūtena suvidūrappaṭipakkhena icchitatthanipphattihetubhūtena mahājutikena puññatejena samannāgamo mahānubhāvatā.
atk-s0503a:610_7: yā hi nāma ayaṃ suppavāsā tathā dukkhanimuggā kicchāpannā bhagavato vacanasamakālameva sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyīti.
atk-s0503a:610_10: Kilesapariyuṭṭhitañhi cittaṃ vase avattanato attamanoti na sakkā vattunti.
atk-s0503a:610_18: yaṃ sve buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānavasena payirupāsanavasena ca bhavissati puññaṃ tadatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:611_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantesīti kasmā āmantesi?
atk-s0503a:611_6: Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ pāṭibhogoti mama bhogādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ ahāniyā avināsāya ayyo mahāmoggallāno yadi pāṭibhogo yadi patibhū,
atk-s0503a:611_7: ito satta divase atikkamitvā mama sakkā dānaṃ dātunti yadi ayyena ñātanti dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:611_8: Theropi tassa tesu divasesu bhogānaṃ jīvitassa ca anupaddavaṃ passitvā āha –
atk-s0503a:611_11: Saddhā panassa cittappaṭibaddhāti tasseva bhāraṃ karonto “saddhāya pana tvaññeva pāṭibhogo”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:611_13: tassa saddhāya aññathābhāvo natthīti tathā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:611_14: Teneva ca kāraṇena bhagavatā “pacchāpi tvaṃ karissasīti saññāpehī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:611_15: Upāsakopi satthari there ca gāravena subbacatāya tassā ca puññena vaḍḍhiṃ icchanto “karotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta bhattāni,
atk-s0503a:612_0: Tañca dārakanti vijātadivasato paṭṭhāya ekādasamaṃ divasaṃ atikkamitvā tato paraṃ sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:612_1: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhojetvā sattame divase taṃ sattavassikaṃ dārakaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vandāpesi.
atk-s0503a:612_2: Satta me vassānīti satta me saṃvaccharāni,
atk-s0503a:612_4: Lohitakumbhiyaṃ vutthānīti mātukucchiyaṃ attano gabbhavāsadukkhaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0503a:612_5: Aññānipi evarūpāni satta puttānīti “aññepi evarūpe satta putte”ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttaṃ “evarūpānī”ti.
atk-s0503a:612_6: Evaṃ satta vassāni gabbhadhāraṇavasena sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhatāya ca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpetvā uppajjanakaputteti attho.
atk-s0503a:612_7: Etena mātugāmānaṃ puttalolatāya puttalābhena titti natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:613_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sattadivasādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni gabbhadhāraṇādivasena pavattaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0503a:613_1: dukkhaṃ ekapade visaritvā puttalolatāvasena tāya vuttamatthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:613_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ cittasukhappamatto viya pamattapuggale iṭṭhākārena vañcetvā taṇhāsinehassa mahānatthakarabhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:614_5: yasmā asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhameva samānaṃ sakalampi vaṭṭagataṃ saṅkhārajātaṃ appahīnavipallāsattā ayonisomanasikārena
atk-s0503a:614_6: iṭṭhaṃ viya piyaṃ viya sukhaṃ viya ca hutvā upaṭṭhahamānaṃ sativippavāsena pamattapuggalaṃ ativattati
atk-s0503a:614_8: tasmā imampi suppavāsaṃ punapi sattakkhattuṃ evarūpaṃ asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhaṃ sātādipatirūpakena dukkhena
atk-s0503a:617_1: Navame pubbārāmeti sāvatthiyā pācīnadisābhāge anurādhapurassa uttamadevīvihārasadise ṭhāne kārite ārāme.
atk-s0503a:618_1: atīte satasahassakappamatthake padumuttaradasabalaṃ ekā upāsikā aññataraṃ upāsikaṃ attano aggupaṭṭhāyikaṭṭhāne
atk-s0503a:618_2: ṭhapentaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusatasahassassa dānaṃ datvā bhagavato
atk-s0503a:618_3: nipaccakāraṃ katvā “anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:618_4: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa
atk-s0503a:618_5: dhanañjayaseṭṭhino gehe sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:618_8: tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:619_0: Aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā,
atk-s0503a:619_1: tattha naṃ sasuro migāraseṭṭhi upakāravasena mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:619_3: Sā attano mahallatāpasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navakoṭīhi bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vasanatthāya karīsamatte
atk-s0503a:619_4: bhūmibhāge uparibhūmiyaṃ pañcagabbhasatāni heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ pañcagabbhasatānīti gabbhasahassehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0503a:620_3: Visākhāya ñātikulato maṇimuttādiracitaṃ tādisaṃ bhaṇḍajātaṃ tassā paṇṇākāratthāya pesitaṃ,
