atk-s0503a:620_4: taṃ nagaradvārappattaṃ suṅkikā tattha suṅkaṃ gaṇhantā tadanurūpaṃ aggahetvā atirekaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:620_5: Taṃ sutvā visākhā rañño tamatthaṃ nivedetukāmā patirūpaparivārena rājanivesanaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:620_6: tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā mallikāya deviyā saddhiṃ antepuraṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0503a:620_8: idāni labhissāmī”ti bhojanavelaṃ atikkamitvā chinnabhattā hutvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:620_9: Evaṃ dvīhatīhaṃ gantvāpi okāsaṃ na labhiyeva.
atk-s0503a:620_10: Iti rājā aniveditopi tassa atthavinicchayassa okāsākaraṇena “yathādhippāyaṃ na tīretī”ti vutto.
atk-s0503a:620_13: Mahāupāsikāya hi rājāyattasuṅkameva rañño datvā itaraṃ vissajjāpetuṃ adhippāyo,
atk-s0503a:620_14: so raññā na diṭṭhattā eva na tīrito.
atk-s0503a:620_18: Kenacideva karaṇīyena dvīhatīhaṃ rājanivesanadvāraṃ gacchantī tassa atthassa aniṭṭhitattā niratthakameva upasaṅkamiṃ,
atk-s0503a:620_19: bhagavati upasaṅkamanameva pana dassanānuttariyādippaṭilābhakāraṇattā sātthakanti evāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:620_20: imāya velāya idhāgatāti imamatthaṃ dassentī mahāupāsikā “idha me,
atk-s0503a:621_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ parāyattatāya adhippāyāsamijjhanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:621_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ parādhīnāparādhīnavuttīsu ādīnavānisaṃsaparidīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:622_0: Tattha sabbaṃ paravasaṃ dukkhanti yaṃ kiñci atthajātaṃ payojanaṃ paravasaṃ parāyattaṃ attano icchāya
atk-s0503a:622_1: nipphādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkhaṃ dukkhāvahaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:622_2: Sabbaṃ issariyaṃ sukhanti duvidhaṃ issariyaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca.
atk-s0503a:622_3: Tattha lokiyaṃ rājissariyādi ceva lokiyajjhānābhiññānibbattaṃ cittissariyañca,
atk-s0503a:622_6: yañca sakkādīnaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ devanikāye ādhipaccabhūtaṃ issariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:622_7: tadubhayaṃ yadipi kammānubhāvena yathicchitanipphattiyā sukhanimittatāya sukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:622_10: nirodhissariyameva pana lokadhammehi akampanīyato anivattisabhāvattā ca ekantasukhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0503a:622_11: Yaṃ panettha sabbattheva aparādhīnatāya labhati cittasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:622_12: taṃ sandhāya satthā “sabbaṃ issariyaṃ sukha”nti āha.
atk-s0503a:623_0: Sādhāraṇe vihaññantīti idaṃ “sabbaṃ paravasaṃ dukkha”nti imassa padassa atthavivaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:623_2: sādhāraṇe payojane sādhetabbe sati tassa parādhīnatāya yathādhippāyaṃ anipphādanato ime sattā vihaññanti vighātaṃ āpajjanti kilamanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:623_3: Yogā hi duratikkamāti yasmā kāmayogabhavayogadiṭṭhiyogaavijjāyogā anādikālabhāvitā anupacitakusalasambhārehi pajahituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya duratikkamā.
atk-s0503a:623_7: Iti ariyamaggānaṃ duradhigamanīyattā ime yogā duratikkamā.
atk-s0503a:623_9: asādhāraṇe pana cittissariye nirodhissariye ca sati na kadācipi vighātassa sambhavoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:624_0: Atha vā sabbaṃ paravasanti yaṃ attano aññappaṭibaddhavuttisaṅkhātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:624_3: Sabbaṃ issariyanti yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ issariyaṭṭhānatāya issariyanti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:624_6: Sādhāraṇeti evaṃ dukkhasukhe vavatthite ime sattā bahusādhāraṇe dukkhakāraṇe nimuggā hutvā vihaññanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:624_7: Yogā hi duratikkamāti yasmā te sabbattha nimujjanassa hetubhūtā kāmayogādayo duratikkamā,
atk-s0503a:624_8: tasmā tvampi visākhe parāyattamatthaṃ patthetvā alabhamānā vihaññasīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:627_2: Ambavaneti tassa nagarassa avidūre mallarājūnaṃ ekaṃ ambavanaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0503a:627_5: Anupiyaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā tattha bhagavā viharati,
atk-s0503a:627_8: Kāḷīgodhāya puttoti kāḷīgodhā nāma sākiyānī sakyarājadevī ariyasāvikā āgataphalā viññātasāsanā,
atk-s0503a:627_11: So pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā na cirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi,
atk-s0503a:627_16: yadidaṃ bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto”ti uccakulikabhāve etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā sāvakānaṃ abbhantaro.
atk-s0503a:628_0: Suññāgāragatoti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlañca ṭhapetvā
atk-s0503a:628_1: aññaṃ pabbatakandarādi pabbajitasāruppaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ janasambādhābhāvato idha suññāgāranti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0503a:628_2: Atha vā jhānakaṇṭakānaṃ saddānaṃ abhāvato vivittaṃ yaṃ kiñci agārampi suññāgāranti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:628_5: Udānaṃ udānesīti so hi āyasmā araññe divāvihāraṃ upagatopi rattivāsūpagatopi yebhuyyena phalasamāpattisukhena nirodhasukhena ca vītināmeti,
atk-s0503a:628_6: tasmā taṃ sukhaṃ sandhāya pubbe attanā anubhūtaṃ sabhayaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ jigucchitvā “aho sukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:628_7: aho sukha”nti somanassasahitaṃ ñāṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ pītisamuṭṭhānaṃ samuggirati.
atk-s0503a:629_0: Sutvāna nesaṃ etadahosīti nesaṃ sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassa āyasmato “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:629_1: aho sukha”nti udānentassa udānaṃ sutvā “nissaṃsayaṃ esa anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ parivitakkitaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0503a:629_2: Te bhikkhū puthujjanā tassa āyasmato vivekasukhaṃ sandhāya udānaṃ ajānantā evaṃ amaññiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:629_5: “Yaṃ so pubbe agāriyabhūto samāno”ti pāḷiṃ vatvā “anubhavī”ti vacanasesena keci atthaṃ vaṇṇenti,
atk-s0503a:629_12: assa āyasmato bhaddiyassa pabbajitato pubbe agāriyabhūtassa gahaṭṭhassa sato yaṃ rajjasukhaṃ anubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0503a:629_13: Sā tamanussaramānoti so taṃ sukhaṃ etarahi ukkaṇṭhanavasena anussaranto.
atk-s0503a:630_0: Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocunti te sambahulā bhikkhū ullapanasabhāvasaṇṭhitā tassa anuggahaṇādhippāyena bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ,
atk-s0503a:630_8: aho sukha”nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti yathā te bhikkhū vadanti,
atk-s0503a:630_9: taṃ evaṃ tathevāti attano udānaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0503a:630_10: Kiṃ pana tvaṃ bhaddiyāti kasmā bhagavā pucchati,
atk-s0503a:630_13: teneva pana tamatthaṃ vadāpetvā te bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:631_2: Rakkhā susaṃvihitāti ārakkhādikatapurisehi gutti suṭṭhu samantato vihitā.
atk-s0503a:631_3: Bahipi antepureti aḍḍakaraṇaṭṭhānādike antepurato bahibhūte rājagehe.
atk-s0503a:631_4: Evaṃ rakkhito gopito santoti evaṃ rājageharājadhānirajjadesesu anto ca bahi ca anekesu ṭhānesu anekasatehi
atk-s0503a:631_5: susaṃvihitarakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā mameva nibbhayatthaṃ phāsuvihāratthaṃ rakkhito gopito samāno.
atk-s0503a:631_8: Ubbiggoti sakarajjepi pakatito uppajjanakabhayubbegena ubbiggo calito.
atk-s0503a:631_9: Ussaṅkīti “raññā nāma sabbakālaṃ avissatthena bhavitabba”nti vacanena sabbattha avissāsavasena tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:631_10: tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīyānaṃ paccayaparisaṅkāya ca uddhamukhaṃ saṅkamāno.
atk-s0503a:631_11: Utrāsīti “santikāvacarehipi ajānantasseva me kadāci anattho bhaveyyā”ti uppannena sarīrakampaṃ uppādanasamatthena tāsena utrāsī.
atk-s0503a:632_4: Bhayādinimittassa pariggahassa taṃ nimittassa ca kilesassa abhāvenevassa abhītāditāti.
atk-s0503a:632_11: Migabhūtena cetasāti vissatthavihāritāya migassa viya jātena cittena.
atk-s0503a:632_12: Migo hi amanussapathe araññe vasamāno vissattho tiṭṭhati, nisīdati,
atk-s0503a:637_2: bhagavā yadidaṃ mama etarahi paramaṃ vivekasukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:638_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ bhaddiyattherassa puthujjanavisayātītaṃ vivekasukhasaṅkhātamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:638_1: Imaṃ udānanti idaṃ sahetukabhayasokavigamānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:639_0: Tattha yassantarato na santi kopāti yassa ariyapuggalassa antarato abbhantare attano citte cittakālussiyakaraṇato
atk-s0503a:639_1: cittappakopā rāgādayo āghātavatthuādikāraṇabhedato anekabhedā dosakopā eva kopā na santi maggena pahīnattā
atk-s0503a:639_3: Ayañhi antarasaddo kiñcāpi “mañca tvañca kimantara”ntiādīsu kāraṇe dissati,
atk-s0503a:639_5: “antarā ca jetavanaṃ antarā ca sāvatthi”ntiādīsu vivare,
atk-s0503a:640_13: khuddakamahantaupapattibhavānaṃ vasena iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā vuccati.
atk-s0503a:640_14: Catūhipi ariyamaggehi yathāsambhavaṃ tena tena nayena taṃ itibhavābhavatañca vītivatto atikkanto hoti.
atk-s0503a:640_16: Taṃ vigatabhayanti taṃ evarūpaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgataṃ khīṇāsavaṃ cittakopābhāvato itibhavābhavasamatikkamato ca bhayahetuvigamena vigatabhayaṃ,
atk-s0503a:640_19: Devā nānubhavanti dassanāyāti adhigatamagge ṭhapetvā sabbepi upapattidevā vāyamantāpi cittacāradassanavasena
atk-s0503a:640_20: dassanāya daṭṭhuṃ nānubhavanti na abhisambhuṇanti na sakkonti,
atk-s0503a:640_22: Sekkhāpi hi puthujjanā viya arahato cittappavattiṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0503a:645_1: Nandavaggassa paṭhame aññataro bhikkhūti nāmagottena apākaṭo eko khīṇāsavabhikkhu.
atk-s0503a:645_2: So kira rājagahavāsī kulaputto moggallānattherena saṃvejito saṃsāradosaṃ disvā satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0503a:645_3: sīlāni sodhetvā catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā na cirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:645_8: So ekadivasaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ desentassa nātidūre ṭhāne dukkhaṃ adhivāsento pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:646_2: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0503a:646_5: Purāṇakammavipākajanti pubbe katassa kammassa vipākabhāvena jātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:646_6: purāṇakammavipāke vā sukhadukkhappakāre vipākavaṭṭasamudāye tadekadesabhāvena jātaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:646_7: Purāṇakammavipākajanti ca iminā tassa ābādhassa kammasamuṭṭhānataṃ dassento opakkamikautuvipariṇāmajādibhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0503a:647_0: Sato sampajānoti vedanāpariggāhakānaṃ satisampajaññānaṃ vasena satimā sampajānanto ca.
atk-s0503a:647_4: uppajjitvā ekantena bhijjanasabhāvattā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti vedanāya aniccatāsallakkhaṇavasena satokāritāya sato,
atk-s0503a:647_6: Atha vā sativepullapattiyā sabbattheva kāyavedanācittadhammesu suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitasatitāya sato,
atk-s0503a:647_10: puthujjano aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati
atk-s0503a:647_11: sammohaṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttanayena andhaputhujjano viya na vihaññamāno maggeneva samugghātitattā cetodukkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:647_12: anuppādento kevalaṃ kammavipākajaṃ sarīradukkhaṃ adhivāsento samāpattiṃ samāpanno viya nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:647_13: Addasāti taṃ āyasmantaṃ adhivāsanakhantiyā tathā nisinnaṃ addakkhi.
atk-s0503a:648_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ tādisassapi rogassa vejjādīhi tikicchanatthaṃ anussukkāpajjanakāraṇaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0503a:648_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ yehi kehici dukkhadhammehi avighātapattivibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:649_1: Aggamaggassa hi uppannakālato paṭṭhāya arahato sabbāni kusalākusalakammāni pahīnāni nāma honti paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ asamatthabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:649_4: Dhunamānassa pure kataṃ rajanti arahattappattito pubbe kataṃ rāgarajādimissatāya rajanti laddhanāmaṃ
atk-s0503a:649_5: dukkhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ vipākapaṭisaṃvedanena taṃ dhunantassa viddhaṃsentassa,
atk-s0503a:649_6: arahattappattiyā parato pana sāvajjakiriyāya sambhavoyeva natthi,
atk-s0503a:649_7: anavajjakiriyā ca bhavamūlassa samucchinnattā samucchinnamūlatāya pupphaṃ viya phaladānasamatthatāya abhāvato kiriyamattāva hoti.
atk-s0503a:650_0: Amamassāti rūpādīsu katthaci mamanti gahaṇābhāvato amamassa mamaṅkārarahitassa.
atk-s0503a:650_5: Ṭhitassāti catubbidhampi oghaṃ taritvā nibbānathale ṭhitassa,
atk-s0503a:650_7: Sekkhaputhujjanā hi kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ appahīnattā cutipaṭisandhivasena saṃsāre dhāvanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:650_9: Atha vā dasavidhe khīṇāsavasaṅkhāte ariyadhamme ṭhitassa.
atk-s0503a:650_10: Tādinoti “paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuttāya pañcavidhāya ariyiddhiyā aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi
atk-s0503a:650_11: akampaniyāya chaḷaṅgupekkhāya ca samannāgatena iṭṭhādīsu ekasadisatāsaṅkhātena tādībhāvena tādino.
atk-s0503a:650_12: Attho natthi janaṃ lapetaveti “mama bhesajjādīni karothā”ti janaṃ lapituṃ kathetuṃ payojanaṃ natthi sarīre nirapekkhabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:650_13: Paṇḍupalāso viya hi bandhanā pavutto sayamevāyaṃ kāyo bhijjitvā patatūti khīṇāsavānaṃ ajjhāsayo.
atk-s0503a:653_0: Atha vā yaṃkiñci nimittaṃ dassetvā “kiṃ ayyassa icchitabba”nti janaṃ lapetave paccayehi nimantanavasena
atk-s0503a:653_1: lapāpetuṃ khīṇāsavassa attho natthi tādisassa micchājīvassa maggeneva samugghātitattāti attho.
atk-s0503a:653_2: Iti bhagavā “kissāyaṃ thero attano rogaṃ vejjehi atikicchāpetvā bhagavato avidūre nisīdatī”ti cintentānaṃ tassa atikicchāpane kāraṇaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0503a:656_2: So hi cakkavattilakkhaṇūpetattā mātāpitaro saparijanaṃ sakalañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ nandayanto jātoti “nando”ti nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0503a:656_9: Brahmacariyanti brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ cariyaṃ ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyaṃ methunaviratiṃ.
atk-s0503a:656_10: Sandhāretunti paṭhamacittato yāvacarimakacittaṃ sammā paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ dhāretuṃ pavattetuṃ.
atk-s0503a:656_11: Dutiyena cettha brahmacariyapadena maggabrahmacariyassāpi saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:656_12: Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāyāti upasampadakāle bhikkhubhāvena saddhiṃ samādinnaṃ nibbattetabbabhāvena anuṭṭhitaṃ tividhampi sikkhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā,
atk-s0503a:657_2: bhagavā pavattavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane viharanto “puttaṃ me ānetvā dassethā”ti suddhodanamahārājena
atk-s0503a:657_3: pesitesu sahassasahassaparivāresu dasasu dūtesu saha parivārena arahattaṃ pattesu sabbapacchā gantvā
atk-s0503a:657_4: arahattappattena kāḷudāyittherena gamanakālaṃ ñatvā maggavaṇṇanaṃ vaṇṇetvā jātibhūmigamanāya yācito vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivutto
atk-s0503a:657_5: kapilavatthunagaraṃ gantvā ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0503a:657_6: punadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā nivesanaṃ
atk-s0503a:658_0: Bhattakiccāvasāne pana rāhulamātuguṇakathaṃ nissāya candakinnarījātakaṃ kathetvā tatiyadivase nandakumārassa
atk-s0503a:658_1: abhisekagehappavesanavivāhamaṅgalesu vattamānesu piṇḍāya pavisitvā nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā
atk-s0503a:658_2: maṅgalaṃ vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto kumārassa hatthato pattaṃ na gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:658_12: Kumāro nivattitukāmo anicchāya gacchanto gāravena “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:659_4: Sā udakabindūhi paggharantehi aḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi vegena pāsādaṃ āruyha sīhapañjaradvāre ṭhatvā “tuvaṭaṃ kho,
atk-s0503a:659_7: Taṃ tassā vacanaṃ tassa hadaye tiriyaṃ patitvā viya ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:659_8: Satthāpissa hatthato pattaṃ aggahetvāva taṃ vihāraṃ netvā “pabbajissasi nandā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:659_11: Satthā tena hi nandaṃ pabbājethāti kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase taṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0503a:659_12: Sattame divase mātarā alaṅkaritvā pesitaṃ “dāyajjaṃ me, samaṇa,
atk-s0503a:659_13: dehī”ti vatvā attanā saddhiṃ ārāmāgataṃ rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0503a:659_14: Punekadivasaṃ mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathetvā rājānaṃ anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0503a:660_1: pitaraṃ tīsu phalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto punadeva rājagahaṃ gantvā tato anāthapiṇḍikena
atk-s0503a:660_2: sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya gahitapaṭiñño niṭṭhite jetavanamahāvihāre tattha gantvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0503a:660_3: Evaṃ satthari jetavane viharante āyasmā nando attano anicchāya pabbajito kāmesu anādīnavadassāvī janapadakalyāṇiyā
atk-s0503a:660_4: vuttavacanamanussaranto ukkaṇṭhito hutvā bhikkhūnaṃ attano anabhiratiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:660_5: Tena vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nando…pe…
atk-s0503a:661_0: Kasmā pana naṃ bhagavā evaṃ pabbājesīti?
atk-s0503a:661_1: “Puretarameva ādīnavaṃ dassetvā kāmehi naṃ vivecetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0503a:661_2: pabbājetvā pana upāyena tato vivecetvā uparivisesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti veneyyadamanakusalo satthā evaṃ naṃ paṭhamaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0503a:662_1: Janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī rūpena uttamā chasarīradosarahitā,
atk-s0503a:662_3: Sā hi yasmā nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷikā naccodātā atikkantā mānusakavaṇṇaṃ appattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:662_5: Chavikalyāṇaṃ maṃsakalyāṇaṃ nakhakalyāṇaṃ aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ vayakalyāṇanti imehi pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatā.
atk-s0503a:663_0: Tattha attano sarīrobhāsena dasadvādasahatthe ṭhāne ālokaṃ karoti,
atk-s0503a:663_3: Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalena sadisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:663_5: Vīsati nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasaparikitāni viya muttaṭṭhāne khīradhārāsadisāni honti,
atk-s0503a:663_7: Dvattiṃsadantā suphusitā parisuddhapavāḷapantisadisā vajirapantī viya khāyanti,
atk-s0503a:663_9: Vīsativassasatikāpi samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya hoti nippalitā,
atk-s0503a:664_8: Apaloketvāti sineharasavipphārasaṃsūcakena aḍḍhakkhinā ābandhantī viya oloketvā. Maṃ,
atk-s0503a:664_9: bhanteti pubbepi “ma”nti vatvā ukkaṇṭhākulacittatāya puna “maṃ etadavocā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:664_12: taṃ vā tassā ākārasahitaṃ vacanaṃ anussaranto.
atk-s0503a:665_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “upāyenassa rāgaṃ vūpasamessāmī”ti iddhibalena naṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ nento
atk-s0503a:665_1: antarāmagge ekasmiṃ jhāmakhette jhāmakhāṇumatthake nisinnaṃ chinnakaṇṇanāsānaṅguṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ
atk-s0503a:665_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana ekakkhaṇeneva satthārā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gataṃ viya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:665_4: taṃ gamanaṃ avatvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:665_5: Gacchantoyeva hi bhagavā āyasmato nandassa antarāmagge taṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:665_8: Evaṃ satthā taṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā sakkassa devarañño upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatāni kakuṭapādāni pañca accharāsatāni
atk-s0503a:665_9: attānaṃ vanditvā ṭhitāni dassetvā janapadakalyāṇiyā tāsaṃ pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ rūpasampattiṃ paṭicca
atk-s0503a:665_12: “atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā…pe…
atk-s0503a:666_0: Tattha bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti bāhumhi gahetvā viya.
atk-s0503a:666_1: Bhagavā hi tadā tādisaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāresi,
atk-s0503a:666_2: yathā āyasmā nando bhuje gahetvā bhagavatā nīyamāno viya ahosi.
atk-s0503a:666_3: Tattha ca bhagavatā sace tassa āyasmato tāvatiṃsadevalokassa dassanaṃ pavesanameva vā icchitaṃ siyā,
atk-s0503a:666_4: yathānisinnasseva tassa taṃ devalokaṃ dasseyya lokavivaraṇiddhikāle viya,
atk-s0503a:666_6: Yasmā panassa dibbattabhāvato manussattabhāvassa yo nihīnajigucchanīyabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:666_7: tassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ antarāmagge taṃ makkaṭiṃ dassetukāmo,
atk-s0503a:666_10: Evañhissa tadatthaṃ brahmacariyavāse visesato abhirati bhavissatīti.
atk-s0503a:667_1: Tā kira sabbāpi kassapassa bhagavato sāvakānaṃ pādamakkhanateladānena tādisā sukumārapādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:668_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā avassutacittaṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ accharāyo olokāpesi?
atk-s0503a:668_2: Yathā hi kusalo vejjo ussannadosaṃ puggalaṃ tikicchanto sinehapānādinā paṭhamaṃ dose ukkiledetvā pacchā vamanavirecanehi sammadeva nīharāpeti,
atk-s0503a:668_3: evaṃ vineyyadamanakusalo bhagavā ussannarāgaṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ devaccharāyo dassetvā ukkiledesi ariyamaggabhesajjena
atk-s0503a:669_2: tumhehi mayhaṃ dassitā chinnakaṇṇanāsā paluṭṭhamakkaṭī janapadakalyāṇiṃ upādāya,
atk-s0503a:669_3: evameva janapadakalyāṇī imāni pañca accharāsatāni upādāyāti attho.
atk-s0503a:669_7: tena pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ rūpasampattiṃ upanidhāyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:669_12: ekaṃ soḷasakoṭṭhāse katvā tato ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā soḷasadhā gaṇite tattha yo ekeko koṭṭhāso,
atk-s0503a:669_15: Upanidhinti “imāya ayaṃ sadisī”ti upamābhāvena gahetvā samīpe ṭhapanampi.
atk-s0503a:670_1: taṃ brahmacariyaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ pākaṭañcāti taṃ anāmasitvā tattha abhiratiyaṃ ādarajananatthaṃ abhirama, nanda, abhirama,
atk-s0503a:670_3: Ahaṃ te pāṭibhogoti kasmā bhagavā tassa brahmacariyavāsaṃ icchanto abrahmacariyavāsassa pāṭibhogaṃ upagañchi?
atk-s0503a:670_5: taṃ āgantukārammaṇe saṅkāmetvā sukhena sakkā jahāpetunti pāṭibhogaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0503a:671_1: Bhagavā hi tadā āyasmante nande vattaṃ dassetvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gate upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:671_2: taṃ pavattiṃ kathetvā yathā nāma kusalo puriso anikkhantaṃ āṇiṃ aññāya āṇiyā nīharitvā puna taṃ hatthādīhi
atk-s0503a:671_4: evameva āciṇṇavisaye tassa rāgaṃ āgantukavisayena nīharitvā puna tadapi brahmacariyamaggahetuṃ katvā apanetukāmo “etha tumhe,
atk-s0503a:671_6: nandaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca samudācarathā”ti āṇāpesi,
atk-s0503a:671_9: yathā te bhikkhū tamatthaṃ jāniṃsū”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:672_3: ayampi āyasmā accharāsambhoganimittaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranto bhatako viya hotīti vuttaṃ “bhatakavādenā”ti.
atk-s0503a:672_6: ayampi āyasmā accharānaṃ hetu attano brahmacariyaṃ kiṇāti,
atk-s0503a:672_8: Atha vā bhagavato āṇāya accharāsambhogasaṅkhātāya bhatiyā brahmacariyavāsasaṅkhātaṃ jīvitaṃ pavattento
atk-s0503a:672_9: tāya bhatiyā yāpane bhagavatā bhariyamāno viya hotīti “bhatako”ti vutto,
atk-s0503a:672_10: tathā accharāsambhogasaṅkhātaṃ vikkayaṃ ādātabbaṃ katvā bhagavato āṇattiyaṃ tiṭṭhanto tena vikkayena
atk-s0503a:673_4: Vūpakaṭṭhoti vatthukāmehi kilesakāmehi ca kāyena ceva cittena ca vūpakaṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:673_8: Pahitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pesitatto vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:673_12: Kulaputtāti duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ca ācārakulaputtā ca,
atk-s0503a:673_18: taṃ ettha natthīti pabbajjā anagāriyāti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:673_22: Tassa hi atthāya kulaputtā idha pabbajanti.
atk-s0503a:673_24: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0503a:673_26: Upasampajja vihāsīti pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā vā vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:674_0: Tattha khīṇā jātīti na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
atk-s0503a:674_3: Maggassa pana abhāvitattā yā ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti uppajjeyya,
atk-s0503a:674_4: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā.
atk-s0503a:674_5: Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāvena vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanena abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:674_9: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:674_11: tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:674_12: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:674_13: Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ karonti nāma,
atk-s0503a:674_15: tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:674_16: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti “idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanāya kiccaṃ me natthī”ti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:674_17: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti vā “itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:674_18: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā viya rukkhā,
atk-s0503a:674_19: te carimakacittanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissanti,
atk-s0503a:674_22: Arahatanti bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ abbhantaro eko mahāsāvako ahosīti attho.
atk-s0503a:675_1: Sā hi sayaṃ asekkhattā asekkhavisayaṃ abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:675_8: Obhāsetvāti attano pabhāya cando viya sūriyo viya ca jetavanaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā.
atk-s0503a:675_9: Tenupasaṅkamīti āyasmato nandassa arahattappattiṃ viditvā pītisomanassajātā “taṃ bhagavato paṭivedessāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:676_2: Atha vā āgotrabhuṃ ābhavaggaṃ vā savantīti āsavā,
atk-s0503a:676_3: ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ anto karitvā pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:676_6: koṭi na paññāyati avijjāyā”tiādivacanehi nesaṃ cirapārivāsiyatā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:676_7: Atha vā āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi, āsavā.
atk-s0503a:676_13: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0503a:679_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinalīkatā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:680_0: Ettha tebhūmikaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0503a:680_2: samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti parūpaghātavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā.
atk-s0503a:681_1: “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti dvidhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:681_6: Abhidhamme teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saddhiṃ catudhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:681_12: āsavā saṃvarāya pahātabbā”tiādinā nayena chadhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:681_13: Sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanapahātabbehi saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:681_14: Idha pana abhidhammanayena cattāro āsavā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:682_0: Khayāti ettha pana “yo āsavānaṃ khayo bhedo paribhedo”tiādīsu āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo āsavakkhayoti vutto.
atk-s0503a:682_3: passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī”tiādīsu āsavānaṃ āyatiṃ anuppādo āsavakkhayoti vutto.
atk-s0503a:684_0: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:685_0: Ādīsu maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”tiādīsu phalaṃ.
atk-s0503a:687_0: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:688_0: Ādīsu nibbānaṃ. Idha pana āsavānaṃ accantakhayo anuppādo vā maggo vā “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0503a:689_3: Ubhayavacanaṃ magge viya phalepi samathavipassanānaṃ yuganandhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:689_5: Devatāya vacanasamanantarameva “kathaṃ nu kho”ti āvajjentassa bhagavato ñāṇaṃ uppajji “nandena arahattaṃ sacchikata”nti.
atk-s0503a:689_6: So hi āyasmā sahāyabhikkhūhi tathā uppaṇḍiyamāno “bhāriyaṃ vata mayā kataṃ,
atk-s0503a:689_7: yohaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā accharānaṃ paṭilābhāya satthāraṃ pāṭibhogaṃ akāsi”nti uppannasaṃvego
atk-s0503a:689_8: hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ patvā cintesi –
atk-s0503a:689_10: So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano adhippāyaṃ satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:690_0: Athassa bhagavā “yasmā tayā aññā ārādhitāti ñātametaṃ mayā,
atk-s0503a:690_2: tasmā nāhaṃ paṭissavā idāni mocetabbo arahattappattiyāva mocitattā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:690_8: yasmiṃyeva kāle āsavehi tava cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:691_0: Sopi āyasmā vipassanākāleyeva “yadevāhaṃ indriyāsaṃvaraṃ nissāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto,
atk-s0503a:691_1: tameva suṭṭhu niggahessāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṃvare ukkaṭṭhapaṭipadampi agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:692_3: sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na
atk-s0503a:693_2: nandassa pacchimā…pe… uttarā… dakkhiṇā… uddhaṃ… adho…
atk-s0503a:693_4: sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me…pe…
atk-s0503a:694_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:695_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato nandassa sabbāsave khepetvā sukhādīsu tādibhāvappattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:695_1: Imaṃ udānanti tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:696_0: Tattha yassa nittiṇṇo paṅkoti yena ariyapuggalena ariyamaggasetunā sabbo diṭṭhipaṅko saṃsārapaṅko eva vā nibbānapāragamanena tiṇṇo.
atk-s0503a:696_2: “Kāmakaṇḍako”ti laddhanāmo sabbo kilesakāmo sabbo kāmavisūko aggañāṇadaṇḍena maddito bhaggo anavasesato mathito.
atk-s0503a:696_3: Mohakkhayaṃ anuppattoti evaṃbhūto ca dukkhādivisayassa sabbassa sammohassa khepanena mohakkhayaṃ patto,
atk-s0503a:696_5: Sukhadukkhesu na vedhatī sa bhikkhūti so bhinnakileso bhikkhu iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogato uppannesu sukhesu
atk-s0503a:696_6: aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogato uppannesu dukkhesu ca na vedhati na kampati,
atk-s0503a:699_1: Tatiye yasojappamukhānīti ettha yasojoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0503a:699_2: taṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pabbajitattā vicaraṇato ca tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni “yasojappamukhānī”ti vuttāni.
atk-s0503a:700_1: atīte kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane aññataro bhikkhu āraññako araññe piṭṭhipāsāṇe katapaṇṇakuṭiyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0503a:700_2: Tasmiñca samaye pañcasatā corā gāmaghātakādīni katvā corikāya jīvantā corakammaṃ katvā janapadamanussehi
atk-s0503a:700_3: anubaddhā palāyamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha kiñci gahaṇaṃ vā paṭisaraṇaṃ vā apassantā avidūre taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0503a:700_4: pāsāṇe nisinnaṃ disvā vanditvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “amhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:700_10: attano jīvitaṃ vināsayantesupi mā manaṃ padosayitthā”ti kakacūpamavidhiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0503a:700_12: Atha te jānapadā taṃ sampattā ito cito ca gavesantā te core disvā sabbeva jīvitā voropesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:700_13: Te tesu manopadosamattampi akatvā akkhaṇḍasīlā kālaṃ katvā kāmāvacaradevesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:701_0: Te aparāparaṃ saṃsarantā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke khepetvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle devalokato cavitvā
atk-s0503a:701_1: jeṭṭhadevaputto sāvatthinagaradvāre kevaṭṭagāme pañcasatakulagāmajeṭṭhakassa kevaṭṭassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0503a:701_4: Te pubbasannivāsena sabbepi sahāyakā hutvā sahapaṃsukīḷitaṃ kīḷantā anupubbena vayappattā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:701_6: Te sabbeva ekato hutvā jālāni gahetvā naditaḷākādīsu macche bandhantā vicaranti.
atk-s0503a:702_0: Athekadivasaṃ aciravatiyā nadiyā jāle khitte suvaṇṇavaṇṇo maccho antojāle pāvisi.
atk-s0503a:702_1: Taṃ disvā sabbepi kevaṭṭā “amhākaṃ puttā macche bandhantā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ macchaṃ bandhiṃsū”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:702_2: Atha te pañcasatāpi sahāyakā macchaṃ nāvāya pakkhipitvā nāvaṃ ukkhipitvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:702_3: Rājā taṃ disvā “bhagavā etassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇakāraṇaṃ jānissatī”ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato dassesi.
atk-s0503a:702_4: Satthā “ayaṃ kassapasammāsambuddhassa sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā micchā paṭipajjanto sāsanaṃ osakkāpetvā
atk-s0503a:702_5: niraye nibbatto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tato cuto aciravatiyaṃ maccho hutvā nibbatto”ti vatvā
atk-s0503a:702_7: tassa bhātikattherassa parinibbutabhāvañca teneva kathāpetvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā kapilasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0503a:703_0: Satthu desanaṃ sutvā te pañcasatā kevaṭṭaputtā saṃvegajātā hutvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā,
atk-s0503a:703_1: upasampannā hutvā vivekavāsaṃ vasantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:703_3: “tena kho pana samayena yasojappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatānī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:704_6: Senāsanāni paññāpayamānāti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ attano ca pāpuṇakāni senāsanāni pucchitvā tehi nevāsikehi tesaṃ “idaṃ tumhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:704_8: idaṃ tumhākaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti senāsanāni saṃvidhāpetvā attanā ca tattha gantvā,
atk-s0503a:704_10: mañcapīṭhakaṭasārakādīni nīharitvā papphoṭetvā yathāṭhānaṃ ṭhapanādivasena paññāpentā ca.
atk-s0503a:705_5: idaṃ me kattarayaṭṭhi”nti evaṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ saṃgopayamānā.
atk-s0503a:705_6: Uccāsaddā mahāsaddāti uddhaṃ gataṭṭhena ucco saddo yesante uccāsaddā akārassa ākāraṃ katvā.
atk-s0503a:705_7: Samantato patthaṭaṭṭhena mahanto saddo yesante mahāsaddā.
atk-s0503a:705_8: Kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilopeti kevaṭṭā viya macchavilumpane.
atk-s0503a:705_9: Yathā nāma kevaṭṭā udake vaṭṭanato macchaggahaṇatthaṃ pavattanato “kevaṭṭā”ti laddhanāmā macchabandhā
atk-s0503a:705_10: macchaggahaṇatthaṃ jale jālaṃ pakkhipitvā “paviṭṭho na paviṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:705_12: Yathā ca te macchapacchiādīni ṭhapitaṭṭhāne mahājane gantvā “mayhaṃ ekaṃ macchaṃ detha,
atk-s0503a:705_15: mayhaṃ khuddako”tiādīni vatvā vilumpamāne tesaṃ paṭisedhanādivasena uccāsaddamahāsaddā ca honti,
atk-s0503a:705_23: Na vo mama santike vatthabbanti tumhehi mayhaṃ santike na vasitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:705_24: Ye tumhe mādisassa buddhassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā evaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karotha,
atk-s0503a:705_25: attano dhammatāya vasantā kiṃ nāma sāruppaṃ karissatha,
atk-s0503a:705_26: tumhādisānaṃ mama santike vasanakiccaṃ natthīti dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:705_27: Evaṃ paṇāmitesu ca bhagavatā tesu ekabhikkhupi “bhagavā tumhe mahāsaddamattakena amhe paṇāmethā”ti vā
atk-s0503a:705_28: aññaṃ vā kiñci paṭivacanaṃ avatvā buddhagāravena sabbe bhagavato vacanaṃ sampaṭicchantā “evaṃ,
atk-s0503a:705_30: Evaṃ pana tesaṃ ahosi “mayaṃ satthāraṃ passissāma,
atk-s0503a:705_33: evarūpassa pana garuno satthu santikaṃ āgantvā mahāsaddaṃ karimhā,
atk-s0503a:706_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “vajjī”tveva vuccati.
atk-s0503a:706_5: Vaggumudāti evaṃnāma lokassa puññasammatā ekā nadī.
atk-s0503a:706_7: Atthakāmenāti kiñci payojanaṃ anapekkhitvā atthameva icchantena.
atk-s0503a:706_9: “kinti me sāvakā vaṭṭadukkhā parimucceyyu”nti tassa atthasaṅkhātassa atthassa vā hetubhūtassa hitassa esanasīlena.
atk-s0503a:706_10: Tato eva attano sarīrakhedaṃ agaṇetvā dūrepi veneyyasantikaṃ gantvā anukampanato anukampakena.
atk-s0503a:706_13: Yasmā dhammagaruno buddhā bhagavanto sammāpaṭipattiyāva pūjetabbā,
atk-s0503a:706_16: tathā vihāraṃ kappema sabbattha satisampajaññayogena apaṇṇakappaṭipadaṃ pūrentā yathāgahitakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:706_18: Yathā no viharatanti yathā amhesu viharantesu,
atk-s0503a:707_1: Sabbeva tisso vijjā sacchākaṃsūti sabbeyeva te pañcasatā bhikkhū pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:707_4: Lokiyābhiññāsu imāyeva dve abhiññā āsavakkhayañāṇassa bahūpakārā,
atk-s0503a:707_5: na tathā dibbasotacetopariyaiddhividhañāṇānīti dassanatthaṃ vijjattayamevettha tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhigamadassanavasena uddhaṭaṃ.
atk-s0503a:707_6: Tathā hi verañjasutte bhagavā verañjabrāhmaṇassa attano adhigamaṃ dassento vijjattayameva desesi,
atk-s0503a:707_8: Evaṃ tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ vijjamānānipi dibbasotañāṇādīni na uddhaṭāni.
atk-s0503a:707_10: Evañca katvā “vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre antarahitā mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ bhagavato sammukhe pāturahesu”nti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhivaḷañjanaṃ vakkhati.
atk-s0503a:708_1: Buddhānañhi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ chāyūdakavipattiṃ vā aphāsukasenāsanaṃ vā manussānaṃ assaddhādibhāvaṃ vā āgamma anabhirati nāma natthi,
atk-s0503a:708_3: Yattha pana bhagavati viharante manussā saraṇesu vā patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0503a:708_6: satthā tāsu sampattīsu tesaṃ patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vasati,
atk-s0503a:708_10: “atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:709_1: Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā turitacārikā aturitacārikāti.
atk-s0503a:709_2: Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthaṃ sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma,
atk-s0503a:709_4: Yā pana gāmanigamarājadhānīpaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanaddhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto gacchati,
atk-s0503a:710_2: Vesāliyanti tikkhattuṃ visālībhūtattā “vesālī”ti laddhanāme licchavirājūnaṃ nagare.
atk-s0503a:710_3: Mahāvaneti mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:710_4: Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:710_7: Kūṭāgārasālāyanti tasmiṃ mahāvane bhagavantaṃ uddissa kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ anto katvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena
atk-s0503a:710_8: katā sabbākārasampannā buddhassa bhagavato gandhakuṭi kūṭāgārasālā nāma,
atk-s0503a:710_11: Cetasā ceto paricca manasi karitvāti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ paricchijja manasi karitvā,
atk-s0503a:710_12: cetopariyañāṇena vā sabbaññutaññāṇena vā tehi adhigatavisesaṃ jānitvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:711_3: Yasmā te yasojappamukhā pañcasatā bhikkhū sabbaso avijjandhakāravidhamanena ālokabhūtā obhāsabhūtā hutvā viharanti,
atk-s0503a:711_4: tasmā bhagavā tehi ṭhitadisāya “ālokajātā viya me, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:711_5: esā disā”tiādinā vaṇṇabhaṇanāpadesena te bhikkhū pasaṃsati.
atk-s0503a:712_0: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0503a:714_1: Satthā āyasmantānaṃ dassanakāmoti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike paheṇākāradassanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:714_2: Iti bhagavā yadatthaṃ te bhikkhū paṇāmesi,
atk-s0503a:714_3: tamatthaṃ matthakappattaṃ disvā āraddhacitto tesaṃ dassanakāmataṃ therassa ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:714_4: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ahaṃ ime uccāsaddamahāsaddakaraṇe paṇāmessāmi,
atk-s0503a:714_5: atha te bhadro assājānīyo viya kasābhighātena,
atk-s0503a:714_6: tena coditā saṃvegappattā mamārādhanatthaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā khippameva arahattaṃ sacchikarissantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:714_7: Idāni te aggaphalappatte disvā tāya arahattappattiyā ārādhitacitto tesaṃ dassanakāmo hutvā evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0503a:715_0: So bhikkhūti ānandattherena tathā āṇatto chaḷabhiñño eko bhikkhu.
atk-s0503a:715_5: Kasmā pana bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ jānanto paṭisanthāraṃ akatvā samāpattiṃyeva samāpajji?
atk-s0503a:715_7: tesaṃ pubbe paṇāmitānaṃ idāni attanā samānasambhogadassanatthaṃ,
atk-s0503a:715_10: Apare panāhu “pubbe paṇāmitānaṃ idāni attano santikaṃ āgatānaṃ anuttarasukhuppādanena anaññasādhāraṇapaṭisanthārakaraṇattha”nti.
atk-s0503a:715_11: Tepi āyasmanto bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā taṃyeva samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:715_13: “katamena nu kho bhagavā vihārena etarahi viharatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:716_0: Ettha ca rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ kosajjādīnaṃ pāripantikadhammānaṃ suvidūrabhāvato iddhiyā mūlabhūtehi
atk-s0503a:716_1: anoṇamanādīhi soḷasahi vodānadhammehi samannāgamanato āneñjappattaṃ sayaṃ aniñjanaṭṭhena āneñjanti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:717_1: Anuṇṇataṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_2: Anabhirataṃ cittaṃ rāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_3: Anapanataṃ cittaṃ byāpāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_4: Anissitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhiyā na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_5: Appaṭibaddhaṃ cittaṃ chandarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_6: Vippamuttaṃ cittaṃ kāmarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_7: Visaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ kilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_8: Vimariyādikataṃ cittaṃ kilesamariyādāya na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_9: Ekattagataṃ cittaṃ nānattakilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_10: Saddhāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ assaddhiye na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_11: Vīriyena pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_12: Satiyā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ pamāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_13: Samādhinā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_14: Paññāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ avijjāya na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:717_15: Obhāsagataṃ cittaṃ avijjandhakāre na iñjatīti āneñja”nti.
atk-s0503a:718_1: ārammaṇavibhāgena catubbidhaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānanti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ āneñjavohāro.
atk-s0503a:718_2: Tesaṃ yaṃ kiñci pādakaṃ katvā samāpannā arahattaphalasamāpatti āneñjasamādhīti porāṇā.
atk-s0503a:719_3: Tuṇhī ahosīti bhagavā ariyena tuṇhībhāvena tuṇhī ahosi.

atk-s0503a:719_6: Nandimukhiyāti rattiyā aruṇassa uggatattā eva aruṇappabhāya sūriyālokūpajīvino satte nandāpanamukhiyā viya rattiyā jātāya,
atk-s0503a:720_0: Tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvāti yathāparicchedaṃ tato āneñjasamādhito arahattaphalasamāpattito uṭṭhāya.
atk-s0503a:720_2: jāneyyāsīti bhagavā “ime ca bhikkhū ettakaṃ kālaṃ iminā nāma samāpattisukhena vītināmentī”ti, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:720_4: Ettakampi te nappaṭibhāseyyāti lokiyapaṭisammodanaṃ sandhāya yadidaṃ te “abhikkantā, bhante,
atk-s0503a:720_9: tasmā maṃ imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lokiyapaṭisammodanaṃ kāretuṃ ussukkaṃ āpajji.
atk-s0503a:720_10: Ahaṃ pana imehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ lokuttarapaṭisammodaneneva tiyāmarattiṃ vītināmesinti dassento bhagavā āha – “ahañca, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:720_11: imāni ca pañca bhikkhusatāni sabbeva āneñjasamādhinā nisīdimhā”ti.
atk-s0503a:721_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ attanā samaṃ āneñjasamādhisamāpajjanasamatthatāsaṅkhātaṃ vasībhāvatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:721_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesarāgādippahānasaṃsiddhitādisabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:722_0: Tattha yassa jito kāmakaṇḍakoti kusalapakkhavijjhanaṭṭhena kaṇḍakabhūto kilesakāmo yena ariyapuggalena anavasesaṃ jito pahīno,
atk-s0503a:722_4: gāme kaṇṭako kaṇṭakaṭṭhāniyo sakalo vatthukāmo yassa jitoti.
atk-s0503a:722_8: Vadho ca bandhanañcāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-s0503a:722_11: Tena taṃnimittakassa byāpādassa anavasesappahānena tatiyamaggo vutto hoti.
atk-s0503a:722_12: Atha vā akkosādijayavacanena tatiyamaggo vutto hoti,
atk-s0503a:722_15: Pabbato viya so ṭhito anejoti ejā vuccati calanakilesaparipantho,

atk-s0503a:722_18: Sukhadukkhesu na vedhati sa bhikkhūti so bhinnakileso bhikkhu sukhadukkhanimittaṃ na kampatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:722_19: Iti bhagavā tesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ arahattādhigamena tādibhāvappattiṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti.

atk-s0503a:726_0: “Ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti supaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā,
atk-s0503a:727_7: Niyyānanti ca satiyā ogāhitabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:727_8: Ettha ca purimo pacchimo ca attho sabbasaṅgāhakavasena,
atk-s0503a:727_10: Satīti vā satisīsena jhānaṃ vuttaṃ “ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjantī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0503a:727_14: Āneñjasamādhiyogena therassa savisesaṃ niccalabhāvaṃ kenaci akampanīyatañca pabbatopamāya pakāsento bhagavā
atk-s0503a:727_15: imaṃ udānaṃ abhāsīti gāthāya eva ayamattho viññāyati.
atk-s0503a:727_18: Pubbeyeva hi sūkarakhataleṇe attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa bhagavati dhammaṃ desente
atk-s0503a:728_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ therassa āneñjasamādhiyogena tādibhāvappattiyā ca kenaci akampanīyatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0503a:728_1: sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:729_0: Tattha yathāpi pabbato seloti yathā silāmayo ekagghanasilāpabbato,
atk-s0503a:729_2: Acalo suppatiṭṭhitoti suppatiṭṭhitamūlo pakativātehi acalo akampanīyo hoti.
atk-s0503a:729_4: pabbatova na vedhatīti mohassa anavasesappahānā mohamūlakattā ca sabbākusalānaṃ pahīnasabbākusalo bhikkhu,
atk-s0503a:729_6: evaṃ lokadhammehi na vedhati na kampati.
atk-s0503a:729_7: Mohakkhayoti vā yasmā nibbānaṃ arahattañca vuccati,
atk-s0503a:729_8: tasmā mohakkhayassa hetu nibbānassa arahattassa vā adhigatattā catūsu ariyasaccesu suppatiṭṭhito asamāpannakālepi
atk-s0503a:732_1: Pañcame kāyagatāya satiyāti kāyānupassanāvasena kāye gatāya kāyārammaṇāya satiyā,
atk-s0503a:732_5: Atha vā yasmā kammaṭṭhānabhūto kesādiko dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsasamudāyo idha kāyoti adhippeto,
atk-s0503a:732_6: tasmā ajjhattanti padassa gocarajjhattanti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:732_7: Sūpaṭṭhitāyāti niyakajjhattabhūte gocarajjhattabhūte vā kāye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitāya.
atk-s0503a:732_10: Yvāyaṃ bhagavatā “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā”tiādinā ajjhattakesādiko dvattiṃsākāro kāyo vutto,
atk-s0503a:732_11: tattha yā paṭikūlamanasikāraṃ pavattentassa upacārappanāvasena kāye upaṭṭhitā sati,
atk-s0503a:732_14: evaṃ ānāpānacatuiriyāpathasatisampajaññānaṃ vasena uddhumātakavinīlakādivasena ca manasikāraṃ pavattentassa
atk-s0503a:732_15: yathārahaṃ upacārappanāvasena kāye upaṭṭhitā sati “kāyagatā satī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:732_16: Idha pana ajjhattaṃ kāyagatā sati pathavīādikā catasso dhātuyo sasambhārasaṅkhepādīsu catūsu yena kenaci
atk-s0503a:732_17: ekenākārena vavatthapetvā tesaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena upaṭṭhitā vipassanāsampayuttā sati
atk-s0503a:732_19: Thero pana tathā vipassitvā attano phalasamāpattimeva samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:732_20: Idhāpi gāthāya evaṃ imassa atthassa viññātabbatā “na cāyaṃ nisajjā”tiādinā vuttanayānusārena yojetabbā.
atk-s0503a:733_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ therassa catudhātuvavatthānamukhena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānena vipassanaṃ ogāhetvā
atk-s0503a:733_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya nibbānādhigamadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:734_0: Tattha sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti pubbe vuttalakkhaṇā sati saddhāpubbaṅgamānaṃ samādhivīriyapaññānaṃ yathāsakaṃ
atk-s0503a:734_1: kiccanipphādanena sahāyabhāvaṃ āpannattā pahīnappaṭipakkhā tato eva tikkhavisadabhūtā ca yathāvuttakāyasaṃvaraṇavasena
atk-s0503a:734_2: ekatthasamosaraṇavasena ca aviparītasabhāvaṃ sallakkhentī upagantvā ṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0503a:734_3: etena kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ tannissitānañca upādārūpānaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena,
atk-s0503a:734_4: paccaye vavatthapetvā tato paraṃ tesaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena ca pavattaṃ ñāṇaparamparāgataṃ satiṃ dasseti,
atk-s0503a:734_6: Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti yathāvuttāya kāye upaṭṭhitāya satiyā samannāgato cakkhādīsu phassassa
atk-s0503a:734_7: kāraṇabhūtesu chasu dvāresu kāyānupassanāya abhāvitāya uppajjanārahānaṃ abhijjhādīnaṃ tassā bhāvitattā
atk-s0503a:734_8: ñāṇappavattiṃ paṭivedhento te pidahanto “tattha saṃvuto”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:735_0: Satataṃ bhikkhu samāhitoti so bhikkhu evaṃ upaṭṭhitassati sabbattha ca saṃvuto puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:735_1: avissajjetvā aniccādivasena sammasanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ñāṇe tikkhe sūre vahante vipassanāsamādhinā
atk-s0503a:735_2: tāva satataṃ nirantaraṃ samāhito anulomañāṇānantaraṃ gotrabhuñāṇodayato paṭṭhāya.
atk-s0503a:735_3: Jaññā nibbānamattanoti aññesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ supinantepi agocarabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:735_4: ariyānaṃ pana tassa tasseva āveṇikattā attasadisattā ca “attā”ti laddhavohārassa maggaphalañāṇassa sātisayavisayabhāvato
atk-s0503a:735_10: Ariyā hi adhicittappavattikālepi ekanteneva nibbāne ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena viharanti.
atk-s0503a:735_11: Ettha ca yassa sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitā,
atk-s0503a:735_13: tato eva satataṃ samāhito attapaccakkhakaraṇena nibbānaṃ attano jāneyyāti evaṃ gāthāpadānaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:735_14: Evaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānamukhena yāva arahattā ekassa bhikkhuno niyyānamaggaṃ dasseti dhammarājā.
atk-s0503a:736_1: sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti etena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:736_2: Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti phasso āyatanaṃ kāraṇaṃ etesanti phassāyatanāni,
atk-s0503a:736_4: Phassahetukesu phassapaccayā nibbattesu chasu cakkhusamphassajādivedayitesu taṇhādīnaṃ appavattiyā saṃvuto,
atk-s0503a:736_6: Satataṃ bhikkhu samāhitoti satataṃ niccakālaṃ nirantaraṃ vikkhepābhāvato samāhito bhikkhu.
atk-s0503a:736_7: So cāyaṃ avikkhepo sabbaso satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya matthakappattāya hoti.
atk-s0503a:736_8: Sammasanto hi atītādibhedabhinnesu pañcupādānakkhandhesu anavasesatova pariggahetvā sammasatīti.
atk-s0503a:736_10: Jaññā nibbānamattanoti evaṃ catusatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhito bhinnakileso bhikkhu attano
atk-s0503a:737_0: Atha vā sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti attano paresañca kāyassa yathāsabhāvapariññādīpanena therassa sativepullappatti dīpitā.
atk-s0503a:737_1: Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti cakkhādīsu chasu dvāresu accantasaṃvaradīpanena satatavihārivasena therassa
atk-s0503a:737_3: Satataṃ bhikkhu samāhitoti samāpattibahulatādassanena navānupubbavihārasamāpattiyo dassitā.
atk-s0503a:737_4: Evaṃbhūto pana bhikkhu jaññā nibbānamattanoti katakiccattā uttari karaṇīyābhāvato kevalaṃ attano anupādisesanibbānameva jāneyya cinteyya,
atk-s0503a:740_6: Te theraṃ tathā samudācarantaṃ disvā “arahāva samāno appahīnavāsanattā evaṃ bhaṇatī”ti ajānantā “dosantaro
atk-s0503a:740_7: maññe ayaṃ thero evaṃ samudācaratī”ti cintetvā ullapanādhippāyā taṃ tato vuṭṭhāpetuṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:740_13: ‘abhūto eva nu kho imasmiṃ uttarimanussadhammo’ti vāsanāvasena tassa tathā samudācāraṃ ajānantā ariyabhāvañcassa
atk-s0503a:740_15: Bhagavā therassa dosantarābhāvaṃ pakāsetukāmo ekena bhikkhunā taṃ pakkosāpetvā sammukhā tassa “pubbāciṇṇavasenāyaṃ tathā samudācarati,
atk-s0503a:741_0: Tattha pubbenivāsaṃ manasi karitvāti satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, vaccha,

atk-s0503a:741_6: Bhikkhū āmantesīti te bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ ālapi, abhāsi.

atk-s0503a:743_1: Pañca jātisatāni brāhmaṇakule paccājātānīti sabbāni tāni vacchassa pañca jātisatāni paṭipāṭiyā brāhmaṇakule eva jātāni,

atk-s0503a:743_15: Taṃ panetaṃ abhinīhārasampattiyā ñeyyāvaraṇappahānavasena yattha kilesā pahīnā,

atk-s0503a:744_1: Imaṃ udānanti tassa aggaphalādhigamavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:745_0: Tattha yamhi na māyā vasati na mānoti yasmiṃ ariyapuggale santadosappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā,
atk-s0503a:745_1: “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā sampaggahavasena pavatto uṇṇatilakkhaṇo māno ca na vasati,
atk-s0503a:745_2: maggena samugghātitattā na pavattati na uppajjati.
atk-s0503a:745_3: Yo vītalobho amamo nirāsoti yo ca rāgādipariyāyavasena pavattassa ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇassa lobhassa sabbathā vigatattā vītalobho,
atk-s0503a:745_4: tato eva rūpādīsu katthaci mamāyanābhāvato amamo apariggaho,
atk-s0503a:745_6: Panuṇṇakodhoti kujjhanalakkhaṇassa kodhassa anāgāmimaggena sabbaso pahīnattā panuṇṇakodho samucchinnāghāto.
atk-s0503a:745_7: Abhinibbutattoti yo evaṃ māyāmānalobhakodhānaṃ samugghātena tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassa saṃkilesapakkhassa
atk-s0503a:745_9: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhūti so evarūpo khīṇāsavo sabbaso bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo,
atk-s0503a:745_10: so eva samitapāpattā samacariyāya ca samaṇo,
atk-s0503a:745_11: so eva ca sabbaso bhinnakilesattā bhikkhu nāma.
atk-s0503a:745_14: vaccho so kathaṃ dosantaro kiñci kāyakammādiṃ pavatteyya,
atk-s0503a:745_15: kevalaṃ pana vāsanāya appahīnattā vasalavādena samudācaratīti.

atk-s0503a:748_3: Tañhi so āyasmā bahulaṃ samāpajjati diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ,

atk-s0503a:750_1: na cettha “yadi evaṃ thero yamakapāṭihāriyampi kareyyā”ti vattabbaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇānaṃyeva jhānādīnaṃ adhippetattāti.
atk-s0503a:751_6: Yā hi esā paccanīkadhammehi akampanīyā balappattiyā samathabalaṃ vipassanābalanti imehi dvīhi balehi,

atk-s0503a:751_9: paṭhamajjhānasamādhiādayo aṭṭha samādhī ekajjhaṃ katvā gahito tesaṃ upacārasamādhi cāti imesaṃ navannaṃ
atk-s0503a:751_10: samādhīnaṃ vasena navahi samādhicariyāhi kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro cittasaṅkhāroti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
atk-s0503a:751_11: tattha tattha paṭippassaddhiyā tathā viharitukāmena yathāvuttesu ṭhānesu vasībhāvappattena arahatā anāgāminā
atk-s0503a:751_12: vā yathādhippetaṃ kālaṃ cittacetasikasantānassa sammadeva appavatti ādhātabbā,
atk-s0503a:752_0: “Kathaṃ dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi
atk-s0503a:753_0: Pucchitvā “dvīhi balehī”ti dve balāni samathabalaṃ vipassanābalanti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:753_2: Kasmā panāyaṃ thero phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpajjitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajji?
atk-s0503a:753_6: Tañhi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa kato appakopi sakkāro visesato mahapphalo mahānisaṃso hotīti.
atk-s0503a:754_1: Nirodhaṃ samāpanno hi arahā ce arahattaphalassa,
atk-s0503a:754_2: anāgāmī ce anāgāmiphalassa uppādena vuṭṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-s0503a:755_0: Tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātaṃ dātukāmo hotīti kathaṃ tassa dātukāmatā jātā?
atk-s0503a:755_2: tā sakkassa devarañño paricārikā kakuṭapādiniyo pubbe “ayyo mahākassapo rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0503a:755_3: gacchatha therassa dānaṃ dethā”ti sakkena pesitā upagantvā dibbāhāraṃ dātukāmā ṭhitā therena paṭikkhittā devalokameva gatā.
atk-s0503a:755_4: Idāni purimappaṭikkhepaṃ cintetvā “kadāci gaṇheyyā”ti samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa therassa dānaṃ dātukāmā
atk-s0503a:755_5: sakkassa anārocetvā sayameva āgantvā dibbabhojanāni upanentiyo purimanayeneva therena paṭikkhittā devalokaṃ
atk-s0503a:755_6: gantvā sakkena “kahaṃ gatatthā”ti puṭṭhā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “dinno vo therassa piṇḍapāto”ti sakkena vutte
atk-s0503a:755_13: jarājiṇṇo khaṇḍadanto palitakeso obhaggasarīro mahallako tantavāyo hutvā,
atk-s0503a:755_15: ekaṃ pesakāravīthiṃ māpetvā tantaṃ pasārento acchi,
atk-s0503a:756_0: Tattha tantaṃ vinātīti pasāritatantaṃ vinanto viya hoti.
atk-s0503a:756_2: Yena sakkassa devānamindassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamīti thero nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya “duggatajanasaṅgahaṃ
atk-s0503a:756_3: karissāmī”ti nagarābhimukho gacchanto bahinagare sakkena māpitaṃ pesakāravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā olokento
atk-s0503a:756_4: addasa oluggaviluggajiṇṇasālaṃ tattha ca te jāyampatike yathāvuttarūpe tantavāyakammaṃ karonte disvā cintesi –
atk-s0503a:756_6: Imasmiṃ nagare imehi duggatatarā natthi maññe.
atk-s0503a:756_7: Imehi dinnaṃ sākamattampi gahetvā imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:756_9: Sakko taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā sujaṃ āha – “bhadde,
atk-s0503a:756_11: taṃ tvaṃ apassantī viya tuṇhī hutvā nisīda.
atk-s0503a:756_12: Khaṇeneva vañcetvā piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmā”ti thero gantvā gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:756_13: Tepi apassantā viya attano kammameva karontā thokaṃ āgamayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:756_14: Atha sakko “gehadvāre ṭhito eko thero viya khāyati,
atk-s0503a:756_17: So gehā nikkhamitvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ubhohi hatthehi jaṇṇukāni olumbitvā nitthunanto
atk-s0503a:756_18: uṭṭhāya “kataratthero nu kho ayyo”ti thokaṃ osakkitvā “akkhīni me dhūmāyantī”ti vatvā nalāṭe hatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:756_19: ṭhapetvā uddhaṃ ulloketvā “aho dukkhaṃ ayyo no mahākassapattherova cirassaṃ me kuṭidvāraṃ āgato.
atk-s0503a:756_20: Atthi nu kho kiñci gehe”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:756_23: lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:756_24: Thero pattaṃ dento “imesaṃ eva duggatānaṃ jarājiṇṇānaṃ mayā saṅgaho kātabbo”ti cintesi.
atk-s0503a:756_25: So anto pavisitvā ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma ghaṭito uddharitvā,
atk-s0503a:757_2: tassa ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma devānaṃ koci āhāravisesoti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0503a:757_4: Anekasūpo so eva āhāro patte pakkhipitvā therassa hatthe ṭhapanakāle kapaṇānaṃ upakappanakalūkhāhāro viya paññāyittha,
atk-s0503a:757_5: hatthe ṭhapitamatte pana attano dibbasabhāveneva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:757_6: Anekasūpoti muggamāsādisūpehi ceva khajjavikatīhi ca anekavidhasūpo.
atk-s0503a:757_8: Anekarasabyañjanoti anekehi sūpehi ceva byañjanehi ca madhurādimūlarasānañceva sambhinnarasānañca abhibyañjako,
atk-s0503a:758_0: So kira piṇḍapāto therassa hatthe ṭhapitakāle rājagahanagaraṃ attano dibbagandhena ajjhotthari,
atk-s0503a:758_8: ajja mayhaṃ dānaṃ datvā kocideva duggato senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ vā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ vā labheyyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:758_13: mayā pana anuppanne buddhe kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0503a:758_14: buddhuppāde pana vattamāne puññakammaṃ katvā cūḷarathadevaputto mahārathadevaputto anekavaṇṇadevaputtoti
atk-s0503a:758_15: ime tayo devaputtā mamāsannaṭṭhāne nibbattā mahātejavantatarā.
atk-s0503a:758_16: Ahaṃ tesu devaputtesu ‘nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā’ti paricārikāyo gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇesu palāyitvā gehaṃ pavisāmi.
atk-s0503a:758_17: Tesañhi sarīrato tejo mama sarīraṃ ottharati,
atk-s0503a:758_18: mama sarīrato tejo tesaṃ sarīraṃ na ottharati.
atk-s0503a:758_21: “Evaṃ santepi ito paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ mā evaṃ vañcetvā dānamadāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:758_22: “Vañcetvā tumhākaṃ dāne dinne mayhaṃ kusalaṃ atthi natthī”ti? “Atthi, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0503a:758_24: bhante”ti vatvā theraṃ vanditvā sujaṃ ādāya theraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā,
atk-s0503a:758_27: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:759_0: Tattha kosiyāti sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ gottena ālapati.
atk-s0503a:759_4: Ākāse antalikkheti ākāsameva pariyāyasaddena antalikkheti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:759_5: Atha vā antalikkhasaṅkhāte ākāse na kasiṇugghāṭimādiākāseti visesento vadati.
atk-s0503a:759_6: Aho dānanti ettha ahoti acchariyatthe nipāto.
atk-s0503a:759_8: “yasmā nirodhā vuṭṭhitassa ayyassa mahākassapattherassa sakkaccaṃ sahatthena cittīkatvā anapaviddhaṃ kālena paresaṃ anupahacca,
atk-s0503a:759_9: sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā idamīdisaṃ mayā dibbabhojanadānaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:759_11: tividhāyapi sampattiyā samannāgatattā sabbaṅgasampannaṃ vata mayā dānaṃ pavattita”nti acchariyabbhutacittajāto
atk-s0503a:759_12: tadā attano hadayabbhantaragataṃ pītisomanassaṃ samuggiranto “aho dāna”nti vatvā tassa dānassa vuttanayena
atk-s0503a:759_13: uttamadānabhāvaṃ khettaṅgatabhāvañca pakāsento “paramadānaṃ kassape suppatiṭṭhita”nti udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:760_0: Evaṃ pana sakkassa udānentassa bhagavā vihāre ṭhitoyeva dibbasotena saddaṃ sutvā “passatha,
atk-s0503a:760_2: sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā ākāsena gacchanta”nti bhikkhūnaṃ vatvā tehi “kiṃ pana, bhante,
atk-s0503a:760_3: tena kata”nti puṭṭho “mama puttassa kassapassa vañcetvā dānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0503a:760_5: Tena vuttaṃ “assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:761_1: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattā pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhā upakkilesavinimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:761_3: Ayañcāpi bhagavato vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattā ñāṇamayā sotadhātu tādisā evāti dibbasadisattā dibbā.
atk-s0503a:761_4: Api ca dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbā.
atk-s0503a:761_9: Atikkantamānusikāyāti manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā saddassavanena mānusikamaṃsasotadhātuṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāya.
atk-s0503a:762_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti “sammāpaṭipattiyā guṇavisese patiṭṭhitaṃ purisātisayaṃ devāpi manussāpi ādarajātā
atk-s0503a:762_1: ativiya pihayantī”ti imamatthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:763_0: Tatra piṇḍapātikaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ samādāya tassa paripūraṇena piṇḍapātikassa.
atk-s0503a:763_1: Nanu cāyaṃ gāthā āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ nimittaṃ katvā bhāsitā,
atk-s0503a:763_2: thero ca sabbesaṃ dhutavādānaṃ aggo terasadhutaṅgadharo,
atk-s0503a:763_6: iminā desanāsīsena sabbepissa dhutaṅgā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:763_7: Atha vā “yathāpi bhamaro puppha”nti gāthāya vuttanayena paramappicchatāya kulānuddayatāya cassa sabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:763_8: piṇḍapātikavattaṃ akkhaṇḍetvā tattha sātisayaṃ paṭipattiyā pakāsanatthaṃ “piṇḍapātikassā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:763_9: Piṇḍapātikassāti ca pihayantīti padaṃ apekkhitvā sampadānavacanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:763_11: Attabharassāti “appāni ca tāni sulabhāni anavajjānī”ti evaṃ vuttehi appānavajjasulabharūpehi catūhi paccayehi attānameva bharantassa.
atk-s0503a:763_12: Anaññaposinoti āmisasaṅgaṇhanena aññe sissādike posetuṃ anussukkatāya anaññaposino.
atk-s0503a:763_13: Padadvayenassa kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato sallahukavuttitaṃ subharataṃ paramañca santuṭṭhiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:763_14: Atha vā attabharassāti ekavacanicchāya attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃyeva imaṃ attānaṃ bharati,
atk-s0503a:763_16: tato eva attanā aññassa posetabbassa abhāvato anaññaposī,
atk-s0503a:764_1: satīmatoti taṃ aggaphalādhigamena sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamena paṭippassaddhiyā upasantaṃ,
atk-s0503a:764_3: tato eva iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ sakkādayo devā pihayanti patthenti,
atk-s0503a:764_4: tassa sīlādiguṇavisesesu bahumānaṃ uppādentā ādaraṃ janenti,
atk-s0503a:767_1: Aṭṭhame pacchābhattanti ekāsanikakhalupacchābhattikānaṃ pātova bhuttānaṃ antomajjhanhikopi pacchābhattameva,
atk-s0503a:767_2: idha pana pakatibhattasseva pacchato pacchābhattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:767_4: piṇḍapātaṃ pariyesitvā bhattakiccassa niṭṭhāpanavasena tato nivattānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:767_6: So kira gandhakuṭiyā maṇḍapassa sālāya ca antare hoti,
atk-s0503a:767_9: Tasmā karerirukkhassa avidūre kate nisīdanasālasaṅkhāte maṇḍalamāḷe.
atk-s0503a:768_4: Iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvo ca puggalavasena ca dvāravasena ca gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:768_5: Ekaccassa hi iṭṭhābhimato ekaccassa aniṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0503a:768_7: Tathā ekassa dvārassa iṭṭho aññassa aniṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:768_11: Cakkhunā rūpe passitunti gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho upāsakehi gehaṃ pavesetvā pūjāsakkārakaraṇatthaṃ upanītesu
atk-s0503a:768_12: āsanavitānādīsu nānāvirāgasamujjalavaṇṇasaṅkhāte rajanīye aññe ca saviññāṇakarūpe cakkhudvārikaviññāṇehi passituṃ.
atk-s0503a:768_13: Saddeti tatheva issarajanānaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭho tesaṃ payutte gītavāditasadde sotuṃ.
atk-s0503a:768_14: Gandheti tathā tehi pūjāsakkāravasena upanīte pupphadhūmādigandhe ghāyituṃ.
atk-s0503a:768_16: Phoṭṭhabbeti mahagghapaccattharaṇesu āsanesu nisinnakāle sukhasamphasse phoṭṭhabbe phusituṃ.
atk-s0503a:768_17: Evañca pañcadvārikaiṭṭhārammaṇappaṭilābhaṃ kittetvā idāni manodvārikaiṭṭhārammaṇappaṭilābhaṃ dassetuṃ “sakkato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:769_0: Kiṃ pana apiṇḍapātikānaṃ ayaṃ nayo na labbhatīti? Labbhati.
atk-s0503a:769_1: Tesampi hi nimantanasalākabhattādiatthaṃ gāmaṃ gatakāle uḷāravibhavā upāsakā tathā sakkārasammānaṃ karontiyeva,
atk-s0503a:769_3: Piṇḍapātikānaṃ pana tadā niccameva tattha pūjāsakkāraṃ kariyamānaṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:770_2: Tenupasaṅkamīti tattha surabhigandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno tesaṃ taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā “ime bhikkhū mādisassa
atk-s0503a:770_3: nāma buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā mayā saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasantāpi evaṃ ayonisomanasikāravasena kathaṃ
atk-s0503a:770_6: handa te tato nivāretvā sallekhavihāre niyojessāmī”ti maṇḍalamāḷaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:771_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti “appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāsallekhānaṃ vasena kilese dhunituṃ taṇhaṃ visosetuṃ paṭipannoti piṇḍapātikassa sato devā pihayanti,
atk-s0503a:771_2: na ito aññathā”ti imamatthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:772_0: Tattha no ce saddasilokanissitoti “aho ayyo appiccho santuṭṭho paramasallekhavuttī”tiādinā parehi kittitabbasaddasaṅkhātaṃ silokaṃ.
atk-s0503a:772_1: Taṇhāya nissito na hoti ceti attho.
atk-s0503a:775_3: amhesu idha sannipatitesu ko nu jīvitanimittaṃ sikkhitabbaṭṭhena “sippa”nti laddhanāmaṃ yaṃkiñci ājīvaṃ vijānāti?
atk-s0503a:775_4: Ko kiṃ sippaṃ sikkhīti ko dīgharattaṃ sippācariyakulaṃ payirupāsitvā āgamato payogato ca hatthisippādīsu kiṃ sippaṃ sikkhi?
atk-s0503a:775_5: Kataraṃ sippaṃ sippānaṃ agganti sabbasippānaṃ agārayhatāya mahapphalatāya akicchasiddhiyā ca kataraṃ sippaṃ aggaṃ uttamaṃ?
atk-s0503a:775_6: Yaṃ nissāya sukhena sakkā jīvitunti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:775_12: taṃ uddissa pavattaṃ sabbampi sippaṃ idha “hatthisippa”nti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0503a:775_14: Rathasippaṃ pana rathayoggānaṃ damanasāraṇādividhānavasena ceva rathassa karaṇavasena ca veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:775_22: so rukkhampi disvā “ettakāni ettha paṇṇānī”ti gaṇituṃ jānāti.
atk-s0503a:775_25: Kāveyyasippanti attano cintāvasena vā parato paṭiladdhasutavasena vā,
atk-s0503a:775_27: evaṃ naṃ yojessāmī”ti evaṃ atthavasena vā,
atk-s0503a:775_29: “tappaṭibhāgaṃ kabbaṃ karissāmī”ti ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavasena vā cintākaviādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kavīnaṃ kabbakaraṇasippaṃ.
atk-s0503a:776_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, kavī – cintākavi, sutakavi, atthakavi, paṭibhānakavī”ti.
atk-s0503a:777_1: balākā rattā lohitassa rattattā”ti evamādinayappavattaṃ paralokanibbānānaṃ paṭisedhakaṃ vitaṇḍasatthasippaṃ.
atk-s0503a:778_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sabbasippāyatanānaṃ jīvikatthatāya vaṭṭadukkhato anissaraṇabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:778_2: taṃ samaṅginoyeva ca bhikkhubhāvaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:779_0: Tattha asippajīvīti catunnaṃ taṇhuppādānaṃ samucchedavikkhambhanena paccayāsāya visositattā yaṃkiñci
atk-s0503a:779_1: sippaṃ upanissāya jīvikaṃ na kappetīti asippajīvī,
atk-s0503a:779_3: Lahūti appakiccatāya sallahukavuttitāya ca lahu abahulasambhāro,
atk-s0503a:779_5: Atthakāmoti sadevakassa lokassa atthameva kāmetīti atthakāmo,
atk-s0503a:779_6: etena sattānaṃ anatthaparivajjanassa pakāsitattā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ dasseti pāṇātipātādianatthaviramaṇaparidīpanato.
atk-s0503a:779_7: Yatindriyoti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ abhijjhādyappavattito saṃyamena yatindriyo,
atk-s0503a:779_9: Sabbadhi vippamuttoti evaṃ suparisuddhasīlo catupaccayasantose avaṭṭhito sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-s0503a:779_10: aniccādivasena saṅkhāre sammasanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tato paraṃ paṭipāṭiyā pavattitehi catūhi ariyamaggehi
atk-s0503a:779_11: saṃyojanānaṃ pahīnattā sabbadhi sabbattha bhavādīsu vippamutto.
atk-s0503a:780_0: Anokasārī amamo nirāsoti tathā sabbadhi vippamuttattā eva okasaṅkhātesu chasupi āyatanesu taṇhābhisaraṇassa abhāvena anokasārī,
atk-s0503a:780_3: Hitvā mānaṃ ekacaro sa bhikkhūti evaṃbhūto ca so arahattamaggappattisamakālameva anavasesaṃ mānaṃ hitvā
atk-s0503a:780_4: pajahitvā ime bhikkhū viya gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ akatvā pavivekakāmatāya taṇhāsahāyavirahena ca sabbiriyāpathesu ekacaro,
atk-s0503a:780_5: so sabbaso bhinnakilesattā paramatthato bhikkhu nāma.
atk-s0503a:780_9: na sippaṃ nissāya micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappentassa,
atk-s0503a:780_10: tasmā sippesu sāraggahaṇaṃ vissajjetvā adhisīlādīsuyeva tumhehi sikkhitabba”nti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:783_1: Dasame buddhacakkhunāti ettha āsayānusayañāṇaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca buddhacakkhu nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:784_0: “Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:785_0: Lokanti tayo lokā – okāsaloko, saṅkhāraloko, sattalokoti. Tattha –
atk-s0503a:791_0: Tattha lokīyati vicittākārato dissatīti cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto loko okāsaloko,
atk-s0503a:791_2: lokīyati ettha puññapāpaṃ tabbipāko cāti sattaloko.
atk-s0503a:791_3: Tesu bhagavā mahākaruṇāya anukampamāno saṃsāradukkhato mocetukāmo sattalokaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0503a:791_6: Bhagavā hi pallaṅkasattāhassa pariyosāne pacchimayāmāvasāne “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā…pe…
atk-s0503a:791_7: sūriyova obhāsayamantalikkha”nti imaṃ ariyamaggānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā,
atk-s0503a:791_8: “ahaṃ tāva evaṃ suduttaraṃ saṃsāramahoghaṃ imāya dhammanāvāya samuttaritvā nibbānapāre ṭhito,
atk-s0503a:791_10: kīdiso nu kho loko”ti lokaṃ volokesi.
atk-s0503a:791_12: “atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:792_1: hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya attano ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:792_6: Tañca dukkhadukkhādivasena ceva jātiādivasena ca anekappakāraṃ.
atk-s0503a:792_10: Pariḍayhamāneti indhanaṃ viya agginā samantato ḍayhamāne.
atk-s0503a:792_18: Yato te cittaṃ kāyañca kilesentīti kilesāti vuccanti.
atk-s0503a:792_19: Ettha ca pariḍayhamāneti etena bhagavā rāgādikilesānaṃ pavattidukkhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:793_0: Bhagavā hi bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinno paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme
atk-s0503a:793_1: dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā kilesamūlakaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ abhiññāya
atk-s0503a:793_2: saṅkhāre pariggahetvā sammasanto anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggādhigamena sayaṃ vigataviddhastakileso
atk-s0503a:793_3: abhisambuddho hutvā paccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ anavasesānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā attano vaṭṭadukkhassa parikkhīṇabhāvadīpakaṃ
atk-s0503a:793_4: sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā teneva pallaṅkena sattāhaṃ vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī
atk-s0503a:793_5: nisinno sattamāya rattiyā tīsu yāmesu vuttanayena tīṇi udānāni udānetvā tatiyaudānānantaraṃ buddhacakkhunā
atk-s0503a:793_8: tehi ime sattā santappanti pariḍayhanti cā”ti passi.
atk-s0503a:794_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ lokassa yathāvuttasantāpapariḷāhehi abhibhuyyamānataṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:794_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ sabbasantāpapariḷāhato parinibbānavibhāvanaṃ mahāudānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:795_0: Tattha ayaṃ loko santāpajātoti ayaṃ sabbopi loko jarārogamaraṇehi ceva nānāvidhabyasanehi ca kilesapariyuṭṭhānehi ca jātasantāpo,
atk-s0503a:795_2: Phassaparetoti tato eva anekehi dukkhasamphassehi parihato upadduto.
atk-s0503a:795_3: Atha vā phassaparetoti sukhādisaṅkhātānaṃ tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ paccayabhūtehi chahi phassehi abhibhūto,
atk-s0503a:795_4: tato tato dvārato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavattivasena upassaṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:795_5: Rogaṃ vadati attatoti phassapaccayā uppajjamānaṃ vedanāsaṅkhātaṃ rogaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:795_6: khandhapañcakameva vā yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto “aha”nti saññāya diṭṭhigāhavasena “ahaṃ sukhito dukkhito”ti attato vadati.
atk-s0503a:795_9: yvāyaṃ loko kenaci dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho abhāvitattatāya adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “aho dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:795_10: īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ attanopi mā hotū”tiādinā vippalapanto kevalaṃ attano rogaṃ vadati,
atk-s0503a:795_11: tassa pana pahānāya na paṭipajjatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:795_12: Atha vā taṃ yathāvuttaṃ dukkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto taṇhāgāhavasena “mama”nti saññāya attato vadati,
atk-s0503a:796_0: Yena yena hi maññatīti evamimaṃ rogabhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ attato attano vā vadanto loko yena yena rūpavedanādinā kāraṇabhūtena,
atk-s0503a:796_1: yena vā sassatādinā pakārena diṭṭhimānataṇhāmaññanāhi maññati.
atk-s0503a:796_2: Tato taṃ hoti aññathāti tato attanā parikappitākārato taṃ maññanāya vatthubhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ aññathā anattānattaniyameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:796_3: Vase vattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ahaṅkāramamaṅkārattaṃ na nipphādetīti attho.
atk-s0503a:796_4: Atha vā tatoti tasmā maññanāmattabhāvato taṃ khandhapañcakaṃ niccādivasena maññitaṃ aññathā aniccādisabhāvameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:796_5: Na hi maññanā bhāvaññathattaṃ vā lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:797_0: Aññathābhāvī bhavasattoti asambhave vaḍḍhiyaṃ hitasukhe satto laggo sattaloko maññanāya yathāruci cintiyamānopi
atk-s0503a:797_1: viparītappaṭipattiyā tato aññathābhāvī ahitadukkhabhāvī vighātaṃyeva pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0503a:797_2: Bhavamevābhinandatīti evaṃ santepi taṃ maññanāparikappitaṃ avijjamānaṃ bhavaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ abhinandati eva abhikaṅkhati eva.
atk-s0503a:797_3: Atha vā aññathābhāvīti “nicco me attā”tiādinā maññanāya parikappitākārato sayaṃ aññathābhāvī samāno anicco adhuvoti attho.
atk-s0503a:797_4: Bhavasattoti kāmādibhavesu bhavataṇhāya satto laggo gadhito.
atk-s0503a:797_8: Yadabhinandati taṃ bhayanti yaṃ vaḍḍhisaṅkhātaṃ bhavaṃ kāmādibhavaṃ vā abhinandati,
atk-s0503a:797_9: taṃ aniccādivipariṇāmasabhāvattā anekabyasanānubandhattā ca bhavahetubhāvato ativiya bhayānakaṭṭhena bhayaṃ.
atk-s0503a:797_11: taṃ jarāmaraṇādi dukkhādhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhadukkhabhāvato ca dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:797_12: Atha vā yassa bhāyatīti bhavābhinandanena yassa vibhavassa bhāyati,
atk-s0503a:797_14: tato bhāyanañca dukkhavatthubhāvato jātiādidukkhassa anativattanato ca dukkhaṃ dukkhasabhāvamevāti attho.
atk-s0503a:797_15: Atha vā yassa bhāyati taṃ dukkhanti yassa aniccādikassa bhāyati taṃ nissaraṇaṃ ajānanto,
atk-s0503a:798_0: Ettakena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:798_9: ekanteneva kāmādibhavassa samudayappahānena anavasesapajahanatthāya idaṃ mayā satasahassakappādhikāni
atk-s0503a:798_10: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atidukkarāni ācaritvā pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimaṇḍe tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā
atk-s0503a:799_0: Evaṃ ariyamaggassa ekaṃseneva niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni aññamaggassa tadabhāvaṃ dassento “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:799_10: Bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṃsūti ekacce kāmabhavena rūpabhavena vā sabbabhavato vimuttiṃ saṃsārasuddhiṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:800_1: Diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādino tesu hi keci “uḷārehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito attā diṭṭheva dhamme paramaṃ nibbutiṃ patto hotī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:800_3: keci “dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānasamaṅgī attā diṭṭheva dhamme paramaṃ nibbutiṃ patto hotī”ti vadanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:801_2: ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃdiṭṭhi ‘yato kho bho ayaṃ attā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito”’ti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:802_0: Te pana yasmā yāvadatthaṃ pītattā suhitāya jalūkāya viya ruhirapipāsā kāmādisukhehi samappitassa tassa attano kāmesanādayo na bhavissanti,
atk-s0503a:802_2: yasmiṃ yasmiñca bhave ṭhitassa ayaṃ nayo labbhati,
atk-s0503a:802_3: tena tena bhavena sabbabhavato vimutti hotīti vadanti,
atk-s0503a:802_5: Yesañca “ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ saṃsaritvā bālā ca paṇḍitā ca pariyosānabhave ṭhatvā saṃsārato vimuccantī”ti laddhi,
atk-s0503a:802_6: tepi bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhaṃ vadanti nāma.
atk-s0503a:803_0: “Cullāsīti mahākappino satasahassāni yāni bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:804_1: Bhavati sassataṃ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhīti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:804_2: bhavadiṭṭhi evettha uttarapadalopena bhavataṇhātiādīsu viya bhavoti vutto.
atk-s0503a:804_3: Bhavadiṭṭhivasena ca ekacce bhavavisesaṃyeva kilesānaṃ vūpasantavuttiyā āyuno ca dīghāvāsatāya niccādisabhāvaṃ bhavavimokkhaṃ maññanti,
atk-s0503a:804_8: Tesamevaṃ viparītagāhīnaṃ anissaraṇe nissaraṇadiṭṭhīnaṃ kuto bhavavimokkho.
atk-s0503a:805_1: Bhavassa nissaraṇamāhaṃsūti sabbabhavato niggamanaṃ nikkhantiṃ saṃsārasuddhiṃ vadiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:805_2: Te hi “bhavena bhavassa vippamokkho”ti vadantānaṃ vādaṃ ananujānantā bhavūpacchedena nissaraṇaṃ paṭijāniṃsu.
atk-s0503a:805_4: Vibhavati vinassati ucchijjati attā ca loko cāti pavattanato ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttanayena “vibhavo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:805_5: Ucchedadiṭṭhivasena hi sattā adhimuccitvā tattha tattha uppannā ucchijjanti,
atk-s0503a:806_0: “Yato kho bho ayaṃ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko…pe…
atk-s0503a:806_2: ettāvatā kho bho ayaṃ attā sammā samucchinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:808_2: bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā”ti ca.
atk-s0503a:809_3: Na hi ariyamaggabhāvanāya anavasesakilesaṃ asamugghātetvā kadācipi bhavato nissaraṇavimutti sambhavati.
atk-s0503a:809_4: Tathā hi tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathābhūtāvabodhābhāvato “atthi natthī”ti antadvayanipatitānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhivasena samparitasitavipphanditamattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:809_5: yato te diṭṭhigatikā pavattihetūsupi sammūḷhā sakkāyabhūmiyaṃ sunikhāte viparītadassanathambhe taṇhābandhanena
atk-s0503a:809_6: baddhā gaddūlabandhanā viya sā na vijahanti bandhanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:810_0: Ye pana catusaccavibhāvanena pavattiādīsu asammohato taṃ antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ samāruḷhā,
atk-s0503a:810_1: tesaṃyeva bhavavippamokkho nissaraṇañcāti dassento satthā “upadhiṃ hī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:811_3: Tattha sabbupādānakkhayāti kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānanti sabbesaṃ imesaṃ
atk-s0503a:811_5: Tattha diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānanti imāni tīṇi upādānāni sotāpattimaggena khīyanti,
atk-s0503a:811_12: Natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti evaṃ sabbaso upādānakkhayā tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassapi kilesagaṇassa anuppādanato
atk-s0503a:812_0: Evaṃ bhagavā hetunā saddhiṃ pavattiṃ nivattiñca dassetvā “imaṃ nayaṃ ajānanto ayaṃ sattaloko vaṭṭatopi
atk-s0503a:812_2: Tattha lokamimaṃ passāti attano buddhacakkhunā paccakkhato visayabhāvassa upagatattā “lokamimaṃ passā”ti
atk-s0503a:812_6: Avijjāya paretāti “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena vuttāya catusaccapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya abhibhūtā.
atk-s0503a:812_8: Bhūtaratāti bhūtesu mātāpituputtadārādisaññāya aññasattesu taṇhāya ratā,
atk-s0503a:812_9: bhūte vā khandhapañcake aniccāsubhadukkhānattasabhāve taṃsabhāvānavabodhato itthipurisādiparikappavasena
atk-s0503a:812_11: Bhavā aparimuttāti yathāvuttena taṇhādiṭṭhigāhena bhavato saṃsārato na parimuttā.
atk-s0503a:813_0: Ettha ca “lokamima”nti paṭhamaṃ tāva sakalampi sattanikāyaṃ sāmaññato ekattaṃ upanento ekavacanena anodhiso
atk-s0503a:813_1: gahaṇaṃ dīpetvā “svāyaṃ loko bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsādivasena ceva tatthāpi taṃtaṃsattanikāyādivasena
atk-s0503a:813_2: ca anekabhedabhinno paccekaṃ mayā volokito”ti attano buddhacakkhuñāṇānubhāvaṃ pakāsento satthā puna vacanabhedaṃ
atk-s0503a:813_3: katvā bahuvacanena odhiso gahaṇaṃ dīpeti “puthū avijjāya paretā bhūtā”tiādinā.
atk-s0503a:813_4: Evañca katvā “lokamima”nti upayogavacanaṃ katvā “avijjāya paretā”tiādinā paccattabahuvacananiddesopi aviruddho hoti bhinnavākyattā.
atk-s0503a:813_5: Keci pana ekavākyatādhippāyena “avijjāya paretaṃ bhūtaṃ bhūtarataṃ bhavā aparimutta”nti paṭhanti,
atk-s0503a:814_1: taṃ sabbaṃ titthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ buddhagocaraṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ dassento “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:814_2: Tattha ye hi keci bhavāti kāmabhavādi saññībhavādi ekavokārabhavādivibhāgena nānābhedabhinnā sātavanto
atk-s0503a:814_3: vā asātavanto vā dīghāyukā vā ittarakkhaṇā vā ye hi keci bhavā.
atk-s0503a:814_4: Sabbadhīti uddhaṃ adho tiriyanti ādivibhāgena sabbattha.
atk-s0503a:814_6: Sabbe tetiādīsu sabbepi te bhavā rūpavedanādidhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā,
atk-s0503a:814_8: jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatāya vipariṇāmadhammā.
atk-s0503a:815_0: Evaṃ lakkhaṇattayapaṭivijjhanākārena etaṃ bhavasaṅkhātaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ yathābhūtaṃ aviparītaṃ sammappaññāya
atk-s0503a:815_1: sammā ñāyena vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya passato pariññābhisamayādivasena paṭivijjhato “bhavo nicco”ti
atk-s0503a:815_4: ucchedadiṭṭhiyā sabbaso pahīnattā vibhavaṃ vicchedaṃ nābhinandati na pattheti.
atk-s0503a:815_5: Evaṃbhūtassa tassa yā kāmataṇhādivasena aṭṭhasatabhedā avatthādivibhāgena anantabhedā ca,
atk-s0503a:815_6: tāsaṃ sabbaso sabbappakārena taṇhānaṃ khayā pahānā,
atk-s0503a:815_7: tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassapi saṃkilesapakkhassa asesaṃ nissesaṃ virāgena ariyamaggena yo anuppādanirodho,
atk-s0503a:816_0: Evaṃ taṇhāya pahānamukhena saupādisesanibbānaṃ dassetvā idāni anupādisesanibbānaṃ dassento “tassa nibbutassā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:816_2: yo so sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā kilesaparinibbānena nibbuto vuttanayena bhinnakileso khīṇāsavabhikkhu,
atk-s0503a:816_3: tassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā upādānābhāvato kilesābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ vā aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti,
atk-s0503a:816_6: ariyamaggakkhaṇe kilesamāro abhisaṅkhāramāro devaputtamāro ca carimakacittakkhaṇe khandhamāro maccumāro cāti pañcavidho māro abhibhūto parājito,
atk-s0503a:816_7: puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ appadānena nibbisevano kato,
atk-s0503a:816_8: yato tena vijito saṅgāmo mārehi tattha tattha pavattito.
atk-s0503a:816_9: Evaṃ vijitasaṅgāmo pana iṭṭhādīsu sabbesu vikārābhāvena tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādī arahā sabbabhavāni
atk-s0503a:816_12: aññadatthu anupādāno viya jātavedo parinibbānato uddhaṃ apaññattikova hotīti.
atk-s0503a:816_13: Iti bhagavā imaṃ mahāudānaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā kūṭaṃ gahetvā niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:821_1: Meghiyavaggassa paṭhame cālikāyanti evaṃ nāmake nagare.
atk-s0503a:821_2: Tassa kira nagarassa dvāraṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samantato calapaṅkaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:821_3: taṃ calapaṅkaṃ nissāya ṭhitattā olokentānaṃ calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:821_5: Cālike pabbateti tassa nagarassa avidūre eko pabbato,
atk-s0503a:821_6: sopi sabbasetattā kālapakkhauposathe olokentānaṃ calamāno viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:821_9: bhagavā tadā taṃ nagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā tasmiṃ cālikapabbatamahāvihāre viharati.
atk-s0503a:821_14: Bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ upaṭṭhākā anibaddhā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:821_20: “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:822_0: Jantugāmanti evaṃ nāmakaṃ tasseva vihārassa aparaṃ gocaragāmaṃ.
atk-s0503a:822_4: Pāsādikanti aviraḷarukkhatāya siniddhapattatāya ca passantānaṃ pasādamāvahatīti pāsādikaṃ.
atk-s0503a:822_6: Anto paviṭṭhānaṃ pītisomanassajananaṭṭhena cittaṃ rametīti ramaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:822_12: Therena kira pubbe taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni raññā eva satā anubhūtaṃ uyyānaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0503a:822_13: tenassa diṭṭhamatteyeva tattha viharituṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0503a:822_14: Āgamehi tāvāti satthā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā upadhārento “na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti ñatvā paṭikkhipanto evamāha.
atk-s0503a:822_15: Ekakamhi tāvāti idaṃ panassa “evamayaṃ gantvāpi kamme anipphajjamāne nirāsaṅko hutvā pemavasena puna āgacchissatī”ti cittamaddavajananatthaṃ āha.
atk-s0503a:822_16: Yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatīti añño koci bhikkhu mama santikaṃ yāva āgacchati,
atk-s0503a:823_0: Natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā,
atk-s0503a:823_1: abhisambodhiyā vā adhigatattā tato aññaṃ uttari karaṇīyaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0503a:823_2: Natthi katassa vā paticayoti katassa vā puna paticayopi natthi.
atk-s0503a:823_4: pahīnakilesānaṃ vā puna pahānena kiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0503a:823_5: Atthi katassa paticayoti mayhaṃ santāne nipphāditassa sīlādidhammassa ariyamaggassa anadhigatattā tadatthaṃ puna vaḍḍhanasaṅkhāto paticayo atthi,
atk-s0503a:823_7: Padhānanti kho meghiya vadamānaṃ kinti vadeyyāmāti “samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti taṃ vadamānaṃ mayaṃ aññaṃ kiṃ nāma vadeyyāma?
atk-s0503a:824_1: Nisinno ca yasmiṃ maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe pubbe anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni rājā hutvā uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vividhanāṭakaparivāro nisinnapubbo,
atk-s0503a:824_3: Athassa nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇabhāvo vigato viya ahosi,
atk-s0503a:824_4: rājavesaṃ gahetvā nāṭakaparivāraparivuto setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisinno viya jāto.
atk-s0503a:824_5: Athassa taṃ sampattiṃ assādayato kāmavitakko udapādi.
atk-s0503a:824_6: So tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sahoḍḍhaṃ gahite dve core ānetvā purato ṭhapite viya addasa.
atk-s0503a:824_7: Tesu ekassa vadhaṃ āṇāpanavasena byāpādavitakko uppajji,
atk-s0503a:824_9: evaṃ so latājālena rukkho viya madhumakkhikāhi madhughātako viya ca akusalavitakkehi parikkhitto samparikiṇṇo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:824_10: Taṃ sandhāya “atha kho āyasmato meghiyassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:825_0: Acchariyaṃ vata bhoti garahaṇacchariyaṃ nāma kiretaṃ yathā āyasmā ānando bhagavato valiyagattaṃ disvā avoca “acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ,
atk-s0503a:825_2: Apare pana “tasmiṃ samaye pupphaphalapallavādīsu lobhavasena kāmavitakko,
atk-s0503a:825_6: vanacarake tattha tattha disvā tesu cittadubbhanena byāpādavitakko,
atk-s0503a:825_7: tesaṃ viheṭhanādhippāyena vihiṃsāvitakko tassa uppajjī”tipi vadanti.
atk-s0503a:825_8: Yathā vā tathā vā tassa micchāvitakkuppattiyeva acchariyakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:825_10: Attani garumhi ca ekattepi bahuvacanaṃ dissati.
atk-s0503a:826_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ micchāvitakkehi samparikiṇṇo kammaṭṭhānasappāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto “idaṃ
atk-s0503a:826_1: vata disvā dīghadassī bhagavā paṭisedhesī”ti sallakkhetvā “imaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasabalassa ārocessāmī”ti nisinnāsanato
atk-s0503a:827_5: Vitakketi ūhati ārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ abhiniropetīti vitakko,
atk-s0503a:827_10: Tesu kāmānaṃ abhinandanavasena pavatto nekkhammapaṭipakkho kāmavitakko,
atk-s0503a:827_11: “ime sattā haññantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu”nti sattesu sampadussanavasena pavatto mettāpaṭipakkho byāpādavitakko,
atk-s0503a:827_12: pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi sattānaṃ viheṭhetukāmatāvasena pavatto karuṇāpaṭipakkho vihiṃsāvitakko.
atk-s0503a:828_0: Kasmā panassa bhagavā tattha gamanaṃ anujāni?
atk-s0503a:828_2: ‘paricārakāmatāya maññe bhagavā gantuṃ na detī’ti cassa siyā aññathattaṃ.
