atk-s0503a:828_3: Tadassa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti anujāni.
atk-s0503a:829_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ attano pavattiṃ ārocetvā nisinne athassa bhagavā sappāyaṃ dhammaṃ desento “aparipakkāya, meghiya,
atk-s0503a:829_4: Pubbabhāge hi tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca kilesehi cetaso vimutti hoti,
atk-s0503a:829_8: Tattha vimuttiparipācanīyehi dhammehi āsaye paripācite pabodhite vipassanāya maggagabbhaṃ gaṇhantiyā
atk-s0503a:829_9: paripākaṃ gacchantiyā cetovimutti paripakkā nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:837_2: aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā anattasaññā pahānasaññā virāgasaññāti imā pañca nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā,
atk-s0503a:837_4: Tesu vineyyadamanakusalo satthā vineyyassa meghiyattherassa ajjhāsayavasena idha kalyāṇamittatādayo vimuttiparipācanīye
atk-s0503a:837_5: dhamme dassento “pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī”ti vatvā te vitthārento “idha, meghiya,
atk-s0503a:838_0: Tattha kalyāṇamittoti kalyāṇo bhaddo sundaro mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto.
atk-s0503a:838_2: hitassa vidhātā”ti evaṃ sabbākārena upakāro mitto hoti,
atk-s0503a:838_4: Yathāvuttehi kalyāṇapuggaleheva sabbiriyāpathesu saha ayati pavattati,
atk-s0503a:838_5: na vinā tehīti kalyāṇasahāyo.Kalyāṇapuggalesu eva cittena ceva kāyena ca ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena pavattatīti kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
atk-s0503a:839_1: idha kalyāṇamitto saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
atk-s0503a:839_2: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ kammaphalañca,
atk-s0503a:839_3: tena sammāsambodhihetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati.
atk-s0503a:839_4: Sīlasampattiyā sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
atk-s0503a:839_5: sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti,
atk-s0503a:839_6: cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:839_11: So satiyā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā,
atk-s0503a:839_13: vīriyena satte ahitā nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:841_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojaye”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:842_2: sabbesañca kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahukāratāya padhānabhāvato ca imesu pañcasu dhammesu ādito vuttattā paṭhamo
atk-s0503a:842_3: anavajjadhammo avisuddhānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena cetovimuttiyā paripākāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0503a:842_4: Ettha ca kalyāṇamittassa bahukāratā padhānatā ca “upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:843_0: Puna caparanti puna ca aparaṃ dhammajātaṃ.
atk-s0503a:843_10: Apare pana “siraṭṭho sītalaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho saṃvaraṭṭho”ti niruttinayena atthaṃ vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0503a:843_11: Tayidaṃ pāripūrito atisayato vā sīlaṃ assa atthīti sīlavā,
atk-s0503a:844_4: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:845_3: puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
atk-s0503a:845_5: Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭīyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī,
atk-s0503a:845_6: maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa patanasīloti vā pātī,
atk-s0503a:846_0: Atha vā avijjādihetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti,
atk-s0503a:846_1: “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:846_2: Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho,
atk-s0503a:847_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkhehīti pāti, cittaṃ.
atk-s0503a:847_4: Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti,
atk-s0503a:848_6: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro.
atk-s0503a:849_0: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:849_4: Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā tammūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca,
atk-s0503a:850_4: samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:850_6: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho.
atk-s0503a:850_10: Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo ca yathārahaṃ saṃkilesanibbāpanato.
atk-s0503a:850_13: patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāvettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:851_2: Atthato pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo cetanā ca.
atk-s0503a:851_3: Tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto samannāgato pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti vutto.
atk-s0503a:852_0: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato,
atk-s0503a:854_0: Ācāragocarasampannoti veḷudānādimicchājīvassa kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā
atk-s0503a:854_1: “kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo”ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhusāruppaācārasampattiyā,
atk-s0503a:854_2: vesiyādiagocaraṃ vajjetvā piṇḍapātādiatthaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānasaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampannattā ācāragocarasampanno.
atk-s0503a:855_0: Apica yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho
atk-s0503a:855_1: supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena iriyāpathasampanno
atk-s0503a:855_2: indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho
atk-s0503a:855_3: pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati,
atk-s0503a:856_0: Gocaro pana upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti tividho.
atk-s0503a:856_7: yañca anusikkhanto saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena,
atk-s0503a:857_0: Yo bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī cakkhundriyasaṃvutova gacchati,
atk-s0503a:859_0: “Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo, yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
atk-s0503a:860_0: Tattha upanissayagocarassa pubbe vuttattā itaresaṃ vasenettha gocaro veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:861_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti appamattakattā aṇuppamāṇesu assatiyā asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo.
atk-s0503a:861_1: Yo hi bhikkhu paramāṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanapamāṇādhikayojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatarājasadisaṃ katvā passati,
atk-s0503a:861_2: yopi sabbalahukaṃ dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā passati,
atk-s0503a:861_4: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:861_5: taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ sammā ādiyitvā sikkhati,
atk-s0503a:862_2: Cetovivaraṇasappāyāti cetaso paṭicchādakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvakaraṇena cetovivaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā,
atk-s0503a:862_3: samathavipassanācittasseva vā vivaraṇāya pākaṭīkaraṇāya vā sappāyā upakārikāti cetovivaraṇasappāyā.
atk-s0503a:863_0: Idāni yena nibbidādiāvahanena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ca nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:863_3: Virāgāya nirodhāyāti tasseva virajjanatthāya ca nirujjhanatthāya ca.
atk-s0503a:863_8: Etesu hi ādito tīhi padehi vipassanā vuttā,
atk-s0503a:863_11: Samathavipassanā ādiṃ katvā nibbānapariyosāno ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sijjhatīti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:864_4: Ettha ca atriccho pāpiccho mahiccho appicchoti icchāvasena cattāro puggalā.
atk-s0503a:864_5: Tesu attanā yathāladdhena lābhena atitto uparūpari lābhaṃ icchanto atriccho nāma.
atk-s0503a:869_0: Lābhasakkārasilokanikāmayatāya asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyo pāpiccho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:870_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa paccayappaṭisevanasaṅkhātena vā sāmantajappitena vā iriyāpathassa vā aṭhapanā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:871_0: Santaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe amattaññū mahiccho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:872_0: “Idhekacco saddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
atk-s0503a:872_1: sīlavā samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:873_0: Duttappiyatāya hissa vijātamātāpi cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0503a:876_0: Ete pana atricchatādayo dose ārakā parivajjetvā santaguṇanigūhanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññū appiccho.
atk-s0503a:876_1: So attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya saddho samāno “saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati, sīlavā,
atk-s0503a:876_6: paññavā samāno “paññavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati.
atk-s0503a:877_0: Svāyaṃ paccayappiccho dhutaṅgappiccho pariyattiappiccho adhigamappicchoti catubbidho.
atk-s0503a:877_1: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayadāyakaṃ deyyadhammaṃ attano thāmañca oloketvā sacepi hi deyyadhammo bahu hoti,
atk-s0503a:877_10: Evarūpo hi bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0503a:877_13: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa pana attani atthibhāvaṃ na jānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgappiccho.
atk-s0503a:877_14: Yo attano bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0503a:877_16: Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sabrahmacārīnampi attano sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0503a:877_20: tappaṭipakkhassa atricchādibhedassa icchācārassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā appicchakathā.
atk-s0503a:878_0: Santuṭṭhikathāti ettha santuṭṭhīti sakena attanā laddhena tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi.
atk-s0503a:878_1: Atha vā visamaṃ paccayicchaṃ pahāya samaṃ tuṭṭhi,
atk-s0503a:881_0: Sammā vā ñāyena bhagavatā anuññātavidhinā paccayehi tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi.
atk-s0503a:882_1: idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:882_6: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
atk-s0503a:882_8: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:882_10: Aparo paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:882_13: idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ vā hotū”ti tesaṃ datvā attanā saṅkārakūṭādito nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:882_14: vā purāṇacīvarāni gahetvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:883_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:883_6: lūkhaṃ pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā gāḷhaṃ rogātaṅkaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0503a:883_7: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:883_10: so “ayaṃ piṇḍapāto cirapabbajitādīnaṃ anurūpo”ti cīvaraṃ viya tesaṃ datvā,
atk-s0503a:884_0: Idha pana bhikkhuno senāsanaṃ pāpuṇāti manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā antamaso tiṇakuṭikāpi tiṇasanthārakampi,
atk-s0503a:884_5: Atha pana ābādhiko hoti dubbalo vā,
atk-s0503a:884_6: so byādhiviruddhaṃ vā pakativiruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0503a:884_8: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:884_10: Aparo sundaraṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati “paṇītasenāsanaṃ pamādaṭṭhāna”nti,
atk-s0503a:884_12: so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:885_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:885_5: Atha pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati,
atk-s0503a:885_8: bhesajjaṃ katvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:885_11: so taṃ cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0503a:885_14: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0503a:885_17: tattha te yāvajīvaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo”ti vacanamanussaranto catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:886_0: So evaṃpabhedo sabbopi santoso santuṭṭhīti pavuccati.
atk-s0503a:886_3: tappaṭipakkhassa atricchatādibhedassa icchāpakatattassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā santuṭṭhikathā.
atk-s0503a:887_0: Pavivekakathāti ettha kāyaviveko cittaviveko upadhivivekoti tayo vivekā.
atk-s0503a:887_10: eko viharatīti evaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu sabbakiccesu gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivittavāso kāyaviveko nāma.
atk-s0503a:890_0: Asaṃsaggakathāti ettha savanasaṃsaggo dassanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo sambhogasaṃsaggo kāyasaṃsaggoti pañca saṃsaggā.
atk-s0503a:890_1: Tesu idhekacco bhikkhu suṇāti “asukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā itthī abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā”ti,
atk-s0503a:890_7: apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ,
atk-s0503a:890_12: Disvā pana aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena uppanno kilesasanthavo samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0503a:890_14: Attano pana santakaṃ yaṃkiñci mātugāmassa datvā vā adatvā vā tena dinnassa vanabhaṅgiyādino paribhogavasena
atk-s0503a:891_0: “Gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikena saṃsaggena sahasokī sahanandī sukhitesu sukhito,
atk-s0503a:892_2: taṃ sabbaṃ pahāya yvāyaṃ saṃsāre thirataraṃ saṃvegaṃ,
atk-s0503a:892_6: sabbakiriyāsu satisampajaññanti sabbaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā kamaladale jalabindu viya sabbattha alaggabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:893_3: vīriyañca taṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya ārambhanaṃ vīriyārambho.
atk-s0503a:893_9: So sabbopi yo bhikkhu gamane uppannaṃ kilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti;
atk-s0503a:893_11: nisajjāya uppannaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0503a:893_12: tattha tattheva ajapadena daṇḍena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya,
atk-s0503a:893_13: tikhiṇena asinā amittaṃ gīvāya paharanto viya ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā vīriyabalena niggaṇhāti,
atk-s0503a:894_3: Tathā vipassanāya pādakabhūtā saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo lokiyo samādhi,
atk-s0503a:894_5: Tathā paññāpi lokiyā sutamayā cintāmayā jhānasampayuttā vipassanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0503a:894_9: Apare pana tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedavimuttīnampi vasenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0503a:894_11: Iti imesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokāraānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena ceva tappaṭipakkhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:895_1: appicchakathañca paresaṃ kattā”ti “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
atk-s0503a:895_2: itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī”ti ca ādivacanato sayañca appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatena paresampi
atk-s0503a:895_4: yā idha abhisallekhikādibhāvena visesetvā vuttā appicchakathādīti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:896_3: sabbakālaṃ imā kathā sotuṃ vicāretuñca yathāsukhaṃ labhanto.
atk-s0503a:897_1: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāyāti akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pajahanatthāya.
atk-s0503a:897_2: Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti kucchitānaṃ salanādiatthena anavajjaṭṭhena ca kusalānaṃ sahavipassanānaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:898_1: Udayatthagāminiyāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhantiyā.
atk-s0503a:898_2: Ariyāyāti vikkhambhanavasena kilesehi ārakā dūre ṭhitāya niddosāya.
atk-s0503a:898_4: Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa khepanato “dukkhakkhayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sammā hetunā ñāyena gacchantiyā.
atk-s0503a:899_0: Imesu ca pana pañcasu dhammesu sīlaṃ vīriyaṃ paññā ca yogino ajjhattikaṃ aṅgaṃ,
atk-s0503a:899_9: “sīlavā bhavissatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ kalyāṇamittassa bhikkhuno sīlavantatāya bhavanaṃ sīlasampannattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:899_10: tassa bhikkhuno sīlasampannattā etaṃ tassa pāṭikaṅkhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:899_11: avassaṃbhāvī ekaṃseneva tassa tattha niyojanatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:900_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sadevake loke uttamakalyāṇamittasaṅkhātassa attano vacanaṃ anādiyitvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0503a:900_1: tādisaṃ vippakāraṃ pattassa āyasmato meghiyassa kalyāṇamittatādinā sakalaṃ sāsanasampattiṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0503a:900_2: idānissa tattha ādarajātassa pubbe yehi kāmavitakkādīhi upaddutattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajji,
atk-s0503a:900_3: tassa tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtattā ca bhāvanānayaṃ pakāsetvā,
atk-s0503a:900_6: bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:900_10: tesaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tato uddhaṃ cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā uppādetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā ca.
atk-s0503a:901_0: Asubhāti ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yattha katthaci asubhabhāvanā.
atk-s0503a:901_3: eko hi puriso asitaṃ gahetvā koṭito paṭṭhāya sālikhette sāliyo lāyati,
atk-s0503a:901_16: vatiṃ bhinditvā gāvīnaṃ pavisanaṃ viya sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya pamādaṃ āgamma rāgassa uppajjanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:901_21: puna ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sālilāyanaṃ viya asubhakammaṭṭhānena rāgaṃ vikkhambhetvā,
atk-s0503a:901_23: Evaṃbhūtaṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:902_4: Asmimānasamugghātāyāti asmīti uppajjanakassa navavidhassa mānassa samucchedanatthāya.
atk-s0503a:902_5: Aniccasaññinoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato pabhaṅguto tāvakālikato niccappaṭipakkhato ca “sabbe
atk-s0503a:902_7: Anattasaññā saṇṭhātīti asārakato avasavattanato parato rittato tucchato suññato ca “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
atk-s0503a:902_8: evaṃ pavattā anattānupassanāsaṅkhātā anattasaññā citte saṇṭhahati,
atk-s0503a:902_10: Aniccalakkhaṇe hi diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:902_11: Tīsu hi lakkhaṇesu ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:902_15: Anattalakkhaṇe diṭṭhe asmīti uppajjanakamāno suppajahova hotīti āha –
atk-s0503a:902_16: “anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānanti diṭṭheyeva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve apaccayaparinibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0503a:902_18: vitthārato pana asubhādibhāvanānayo visuddhimagge vuttanayena gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:903_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato meghiyassa micchāvitakkacorehi kusalabhaṇḍupacchedasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:903_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ avinodane vinodane ca ādīnavānisaṃsadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:904_2: Te hi sabbavitakkehi patikiṭṭhatāya idha khuddāti vuttā “na ca khuddamācare”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0503a:904_4: Ñātivitakko janapadavitakko amarāvitakko parānuddayatāya paṭisaṃyutto vitakko lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0503a:904_5: vitakko anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakkoti ete hi vitakkā kāmavitakkādayo viya dāruṇā na hontīti anoḷārikasabhāvatāya
atk-s0503a:904_8: Vitakke hi uppajjamāne cittaṃ tadanugatameva hoti tassa ārammaṇābhiniropanato.
atk-s0503a:905_0: Ete avidvā manaso vitakketi ete kāmavitakkādike manovitakke assādādīnavanissaraṇato ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto.
atk-s0503a:905_1: Hurā huraṃ dhāvati bhantacittoti appahīnamicchāvitakkattā anavaṭṭhitacitto “kadāci rūpe,
atk-s0503a:905_2: kadāci sadde”tiādinā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe assādādivasena aparāparaṃ dhāvati paribbhamati.
atk-s0503a:905_3: Atha vā hurā huraṃ dhāvati bhantacittoti apariññātavitakkattā tannimittānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ vasena paribbhamanamānaso
atk-s0503a:905_4: idhalokato paralokaṃ ādānanikkhepehi aparāparaṃ dhāvati saṃsaratīti attho.
atk-s0503a:906_0: Ete ca vidvā manaso vitakketi ete yathāvuttappabhede kāmavitakkādike manovitakke assādādito yathābhūtaṃ jānanto.
atk-s0503a:906_6: ete vuttappakāre kāmavitakkādike manovitakke cittassa uppilāvitahetutāya manaso uppilāve vidvā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya sammadeva jānanto,
atk-s0503a:906_7: tassa sahāyabhūtānaṃ sammāvāyāmasatīnaṃ atthitāya ātāpiyo satimā te ariyamaggabhāvanāya āyatiṃ uppattirahe
atk-s0503a:906_11: evaṃbhūto ca catusaccappabodhena buddho ariyasāvako arahattādhigamena asesaṃ,
atk-s0503a:909_1: Dutiye kusinārāyanti kusinārāyaṃ nāma mallarājūnaṃ nagare.
atk-s0503a:909_2: Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti yathā hi anurādhapurassa thūpārāmo,
atk-s0503a:909_4: Yathā thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagarapavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati,
atk-s0503a:909_5: evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā,
atk-s0503a:909_8: Araññakuṭikāyanti sālapantiyā avidūre rukkhagacchasañchannaṭṭhāne katā kuṭikā,
atk-s0503a:909_10: Te pana bhikkhū paṭisaṅkhānavirahitā ossaṭṭhavīriyā pamattavihārino,
atk-s0503a:910_6: Tiracchānakathābahulatāya vikiṇṇā byākulā vācā etesanti vikiṇṇavācā.
atk-s0503a:910_10: Gaddūhanamattampi kālaṃ cittasamādhānassa abhāvato na samāhitāti asamāhitā.
atk-s0503a:911_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddhaccādivasena pamādavihāraṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:911_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ pamādavihāre appamādavihāre ca yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:912_1: Kāyenāti chaviññāṇakāyena cakkhuviññāṇena hi rūpaṃ disvā tattha nimittānubyañjanaggahaṇavasena abhijjhādipavattito
atk-s0503a:912_10: Thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti cittassa akalyatālakkhaṇena thinena kāyassa akalyatālakkhaṇena middhena ca ajjhotthaṭena,
atk-s0503a:912_12: Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatīti kilesamārādikassa sabbassapi mārassa vasaṃ yathākāmakaraṇīyataṃ upagacchati,
atk-s0503a:913_0: Imāya hi gāthāya bhagavā ye satiārakkhābhāvena sabbaso arakkhitacittā,
atk-s0503a:913_1: yonisomanasikārassa hetubhūtāya paññāya abhāvato ayoniso ummujjanena niccantiādinā vipariyesagāhino,
atk-s0503a:913_2: tato eva kusalakiriyāya vīriyārambhābhāvato kosajjābhibhūtā saṃsāravaṭṭato sīsaṃ na ukkhipissantīti tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:913_3: bhikkhūnaṃ pamādavihāragarahāmukhena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:914_0: Tattha tasmā rakkhitacittassāti yasmā arakkhitacitto mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo hutvā saṃsāreyeva hoti,
atk-s0503a:914_1: tasmā satisaṃvarena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ rakkhaṇena pidahanena rakkhitacitto assa.
atk-s0503a:914_2: Citte hi rakkhite cakkhādiindriyāni rakkhitāneva hontīti.
atk-s0503a:914_3: Sammāsaṅkappagocaroti yasmā micchāsaṅkappagocaro tathā tathā ayoniso vitakketvā nānāvidhāni micchādassanāni
atk-s0503a:914_4: gaṇhanto micchādiṭṭhihatena cittena mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo hoti,
atk-s0503a:914_5: tasmā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto nekkhammasaṅkappādisammāsaṅkappagocaro assa,
atk-s0503a:914_6: jhānādisampayuttaṃ sammāsaṅkappameva attano cittassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0503a:914_8: tato yathābhūtañāṇalakkhaṇañca sammādiṭṭhiṃ purato katvā pubbe vuttanayeneva sīlasamādhīsu yutto payutto
atk-s0503a:914_9: vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā saṅkhāre sammasanto ñatvāna udayabbayaṃ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu samapaññāsāya
atk-s0503a:914_10: ākārehi uppādanirodhaṃ vavatthapetvā udayabbayañāṇamadhigantvā tato paraṃ bhaṅgānupassanādivasena vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:914_13: evaṃ so heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭhamameva pahīnattā diṭṭhivippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu
atk-s0503a:914_14: uppajjanakathinamiddhānaṃ adhigatena arahattamaggena samucchindanato tadekaṭṭhānaṃ mānādīnampi pahīnattā
atk-s0503a:914_15: sabbaso bhinnakileso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tividhadukkhatāyogena duggatisaṅkhātā sabbāpi gatiyo ucchinnabhavamūlattā jahe,
atk-s0503a:917_1: Tatiye kosalesūti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0503a:917_10: Aññataraṃ rukkhamūlanti ghanapattasākhāviṭapasampannassa sandacchāyassa mahato rukkhassa samīpasaṅkhātaṃ mūlaṃ.
atk-s0503a:918_4: evaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa goyūthaṃ rakkhanto gopālakattena rājapīḷaṃ apaharanto attano kuṭumbaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0503a:918_5: So kālena kālaṃ pañca gorase gahetvā,
atk-s0503a:918_6: mahāseṭṭhissa santikaṃ āgantvā niyyātetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0503a:918_11: aparabhāge mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto janapadacārikaṃ caranto,
atk-s0503a:918_12: “idānissa ñāṇaṃ paripakka”nti ñatvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānassa avidūre maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi tassa āgamanaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0503a:918_13: Nandopi kho “satthā kira janapadacārikaṃ caranto ito āgacchatī”ti sutvā,
atk-s0503a:918_15: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0503a:918_17: So sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ pāyāsadānamadāsi,
atk-s0503a:918_18: sattame divase bhagavā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:918_20: “ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ gopālakaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi…pe…
atk-s0503a:919_1: ime dhammā akusalā”tiādinā kusalādidhamme kammavipāke idhalokaparaloke paccakkhato dassento anupubbikathāvasāne cattāri ariyasaccāni sammā dassesi.
atk-s0503a:919_2: Samādapesīti “saccādhigamāya ime nāma dhammā attani uppādetabbā”ti sīlādidhamme sammā gaṇhāpetvā tesu taṃ patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:919_3: Samuttejesīti te dhammā samādinnā anukkamena bhāviyamānā nibbedhabhāgiyā hutvā tikkhavisadā yathā khippaṃ ariyamaggaṃ āvahanti,
atk-s0503a:919_5: Sampahaṃsesīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesabhāvadassanena cittassa pamodāpanavasena suṭṭhu pahaṃsesi.
atk-s0503a:919_6: Apicettha sāvajjānavajjadhammesu dukkhādīsu ca sammohavinodanena sandassanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:919_10: Evaṃ so bhagavato sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0503a:919_12: bhante bhagavā”tiādinā nimantito kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopento citteneva adhivāsesi sādiyi.
atk-s0503a:920_2: Navañca sappinti navanītaṃ gahetvā tāvadeva vilīnaṃ maṇḍasappiñca paṭiyādāpetvā.
atk-s0503a:920_10: Nīcanti anuccaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā āsaneyeva nisīdanaṃ ariyadesavāsīnaṃ cārittaṃ,
atk-s0503a:920_11: so pana satthu santike upacāravasena paññattassa dāruphalakāsanassa samīpe nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:920_12: Dhammiyā kathāyātiādi sattame divase kataṃ anumodanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:920_13: So kira sattāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca tattha vasāpetvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0503a:920_15: Satthā tassa tasmiṃ attabhāve uparimaggatthāya ñāṇaparipākābhāvato anumodanameva katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:921_2: Gāmavāsino kira ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya tena saddhiṃ kalahaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:921_3: So te abhibhavitvā taṃ taḷākaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:921_4: Tena baddhāghāto eko puriso taṃ satthu pattaṃ gahetvā dūraṃ anugantvā “nivattāhi upāsakā”ti vutte bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:921_5: vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā yāva dassanūpacārasamatikkamā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ
atk-s0503a:921_6: añjaliṃ sirasi paggayha paṭinivattitvā dvinnaṃ gāmānaṃ antare araññappadese ekakaṃ gacchantaṃ sarena
atk-s0503a:921_10: Kenacideva karaṇīyena ohīyitvā pacchā gacchantā bhikkhū taṃ tathā mataṃ disvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:921_11: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:922_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yasmā diṭṭhisampannaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ nandaṃ mārentena purisena ānantariyakammaṃ bahulaṃ apuññaṃ pasutaṃ,
atk-s0503a:922_1: tasmā yaṃ corehi ca verīhi ca kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:922_2: tatopi ghorataraṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ karotīti imamatthaṃ jānitvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:923_0: Tattha diso disanti dūsako dūsanīyaṃ coro coraṃ,
atk-s0503a:923_2: Yaṃ taṃ kayirāti yaṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0503a:923_5: eko ekassa mittadubbhī coro puttadārakhettavatthugomahiṃsādīsu aparajjhanto yassa aparajjhati,
atk-s0503a:923_6: tampi tatheva attani aparajjhantaṃ coraṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:923_7: verī vā pana kenacideva kāraṇena baddhaveraṃ veriṃ disvā attano kakkhaḷatāya dāruṇatāya yaṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0503a:923_11: dasasu akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitattā micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ pāpiyo naṃ tato kare,
atk-s0503a:923_13: Vuttappakāro hi diso vā verī vā disassa vā verino vā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhaṃ vā uppādeyya,
atk-s0503a:923_15: Idaṃ pana akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0503a:923_16: attabhāvasatasahassesupi catūsu apāyesu khipitvā sīsamassa ukkhipituṃ na detīti.
atk-s0503a:926_2: Tasmiṃ kira pabbatakandare pubbe bahū kapotā vasiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:926_10: Abbhokāseti yattha uparicchadanaṃ parikkhepo vā natthi,
atk-s0503a:927_2: Ubhopi pana te mahātherā udiccabrāhmaṇajaccā kappānaṃ satasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ abhinīhārasampannā
atk-s0503a:927_3: chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidāppattā mahākhīṇāsavā samāpattilābhino sattasaṭṭhiyā sāvakapāramiñāṇānaṃ matthakappattā
atk-s0503a:927_4: etaṃ kapotakandaravihāraṃ upasobhayantā ekaṃ kanakaguhaṃ paviṭṭhā dve sīhā viya,
atk-s0503a:927_5: ekaṃ vijambhanabhūmiṃ otiṇṇā dve byagghā viya,
atk-s0503a:927_6: ekaṃ supupphitasālavanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve chaddantanāgarājāno viya,
atk-s0503a:927_7: ekaṃ simbalivanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve supaṇṇarājāno viya,
atk-s0503a:927_8: ekaṃ naravāhanayānaṃ abhiruḷhā dve vessavaṇā viya,
atk-s0503a:927_9: ekaṃ paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ abhinisinnā dve sakkā viya,
atk-s0503a:927_11: ekasmiṃ gaganaṭṭhāne ṭhitāni dve candamaṇḍalāni viya,
atk-s0503a:928_3: Imā eva hi tisso kāyarakkhaṇasamatthā samāpattiyo.
atk-s0503a:928_6: Uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchantīti uttarāya disāya yakkhasamāgamaṃ gantvā attano bhavanaṃ gantuṃ dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0503a:928_9: imassa sīse pahāraṃ dātuṃ cittaṃ me uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:928_11: tenassa theraṃ disvā paduṭṭhacittassa evaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0503a:929_2: Yasmā pana tassa vacanaṃ aggaṇhanto taṃ anādiyanto nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:929_5: Sīse pahāraṃ adāsīti sabbathāmena ussāhaṃ janetvā ākāse ṭhitova sīse khaṭakaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0503a:929_7: Tāva mahāti thāmamahattena tattakaṃ mahanto pahāro ahosi.
atk-s0503a:930_1: so vedanāturo ākāse ṭhātuṃ asakkonto bhūmiyaṃ pati,
atk-s0503a:930_3: mahāpathavī taṃ pāpasattaṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya vivaramadāsi.
atk-s0503a:930_4: Avīcito jālā uṭṭhahitvā kandantaṃyeva taṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:930_7: “atha ca pana so yakkho ‘ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī’ti vatvā tattheva mahānirayaṃ apatāsīti.
atk-s0503a:931_0: Kiṃ pana so yakkhattabhāveneva nirayaṃ upagacchīti?
atk-s0503a:931_3: tassa balena yakkhattabhāve mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0503a:931_6: Therassa pana samāpattibalena upatthambhitasarīrassa na koci vikāro ahosi.
atk-s0503a:931_7: Samāpattito avuṭṭhitakāle hi taṃ yakkho pahari,
atk-s0503a:931_8: tathā paharantaṃ dibbacakkhunā disvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkami,
atk-s0503a:931_14: api ca me sīsaṃ thokaṃ dukkha”nti.
atk-s0503a:932_0: Tattha thokaṃ dukkhanti thokaṃ appamattakaṃ madhurakajātaṃ viya me sīsaṃ dukkhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:932_4: Kathaṃ pana samāpattibalena sarīre upatthambhite therassa sīse thokampi dukkhaṃ ahosīti?
atk-s0503a:932_6: Antosamāpattiyaṃ apaññāyamānadukkhañhi kāyanissitattā niddaṃ upagatassa makasādijanitaṃ viya paṭibuddhassa thokaṃ paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:933_0: “Mahābalena yakkhena tathā sabbussāhena pahaṭe sarīrepi vikāro nāma natthī”ti acchariyabbhutacittajātena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena “acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:933_1: āvuso sāriputtā”tiādinā dhammasenāpatino mahānubhāvatāya vibhāvitāya sopissa ‘acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:933_2: āvuso moggallānā”tiādinā iddhānubhāvamahantatāpakāsanāpadesena attano issāmacchariyāhaṅkārādimalānaṃ suppahīnataṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:933_3: Paṃsupisācakampi na passāmāti saṅkārakūṭādīsu vicaraṇakakhuddakapetampi na passāma.
atk-s0503a:933_4: Iti adhigamappicchānaṃ aggabhūto mahāthero tasmiṃ kāle anāvajjanena tesaṃ adassanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0503a:934_0: Bhagavā pana veḷuvane ṭhito ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ dibbasotena assosi.
atk-s0503a:935_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa samāpattibalūpagataṃ iddhānubhāvamahantataṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:935_1: Imaṃ udānanti tasseva tādibhāvappattidīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:936_1: ṭhitaṃ nānupakampatīti yassa khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ ekagghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṃ sabbesaṃ iñjanānaṃ abhāvato
atk-s0503a:936_2: vasībhāvappattiyāva ṭhitaṃ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānupakampati na pavedhati.
atk-s0503a:936_3: Idānissa akampanākāraṃ saddhiṃ kāraṇena dassetuṃ “viratta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:936_4: Tattha virattaṃ rajanīyesūti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu virattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:936_6: Kopaneyyeti paṭighaṭṭhānīye sabbasmimpi āghātavatthusmiṃ na kuppati na dussati na vikāraṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0503a:936_7: Yassevaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittanti yassa yathāvuttassa ariyapuggalassa cittaṃ evaṃ vuttanayena tādibhāvāvahanabhāvena bhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:936_8: Kuto taṃ dukkhamessatīti taṃ uttamapuggalaṃ kuto sattato saṅkhārato vā dukkhaṃ upagamissati,
atk-s0503a:939_1: Pañcame kosambiyanti kusumbena nāma isinā vasitaṭṭhāne māpitattā “kosambī”ti evaṃladdhanāmake nagare.
atk-s0503a:939_3: Bhagavā ākiṇṇo viharatīti bhagavā sambādhappatto viharati.
atk-s0503a:939_6: Na hi koci bhagavantaṃ anicchāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:939_7: Durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto sabbattha ca anupalittattā.
atk-s0503a:939_8: Hitesitāya pana sattesu anukampaṃ upādāya “mutto mocessāmī”ti paṭiññānurūpaṃ caturoghanittharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:939_9: aṭṭhannaṃ parisānaṃ attano santikaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ adhivāseti,
atk-s0503a:939_10: sayañca mahākaruṇāsamussāhito kālaññū hutvā tattha upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0503a:940_0: Idha pana kosambikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalahajātānaṃ satthā dīghītissa kosalarañño vatthuṃ āharitvā,
atk-s0503a:940_3: taṃ divasaṃ tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā.
atk-s0503a:940_5: taṃ divasampi tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā.
atk-s0503a:940_11: mayametena bhaṇḍanena kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:940_12: Satthā “pariyādinnacittā kho ime moghapurisā na dānime sakkā saññāpetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:940_15: evaṃ ime bhikkhū kalahato oramissantī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0503a:940_16: Evaṃ tehi kalahakārakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekavihāre vāsaṃ vinetabbābhāvato upāsakādīhi upasaṅkamanañca ākiṇṇavihāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:940_17: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā ākiṇṇo viharatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:941_4: Tathā cintetvāva bhagavā pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kañci anāmantetvā
atk-s0503a:941_5: eko adutiyo gantvā kosalaraṭṭhe pālileyyake vanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:941_11: Pattacīvaramādāyāti etthāpi sāmanti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:941_13: vihāre ca aggupaṭṭhākaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ anāmantetvā.
atk-s0503a:942_0: Evaṃ gate satthari pañcasatā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-s0503a:942_4: yadā bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke ca anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ adutiyo gacchati,
atk-s0503a:942_7: tasmā na imesu divasesu bhagavā anugantabbo”ti nivāresi,
atk-s0503a:943_1: gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā cārikaṃ caramāno “ekacāravāsaṃ tāva vasamānaṃ bhikkhuṃ passissāmī”ti bālakaloṇakāragāmaṃ
atk-s0503a:943_2: gantvā tattha bhaguttherassa sakalaṃ pacchābhattañceva tiyāmañca rattiṃ ekacāravāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0503a:943_3: punadivase tena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caritvā taṃ tattheva nivattetvā “samaggavāsaṃ vasamāne tayo kulaputte
atk-s0503a:943_4: passissāmī”ti pācīnavaṃsamigadāyaṃ gantvā tesampi sakalarattiṃ samaggavāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā tepi tattheva
atk-s0503a:943_6: Pālileyyagāmavāsino paccuggantvā bhagavato dānaṃ datvā pālileyyagāmassa avidūre rakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma atthi,
atk-s0503a:943_7: tattha bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā “ettha bhagavā vasatū”ti yācitvā vāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:943_8: Bhaddasāloti pana tattheko manāpo bhaddako sālarukkho,
atk-s0503a:943_9: bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālasamīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:944_4: Chinnaggānīti purato purato gacchantehi tehi hatthiādīhi chinnaggāni khāditāvasesāni khāṇusadisāni khādati.
atk-s0503a:944_5: Obhaggobhagganti tena hatthināgena uccaṭṭhānato bhañjitvā bhañjitvā pātitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:944_6: Assa sākhābhaṅganti etassa santakaṃ sākhābhaṅgaṃ te khādanti.
atk-s0503a:944_7: Āvilānīti tehi paṭhamataraṃ otaritvā pivantehi āluḷitattā āvilāni kaddamamissāni pānīyāni pivati.
atk-s0503a:945_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira hatthināgo yūthavāse ukkaṇṭhito taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭho tattha bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:945_1: disvā ghaṭasahassena nibbāpitasantāpo viya nibbuto hutvā pasannacitto bhagavato santike aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0503a:945_2: tato paṭṭhāya vattasīse ṭhatvā bhaddasālassa paṇṇasālāya ca samantato appaharitakaṃ katvā sākhābhaṅgehi sammajjati,
atk-s0503a:945_6: araññato madhurāni phalāni āharitvā satthu upaneti,
atk-s0503a:945_9: “tatra sudaṃ so hatthināgo yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati,
atk-s0503a:945_12: Soṇḍāya dārūni āharitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā dārūni jālāpetvā tattha pāsāṇakhaṇḍāni
atk-s0503a:945_13: tāpetvā tāni daṇḍakehi pavaṭṭetvā soṇḍiyaṃ khipitvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavato santikaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0503a:945_14: bhagavā “hatthināgo mama nhānaṃ icchatī”ti tattha gantvā nhānakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0503a:946_0: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassātiādi ubhinnaṃ mahānāgānaṃ vivekasukhapaccavekkhaṇadassanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:946_2: Attano ca pavivekaṃ viditvāti kehici anākiṇṇabhāvaladdhaṃ kāyavivekaṃ jānitvā,
atk-s0503a:946_3: itare pana vivekā bhagavato sabbakālaṃ vijjantiyeva.
atk-s0503a:947_0: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ attano hatthināgassa ca pavivekābhiratiyā samānajjhāsayabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:948_1: etaṃ īsādantassa rathaīsāsadisadantassa hatthināgassa cittaṃ nāgena buddhanāgassa cittena sameti saṃsandati.
atk-s0503a:948_3: Yadeko ramatī vane yasmā buddhanāgo “ahaṃ kho pubbe ākiṇṇo vihāsi”nti purimaṃ ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā
atk-s0503a:948_4: vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno idāni yathā eko adutiyo vane araññe ramati abhiramati,
atk-s0503a:948_5: evaṃ ayampi hatthināgo pubbe attano hatthiādīhi ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno idāni eko asahāyo vane araññe ramati abhiramati.
atk-s0503a:948_6: Tasmāssa cittaṃ nāgena sameti tassa cittena sametīti katvā ekībhāvaratiyā ekasadisaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:951_1: Chaṭṭhe piṇḍolabhāradvājoti piṇḍaṃ ulamāno pariyesamāno pabbajitoti piṇḍolo.
atk-s0503a:951_2: So kira parijiṇṇabhogo brāhmaṇo hutvā mahantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā piṇḍatthāya nikkhamitvā pabbajito.
atk-s0503a:951_12: Taṃ gacchante gacchante kāle ghaṃsanena parikkhīṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:951_16: Thero aparena samayena indriyabhāvanaṃ bhāvento aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:951_17: Iti so pubbe savisesaṃ piṇḍatthāya ulatīti piṇḍolo,
atk-s0503a:951_18: gottena pana bhāradvājoti ubhayaṃ ekato katvā “piṇḍolabhāradvājo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:952_0: Āraññakoti gāmantasenāsanapaṭikkhipanena araññe nivāso assāti āraññako,
atk-s0503a:952_3: parehi dinnānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte nipatananti attho.
atk-s0503a:952_4: Piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati taṃ taṃ kulaṃ upasaṅkamanto gavesatīti piṇḍapātiko,
atk-s0503a:952_5: piṇḍāya vā patituṃ carituṃ vatametassāti piṇḍapātī,
atk-s0503a:952_7: Saṅkārakūṭādīsu paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena paṃsukūlaṃ viyāti paṃsukūlaṃ,
atk-s0503a:952_8: paṃsu viya vā kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
atk-s0503a:953_10: Tesu yo sayaṃ dhutadhamme samādāya vattati,
atk-s0503a:953_13: Yo pana sayaṃ na dhutadhamme samādāya vattati,
atk-s0503a:953_22: Ekadesasarūpekasesavasena hi ayaṃ niddeso yathā taṃ “nāmarūpa”nti.
atk-s0503a:954_0: Adhicittamanuyuttoti ettha aṭṭhasamāpattisampayogato arahattaphalasamāpattisampayogato vā cittassa adhicittabhāvo veditabbo,
atk-s0503a:954_6: bhikkhunā kālena kālaṃ tīṇi nimittāni manasi kātabbānīti etasmiṃ adhicittasutte viya samathavipassanācittaṃ adhicittanti idhādhippeta”nti vadanti,
atk-s0503a:955_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa adhiṭṭhānaparikkhārasampadāsampannaṃ adhicittānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:955_1: Evaṃ “adhicittānuyogo mama sāsanānuṭṭhāna”nti dīpento imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:956_2: Pātimokkheti ettha pātimokkhapadassa attho heṭṭhā nānappakārehi vutto,
atk-s0503a:956_7: Adhicitte ca āyogoti aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhigamāya bhāvanānuyogo.
atk-s0503a:957_3: Anūpaghātoti kāyena kassaci upaghātassa paraviheṭhanassa akaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:957_5: Yādisaṃ panidaṃ ubhayaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanantogadhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:957_9: Pātimokkhe ca saṃvaroti pātimokkhasaṃvarabhūto anūpavādo anūpaghāto cāti attho.
atk-s0503a:958_4: Upasampadavelāyañhi avisesena pātimokkhasīlaṃ samādinnaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:958_5: tasmiṃ pātimokkhe ṭhitassa tato paraṃ upavādūpaghātānaṃ akaraṇavasena saṃvaro,
atk-s0503a:959_0: Atha vā pātimokkheti nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasamo ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0503a:960_0: Mattaññutā ca bhattasminti pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogavissajjanānaṃ vasena bhojane pamāṇaññutā.
atk-s0503a:960_2: Adhicitte ca āyogoti sabbacittānaṃ adhikattā uttamattā adhicittasaṅkhāte arahattaphalacitte sādhetabbe
atk-s0503a:960_4: Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ parassa anūpavadanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:960_9: yathāvuttaadhicittānuyogo ca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti attho.
atk-s0503a:960_10: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya tisso sikkhā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:963_5: appamādena anavajjadhammesu sātaccakiriyāya samannāgatassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:963_7: muni tena pavuccatī”ti evaṃ ubhayalokamunanena monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:963_8: tena arahattaphalañāṇasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgatattā vā khīṇāsavo muni nāma,
atk-s0503a:963_10: Monapathesu sikkhatoti arahattañāṇasaṅkhātassa monassa pathesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesu tīsu vā sikkhāsu sikkhato.
atk-s0503a:963_14: imāya sikkhāya munibhāvaṃ pattassa muninoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:963_18: maggañāṇasamannāgamena muninoti evametesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ attho yujjatiyeva.
atk-s0503a:963_19: Atha vā “appamajjato sikkhato”ti padānaṃ hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu ca adhicetasoti.
atk-s0503a:964_0: Sokā na bhavanti tādinoti tādisassa khīṇāsavamunino abbhantare iṭṭhaviyogādivatthukā sokā cittasantāpā na honti.
atk-s0503a:964_1: Atha vā tādinoti tādilakkhaṇasamannāgatassa evarūpassa munino sokā na bhavantīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0503a:964_3: Sadā satīmatoti sativepullappattiyā niccakālaṃ satiyā avirahitassa.
atk-s0503a:965_5: “sokā na bhavantī”tiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃso pakāsitoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:968_1: Aṭṭhame sakkatotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vaṇṇitoyeva.
atk-s0503a:969_1: Sā kira tasmiṃ kāle sabbaparibbājikāsu abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā,
atk-s0503a:969_4: tasmā te sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ pāpakamme uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:969_5: Te hi aññatitthiyā buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya sayaṃ hatalābhasakkārā heṭṭhā akkosasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgatanayena
atk-s0503a:969_6: bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uḷāraṃ aparimitaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattamānaṃ disvā issāpakatā ekato hutvā
atk-s0503a:969_8: mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya naṭṭhā hatalābhasakkārā,
atk-s0503a:969_10: kiṃ nissāya nu kho loko samaṇe gotame abhippasanno uḷāraṃ sakkārasammānaṃ upanetīti?
atk-s0503a:969_14: añño “kāladevilaṃ vandāpetuṃ upanītassa pādā parivattitvā tassa jaṭāsu patiṭṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0503a:969_15: aparo “vappamaṅgalakāle jambucchāyāya sayāpitassa vītikkantepi majjhanhike jambucchāyā aparivattitvā ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0503a:969_17: aparo “jiṇṇāturamatapabbajitasaṅkhātanimitte disvā saṃvegajāto āgāminaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito”ti.
atk-s0503a:969_18: Evaṃ aparimāṇakāle sambhataṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato puññañāṇasambhāraṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ nirupamaṃ
atk-s0503a:969_19: sallekhappaṭipadaṃ anuttarañca ñāṇapahānasampadādibuddhānubhāvaṃ ajānantā attanā yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ
atk-s0503a:969_20: dharamānaṃ taṃ taṃ bhagavato bahumānakāraṇaṃ kittetvā abahumānakāraṇaṃ pariyesitvā apassantā “kena nu
atk-s0503a:969_21: kho kāraṇena mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa ayasaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāseyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:969_23: “ambho imasmiṃ sattaloke mātugāmasukhe asattasattā nāma natthi,
atk-s0503a:969_24: ayañca samaṇo gotamo abhirūpo devasamo taruṇo,
atk-s0503a:969_28: handa mayaṃ sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ tathā uyyojema,
atk-s0503a:969_29: yathā samaṇassa gotamassa ayaso pathaviyaṃ patthareyyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:970_0: Taṃ sutvā itare “idaṃ suṭṭhu tayā cintitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:970_1: evañhi kate samaṇo gotamo ayasakena upadduto sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkonto yena vā tena vā palāyissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:970_2: sabbeva ekajjhāsayā hutvā tathā uyyojetuṃ sundariyā santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:970_3: Sā te disvā “kiṃ tumhe ekato āgatatthā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:970_4: Titthiyā anālapantā ārāmapariyante paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:970_5: Sā tattha gantvā punappunaṃ ālapantī paṭivacanaṃ alabhitvā kiṃ tumhākaṃ aparajjhaṃ?
atk-s0503a:970_7: Tathā hi pana tvaṃ amhe viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasīti.
atk-s0503a:970_10: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhetvā hatalābhasakkāre katvā vicaranta”nti vatvā “tattha mayā kiṃ kātabba”nti
atk-s0503a:970_11: vutte “tena hi tvaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanasamīpaṃ gantvā mahājanassa evañcevañca vadeyyāsī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:971_3: Yasmā te titthiyā tassā aññātakāpi samānā pabbajjasambandhamattena saṅgaṇhituṃ ñātakā viya hutvā “ussahasi
atk-s0503a:971_4: tvaṃ bhagini ñātīnaṃ atthaṃ kātu”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:971_5: Tasmā sāpi migaṃ valli viya pāde laggā jīvitampi me pariccattaṃ ñātīnaṃ atthāyāti āha.
atk-s0503a:972_0: Tena hīti “yasmā tvaṃ ‘jīvitampi me tumhākaṃ atthāya pariccatta’nti vadasi,
atk-s0503a:972_1: tvañca paṭhamavaye ṭhitā abhirūpā sobhaggappattā ca,
atk-s0503a:972_2: tasmā yathā taṃ nissāya samaṇassa gotamassa ayaso uppajjissati,
atk-s0503a:972_3: tathā kareyyāsī”ti vatvā “abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ gacchāhī”ti uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:972_4: Sāpi kho bālā kakacadantapantiyā pupphāvalikīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmā viya,
atk-s0503a:972_6: nalāṭena maccuṃ gaṇhantī viya titthiyānaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mālāgandhavilepanatambūlamukhavāsādīni
atk-s0503a:972_7: gahetvā mahājanassa satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nagaraṃ pavisanakāle jetavanābhimukhī gacchantī “kahaṃ
atk-s0503a:972_9: ahañhi tena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasāmī”ti vatvā aññatarasmiṃ titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova jetavanamaggaṃ
atk-s0503a:972_10: otaritvā nagarābhimukhī āgacchantī “kiṃ sundari kahaṃ gatāsī”ti ca puṭṭhā “samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:972_11: ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā taṃ kilesaratiyā ramāpetvā āgatāmhī”ti vadati.
atk-s0503a:972_13: “evaṃ ayyāti kho sundarī paribbājikā tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ paṭissutvā abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:973_0: Titthiyā katipāhassa accayena dhuttānaṃ kahāpaṇe datvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0503a:973_1: sundariṃ māretvā samaṇassa gotamassa gandhakuṭiyā avidūre mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā ethā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:973_3: Tato titthiyā “sundariṃ na passāmā”ti kolāhalaṃ katvā rañño ārocetvā “kattha pana tumhe parisaṅkathā”ti raññā vuttā imesu divasesu jetavane vasati,
atk-s0503a:973_6: naṃ tattha vicinathā”ti raññā anuññātā attano upaṭṭhāke gahetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā vicinantā viya hutvā
atk-s0503a:973_7: mālākacavaraṃ byūhitvā tassā sarīraṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā
atk-s0503a:973_8: ‘satthunā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ paṭicchādessāmā’ti sundariṃ māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipiṃsū”ti rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:973_11: Te nagaravīthīsu “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vadantā vicaritvā puna rañño nivesanadvāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:973_12: Rājā sundariyā sarīraṃ āmakasusāne aṭṭakaṃ āropetvā rakkhāpesi.
atk-s0503a:973_13: Sāvatthivāsino ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake yebhuyyena “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vatvā
atk-s0503a:973_14: antonagare bahinagare ca bhikkhū akkosantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:973_16: “yadā te aññiṃsu titthiyā paribbājakā ‘vodiṭṭhā kho sundarī”’tiādi.
atk-s0503a:974_2: jetavanaṃ āgacchantī ca gacchantī ca visesato diṭṭhā,
atk-s0503a:974_6: yā sā imasmiṃ nagare rūpasundaratāya “sundarī”ti pākaṭā abhiññātā paribbājikā.
atk-s0503a:974_7: Sā no na dissatīti sā amhākaṃ cakkhu viya jīvitaṃ viya ca piyāyitabbā,
atk-s0503a:974_9: Yathānikkhittanti purise āṇāpetvā mālākacavarantare attanā yathāṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:975_7: Musāvādinoti dussīlā samānā “sīlavanto maya”nti alikavāditāya musāvādino.
atk-s0503a:975_8: Abrahmacārinoti “methunappaṭisevitāya aseṭṭhacārino ime hi nāmā”ti hīḷentā vadanti.
atk-s0503a:976_0: Atha bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:976_3: tumhepi te manusse imāya gāthāya paṭicodethā”ti vatvā “abhūtavādī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0503a:976_9: saddo ciraṃ bhavissatīti idaṃ satthā tassa ayasassa nipphattiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā bhikkhū samassāsento āha.
atk-s0503a:977_0: Gāthāyaṃ abhūtavādīti parassa dosaṃ adisvāva musāvādaṃ katvā abhūtena atacchena paraṃ abbhācikkhanto.
atk-s0503a:977_1: Yo vāpi katvāti yo vā pana pāpakammaṃ katvā “nāhaṃ etaṃ karomī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:977_2: Pecca samā bhavantīti te ubhopi janā ito paralokaṃ gantvā nirayūpagamanena gatiyā samā bhavanti.
atk-s0503a:977_5: Bahukañhi pāpaṃ katvā ciraṃ niraye paccati,
atk-s0503a:977_7: Yasmā pana nesaṃ ubhinnampi lāmakameva kammaṃ,
atk-s0503a:977_11: pecca parattha ito gantvā te nihīnakammā paraloke samā bhavantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:978_3: imehi samaṇehi sakyaputtiyehi addhā taṃ pāpakammaṃ na kataṃ,
atk-s0503a:978_5: yasmā ime amhesu evaṃ asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi abbhācikkhantesupi na kiñci vikāraṃ dassenti,
atk-s0503a:978_7: kevalaṃ pana “abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upetī”ti dhammaṃyeva vadantā sapantiyeva,
atk-s0503a:978_8: ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā amhe anupadhāretvā abbhācikkhante sapanti,
atk-s0503a:978_10: Atha vā “yo vāpi katvā ‘na karomi’ cāhā”ti vadantā sapanti,
atk-s0503a:978_11: attano akārakabhāvaṃ bodhetuṃ amhākaṃ sapathaṃ karonti imeti attho.
atk-s0503a:979_0: Tesañhi manussānaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitagāthāya savanasamanantarameva buddhānubhāvena sārajjaṃ okkami,
atk-s0503a:979_4: ete ca aññatitthiyā imesaṃ anatthakāmā ahitakāmā,
atk-s0503a:979_5: tasmā te saddhāya nayidaṃ amhehi vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:980_2: Atha te dhuttā tehi kahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivantā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:980_4: “tvaṃ sundariṃ ekappahārena māretvā mālākacavarantare khipitvā tato laddhakahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivasi,
atk-s0503a:980_6: Rājapurisā taṃ sutvā te dhutte gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:980_7: Rājā “tumhehi sā māritā”ti te dhutte pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0503a:980_11: “ayaṃ sundarī tassa samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ āropetukāmehi amhehi mārāpitā,
atk-s0503a:980_14: amhākameva dosoti evaṃ vadantā nagaraṃ āhiṇḍathā”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0503a:980_19: Tato paṭṭhāya buddhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhiyyosomattāya sakkārasammāno mahā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:980_20: Bhikkhū acchariyabbhutacittajātā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā attamanā paṭivedesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:981_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā “titthiyānaṃ idaṃ kamma”nti bhikkhūnaṃ nārocesi?
atk-s0503a:981_3: tesaṃ taṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti nārocesi.
atk-s0503a:981_7: kammañca katokāsaṃ na sakkā nivattetunti abbhakkhānaṃ tannimittañca bhagavā ajjhupekkhanto nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:986_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti mammacchedanavasenāpi bālajanehi pavattitaṃ duruttavacanaṃ khantibalasamannāgatassa
atk-s0503a:986_1: dhīrassa duttitikkhā nāma natthīti imamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:986_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ adhivāsanakhantibalavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:987_1: sarehi saṅgāmagataṃva kuñjaranti kāyikasaṃvarādīsu kassacipi saṃvarassa abhāvena asaṃyatā avinītā bālajanā
atk-s0503a:987_2: sarehi sāyakehi saṅgāmagataṃ yuddhagataṃ kuñjaraṃva hatthināgaṃ paṭiyodhā viya vācāsattīhi tudanti vijjhanti,
atk-s0503a:987_5: adhivāsaye bhikkhu aduṭṭhacittoti taṃ pana tehi bālajanehi udīritaṃ bhāsitaṃ mammaghaṭṭanavasena pavattitaṃ
atk-s0503a:987_6: pharusaṃ vākyaṃ vacanaṃ abhūtaṃ bhūtato nibbeṭhento mama kakacūpamaovādaṃ anussaranto īsakampi aduṭṭhacitto
atk-s0503a:987_7: hutvā “saṃsārasabhāvo eso”ti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhaṇasīlo bhikkhu adhivāsaye,
atk-s0503a:988_2: yaṃ aparimāṇakālaṃ sakkaccaṃ upacitavipulapuññasambhāro satthā evaṃ dāruṇaṃ abhūtabbhakkhānaṃ pāpuṇīti? Vuccate –
atk-s0503a:988_3: ayaṃ so bhagavā bodhisattabhūto atītajātiyaṃ munāḷi nāma dhutto hutvā pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo vicarati.
atk-s0503a:988_4: So ekadivasaṃ surabhiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ passi.
atk-s0503a:988_5: Tasmiñca samaye aññatarā itthī tassa avidūrena gacchati.
atk-s0503a:988_7: So tena kammena bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena idāni buddho
atk-s0503a:988_10: evaṃ ciñcamāṇavikādīnaṃ vikārakitthīnaṃ bhagavato abbhakkhānādīni dukkhāni pattāni,
atk-s0503a:993_0: “Suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0503a:1004_0: Taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā.
atk-s0503a:1039_0: Pāde chaviṃ pakappesi, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
atk-s0503a:1044_0: Sakkā ca sabbe haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho.
atk-s0503a:1047_0: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
atk-s0503a:1058_0: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
atk-s0503a:1069_1: Navame upasenassāti ettha upasenoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1069_2: vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa pana puttattā “vaṅgantaputto”ti ca naṃ voharanti.
atk-s0503a:1070_1: sāsane pabbajitvā apaññatte sikkhāpade upasampadāya dvivasso upajjhāyo hutvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gato,
atk-s0503a:1070_2: tassa bhikkhuno bhagavatā tassa saddhivihārikabhāvaṃ pucchitvā khandhake āgatanayena “atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1070_5: yadidaṃ gaṇabandhiya”nti vigarahito patodābhitunno viya ājānīyo saṃviggamānaso “yadipāhaṃ idāni parisaṃ nissāya bhagavatā vigarahito,
atk-s0503a:1070_6: parisaṃyeva pana nissāya pāsaṃsiyo bhaveyya”nti ussāhajāto sabbe dhutadhamme samādāya vattamāno vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1070_7: ārabhitvā na cirasseva chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāppatto mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā attano nissitake dhutaṅgadhare
atk-s0503a:1070_8: eva katvā tehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā santhatasikkhāpade āgatanayena “pāsādikā kho tyāyaṃ,  upasena,
atk-s0503a:1070_11: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ yadidaṃ upaseno vaṅgantaputto”ti etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā mahāsāvakesu abbhantaro.
atk-s0503a:1071_0: So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto antevāsikesu attano attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gatesu udakakumbhato
atk-s0503a:1071_1: udakaṃ gahetvā pāde pakkhāletvā gattāni sītiṃ katvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ attharitvā divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno
atk-s0503a:1071_3: Tassa te anekasatā anekasahassā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1071_4: So “mayhaṃ tāva sāvakassa sato ime evarūpā guṇā,
atk-s0503a:1071_5: kīdisā nu kho mayhaṃ satthu guṇā”ti bhagavato guṇābhimukhaṃ manasikāraṃ pesesi.
atk-s0503a:1071_7: So “evaṃsīlo me satthā evaṃdhammo evaṃpañño evaṃvimuttī”tiādinā ca “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1071_11: Evaṃ mahāthero anekākāravokāraṃ ratanattayaguṇesu āvibhūtesu attamano pamudito uḷārapītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1071_12: Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “āyasmato upasenassa vaṅgantaputtassa rahogatassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1072_2: Evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādīti evaṃ idāni vuccamānākāro cittassa vitakko uppajji.
atk-s0503a:1072_5: Suladdhaṃ vata meti yañcidaṃ mayā bhagavato sāsane pabbajjūpasampadāratanattayapayirupāsanādi paṭiladdhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1072_6: taṃ me aho vata suṭṭhu laddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1073_0: Tattha diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ satte anusāsatīti satthā.
atk-s0503a:1073_7: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0503a:1074_5: Sabrahmacārinoti seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmasaṅkhātaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ ariyamaggaṃ saha caranti paṭipajjantīti sabrahmacārino.
atk-s0503a:1074_7: Kalyāṇadhammāti samādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanādayo kalyāṇā sundarā dhammā etesaṃ atthīti kalyāṇadhammā.
atk-s0503a:1074_9: Sīlesu camhi paripūrakārīti “ahampi pabbajitvā na tiracchānakathākathiko kāyadaḷhibahulo hutvā vihāsiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1074_10: atha kho pātimokkhasaṃvarādiṃ catubbidhampi sīlaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ achiddaṃ asabalaṃ akammāsaṃ bhujissaṃ viññuppasatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1074_11: aparāmaṭṭhaṃ katvā paripūrento ariyamaggaṃyeva pāpesi”nti vadati.
atk-s0503a:1074_14: Susamāhito camhi ekaggacittoti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā sabbathāpi samāhito ca amhi avikkhittacitto.
atk-s0503a:1074_17: Arahā camhi khīṇāsavoti kāmāsavādīnaṃ sabbaso khīṇattā khīṇāsavo,
atk-s0503a:1074_18: tato eva parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya arahā camhi.
atk-s0503a:1074_20: Mahiddhiko camhi mahānubhāvoti adhiṭṭhānavikubbanādiiddhīsu mahatā vasībhāvena samannāgatattā mahiddhiko
atk-s0503a:1074_21: uḷārassa puññānubhāvassa guṇānubhāvassa ca sampattiyā mahānubhāvo ca asmi.
atk-s0503a:1074_23: Abhiññāsu vasībhāvena hi ariyā yathicchitanipphādanena mahiddhikā,
atk-s0503a:1074_24: pubbūpanissayasampattiyā nānāvihārasamāpattīhi ca visodhitasantānattā mahānubhāvā ca hontīti.
atk-s0503a:1075_0: Bhaddakaṃ me jīvitanti evaṃvidhasīlādiguṇasamannāgatassa me yāvāyaṃ kāyo dharati,
atk-s0503a:1075_3: Bhaddakaṃ maraṇanti sace panidaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ ajja vā imasmiṃyeva vā khaṇe anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyati,
atk-s0503a:1075_4: taṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ parinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ maraṇampi me bhaddakanti ubhayattha tādibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:1075_5: Evaṃ mahāthero appahīnasomanassuppilāvitavāsanussannattā uḷārasomanassito dhammabahumānena dhammapītipaṭisaṃvedanena parivitakkesi.
atk-s0503a:1076_0: Taṃ satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā jīvite maraṇe ca tassa tādibhāvavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1077_0: Tattha yaṃ jīvitaṃ na tapatīti yaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ jīvitaṃ āyatiṃ khandhappavattiyā sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato na tapati na bādhati,
atk-s0503a:1077_1: vattamānameva vā jīvitaṃ sabbaso saṅkhatadhammattā satipaññāvepullappattiyā sabbattha satisampajaññasamāyogato na bādhati.
atk-s0503a:1077_2: Yo hi andhaputhujjano pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo akatakusalo akatapuñño,
atk-s0503a:1077_3: so “akataṃ vata me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā vippaṭisārena tapatīti tassa jīvitaṃ taṃ tapati nāma.
atk-s0503a:1077_4: Itare pana akatapāpā katapuññā kalyāṇaputhujjanena saddhiṃ satta sekhā tapanīyadhammaparivajjanena atapanīyadhammasamannāgamena
atk-s0503a:1077_5: ca pacchānutāpena na tapantīti na tesaṃ jīvitaṃ tapati.
atk-s0503a:1077_6: Khīṇāsave pana vattabbameva natthīti pavattidukkhavasena atthavaṇṇanā katā.
atk-s0503a:1078_0: Maraṇante na socatīti maraṇasaṅkhāte ante pariyosāne,
atk-s0503a:1078_1: maraṇasamīpe vā na socati anāgāmimaggeneva sokassa samugghātitattā.
atk-s0503a:1078_3: sokamajjhe na socatīti so anabhijjhādīnaṃ catunnaṃ dhammapadānaṃ nibbānasseva vā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhapado,
atk-s0503a:1078_4: dhitisampannattā dhīro khīṇāsavo socanadhammattā “sokā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ avītarāgānaṃ sattānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1078_5: sokahetūnaṃ vā lokadhammānaṃ majjhe ṭhatvāpi na socati.
atk-s0503a:1079_1: Tattha yassa aggamaggena sabbaso ucchinnā bhavataṇhā,
atk-s0503a:1082_1: Tasmā natthi tassa punabbhavoti yasmā tassa evarūpassa ariyapuggalassa āyatiṃ punabbhavo natthi,
atk-s0503a:1082_7: tato eva natthi tassa punabbhavoti attho yojetabbo.
atk-s0503a:1085_1: Dasame attano upasamanti sāvakapāramīmatthakappattiyā hetubhūtaṃ aggamaggena attano anavasesakilesavūpasamaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1086_2: nesaṃ vaṭṭamūlakadukkhaṃ parituletvā karuṇāyamāno attanāpi puthujjanakāle anubhūtaṃ kilesanimittaṃ vā
atk-s0503a:1086_3: anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ anussaritvā “īdisassa nāma mahādukkhassa hetubhūtā kilesā idāni me suppahīnā”ti attano
atk-s0503a:1086_5: Paccavekkhanto ca “ime ettakā kilesā sotāpattimaggena upasamitā,
atk-s0503a:1086_8: ettakā arahattamaggena upasamitā”ti taṃtaṃmaggañāṇehi odhiso kilesānaṃ upasamitabhāvaṃ paccavekkhati,
atk-s0503a:1087_0: Apare “thero arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ paccavekkhitvā ‘imassa vatāyaṃ santapaṇītabhāvo accantasantāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā ārammaṇato,
atk-s0503a:1087_1: sayañca sammadeva kilesavūpasamato’ti evaṃ abhiṇhaṃ upasamaṃ paccavekkhatī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1087_2: Aññe pana “anavasesakilesānaṃ upasamapariyosāne jātaṃ aggaphalamevettha upasamo nāma,
atk-s0503a:1088_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yadidaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa mahāpaññatādihetubhūtaṃ sāvakesu anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1088_2: tassa paccavekkhaṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadanubhāvadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1089_0: Tattha upasantasantacittassāti upasantameva hutvā santaṃ cittaṃ etassāti upasantasantacitto.
atk-s0503a:1089_1: Samāpattiyā vikkhambhanena hi upasantakilesattā upasantacittaṃ na sabbathā “upasantasanta”nti vuccati tassa upasamassa anaccantikabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:1089_3: Tena pana accantameva kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā arahato cittaṃ puna kilesānaṃ anupasametabbatāya samathavipassanāheṭṭhimamaggehi
atk-s0503a:1090_0: Atha vā satipi sabbesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ anavasesakilesavūpasame sāvakapāramīñāṇassa pana matthakappattihetubhūto
atk-s0503a:1090_1: sāvakesu anaññasādhāraṇo saviseso dhammasenāpatino kilesavūpasamoti dassetuṃ satthā upasantasaddena visesetvā
atk-s0503a:1091_2: tena upasantena upasantameva hutvā santaṃ upasantasantaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1091_7: mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño”tiādinā anekapariyāyena vaṇṇito thomito.
atk-s0503a:1091_8: Netticchinnassāti netti vuccati bhavataṇhā saṃsārassa nayanato,
atk-s0503a:1091_12: Mutto so mārabandhanāti so evaṃvidho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sabbasmā mārabandhanato mutto,
atk-s0503a:1096_1: Mahāvaggassa paṭhame mallikāya deviyā saddhinti mallikāya nāma attano mahesiyā saha.
atk-s0503a:1096_3: Kocañño attanā piyataroti koci añño attanā piyāyitabbataro.
atk-s0503a:1096_4: Atthi nu kho teti “kiṃ te atthī”ti deviṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:1097_2: Ekadivasaṃ āpaṇato pūvaṃ gahetvā mālārāmaṃ gantvā “khādissāmī”ti gacchantī paṭipathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ
atk-s0503a:1097_3: bhagavantaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacittā taṃ bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0503a:1097_6: Bhagavā tattha nisīditvā taṃ pūvaṃ paribhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0503a:1097_10: ajjeva kosalarañño aggamahesī bhavissati piyā manāpā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1097_11: Taṃ divasameva ca rājā kāsigāme bhāgineyyena saddhiṃ yujjhitvā parājito palāyitvā āgato nagaraṃ pavisanto
atk-s0503a:1097_13: Sā rājānaṃ āgataṃ passitvā tassa vattamakāsi.
atk-s0503a:1097_14: Rājā tassā vatte pasīditvā pitaraṃ pakkosāpetvā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ datvā taṃ antepuraṃ paṭiharāpetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:1097_22: Iti so aññamaññaṃ vissāsajananatthaṃ sammodanīyaṃ karonto pucchi.
atk-s0503a:1098_0: Devī pana paṇḍitā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā saṅghupaṭṭhāyikā “nāyaṃ pañho rañño mukhaṃ ulloketvā kathetabbo”ti cintetvā yathābhūtameva vadantī “natthi kho me, mahārāja,
atk-s0503a:1098_2: Vatvāpi attanā byākatamatthaṃ upāyena rañño paccakkhaṃ kātukāmā “tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja,
atk-s0503a:1098_3: atthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti tatheva rājānaṃ pucchi yathā raññā sayaṃ puṭṭhā.
atk-s0503a:1098_4: Rājāpi tāya sarasalakkhaṇena kathitattā nivattituṃ asakkonto sayampi sarasalakkhaṇeneva kathento tatheva byākāsi yathā deviyā byākataṃ.
atk-s0503a:1099_1: “ahaṃ rājā pathavissaro mahantaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ abhivijiya ajjhāvasāmi,
atk-s0503a:1099_2: mayhaṃ tāva yuttaṃ ‘attanā piyataraṃ aññaṃ na passāmī’ti,
atk-s0503a:1099_3: ayaṃ pana vasalī hīnajaccā samānā mayā ucce ṭhāne ṭhapitā sāmibhūtaṃ maṃ na tathā piyāyati,
atk-s0503a:1099_5: yāva kakkhaḷā vatāya”nti anattamano hutvā “nanu te tīṇi ratanāni piyatarānī”ti codesi.
atk-s0503a:1099_6: Devī ‘ratanattayaṃpāhaṃ deva attano saggasukhaṃ mokkhasukhañca patthayantī sampiyāyāmi,
atk-s0503a:1099_8: Sabbo cāyaṃ loko attadatthameva paraṃ piyāyati,
atk-s0503a:1099_9: puttaṃ patthentopi “ayaṃ maṃ jiṇṇakāle posessatī”ti pattheti,
atk-s0503a:1099_13: iti attadatthameva sampassanto loko paraṃ piyāyatīti.
atk-s0503a:1100_1: “ayaṃ mallikā kusalā paṇḍitā nipuṇā ‘attāva me piyataro’ti vadati,
atk-s0503a:1100_6: Evaṃ pana cintetvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1101_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ “loke sabbasattānaṃ attāva attano piyataro”ti raññā vuttamatthaṃ sabbaso jānitvā tadatthaparidīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1102_0: Tattha sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasāti sabbā anavasesā dasapi disā pariyesanavasena cittena anugantvā.
atk-s0503a:1102_1: Nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvacīti attanā atisayena piyaṃ aññaṃ koci puriso sabbussāhena pariyesanto
atk-s0503a:1102_2: kvaci katthaci sabbadisāsu neva adhigaccheyya na passeyya.
atk-s0503a:1102_3: Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti evaṃ kassaci attanā piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena puthu visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attāva piyo.
atk-s0503a:1102_4: Tasmā na hiṃse paramattakāmoti yasmā evaṃ sabbopi satto attānaṃ piyāyati attano sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo,
atk-s0503a:1102_5: tasmā attakāmo attano hitasukhaṃ icchanto paraṃ sattaṃ antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya na hiṃse na haneyya na pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhipi viheṭheyya.
atk-s0503a:1102_6: Parassa hi attanā kate dukkhe taṃ tato saṅkamantaṃ viya kālantare attani sandissati.
atk-s0503a:1105_2: bhanteti idampi meghiyasutte viya garahaṇacchariyavasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1105_8: Tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapajjīti tusitaṃ devanikāyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena upapajji.
atk-s0503a:1106_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira thero pacchābhattaṃ divāṭṭhāne nisinno lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ
atk-s0503a:1106_2: “aho buddhānaṃ rūpakāyasampatti dassanīyā samantapāsādikā manoharā”ti uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0503a:1106_3: “vijātamātuyā nāma virūpopi putto surūpo viya manāpo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1106_4: sace pana buddhānaṃ mātā mahāmāyā devī dhareyya,
atk-s0503a:1106_5: kīdisaṃ nu kho tassā bhagavato rūpadassane pītisomanassaṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-s0503a:1106_8: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano parivitakkitaṃ ārocento tassā kālakiriyaṃ garahanto “acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1107_1: “mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ mahatā āyāsena pabbajjaṃ yācitvāpi paṭikkhittā,
atk-s0503a:1107_2: mayā pana upāyena yācito bhagavā aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇavasena tassā pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca anujāni,
atk-s0503a:1107_3: sā te dhamme paṭiggahetvā laddhapabbajjūpasampadā bhagavato dutiyaṃ parisaṃ uppādetvā catutthāya parisāya paccayo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1107_4: Sace pana bhagavato janetti mahāmāyā devī dhareyya,
atk-s0503a:1107_5: evametā cubhopi khattiyabhaginiyo ekato hutvā imaṃ sāsanaṃ sobheyyuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1107_6: bhagavā ca mātari bahumānena mātugāmassa sāsane pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca sukheneva anujāneyya,
atk-s0503a:1107_7: appāyukatāya panassā kasirena nipphannamidanti iminā adhippāyena thero bhagavato santike ‘acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1107_10: Bhagavā hi mātuyā vā aññassa vā mātugāmassa attano sāsane pabbajjaṃ anujānanto garukaṃyeva katvā anujānāti,
atk-s0503a:1108_1: “dasabalacatuvesārajjādike anaññasādhāraṇe anantāparimāṇe buddhaguṇe thero manasi karitvā yā evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:1108_2: nāma loke aggapuggalaṃ satthāraṃ kucchinā dasa māse parihari,
atk-s0503a:1108_3: sā buddhamātā kassaci paricārikā bhavissatīti ayuttamidaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1108_5: yadidaṃ sattāhajāte bhagavati janetti kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0503a:1108_6: kālakatā ca tusitesu uppajjatīti acchariyabbhutacittajāto hutvā taṃ attano vitakkuppādanaṃ bhagavato ārocento ‘acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1109_0: Satthā pana yasmā sattāhajātesu bodhisattesu bodhisattamātu kālakiriyā dhammatā siddhā,
atk-s0503a:1109_3: Sā panāyaṃ dhammatā yasmā yathā sabbe bodhisattā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0503a:1109_4: ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi sannipatitvā abhisambodhiṃ pattuṃ manussaloke paṭisandhiggahaṇāya
atk-s0503a:1109_5: ajjhesitā kāladīpadesakulāni viya janettiyā āyuparimāṇampi oloketvā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0503a:1109_6: ayampi bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tatheva tusitapure ṭhito pañca mahāvilokanāni vilokento sattadivasādhikadasamāsaparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1109_7: mātuyā āyuparimāṇaṃ paricchinditvā “ayaṃ mama paṭisandhiggahaṇassa kālo,
atk-s0503a:1109_8: idāni uppajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ñatvāva paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0503a:1110_0: Tattha kālaṃ karontīti yathāvuttaāyuparikkhayeneva kālaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1110_4: na ca sakkā bodhisattamātaraṃ apanetvā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapetunti tattakaṃ eva bodhisattamātu āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1110_6: Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya mahābodhisattā pañcamaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ karonti.
atk-s0503a:1111_2: Paṭhamavayasmiñhi sattānaṃ attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hoti,
atk-s0503a:1111_3: tena tadā sañjātagabbhā itthiyo yebhuyyena gabbhaṃ anurakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0503a:1111_6: Majjhimavayassa pana dve koṭṭhāse atikkamitvā tatiyakoṭṭhāse vatthu visadaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1111_8: tasmā bodhisattamātaro paṭhamavaye sampattiṃ anubhavitvā majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse vijāyitvā kālaṃ karontīti.
atk-s0503a:1112_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ bodhisattamātu aññesañca sabbasattānaṃ attabhāve āyussa maraṇapariyosānataṃ
atk-s0503a:1112_1: viditvā tadatthavibhāvanamukhena anavajjappaṭipattiyaṃ ussāhadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1113_6: Ettāvatā atītādivasena tiyaddhapariyāpanne satte anavasesato pariyādiyati.
atk-s0503a:1113_7: Apica gabbhaseyyakasattā gabbhato nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya bhūtā nāma,
atk-s0503a:1114_0: Sabbe gamissanti pahāya dehanti sabbe yathāvuttabhedā sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsādivasena
atk-s0503a:1114_1: anekabhedabhinnā sattā dehaṃ attano sarīraṃ pahāya nikkhipitvā paralokaṃ gamissanti,
atk-s0503a:1114_3: Ettha koci acavanadhammo nāma natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1114_4: Taṃ sabbajāniṃ kusalo viditvāti tadetaṃ sabbassa sattassa jāniṃ hāniṃ maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1114_5: sabbassa vā sattassa jāniṃ vināsaṃ pabhaṅgutaṃ kusalo paṇḍitajātiko maraṇānussativasena aniccatāmanasikāravasena vā jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:1114_6: Ātāpiyo brahmacariyaṃ careyyāti vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ātāpiyasaṅkhātena vīriyena samannāgatattā
atk-s0503a:1114_7: ātāpiyo catubbidhasammappadhānavasena āraddhavīriyo anavasesamaraṇasamatikkamanūpāyaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ careyya,
atk-s0503a:1117_1: Tatiye rājagahe suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī ahosīti suppabuddhanāmako eko puriso rājagahe ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1117_3: Manussadaliddoti yattakā rājagahe manussā tesu sabbaduggato.
atk-s0503a:1117_4: So hi saṅkārakūṭavatiādīsu manussehi chaḍḍitapilotikakhaṇḍāni sibbitvā paridahati,
atk-s0503a:1117_5: kapālaṃ gahetvā gharā gharaṃ gantvā laddhaācāmaucchiṭṭhabhattāni nissāya jīvati,
atk-s0503a:1117_6: tampi pubbe katakammapaccayā na yāvadatthaṃ labhati.
atk-s0503a:1117_10: Mahatiyā parisāyāti mahatiyā bhikkhuparisāya ceva upāsakaparisāya ca.
atk-s0503a:1118_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā bhikkhūnaṃ sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1118_1: katvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto katipayabhikkhuparivāro nikkhanto yehi dānaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1118_2: tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ avasesabhikkhūnañca āgamanaṃ āgamayamāno antonagareyeva aññatarasmiṃ ramaṇīye padese aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1118_3: Tāvadeva bhikkhū tato tato āgantvā bhagavantaṃ parivāresuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1118_4: upāsakāpi “anumodanaṃ sutvā vanditvā nivattissāmā”ti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1118_8: Atha bhagavā asītianubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi virocamānāya byāmappabhāparikkhepasamujjalāya
atk-s0503a:1118_9: nīlapītalohitodātamañjeṭṭhapabhassarānaṃ vasena chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjentiyā anupamāya rūpakāyasiriyā
atk-s0503a:1118_10: sakalameva taṃ padesaṃ obhāsento tārāgaṇaparivuto viya puṇṇacando bhikkhugaṇaparivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0503a:1118_11: nisīditvā manosilātale kesarasīho viya sīhanādaṃ nadanto karavīkarutamañjunā brahmassarena dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0503a:1119_0: Bhikkhūpi kho appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā pahitattā codakā pāpagarahino vattāro
atk-s0503a:1119_1: vacanakkhamā sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā meghavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1119_2: paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā suvammitā viya gandhahatthino bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0503a:1119_3: Upāsakāpi suddhavatthanivatthā suddhuttarāsaṅgā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ mahādānāni pavattetvā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0503a:1119_4: bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā vanditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca parivāretvā
atk-s0503a:1119_7: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1120_0: Suppabuddho pana jighacchādubbalyapareto ghāsapariyesanaṃ caramāno antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇo dūratova taṃ mahājanasannipātaṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:1120_3: appeva nāmettha gatena kiñci khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā laddhuṃ sakkā”ti sañjātābhilāso tattha gantvā
atk-s0503a:1120_4: addasa bhagavantaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassanīyaṃ pasādanīyaṃ uttamadamathasamathamanuppattaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1120_5: susamāhitaṃ tāya parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1120_6: disvāna purimajātisambhatāya paripakkāya upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno “yaṃnūnāhampi dhammaṃ suṇeyya”nti parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1121_6: Ceto paricca manasākāsīti tassā parisāya cittaṃ paccekaṃ paricchinditvā manasi akāsi te volokesi.
atk-s0503a:1121_7: Bhabbo dhammaṃ viññātunti maggaphaladhammaṃ adhigantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0503a:1121_9: Etadahosīti ayaṃ suppabuddho kiñcāpi tagarasikhimhi paccekabuddhe aparajjhitvā īdiso jāto,
atk-s0503a:1121_10: maggaphalūpanissayo panassa paṃsupaṭicchannasuvaṇṇanikkhaṃ viya antohadayeyeva vijjotati,
atk-s0503a:1122_3: Bhagavā hi paṭhamaṃ hetunā saddhiṃ assādaṃ dassetvā tato satte vivecetuṃ nānānayehi ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā
atk-s0503a:1122_4: ādīnavasavanena saṃviggahadayānaṃ nekkhammaguṇavibhāvanamukhena ca vivaṭṭaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1123_4: idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0503a:1123_19: cakkavattisampattiṃ sakkasampattiṃ mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1124_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1124_2: Sīlakathanti sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ sattānaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1124_3: Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:1124_7: sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlakusumapiḷandhitaṃ sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevako loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatīti evamādīhi sīlaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1125_0: Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0503a:1125_1: Saggakathanti saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo,
atk-s0503a:1125_3: cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti,
atk-s0503a:1125_4: tāvatiṃsā tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādisaggaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1126_0: Evaṃ hetunā saddhiṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya “ayampi saggo anicco adhuvo,
atk-s0503a:1126_1: na ettha chandarāgo kātabbo”ti dassanatthaṃ “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā,
atk-s0503a:1126_2: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0503a:1126_5: aseṭṭhehi sevitabbaṃ seṭṭhehi na sevitabbaṃ nihīnasabhāvanti attho.
atk-s0503a:1126_6: Saṃkilesanti tehi sattānaṃ saṃsāre saṃkilissanaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1127_0: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjetvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi pabbajjāya jhānādīsu ca guṇaṃ dīpesi vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0503a:1127_2: heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammaniyacittaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1129_1: Sāmukkaṃsikāti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā attanāva uddharitvā gahitā,
atk-s0503a:1129_10: tāni sabbākārato vitthārena visuddhimagge vuttānīti tattha vuttanayena veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:1130_0: Seyyathāpītiādinā upamāvasena suppabuddhassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādañca dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1130_7: Etenassa lahuvipassanakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññatā ca dassitā honti.
atk-s0503a:1130_15: Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena eva saṅkhatadhamme paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0503a:1131_2: vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:1131_5: udakena temetvā temetvā gomayakhārehi kāḷake sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanappayogo viya saddhāsalilena
atk-s0503a:1131_6: temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithile katvā saddhādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho,
atk-s0503a:1131_7: tena payogena vatthe kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1131_9: tena suddhassa vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodāpananti.
atk-s0503a:1132_0: Evaṃ pana suppabuddho parisapariyante nisinno dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1132_1: satthu ārocetukāmo parisamajjhaṃ ogāhituṃ avisahanto mahājanassa satthāraṃ vanditvā anugantvā nivattakāle
atk-s0503a:1132_2: bhagavati vihāraṃ gate sayampi vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1132_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko devarājā “ayaṃ suppabuddho kuṭṭhī attanā satthu sāsane paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātukāmo”ti
atk-s0503a:1132_4: ñatvā “vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti gantvā ākāse ṭhito etadavoca –
atk-s0503a:1132_16: tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ na yuttarūpo,
atk-s0503a:1132_18: apica maṃ tvaṃ ‘duggato daliddo kapaṇo’ti kasmā vadesi,
atk-s0503a:1132_20: nevāhaṃ duggato na daliddo na kapaṇo,
atk-s0503a:1132_21: atha kho sukhappatto paramena sukhena apāhamasmi mahaddhano”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0503a:1134_0: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1135_0: “Yassa ete dhanā atthi, itthiyā purisassa vā;
atk-s0503a:1137_2: na tveva te buddhehi vā paccekabuddhehi vā ‘daliddā’ti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1138_0: Sakko tassa kathaṃ sutvā taṃ antarāmagge ohāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ paṭivacanañca ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1138_2: “na kho sakka sakkā tādisānaṃ satenapi sahassenapi suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ ‘buddho na buddho,
atk-s0503a:1138_5: Suppabuddhopi kho kuṭṭhī satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā katapaṭisanthāro attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1139_0: Tattha diṭṭhadhammoti diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo.
atk-s0503a:1139_3: Dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1139_4: Patti ca ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1139_5: Sā panāyaṃ viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenāpi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1139_7: Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesenapi pariññeyyadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1140_0: Tattha paṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā ca aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā vicikicchā etenāti tiṇṇavicikiccho.
atk-s0503a:1140_2: na nu kho”ti evaṃ pavattitā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā etassāti vigatakathaṃkatho.
atk-s0503a:1140_3: Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu ca sīlādiguṇesu suppatiṭṭhitattā vesārajjaṃ visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ pattoti vesārajjappatto.
atk-s0503a:1140_5: na parassa saddhāya ettha vattatīti aparappaccayo.
atk-s0503a:1141_0: Abhikkantantiādīsu kiñcāpi ayaṃ abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpabbhanumodanādīsu anekesu atthesu dissati,
atk-s0503a:1141_2: Teneva so pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena ca dvikkhattuṃ vutto,
atk-s0503a:1141_7: Tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena bhagavato desanaṃ thometi,
atk-s0503a:1142_4: yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti.
atk-s0503a:1142_5: Bhagavato eva vā vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato,
atk-s0503a:1143_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-s0503a:1143_7: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti maggaṃ upadiseyya.
atk-s0503a:1144_2: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0503a:1144_4: evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena,
atk-s0503a:1144_8: evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsanadesanāpajjotadhāraṇena
atk-s0503a:1144_9: bhagavatā nānānayehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
atk-s0503a:1145_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā tāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto “esāha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1145_2: Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhagavā me saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ aghassa ghātā,
atk-s0503a:1145_3: hitassa vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhagavantaṃ gacchāmi bhajāmi,
atk-s0503a:1145_7: Dhammanti adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
atk-s0503a:1146_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1147_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti ca –
atk-s0503a:1151_3: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti pariyattidhammo vuttoti.
atk-s0503a:1152_2: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatanti ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā.
atk-s0503a:1152_5: ajja agge ajja ādiṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1152_8: tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ ratanattayassa upāsanato upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā upadhāretu jānātūti attho.
atk-s0503a:1153_0: Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvāti bhagavato vacanaṃ cittena abhinanditvā tameva abhinanditabhāvaṃ pakāsento vuttanayena vācāya anumoditvā.
atk-s0503a:1153_1: Abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmīti taṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1153_2: katvā satthu guṇaninnacitto yāva dassanavisayasamatikkamā bhagavantaṃyeva pekkhamāno pañjaliko namassamāno pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:1154_0: Pakkanto ca kuṭṭharogābhibhavena chinnahatthapādaṅguli ukkāragatto samantato vissandamānāsavo kaṇḍūtipatipīḷito
atk-s0503a:1154_1: asuci duggandho jegucchatamo paramakāruññataṃ patto “nāyaṃ kāyo imassa accantasantassa paṇītatamassa
atk-s0503a:1154_2: ariyadhammassa ādhāro bhavituṃ yutto”ti uppannābhisandhinā viya saggasaṃvattaniyena puññakammena okāse
atk-s0503a:1154_3: kate appāyukasaṃvattaniyena upacchedakena pāpakammena katūpacitena codiyamāno taruṇavacchāya dhenuyā
