atk-s0503a:1154_6: “atha kho acirapakkantaṃ suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1155_0: So kira atīte eko seṭṭhiputto hutvā attano sahāyehi tīhi seṭṭhiputtehi saddhiṃ kīḷanto ekaṃ nagarasobhiniṃ
atk-s0503a:1155_1: gaṇikaṃ uyyānaṃ netvā divasaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā atthaṅgate sūriye sahāye etadavoca –
atk-s0503a:1155_2: “imissā hatthe kahāpaṇasahassaṃ bahukañca suvaṇṇaṃ mahagghāni ca pasādhanāni saṃvijjanti,
atk-s0503a:1155_5: handa imaṃ mayaṃ māretvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā gacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1155_6: Te cattāropi janā ekajjhāsayā hutvā taṃ māretuṃ upakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1155_7: Sā tehi māriyamānā “ime nillajjā nikkaruṇā mayā saddhiṃ kilesasanthavaṃ katvā niraparādhaṃ maṃ kevalaṃ dhanalobhena mārenti,
atk-s0503a:1155_9: ahaṃ pana yakkhinī hutvā anekavāraṃ ime māretuṃ samatthā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0503a:1155_10: Tesu kira eko pakkusāti kulaputto ahosi,
atk-s0503a:1155_14: iti imesaṃ catunnaṃ janānaṃ anekasate attabhāve sā yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbattā gāvī hutvā jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0503a:1155_15: Te tassa kammassa nissandena tattha tattha antarāmaraṇaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1155_16: Evaṃ suppabuddhassa kuṭṭhissa sahasā maraṇaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1156_0: Atha sambahulā bhikkhū tassa kālakiriyaṃ bhagavato ārocetvā abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1157_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayāti sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāsoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavabandhanānaṃ samucchedavasena pahānā.
atk-s0503a:1159_4: Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ assa gati paṭisaraṇaṃ avassaṃ pattabbanti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0503a:1159_6: ko abhisamparāyo”ti pucchāya bhaddikā eva suppabuddhassa gati,
atk-s0503a:1159_9: taṃ pana pucchānusandhivasena pakāsetukāmo dhammarājā ettakameva abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1159_10: Passati hi bhagavā “mayā ettake kathite imissaṃyeva parisati anusandhikusalo eko bhikkhu suppabuddhassa
atk-s0503a:1159_12: athāhaṃ tassa taṃ kāraṇaṃ tena pucchānusandhinā pakāsetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1159_18: Yenāti yena hetunā yena paccayena ca.
atk-s0503a:1160_1: Atīte kāle nibbattaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “suppabuddho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1160_3: Atīte kira anuppanne tathāgate bārāṇasiyā sāmantā ekasmiṃ gāme ekā kuladhītā khettaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0503a:1160_4: Sā ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannacittā tassa pañcahi lājāsatehi saddhiṃ ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ datvā pañca puttasatāni patthesi.
atk-s0503a:1160_5: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā paccekabuddhassa madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā “etissā puttā bhaveyyāma,
atk-s0503a:1160_8: Tato cutā ekasmiṃ jātassare padumagabbhe nibbatti.
atk-s0503a:1160_10: Tassā vicarantiyā pāduddhāre pāduddhāre bhūmito padumāni uṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0503a:1160_16: te vayappattā uyyāne padumasare kīḷantā ekekasmiṃ padume nisīditvā paripakkañāṇā saṅkhāresu khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1165_0: Evaṃ paccekabodhiṃ abhisambuddhesu tesu pañcasu paccekabuddhasatesu abbhantaro tagarasikhī nāma paccekasambuddho
atk-s0503a:1165_1: gandhamādanapabbate nandamūlapabbhāre sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā sattāhassa accayena nirodhā
atk-s0503a:1165_2: vuṭṭhito ākāsena āgantvā isigilipabbate otaritvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ
atk-s0503a:1165_4: Tasmiñca samaye rājagahe eko seṭṭhiputto mahatā parivārena uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ nagarato nikkhamanto tagarasikhipaccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1165_7: tathā hi kuṭṭhicīvarena sarīraṃ pārupitvā gacchatī”ti niṭṭhubhitvā apasabyaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:1166_3: Kuṭṭhīti akuṭṭhiṃyeva taṃ seṭṭhi kuṭṭharogaṃ akkosavatthuṃ pāpento vadati.
atk-s0503a:1166_5: Yebhuyyena hi kuṭṭhino ḍaṃsamakasasarīsapapaṭibāhanatthaṃ rogapaṭicchādanatthañca yaṃ vā taṃ vā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pārupati,
atk-s0503a:1166_7: Paṃsukūlacīvaradharattā vā aggaḷānaṃ anekavaṇṇabhāvena kuṭṭhasarīrasadisoti hīḷento “kuṭṭhicīvarenā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1166_9: Apasabyato karitvāti paṇḍitā tādisaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1166_10: ayaṃ pana aviññutāya paribhavena taṃ apasabyaṃ katvā attano apasabyaṃ apadakkhiṇaṃ katvā gato.
atk-s0503a:1166_12: Tassa kammassāti tagarasikhimhi paccekabuddhe “kvāyaṃ kuṭṭhī”ti hīḷetvā niṭṭhubhanaapasabyakaraṇavasena pavattapāpakammassa.
atk-s0503a:1166_15: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenāti yena kammena so niraye paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0503a:1166_16: na taṃ kammaṃ manussaloke vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0503a:1166_17: Yā panassa nānakkhaṇikā cetanā tadā paccekabuddhe vippaṭipajjanavasena pavattā aparāpariyavedanīyabhūtā,
atk-s0503a:1166_18: sā aparāpariyavedanīyeneva puññakammena manussesu tihetukapaṭisandhiyā dinnāya pavattiyaṃ kuṭṭhibhāvaṃ dāliddiyaṃ paramakāruññataṃ āpādesi.
atk-s0503a:1166_19: Taṃ sandhāya kammasabhāgatāvasena “tasseva kammassa vipākavasesenā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1166_20: Sadisepi hi loke tabbohāro diṭṭho yathā taṃ “sā eva tittirī,
atk-s0503a:1167_1: hetū”ti tena bhikkhunā puṭṭhapañhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni yo “tassa kā gati,
atk-s0503a:1167_4: Tattha tathāgatappaveditanti tathāgatena bhagavatā desitaṃ akkhātaṃ pakāsitanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1167_10: suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti ratanattayasannissayaṃ pubbabhāgasaddhañceva lokuttarasaddhañcāti duvidhampi saddhaṃ sammā ādiyi.
atk-s0503a:1167_17: Pariyattidhammāpi hi tena dhammassavanakāle saccappaṭivedhāya sāvakehi yathāladdhappakāraṃ sutā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā cāti.
atk-s0503a:1167_19: yena ariyasāvakā deyyadhammesu muttacāgā ca honti payatapāṇī vossaggaratā.
atk-s0503a:1168_2: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā.
atk-s0503a:1168_4: Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokanti padattayenāpi devalokameva vadati.
atk-s0503a:1168_5: So hi sampattīnaṃ sobhanattā sundarā gatīti sugati,
atk-s0503a:1168_18: So hi asucimakkhitaṃ jajjaraṃ mattikābhājanaṃ chaḍḍetvā anekaratanavicittaṃ pabhassararaṃsijālavinaddhasuddhajambunadabhājanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1168_19: gaṇhanto viya vuttappakāraṃ kaḷevaraṃ idha nikkhipitvā ekacittakkhaṇena yathāvuttaṃ dibbattabhāvaṃ mahatā
atk-s0503a:1169_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ pāpānaṃ aparivajjane ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1169_1: parivajjane ca ānisaṃsaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1170_1: yathā cakkhumā puriso parakkame kāyikavīriye vijjamāne sarīre vahante visamāni papātādiṭṭhānāni caṇḍabhāvena
atk-s0503a:1170_3: evaṃ jīvalokasmiṃ imasmiṃ sattaloke paṇḍito sappañño puriso tāya sappaññatāya attano hitaṃ jānanto pāpāni lāmakāni duccaritāni parivajjeyya.
atk-s0503a:1170_4: Evañhi yathāyaṃ suppabuddho tagarasikhimhi paccekabuddhe pāpaṃ aparivajjetvā mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ āpajji,
atk-s0503a:1170_6: Yathā vā suppabuddho kuṭṭhī mama dhammadesanaṃ āgamma idāni saṃvegappatto pāpāni parivajjento uḷāraṃ visesaṃ adhigañchi,
atk-s0503a:1170_7: evaṃ aññopi uḷāraṃ visesādhigamaṃ icchanto pāpāni parivajjeyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1173_4: Ime hi sattā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassakā,
atk-s0503a:1173_8: Macchake bādhentīti maggasamīpe ekasmiṃ taḷāke nidāghakāle udake parikkhīṇe ninnaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1173_9: ussiñcitvā khuddakamacche gaṇhanti ceva hananti ca “pacitvā khādissāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1173_10: Tenupasaṅkamīti maggato thokaṃ taḷākaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0503a:1173_13: Te kumārake attani vissāsaṃ janetuṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:1173_17: Appiyaṃ vo dukkhanti “kiṃ tumhākaṃ sarīre uppajjanakadukkhaṃ appiyaṃ aniṭṭha”nti pucchati.
atk-s0503a:1174_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti ime sattā attano dukkhaṃ anicchantā eva hutvā dukkhahetuṃ paṭipajjantā attano taṃ
atk-s0503a:1174_1: icchantā eva nāma hontīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1174_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ pāpakiriyāya nisedhanaṃ ādīnavavibhāvanañca udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1175_4: āvi vā paresaṃ pākaṭabhāvavasena appaṭicchannaṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā pāṇātipātādippabhedaṃ yadi
atk-s0503a:1175_5: vā raho apākaṭabhāvavasena paṭicchannaṃ katvā manodvāre eva abhijjhādippabhedaṃ aṇumattampi pāpakaṃ lāmakadhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1175_7: atha pana taṃ pāpakammaṃ etarahi karotha,
atk-s0503a:1175_9: nirayādīsu catūsu apāyesu manussesu ca tassa phalabhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ ito vā etto vā palāyante amhe nānubandhissatīti
atk-s0503a:1175_10: adhippāyena upecca apecca palāyatampi tumhākaṃ tato mutti mokkho natthi.
atk-s0503a:1175_13: vuttanayena yattha katthaci gamane pakkamane satīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1178_1: Pañcame tadahūti tasmiṃ ahani tasmiṃ divase.
atk-s0503a:1178_3: upavasantīti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1178_4: Ayañhi uposathasaddo “aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasāmī”tiādīsu sīle āgato.
atk-s0503a:1178_11: Nisinno hotīti mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1178_12: Nisajja pana bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni olokento ekaṃ dussīlapuggalaṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:1178_13: “sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ puggale idha nisinneyeva pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi,
atk-s0503a:1178_14: sattadhāssa muddhā phalissatī”ti tasmiṃ anukampāya tuṇhīyeva ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1179_0: Ettha ca uddhastaṃ aruṇanti aruṇuggamanaṃ vatvāpi “uddisatu,
atk-s0503a:1179_2: bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci tasmiṃ kāle “na,
atk-s0503a:1179_6: parisāti tikkhattuṃ therena pātimokkhuddesassa yācitattā anuddesassa kāraṇaṃ kathento “asukapuggalo aparisuddho”ti avatvā “aparisuddhā, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:1179_8: Kasmā pana bhagavā tiyāmarattiṃ tathā vītināmesi?
atk-s0503a:1179_9: Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ anuddisitukāmo tassa vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1180_1: Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni parijānanto tassa moghapurisassa dussīlyacittaṃ passi.
atk-s0503a:1180_2: Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo diṭṭho nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1180_3: tasmā “addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ dussīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1180_4: Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattamānaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇalābhī jānāti,
atk-s0503a:1180_9: Asucinti aparisuddhehi kāyakammādīhi samannāgatattā na suciṃ.
atk-s0503a:1180_10: Saṅkassarasamācāranti kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ iminā kataṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyatāya saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1180_11: atha vā kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ.
atk-s0503a:1181_0: Lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbakāraṇato paṭicchannaṃ kammantaṃ etassāti paṭicchannakammantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1181_2: Salākaggahaṇādīsu “kittakā samaṇā”ti ca gaṇanāya “ahampi samaṇomhī”ti micchāpaṭiññāya samaṇapaṭiññaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1181_4: Aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute supattadhare gāmanigamādīsu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā
atk-s0503a:1181_5: abrahmacārī samāno sayampi tādisena ākārena paṭipajjanto uposathādīsu sandissanto “ahampi brahmacārī”ti
atk-s0503a:1181_7: Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtiṃ.
atk-s0503a:1181_10: Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnanti saṅghapariyāpanno viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1181_11: Diṭṭhosīti ayaṃ pana na pakatattoti bhagavatā diṭṭho asi.
atk-s0503a:1181_13: tasmā natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso.
atk-s0503a:1181_14: Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi,
atk-s0503a:1182_0: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosīti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi thero “sayameva nibbinno oramissatī”ti vā,
atk-s0503a:1182_1: “idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī”ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1182_2: Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato diṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:1182_4: “idānissa nikkaḍḍhanakālo mā saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī”ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0503a:1182_10: evaṃ ubhayathāpi vihārato bahi katvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1182_14: parisā”ti vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0503a:1182_15: evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessatīti acchariyamidanti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1183_3: na ca tathāgatā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1183_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti.
atk-s0503a:1183_7: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāni.
atk-s0503a:1184_0: Tattha na dānāhanti idāni ahaṃ uposathaṃ na karissāmi,
atk-s0503a:1184_12: etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti imā pana tisso gāthā ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0503a:1184_21: tasmā amhākampi bhagavā vīsativassamattaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ na uddisi.
atk-s0503a:1184_24: Kāraṇañhi yathā tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānanti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1185_3: Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhassa anuddeso vutto,
atk-s0503a:1185_4: so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehi sattahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:1185_5: vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ upamābhāvena mahāsamudde aṭṭha acchariyabbhutadhamme dassento
atk-s0503a:1186_0: Pakatidevā viya na suranti na isanti na virocantīti asurā,
atk-s0503a:1186_5: te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādiṃ nimminitvā kīḷantāva abhiramanti.
atk-s0503a:1186_6: Tattha tesaṃ abhirati ime guṇe disvāti āha –
atk-s0503a:1187_1: Na āyatakeneva papātoti na chinnataṭo mahāsobbho viya ādito eva papāto.
atk-s0503a:1187_3: gambhīro hutvā gacchanto gacchanto sinerupādamūle caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro hutvā ṭhitoti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1188_1: Na matena kuṇapena saṃvasatīti yena kenaci hatthiassādīnaṃ kaḷevarena saddhiṃ na saṃvasati.
atk-s0503a:1188_3: Thalaṃ ussāretīti hatthena gahetvā viya vīcippahāreneva thale khipati.
atk-s0503a:1188_4: Gaṅgā yamunāti anotattadahassa dakkhiṇamukhato nikkhantanadī pañca dhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne gaṅgātiādinā pañcadhā saṅkhaṃ gatā.
atk-s0503a:1189_0: Tatrāyaṃ imāsaṃ nadīnaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya uppattikathā –
atk-s0503a:1189_2: tattha catusahassayojanappamāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo samuddoti saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0503a:1189_4: tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena pañcayojanasatiko caturāsītikūṭasahassapaṭimaṇḍito samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto,
atk-s0503a:1189_5: yattha āyāmena vitthārena gambhīratāya ca paṇṇāsayojanappamāṇo diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalo anotattadaho
atk-s0503a:1189_6: kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho sīhapapātadahoti satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0503a:1190_0: Tesu anotattadaho sudassanakūṭaṃ cittakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatakūṭehi parikkhitto.
atk-s0503a:1190_1: Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ tiyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1190_16: kāḷapakkhuposathadivase ādittaṃ viya aṅgāraṃ pajjalantaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0503a:1190_18: Sabbāni cetāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0503a:1190_19: Tattha devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca devo vassati,
atk-s0503a:1190_22: candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1191_0: Tattha ratanamayamanuññasopānasilātalāni nimmacchakacchapāni phalikasadisāni nimmalūdakāni tadupabhogasattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1191_2: yattha buddhapaccekabuddhā iddhimanto sāvakā isayo ca nahānādīni karonti,
atk-s0503a:1192_7: Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva
atk-s0503a:1192_9: Pacchimadisato uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva
atk-s0503a:1193_0: Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva
atk-s0503a:1193_1: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā uṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇaudakadhārā hutvā ākāsena
atk-s0503a:1193_2: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā,
atk-s0503a:1193_4: Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā,
atk-s0503a:1193_5: pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena
atk-s0503a:1193_6: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañcadhārā
atk-s0503a:1194_0: Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne “āvaṭṭagaṅgā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1194_4: kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne “bahalagaṅgā”ti,
atk-s0503a:1194_6: viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne gaṅgā, yamunā,
atk-s0503a:1194_9: Evametā pañca mahānadiyo himavantato pavattantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:1195_2: Savantiyoti yā kāci savamānā sandamānā gacchantiyo mahānadiyo vā kunnadiyo vā.
atk-s0503a:1195_8: jālakkhipādīni ādāya macchakacchape gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “imasmiṃ kāle atimahantī vuṭṭhi,
atk-s0503a:1195_9: na labhissāma nu kho piṭṭhipasāraṇaṭṭhāna”nti vā taṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1195_10: Paṭhamakappikakālato paṭṭhāya hi yaṃ vassitvā sinerumekhalaṃ āhacca udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1195_11: taṃ tato ekaṅgulamattampi udakaṃ neva heṭṭhā otarati,
atk-s0503a:1198_0: Evameva khoti kiñcāpi satthā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye soḷasapi bāttiṃsapi tato bhiyyopi acchariyabbhutadhamme vibhajitvā dassetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1198_1: tadā upamābhāvena pana gahitānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ anurūpavasena aṭṭheva te upametabbadhamme vibhajitvā dassento “evameva kho,
atk-s0503a:1198_3: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1199_2: anupubbapaṭipadāya satta anupassanā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā ca gahitā.
atk-s0503a:1199_3: Na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedhoti maṇḍūkassa uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya āditova sīlapūraṇādīni akatvā arahattapaṭivedho nāma natthi,
atk-s0503a:1199_4: paṭipāṭiyā pana sīlasamādhipaññāyo pūretvāva arahattappattīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1200_0: Mama sāvakāti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0503a:1200_1: Na saṃvasatīti uposathakammādivasena saṃvāsaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0503a:1200_4: Na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vāti asaṅkhyeyyepi mahākappe buddhesu anuppajjantesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1200_6: buddhakāle pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ ārādhenti,
atk-s0503a:1200_9: Sabbā hi sāsanassa sampatti yāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittassa vimuttiyā hoti.
atk-s0503a:1201_1: Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti,
atk-s0503a:1204_0: Lokiyaratananimittaṃ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghatīti ayamattho heṭṭhā dassito eva. Apica –
atk-s0503a:1207_0: Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1207_6: Paramparakāraṇañhi dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ sātisayo.
atk-s0503a:1208_2: Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1208_3: Tathā hi kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccaattasaññānaṃ pahānato asubhadukkhāniccānattatāgahaṇato ca nesaṃ kāyānupassanādibhāvo vibhatto.
atk-s0503a:1209_6: Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanapahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādanabhāvanavasena
atk-s0503a:1210_2: Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
atk-s0503a:1210_3: Iti paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo,
atk-s0503a:1210_5: Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamūpāyoti iddhipādo.
atk-s0503a:1210_6: Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0503a:1210_7: svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattiyati,
atk-s0503a:1211_1: Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1211_5: aññāṇaṃ abhibhavitvā dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti paññindriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1212_0: Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena “balānī”ti veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:1213_2: Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyoga-
atk-s0503a:1213_8: tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0503a:1213_9: Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1213_10: tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0503a:1213_13: “Bodhiyā saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā”tiādinā nayenapi bojjhaṅgānaṃ bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1214_0: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo.
atk-s0503a:1215_0: Sotāpannoti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0503a:1215_2: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannoti sotāpattiphalassa attapaccakkhakaraṇāya paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:1215_4: Sakadāgāmīti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:1215_6: Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījīti evamādiko ariyapuggalavibhāgo,
atk-s0503a:1216_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ attano dhammavinaye matakuṇapasadisena dussīlapuggalena saddhiṃ saṃvāsābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1217_0: Tattha channamativassatīti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0503a:1217_1: tato paraṃ tato paranti evaṃ āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativiya vassati.
atk-s0503a:1217_2: Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti āpattiṃ āpanno taṃ appaṭicchādetvā vivaranto sabrahmacārīnaṃ pakāsento yathādhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1217_3: yathāvinayaṃ paṭikaronto desento vuṭṭhahanto aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati,
atk-s0503a:1217_4: tenassa vivaṭaṃ puna āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ na vassati.
atk-s0503a:1217_6: tasmā channaṃ chāditaṃ āpattiṃ vivaretha pakāsetha.
atk-s0503a:1217_7: Evaṃ taṃ nātivassatīti evaṃ sante taṃ āpattiāpajjanakaṃ āpannapuggalaṃ attabhāvaṃ ativijjhitvā kilesavassaṃ na vassati na temeti.
atk-s0503a:1217_8: Evaṃ so kilesehi anavassuto parisuddhasīlo samāhito hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sammasanto anukkamena nibbānaṃ pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1220_5: Soṇo upāsako kuṭikaṇṇoti nāmena soṇo nāma,
atk-s0503a:1220_7: koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena “koṭikaṇṇo”ti vattabbe “kuṭikaṇṇo”ti evaṃ abhiññāto,
atk-s0503a:1220_9: Ayañhi āyasmato mahākaccāyanassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane abhippasanno,
atk-s0503a:1220_10: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhito pavatte pabbate chāyūdakasampanne ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā theraṃ tattha vasāpetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0503a:1221_0: So kālena kālaṃ therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0503a:1221_3: So ekadā satthena saddhiṃ vāṇijjatthāya ujjeniṃ gacchanto antarāmagge aṭaviyaṃ satthe niviṭṭhe rattiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1221_8: So pabhātāya rattiyā pabujjhitvā uṭṭhāya kañci apassanto sattheneva gatamaggaṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gacchanto ekaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0503a:1221_9: Tattha addasa ekaṃ mahākāyaṃ virūpadassanaṃ gacchantaṃ purisaṃ aṭṭhito muttāni attano maṃsāni sayameva khādantaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1221_15: “Ahaṃ pubbe bhārukacchanagaravāsī kūṭavāṇijo hutvā paresaṃ santakaṃ vañcetvā khādiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1221_16: samaṇe ca bhikkhāya upagate ‘tumhākaṃ maṃsaṃ khādathā’ti akkosiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1221_17: tena kammena etarahi imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1221_18: Taṃ sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0503a:1222_0: Tato paraṃ gacchanto mukhato paggharitakāḷalohite dve petadārake passitvā tatheva pucchi.
atk-s0503a:1222_2: Te kira bhārukacchanagare dārakakāle gandhavāṇijjāya jīvikaṃ kappentā attano mātari khīṇāsave nimantetvā
atk-s0503a:1222_3: bhojentiyā gehaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ santakaṃ kasmā samaṇānaṃ desi,
atk-s0503a:1222_4: tayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjanakasamaṇānaṃ mukhato kāḷalohitaṃ paggharatū”ti akkosiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1222_5: Te tena kammena niraye paccitvā tassa vipākāvasesena petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tadā imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
atk-s0503a:1222_6: Tampi sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegajāto ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1223_0: So ujjeniṃ gantvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā kulagharaṃ paccāgato theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro therassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1223_1: Theropissa pavattinivattīsu ādīnavānisaṃse vibhāvento dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0503a:1223_2: So theraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gato sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ upagato thokaṃyeva niddāyitvā pabujjhitvā sayanatale
atk-s0503a:1223_5: te ca petattabhāve anussarato saṃsāradukkhaṃ ativiya bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0503a:1223_7: So vibhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ ārocetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0503a:1224_0: Tattha yathā yathātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0503a:1224_1: yena yena ākārena ayyo mahākaccāno dhammaṃ deseti ācikkhati paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti pakāseti,
atk-s0503a:1224_2: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1224_3: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akkhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1224_4: Ekadivasampi kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1224_6: Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekanta paripuṇṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0503a:1224_7: carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ceva massūni ca ohāretvā voropetvā kāsāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1224_8: carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni acchādetvā nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1224_10: Yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1225_0: Evaṃ attanā rahovitakkitaṃ soṇo upāsako therassa ārocetvā taṃ paṭipajjitukāmo “pabbājetu maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:1225_2: Thero pana “tāvassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ katha”nti upadhāretvā ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno “dukkaraṃ kho”tiādinā pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāresi.
atk-s0503a:1226_0: Tattha ekabhattanti “ekabhattiko hoti rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ vikālabhojanaviratiṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0503a:1226_4: eko nisīdatī”tiādinā nayena vuttesu catūsu iriyāpathesu kāyavivekaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0503a:1226_12: Etañhi upāsakena pubbabhāge anuyuñjitabbaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1227_1: yathāvuttakāle vā tuyhaṃ anuyuñjantassa yuttaṃ patirūpaṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1227_3: Sabbametaṃ ñāṇassa aparipakkattā tassa kāmānaṃ duppahānatāya sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ yogyaṃ kārāpetuṃ vadati,
atk-s0503a:1227_9: therena vuttavidhiṃ pana anutiṭṭhanto kālena kālaṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanto dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0503a:1227_10: Tassa vuttanayeneva dutiyaṃ pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppajji,
atk-s0503a:1227_13: Tatiyavāre pana ñāṇassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā “idāni naṃ pabbājetuṃ kālo”ti thero pabbājesi,
atk-s0503a:1227_14: pabbajitañca taṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni atikkamitvā gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā upasampādesi.
atk-s0503a:1228_1: Tadā kira bhikkhū yebhuyyena majjhimadese eva vasiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1228_4: ekasmiṃ dveti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1228_8: Therena hi katipaye bhikkhū ānetvā aññesu ānīyamānesu pubbe ānītā kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1228_9: kiñci kālaṃ āgametvā puna tesu ānīyamānesu itare pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1228_10: Evaṃ punappunaṃ ānayanena sannipāto cireneva ahosi,
atk-s0503a:1228_12: Dasavaggaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvāti tadā bhagavatā paccantadesepi dasavaggeneva saṅghena upasampadā anuññātā.
atk-s0503a:1228_13: Itonidānañhi therena yācito pañcavaggena saṅghena paccantadese upasampadaṃ anujāni.
atk-s0503a:1229_1: Īdiso ca īdiso cāti evarūpo ca evarūpo ca,
atk-s0503a:1229_3: evarūpāya dhammakāyasampattiyā samannāgatoti sutoyeva me so bhagavā.
atk-s0503a:1229_4: Na kho me so bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭhoti etena puthujjanasaddhāya evaṃ āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1229_5: Aparabhāge pana satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā paccūsasamayaṃ ajjhiṭṭho soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni
atk-s0503a:1229_6: satthu sammukhā aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā atthadhammappaṭisaṃvedī hutvā
atk-s0503a:1229_7: bhaṇanto dhammūpasañhitapāmojjādimukhena samāhito sarabhaññapariyosāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅkhāre
atk-s0503a:1229_9: Etadatthameva hissa bhagavatā attanā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāso āṇattoti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1230_1: “na kho me so bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭho”ti idaṃ rūpakāyadassanameva sandhāya vuttanti.
atk-s0503a:1230_2: Āyasmā hi soṇo pabbajitvāva therassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto anupasampannova
atk-s0503a:1230_5: kimettha citta”nti uparimaggatthāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā antovasseyeva chaḷabhiñño hutvā visuddhipavāraṇāya pavāresi.
atk-s0503a:1230_6: Ariyasaccadassanena hi bhagavato dhammakāyo diṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-s0503a:1231_0: “Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passati. Yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1232_0: Tasmāssa dhammakāyadassanaṃ pageva siddhaṃ, pavāretvā pana rūpakāyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1233_8: Āvusovādoyeva hi aññamaññaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavato dharamānakāle āciṇṇo.
atk-s0503a:1233_9: Bhagavantaṃ pāsādikantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0503a:1234_0: Kacci bhikkhu khamanīyanti bhikkhu idaṃ tuyhaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ kacci khamanīyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1234_3: Kacci yāpanīyanti kiṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu yāpetuṃ gametuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0503a:1234_5: Kaccisi appakilamathenāti anāyāsena imaṃ ettakaṃ addhānaṃ kacci āgatosi.
atk-s0503a:1235_0: Etadahosīti buddhāciṇṇaṃ anussarantassa āyasmato ānandassa etaṃ “yassa kho maṃ bhagavā”tiādinā idāni vuccamānaṃ citte āciṇṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1236_0: Nisajjāya vītināmetvāti ettha yasmā bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa samāpattisamāpajjane paṭisanthāraṃ karonto
atk-s0503a:1236_1: sāvakasādhāraṇā sabbā samāpattiyo anulomapaṭilomaṃ samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ…pe…
atk-s0503a:1236_3: tasmā āyasmāpi soṇo bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ sabbā tā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto “bahudeva rattiṃ…pe…
atk-s0503a:1236_5: Pavisitvā ca bhagavatā anuññāto cīvaraṃ tirokaraṇīyaṃ katvāpi bhagavato pādapasse nisajjāya vītināmesi.
atk-s0503a:1236_7: Paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitunti bhikkhu tuyhaṃ dhammo bhāsituṃ upaṭṭhātu ñāṇamukhe āgacchatu,
atk-s0503a:1237_0: Soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikānīti aṭṭhakavaggabhūtāni kāmasuttādīni soḷasa suttāni.
atk-s0503a:1237_6: Ekacco uggahaṇakāle sammā uggahetvāpi pacchā sajjhāyādivasena manasi karaṇakāle byañjanāni vā micchā ropeti,
atk-s0503a:1237_9: Iminā pana sammadeva yathuggahitaṃ manasi katāni.
atk-s0503a:1237_13: Atthe hi suṭṭu upadhārite sakkā pāḷiṃ sammā ussāretuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1237_14: Kalyāṇiyāsi vācāya samannāgatoti sithiladhanitādīnaṃ yathāvidhānavacanena parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanaparipuṇṇāya poriyā vācāya samannāgato āsi.
atk-s0503a:1237_20: Atha vā anelagaḷāyāti anelāya ca agaḷāya ca niddosāya agaḷitapadabyañjanāya,
atk-s0503a:1237_24: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ yadidaṃ soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:1237_25: Atthassa viññāpaniyāti yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ samatthāya.
atk-s0503a:1238_0: Kativassoti so kira majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse ṭhito ākappasampanno ca paresaṃ ciratarapabbajito viya khāyati.
atk-s0503a:1238_4: ettakaṃ kālaṃ kasmā pamādamāpannoti puna anuyuñjituṃ satthā “kativassosī”ti taṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:1238_6: “kissa pana tvaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ ciraṃ akāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1239_2: kena kāraṇena evaṃ cirakālaṃ pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā agāramajjhe vasīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1239_3: Ciraṃ diṭṭho meti cirena cirakālena mayā diṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:1239_6: Api cāti kāmesu ādīnave kenaci pakārena diṭṭhepi na tāvāhaṃ gharāvāsato nikkhamituṃ asakkhiṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1239_7: Sambādho gharāvāso uccāvacehi kiccakaraṇīyehi samupabyūḷho agāriyabhāvo.
atk-s0503a:1240_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti kāmesu yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavadassino cittaṃ cirāyitvāpi na patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:1240_1: aññadatthu padumapalāse udakabindu viya vinivattatiyevāti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1240_2: Imaṃ udānanti pavattiṃ nivattiñca sammadeva jānanto pavattiyaṃ tannimitte ca na kadācipi ramatīti idamatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1241_0: Tattha disvā ādīnavaṃ loketi sabbasmiṃ saṅkhāraloke “anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo”tiādinā ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ paññāya passitvā.
atk-s0503a:1241_2: Ñatvā dhammaṃ nirupadhinti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattā nirupadhiṃ nibbānadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā nissaraṇavivekāsaṅkhatāmatasabhāvato
atk-s0503a:1241_4: “Disvā ñatvā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ “sappiṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1241_6: paññāya disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0503a:1241_7: Ariyo na ramatī pāpeti kilesehi ārakattā ariyo sappuriso aṇumattepi pāpe na ramati. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1241_8: Pāpe na ramatī sucīti suvisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya visuddhapuggalo rājahaṃso viya ukkāraṭṭhāne pāpe saṃkiliṭṭhadhamme na ramati nābhinandati.
atk-s0503a:1241_11: pāpo pāpapuggalo suciṃ anavajjaṃ vodānadhammaṃ na ramati,
atk-s0503a:1241_12: aññadatthu gāmasūkarādayo viya ukkāraṭṭhānaṃ asuciṃ saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva ramatīti paṭipakkhato desanaṃ parivatteti.
atk-s0503a:1242_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā udāne udānite āyasmā soṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano upajjhāyassa vacanena
atk-s0503a:1242_2: Bhagavāpi tāni anujānīti taṃ sabbaṃ khandhake āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1245_2: So hi sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo viharati,
atk-s0503a:1245_5: akappiyo guḷo”ti ca ādinā vinayakukkuccasaṅkhātakaṅkhābahulo pana hoti.
atk-s0503a:1245_7: So aparabhāge satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto chaḷabhiññā sacchikatvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmeti,
atk-s0503a:1245_8: yebhuyyena pana attanā adhigataṃ ariyamaggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
atk-s0503a:1245_11: Maggapaññā hi “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinayapavattāya soḷasavatthukāya,
atk-s0503a:1245_13: paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya aṭṭhavatthukāya,
atk-s0503a:1245_14: pageva itarāsanti anavasesato sabbakaṅkhānaṃ vitaraṇato samatikkamanato,
atk-s0503a:1245_15: aññehi ca attanā pahātabbakilesehi accantavisujjhanato “kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhī”ti idhādhippetā.
atk-s0503a:1245_16: Tañhi ayamāyasmā dīgharattaṃ kaṅkhāpakatattā “imaṃ maggadhammaṃ adhigamma imā me kaṅkhā anavasesā pahīnā”ti garuṃ katvā paccavekkhamāno nisīdi,
atk-s0503a:1246_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ ariyamaggassa anavasesakaṅkhāvitaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1247_0: Tattha yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṃ vāti idha imasmiṃ paccuppanne attabhāve “ahaṃ nu khosmi no nu khosmī”tiādinā huraṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:1247_1: atītānāgatesu attabhāvesu “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinā uppajjanakā kaṅkhā.
atk-s0503a:1247_2: Sakavediyā vā paravediyā vāti tā evaṃ vuttanayeneva sakaattabhāve ārammaṇavasena paṭilabhitabbāya pavattiyā
atk-s0503a:1247_3: sakavediyā vā parassa attabhāve paṭilabhitabbāya “buddho nu kho,
atk-s0503a:1247_4: no nu kho”tiādinā vā parasmiṃ padhāne uttame paṭilabhitabbāya pavattiyā paravediyā vā yā kāci kaṅkhā vicikicchā.
atk-s0503a:1247_6: ātāpino brahmacariyaṃ carantāti ye ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyino vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1247_7: catubbidhasammappadhānapāripūriyā ātāpino maggabrahmacariyaṃ carantā adhigacchantā saddhānusārīādippabhedā
atk-s0503a:1247_9: tā sabbā kaṅkhā pajahanti samucchindanti maggakkhaṇe.
atk-s0503a:1247_10: Tato paraṃ pana tā pahīnā nāma honti,
atk-s0503a:1247_11: tasmā ito aññaṃ tāsaṃ accantappahānaṃ nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1248_0: Iti bhagavā jhānamukhena āyasmato kaṅkhārevatassa jhānasīsena ariyamaggādhigamaṃ thomento thomanāvasena udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1248_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti jhāyībhāvena etadagge ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0503a:1251_1: Aṭṭhame āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti abhimāre payojetvā nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjāpetvā silaṃ pavaṭṭetvā bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1251_2: anatthaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto “saṅghaṃ bhinditvā cakkabhedaṃ karissāmī”ti adhippāyena etaṃ “ajjatagge”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0503a:1251_6: Uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cāti bhagavato ovādakārakaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ visuṃ katvā maṃ anuvattantehi
atk-s0503a:1251_7: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammāni ca karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1251_8: Devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissatīti bhedakarānaṃ sabbesaṃ devadattena sajjitattā ekaṃseneva devadatto ajja saṅghaṃ bhindissati dvidhā karissati.
atk-s0503a:1251_9: “Adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīsu hi aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu yaṃkiñci ekampi vatthuṃ dīpetvā tena tena kāraṇena “imaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0503a:1251_10: imaṃ rocethā”ti saññāpetvā salākaṃ gāhetvā visuṃ saṅghakamme kate saṅgho bhinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1252_0: “Pañcahi, upāli, ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1253_0: Tattha kammenāti apalokanakammādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena.
atk-s0503a:1253_2: Voharantoti tāhi tāhi uppattīhi “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūni dīpento.
atk-s0503a:1253_3: Anussāvanenāti “nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca,
atk-s0503a:1253_4: mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ gāheyyāti kiṃ tumhākaṃ cittampi uppādetuṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1253_5: kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena.
atk-s0503a:1253_6: Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anāvattidhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
atk-s0503a:1254_0: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1254_2: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya gāhitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho.
atk-s0503a:1254_3: Yadā panevaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gāhetvā āveṇikaṃ uddesaṃ vā kammaṃ vā karonti,
atk-s0503a:1254_5: Devadatto ca sabbaṃ saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgaṃ nipphādetvā “ekaṃseneva ajja āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammañca
atk-s0503a:1255_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ avīcimahānirayuppattisaṃvattaniyaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ devadattena nibbattiyamānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1255_2: Imaṃ udānanti kusalākusalesu yathākkamaṃ sappurisāsappurisasabhāgavisabhāgapaṭipattivasena pana sukusalāti idamatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1256_0: Tattha sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhūti attano paresañca hitaṃ sādhetīti sādhu,
atk-s0503a:1256_2: Tena sādhunā sāriputtādinā sāvakena paccekabuddhena sammāsambuddhena aññena vā lokiyasādhunā sādhu sundaraṃ
atk-s0503a:1256_3: bhaddakaṃ attano paresañca hitasukhāvahaṃ sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkā.
atk-s0503a:1256_4: Sādhu pāpena dukkaranti tadeva pana vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sādhu pāpena devadattādinā pāpapuggalena dukkaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0503a:1256_5: na so taṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1256_6: Pāpaṃ pāpena sukaranti pāpaṃ asundaraṃ attano paresañca anatthāvahaṃ pāpena yathāvuttapāpapuggalena sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0503a:1256_7: Pāpamariyehi dukkaranti ariyehi pana buddhādīhi taṃ taṃ pāpaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1259_0: 49. Navame māṇavakāti taruṇā. Paṭhame yobbane ṭhitā brāhmaṇakumārakā idhādhippetā.
atk-s0503a:1260_5: taṃ ācikkhantīti sadhayamānāti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā “sadhāyamānā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1260_6: Atha vā visesato sasedhe viya attānaṃ āvadantīti sadhāyamānā.
atk-s0503a:1260_10: Bhagavato avidūre atikkamantīti bhagavato savanavisaye taṃ taṃ mukhāruḷhaṃ vadantā atiyanti.
atk-s0503a:1261_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ vācāya asaññatabhāvaṃ jānitvā tadatthadīpakaṃ dhammasaṃvegavasena imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1262_2: mayamevettha jānāmā”ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe attānameva jānantaṃ katvā samudācaraṇato.
atk-s0503a:1262_3: Vācāgocarabhāṇinoti yesaṃ vācā eva gocaro visayo,
atk-s0503a:1262_6: Atha vā vācāya agocaraṃ ariyānaṃ kathāya avisayaṃ musāvādaṃ bhaṇantīti vācāgocarabhāṇino.
atk-s0503a:1262_7: Atha vā “gocarabhāṇino”ti ettha ākārassa rassabhāvo kato.
atk-s0503a:1262_11: Yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ attano yāva mukhāyāmaṃ yāva mukhappasāraṇaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0503a:1262_14: attano avisayatāya ca mukhasaṅkocaṃ na karontīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1262_15: Atha vā vācāgocarā eva hutvā bhāṇino,
atk-s0503a:1262_16: sayaṃ ajānitvā parapattikā eva hutvā vattāroti attho.
atk-s0503a:1262_17: Tato eva yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ yena vacanena sāvetabbā,
atk-s0503a:1262_18: taṃ acintetvā yāvadeva attano mukhappasāraṇamattaṃ icchantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1262_19: Yena nītā na taṃ vidūti yena muṭṭhassaccādinā nillajjabhāvaṃ paṇḍitamānībhāvañca nītā “mayamevaṃ bhaṇāmā”ti,
atk-s0503a:1262_20: taṃ tathā attano bhaṇantassa kāraṇaṃ na vidū,
atk-s0503a:1265_1: Dasame cūḷapanthakoti mahāpanthakattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātikattā panthe jātattā ca daharakāle laddhavohārena
atk-s0503a:1265_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ yadidaṃ cūḷapanthako,
atk-s0503a:1265_6: cetovivaṭṭakusalānaṃ yadidaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti dvīsu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā mahāsāvakesu abbhantaro.
atk-s0503a:1266_0: So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto attano divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno samāpattīhi divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0503a:1266_1: vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ upāsakesu dhammassavanatthaṃ anāgatesu eva vihāramajjhaṃ pavisitvā bhagavati
atk-s0503a:1266_2: gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinne “akālo tāva bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitu”nti gandhakuṭipamukhe ekamantaṃ nisīdi
atk-s0503a:1266_5: “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā cūḷapanthako bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1266_6: So hi tadā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1267_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato cūḷapanthakassa kāyacittānaṃ sammāpaṇihitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:1267_1: Imaṃ udānanti aññopi yo passaddhakāyo sabbiriyāpathesu upaṭṭhitassati samāhito,
atk-s0503a:1267_2: tassa bhikkhuno anupādā parinibbānapariyosānassa visesādhigamassa tattha pātubhāvavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1268_0: Tattha ṭhitena kāyenāti kāyadvārikassa asaṃvarassa pahānena akaraṇena sammā ṭhapitena copanakāyena,
atk-s0503a:1268_1: tathā cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena suṭṭhu ṭhapitena pañcadvārikakāyena,
atk-s0503a:1268_2: saṃyatahatthapādatāya hatthakukkuccādīnaṃ abhāvato apariphandanena ṭhitena karajakāyena cāti saṅkhepato
atk-s0503a:1268_6: Ṭhitena cetasāti cittassa ṭhitiparidīpanena samādhisampadaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1268_8: Tasmā samathavasena vipassanāvaseneva vā ekaggatāya sati cittaṃ ārammaṇe ekodibhāvūpagamanena ṭhitaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1268_10: Idañca yathāvuttakāyacittānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ samādahanaṃ sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbesu ca iriyāpathesu icchitabbanti dassento āha –
atk-s0503a:1268_14: Tena tiṭṭhanto vā nisinno vā sayāno vā tadaññiriyāpatho vāti ayamattho dīpito hotīti caṅkamanassāpi idha saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1269_0: Etaṃ satiṃ bhikkhu adhiṭṭhahānoti yāya pageva parisuddhasamācāro kāyacittaduṭṭhullabhāvūpasamanena kāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1269_1: cittañca asāraddhaṃ katvā paṭiladdhāya anavajjasukhādhiṭṭhāya kāyacittapassaddhivasena cittaṃ lahuṃ muduṃ
atk-s0503a:1269_2: kammaññañca katvā sammā ṭhapento samādahanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ paribrūheti matthakañca pāpeti,
atk-s0503a:1269_3: taṃ eva kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa ādimajjhapariyosānesu bahūpakāraṃ satiṃ bhikkhu adhiṭṭhahāno sīlavisodhanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1269_4: ādiṃ katvā yāva visesādhigamā tattha tattha adhiṭṭhahantoti attho.
atk-s0503a:1269_5: Labhetha pubbāpariyaṃ visesanti so evaṃ satiārakkhena cetasā kammaṭṭhānaṃ uparūpari vaḍḍhento brūhento
atk-s0503a:1269_6: phātiṃ karonto pubbāpariyaṃ pubbāpariyavantaṃ pubbāparabhāgena pavattaṃ uḷāruḷāratarādibhedavisesaṃ labheyya.
atk-s0503a:1270_0: Tattha duvidho pubbāpariyaviseso samathavasena vipassanāvasena cāti.
atk-s0503a:1270_1: Tesu samathavasena tāva nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavasībhāvo,
atk-s0503a:1271_0: Laddhāna pubbāpariyaṃ visesanti pubbāpariyavisesaṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ arahattaṃ labhitvā.
atk-s0503a:1271_1: Adassanaṃ maccurājassa gaccheti jīvitupacchedavasena sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ abhibhavanato maccurājasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0503a:1271_2: maraṇassa visayabhūtaṃ bhavattayaṃ samatikkantattā adassanaṃ agocaraṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0503a:1276_4: Bhagavā hi veḷuvagāmake vassaṃ vasitvā tato nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavane vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:1276_5: Tasmiṃ kāle dhammasenāpati attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ oloketvā “sattāhameva pavattissatī”ti ñatvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1276_6: anujānāpetvā nāḷakagāmaṃ gantvā tattha mātaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0503a:1276_7: Satthā cundena ābhatā tassa dhātuyo gahetvā dhātucetiyaṃ kārāpetvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1276_9: Bhagavā tassapi dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā rājagahato nikkhamitvā anupubbena ukkācelaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1276_10: Tattha gaṅgātīre bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā aggasāvakānaṃ parinibbānappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā ukkācelato nikkhamitvā vesāliṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1276_11: Evaṃ gato bhagavā “pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:1277_1: Cāpālaṃ cetiyanti pubbe cāpālassa nāma yakkhassa vasitaṭṭhānaṃ “cāpālacetiya”nti paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:1277_2: Tattha bhagavato katavihāropi tāya ruḷhiyā “cāpālacetiya”nti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:1277_4: Sattambanti kikissa kira kāsirañño dhītaro satta kumāriyo saṃvegajātā rājagehato nikkhamitvā yattha padhānaṃ padahiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1277_7: tasmiṃ adhivatthaṃ devataṃ bahū manussā putte patthenti,
atk-s0503a:1277_10: Iti sabbāneva tāni buddhuppādato pubbe devatāpariggahitattā cetiyavohārena voharitāni,
atk-s0503a:1277_11: bhagavato vihāre katepi ca tatheva paññāyanti.
atk-s0503a:1277_12: Ramaṇīyāti ettha vesāliyā tāva bhūmibhāgasampattiyā puggalasampattiyā sulabhapaccayatāya ca ramaṇīyabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1277_13: Vihārānaṃ pana nagarato nātidūratāya nāccāsannatāya gamanāgamanasampattiyā anākiṇṇavihāraṭṭhānatāya chāyūdakasampattiyā
atk-s0503a:1277_15: Cattāro iddhipādāti ettha iddhipādapadassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0503a:1278_0: Evaṃ aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1278_3: Tiṭṭheyyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1278_5: Kappāvasesaṃ vāti “appaṃ vā bhiyyo vā”ti vuttaṃ vassasatato atirekaṃ vā.
atk-s0503a:1278_8: Yatheva hi veḷuvagāmake uppannaṃ māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ dasa māse vikkhambhesi,
atk-s0503a:1278_9: evaṃ punappunaṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vikkhambhento imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1278_12: buddhā ca pana khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ appatvā pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva parinibbāyanti.
atk-s0503a:1278_13: Buddhānubuddhesu aggasāvakamahāsāvakesu parinibbutesu aparivārena ekakeneva ṭhātabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1278_17: Evaṃ vuttepi so pana na ruccati,
atk-s0503a:1279_2: “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya yadidaṃ “yassa kassaci, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:1279_3: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvibhāvanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1279_5: Pākaṭañcetaṃ vacanaṃ pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1280_6: Bhagavato hi dhammacakkappavattanasuttadesanāya aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo dhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1280_7: Evaṃ yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā dhammapaṭividdhasattānaṃ gaṇanā natthi,
atk-s0503a:1280_8: mahāsamayasuttaṃ maṅgalasuttaṃ cūḷarāhulovādasuttaṃ samacittasuttanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ suttānaṃ desanākāle abhisamayappattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi,
atk-s0503a:1280_9: etassa aparimāṇassa sattalokassa anukampāya bhagavato ṭhānaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1280_12: avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhagavato ṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1280_13: Sahetukapaṭisandhike pana maggaphalasacchikiriyāya bhabbapuggale dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1280_14: tasmā aññesampi atthatthāya hitatthāya sukhatthāya bhagavā tiṭṭhatūti attho.
atk-s0503a:1281_0: Yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittoti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1281_1: yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-s0503a:1281_3: Māro hi yassa keci vipallāsā appahīnā,
atk-s0503a:1281_5: Yassa pana sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā,
atk-s0503a:1281_9: So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ karotīti?
atk-s0503a:1281_12: tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā vivaṭamukhā honti.
atk-s0503a:1281_13: Tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati,
atk-s0503a:1281_15: Therassa panesa mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0503a:1281_17: Taṃ disvā thero nimittobhāsaṃ na paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0503a:1281_22: Passati hi bhagavā “ayaṃ mayi ativiya siniddhahadayo,
atk-s0503a:1281_23: so parato bhūmicālakāraṇañca āyusaṅkhārossajjanañca sutvā mama ciraṭṭhānaṃ yācissati,
atk-s0503a:1281_24: athāhaṃ ‘kissa tvaṃ puretaraṃ na yācasī’ti tasseva sīse dosaṃ pātessāmi,
atk-s0503a:1281_25: sattā ca attano aparādhena na tathā vihaññanti,
atk-s0503a:1282_1: ānandāti yasmā divāvihāratthāya idhāgato, tasmā, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:1283_0: Māro pāpimāti ettha satte anatthe niyojento māretīti māro.
atk-s0503a:1283_3: Bhāsitā kho panesāti ayañhi bhagavati bodhimaṇḍe satta sattāhe atikkamitvā ajapālanigrodhe viharante
atk-s0503a:1283_4: attano dhītāsu āgantvā icchāvighātaṃ patvā gatāsu ayaṃ “attheso upāyo”ti cintento āgantvā “bhagavā yadatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1283_8: kiṃ te lokavicaraṇenā”ti vatvā yathā ajja evameva “parinibbātu dāni,
atk-s0503a:1284_2: Visāradāti sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādīnaṃ pahānena visāradabhāvaṃ pattā.
atk-s0503a:1284_5: Atha vā bahussutāti pariyattibahussutā ceva paṭivedhabahussutā ca.
atk-s0503a:1284_6: Dhammadharāti pariyattidhammānaṃ ceva paṭivedhadhammānañca dhāraṇato dhammadharāti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1284_9: Anudhammacārinoti sallekhikaṃ tassā paṭipadāya anurūpaṃ appicchatādidhammaṃ caraṇasīlā.
atk-s0503a:1284_20: Uttānīkarissantīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti.
atk-s0503a:1285_0: Ettha ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni,
atk-s0503a:1285_1: ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadānīti.
atk-s0503a:1285_2: Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1286_3: Vitthārikanti vitthataṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge patiṭṭhahanavasena.
atk-s0503a:1286_6: Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti yattakā viññujātikā devā manussā ca atthi,
atk-s0503a:1287_5: mā mayhaṃ parinibbānatthāya vāyāmaṃ karohī”ti vadati.
atk-s0503a:1287_6: Sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissaji pajahi.
atk-s0503a:1287_7: Tattha na bhagavā hatthena leḍḍuṃ viya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji,
atk-s0503a:1287_8: temāsamattameva pana samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato paraṃ na samāpajjissāmīti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0503a:1288_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā kappaṃ vā kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhātuṃ samattho tattakaṃ kālaṃ aṭṭhatvā parinibbāyituṃ mārassa yācanāya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji?
atk-s0503a:1288_1: Na bhagavā mārassa yācanāya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji,
atk-s0503a:1288_3: temāsato pana paraṃ buddhaveneyyānaṃ abhāvato āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji.
atk-s0503a:1288_4: Ṭhānañhi nāma buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ yāvadeva veneyyavinayanatthaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1288_5: te asati vineyyajane kena nāma kāraṇena ṭhassanti.
atk-s0503a:1288_11: Evaṃ mahānubhāvā buddhā bhagavantoyeva tiṭṭhantāpi attano ruciyāva tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0503a:1290_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ saṅkhāravisaṅkhārānaṃ visesasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1290_1: Imaṃ udānanti anavasesasaṅkhāre vissajjetvā attano visaṅkhāragamanadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1290_3: Koci nāma vadeyya “mārena pacchato pacchato anubandhitvā ‘parinibbātu,
atk-s0503a:1290_4: bhante’ti upadduto bhayena bhagavā āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1290_6: bhītassa udānaṃ nāma natthī”ti etassa dīpanatthaṃ pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1290_7: Tato temāsamatteneva ca pana buddhakiccassa nipphajjanato evaṃ dīgharattaṃ mayā parihaṭoyaṃ dukkhabhāro
atk-s0503a:1290_8: na cirasseva nikkhipiyatīti passato parinibbānaguṇapaccavekkhaṇe tassa uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajji,
atk-s0503a:1290_10: Ekantena hi visaṅkhāraninno nibbānajjhāsayo satthā mahākaruṇāya balakkārena viya sattahitatthaṃ loke suciraṃ ṭhito.
atk-s0503a:1290_11: Tathā hi devasikaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo vaḷañjeti,
atk-s0503a:1290_12: sodāni mahākaruṇādhikārassa nipphannattā nibbānābhimukho anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi.
atk-s0503a:1290_13: Teneva hi bhagavato kilesaparinibbānadivase viya khandhaparinibbānadivasepi sarīrābhā visesato vippasannā parisuddhā pabhassarā ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1291_0: Gāthāya soṇasiṅgālādīnampi paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1291_3: tulaṃ vā sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyakammaṃ natthīti atulaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1291_19: bhavābhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji,
atk-s0503a:1291_20: saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato samāhito hutvā abhindī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1292_4: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulento buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1292_5: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhārakammaṃ “kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti
atk-s0503a:1292_10: samathavasena samāhitoti evaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya samathavipassanābalena kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1292_11: attani sambhavattā “attasambhava”nti laddhanāmaṃ sabbaṃ kilesajālaṃ abhindi,
atk-s0503a:1292_12: kilesābhāveneva kammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ kilesappahānena kammaṃ pajahi.
atk-s0503a:1292_13: Iti bodhimūleyeva avassaṭṭhabhavasaṅkhāro bhagavā vekhamissakena viya jarasakaṭaṃ samāpattivekhamissakena
atk-s0503a:1292_14: attabhāvaṃ yāpentopi “ito temāsato uddhaṃ samāpattivekhamassa na dassāmī”ti cittuppādanena āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti.
atk-s0503a:1295_3: So kira pāsādo lohapāsādo viya samantā catudvārakoṭṭhakaparivuto pākāraparikkhitto.
atk-s0503a:1295_4: Tesu pācīnadvārakoṭṭhakassa bahi pāsādacchāyāyaṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1295_7: Ekasāṭakāti ekasāṭakanigaṇṭhā viya ekaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ hatthe bandhitvā tenāpi sarīrassa purimabhāgaṃ paṭicchādetvā vicaraṇakā.
atk-s0503a:1295_11: Avidūre atikkamantīti vihārassa avidūramaggena nagaraṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0503a:1296_4: Kasmā pana rājā loke aggapuggalassa santike nisinno evarūpānaṃ nagganissirīkānaṃ añjaliṃ paggaṇhātīti?
atk-s0503a:1296_6: Evañhissa ahosi “sacāhaṃ ettakampi etesaṃ na karissāmi,
atk-s0503a:1296_7: mayaṃ puttadāraṃ pahāya etassatthāya dubbhojanadukkhaseyyādīni anubhoma,
atk-s0503a:1296_9: Tasmiñhi kate amhe ‘ocarakā’ti jano aggahetvā ‘pabbajitā’icceva sañjānissati,
atk-s0503a:1296_10: kiṃ imassa bhūtatthakathanenāti attanā diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ paṭicchādetvā na katheyyuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1296_13: Rājā kira bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantopi katipayakālaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ na saddahi.
atk-s0503a:1296_14: Tenassa evaṃ ahosi “yadi bhagavā sabbaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0503a:1296_15: mayā imesaṃ nipaccakāraṃ katvā ‘ime arahanto’ti vutte nānujāneyya,
atk-s0503a:1296_18: Evaṃ so satthu ajjhāsayajānanatthaṃ tathā akāsi.
atk-s0503a:1296_19: Bhagavā pana “ujukameva ‘na ime samaṇā ocarakā’ti vutte yadipi rājā saddahati,
atk-s0503a:1296_20: mahājano pana tamatthaṃ ajānanto na saddaheyya,
atk-s0503a:1296_21: samaṇo gotamo ‘rājā attano kathaṃ suṇātī’ti yaṃ kiñci mukhāruḷhaṃ kathetī’ti vadeyya,
atk-s0503a:1296_23: añño ca guḷhakammaṃ vivaṭaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0503a:1296_24: sayameva rājā tesaṃ ocarakabhāvaṃ kathessatī”ti ñatvā “dujjānaṃ kho eta”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1297_4: puttadāresu uppilāvitena tesaṃ gharāvāsādihetu sokābhibhavena cittassa saṃkiliṭṭhataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1298_1: Sīlaṃ veditabbanti “ayaṃ pesalo vā dussīlo vā”ti saṃvasantena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne saha vasantena jānitabbo.
atk-s0503a:1298_2: Tañca kho dīghena addhunā na ittaranti tañca sīlaṃ dīghena kālena veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1298_4: Katipayadivase hi saññatākāro saṃvutindriyākāro ca hutvā sakkā dassetuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1298_5: Manasi karotā no amanasi karotāti tampi “sīlamassa pariggaṇhissāmī”ti manasi karontena paccavekkhantena sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-s0503a:1298_8: Bālo hi manasi karontopi jānituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:1300_0: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1301_5: Ekaccassa hi sammukhākathā parammukhākathāya na sameti,
atk-s0503a:1301_9: So kathentoyeva sakkā jānituṃ “asuci eso puggalo”ti.
atk-s0503a:1301_14: tasmā kathentena sakkā sucibhāvo jānitunti pakāsento āha –
atk-s0503a:1302_2: so uppannesu upaddavesu gahetabbagahaṇaṃ kattabbakaraṇaṃ apassanto advārikaṃ gharaṃ paviṭṭho viya carati. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1302_6: Duppaññassa hi kathā udake geṇḍu viya uplavati,
atk-s0503a:1302_8: Udakavipphandaneneva hi maccho khuddako mahanto vāti paññāyati.
atk-s0503a:1303_0: Iti bhagavā rañño ujukameva te “ime nāmā”ti avatvā arahantānaṃ anarahantānañca jānanūpāyaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0503a:1303_1: Rājā taṃ sutvā bhagavato sabbaññutāya desanāvilāsena ca abhippasanno “acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1303_2: bhante”tiādinā attano pasādaṃ pakāsetvā idāni te yāthāvato bhagavato ārocento “ete, bhante,
atk-s0503a:1303_4: Tattha carāti apabbajitā eva pabbajitarūpena raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantā paṭicchannakammantattā.
atk-s0503a:1303_6: Carā hi pabbatamatthakena carantāpi heṭṭhā carakāva nihīnakammattā.
atk-s0503a:1303_9: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dese taṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1303_16: kāmabandhanehi vā samappitāti suṭṭhu appitā allīnā.
atk-s0503a:1303_18: Paricāressantīti indriyāni samantato cāressanti kīḷāpessanti vā.
atk-s0503a:1304_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ rājapurisānaṃ attano udarassa kāraṇā pabbajitavesena lokavañcanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1305_0: Tattha na vāyameyya sabbatthāti dūteyyaocarakakammādike sabbasmiṃ pāpadhamme ime rājapurisā viya pabbajito na vāyameyya,
atk-s0503a:1305_2: sabbattha yattha katthaci vāyāmaṃ akatvā appamattakepi puññasmiṃyeva vāyameyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1305_3: Nāññassa puriso siyāti pabbajitarūpena aññassa puggalassa sevakapuriso na siyā. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1305_5: Nāññaṃ nissāya jīveyyāti aññaṃ paraṃ issarādiṃ nissāya “tappaṭibaddhaṃ me sukhadukkha”nti evaṃcitto hutvā na jīvikaṃ pavatteyya,
atk-s0503a:1305_7: Atha vā anatthāvahato “ocaraṇa”nti laddhanāmakattā aññaṃ akusalakammaṃ nissāya na jīveyya.
atk-s0503a:1305_8: Dhammena na vaṇiṃ careti dhanādiatthāya dhammaṃ na katheyya.
atk-s0503a:1305_9: Yo hi dhanādihetu paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0503a:1305_12: Atha vā dhanādīnaṃ atthāya kosalarañño puriso viya ocarakādikammaṃ karonto parehi anāsaṅkanīyatāya pabbajjāliṅgasamādānādīni
atk-s0503a:1305_14: Yopi idha parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantopi aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati,
atk-s0503a:1308_1: Tatiye attano aneke pāpake akusale dhamme pahīneti lobhadosamohaviparītamanasikāraahirikānottappakodhūpanāhamakkhapalāsaissāmacchariyamāyā-
atk-s0503a:1308_7: diyaḍḍhasahassakilese taṃsahagate cāpi aneke pāpake lāmake akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusale dhamme anavasesaṃ
atk-s0503a:1308_8: saha vāsanāya bodhimūleyeva pahīne ariyamaggena samucchinne paccavekkhamāno “ayampi me kileso pahīno,
atk-s0503a:1308_9: ayampi me kileso pahīno”ti anupadapaccavekkhaṇāya paccavekkhamāno bhagavā nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1309_0: Aneke ca kusale dhammeti sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0503a:1309_71: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādike aneke attano kusale
atk-s0503a:1309_72: anavajjadhamme anantakālaṃ pāramiparibhāvanāya maggabhāvanāya ca pāripūriṃ vuddhiṃ gate “imepi anavajjadhammā
atk-s0503a:1309_74: imepi anavajjadhammā mayi saṃvijjantī”ti rucivasena manasikārābhimukhe buddhaguṇe vaggavagge puñjapuñje katvā paccavekkhamāno nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1309_77: Sabbe buddhaguṇe bhagavatāpi anupadaṃ anavasesato manasi kātuṃ na sakkā anantāparimeyyabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1318_0: Tadā hi bhagavā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā gandhakuṭippamukhe ṭhatvā bhikkhūsu
atk-s0503a:1318_1: vattaṃ dassetvā gatesu mahāgandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno attano atītajātivisayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1318_3: Athassa tāni nirantaraṃ poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ anantāparimāṇappabhedā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1318_4: So “evaṃ mahantassa nāma dukkhakkhandhassa mūlabhūtā ime kilesā”ti kilesavisayaṃ ñāṇācāraṃ pesetvā te
atk-s0503a:1318_5: pahānamukhena anupadaṃ paccavekkhitvā “ime vata kilesā anavasesato mayhaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnā”ti puna tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:1318_6: pahānakaraṃ sākāraṃ saparivāraṃ sauddesaṃ ariyamaggaṃ paccavekkhanto anantāparimāṇabhede attano sīlādianavajjadhamme
atk-s0503a:1319_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā attano aneke pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne paccavekkhamāno nisinno hoti,
atk-s0503a:1319_1: aneke ca kusale dhamme bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gate”ti.
atk-s0503a:1320_0: Evaṃ paccavekkhitvā uppannapītisomanassuddesabhūtaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1321_0: Tattha ahu pubbeti arahattamaggañāṇuppattito pubbe sabbopi cāyaṃ rāgādiko kilesagaṇo mayhaṃ santāne ahu āsi,
atk-s0503a:1321_1: na imasmiṃ kilesagaṇe kocipi kileso nāhosi.
atk-s0503a:1321_2: Tadā nāhūti tadā tasmiṃ kāle ariyamaggakkhaṇe so kilesagaṇo na ahu na āsi,
atk-s0503a:1321_3: tattha aṇumattopi kileso aggamaggakkhaṇe appahīno nāma natthi.
atk-s0503a:1321_6: Nāhu pubbeti yo cāyaṃ mama aparimāṇo anavajjadhammo etarahi bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gato upalabbhati,
atk-s0503a:1321_7: sopi ariyamaggakkhaṇato pubbe na ahu na āsi.
atk-s0503a:1321_8: Tadā ahūti yadā pana me aggamaggañāṇaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1321_10: Aggamaggādhigamena hi saddhiṃ sabbepi sabbaññuguṇā buddhānaṃ hatthagatā eva honti.
atk-s0503a:1322_1: na cetarahi vijjatīti yo pana so anavajjadhammo ariyamaggo mayhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe uppanno,
atk-s0503a:1322_3: so yathā mayhaṃ maggakkhaṇato pubbe na cāhu na ca ahosi,
atk-s0503a:1322_4: evaṃ attanā pahātabbakilesābhāvato te kilesā viya ayampi na ca bhavissati anāgate na uppajjissati,
atk-s0503a:1322_5: etarahi paccuppannakālepi na vijjati na upalabbhati attanā kattabbakiccābhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1323_0: Iti bhagavā ariyamaggena attano santāne anavasesaṃ pahīne akusale dhamme bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gate aparimāṇe
atk-s0503a:1323_1: anavajjadhamme ca paccavekkhamāno attupanāyikapītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1326_1: Catutthe nānātitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakāti ettha taranti etena saṃsāroghanti titthaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1326_3: Idha pana viparītavipallāsavasena diṭṭhigatikehi tathā gahitadiṭṭhidassanaṃ “tittha”nti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1326_5: nagganigaṇṭhādisamaṇā ceva kaṭhakalāpādibrāhmaṇā ca pokkharasātādiparibbājakā ca samaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakā.
atk-s0503a:1326_6: Nānātitthiyā ca te samaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakā cāti nānātitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakā.
atk-s0503a:1327_0: “Sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādinā passanti etāya,
atk-s0503a:1327_4: Sassatādivasena nānā anekavidhā diṭṭhiyo etesanti nānādiṭṭhikā.
atk-s0503a:1327_7: atthato “sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādinā pavatto cittavipallāso saññāvipallāso ca.
atk-s0503a:1327_10: Diṭṭhigatikā hi pubbabhāge tathā tathā cittaṃ rocetvā khamāpetvā ca pacchā “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti abhinivisanti.
atk-s0503a:1327_11: Atha vā “aniccaṃ nicca”ntiādinā tathā tathā dassanavasena diṭṭhi,
atk-s0503a:1327_13: ruccanavasena rucīti evaṃ tīhipi padehi diṭṭhi eva vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:1327_14: Nānādiṭṭhinissayanissitāti sassatādiparikappavasena nānāvidhaṃ diṭṭhiyā nissayaṃ vatthuṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1327_15: diṭṭhisaṅkhātameva vā nissayaṃ nissitā allīnā upagatā,
atk-s0503a:1327_17: Diṭṭhiyopi hi diṭṭhigatikānaṃ abhinivesākārānaṃ nissayā honti.
atk-s0503a:1328_4: lokena vā samaṇāti ca brāhmaṇāti ca evaṃ gahitā.
atk-s0503a:1328_5: Evaṃvādinoti evaṃ idāni vattabbākārena vadantīti evaṃvādino.
atk-s0503a:1328_6: Evaṃ idāni vattabbākārena pavattā diṭṭhi etesanti evaṃdiṭṭhino.
atk-s0503a:1328_8: paṭhamena tesaṃ yathābhinivesaṃ paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena vohāro.
atk-s0503a:1329_1: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ettha lokoti attā.
atk-s0503a:1329_2: So hi diṭṭhigatikehi lokiyanti ettha puññaṃ pāpaṃ tabbipākā,
atk-s0503a:1329_3: sayaṃ vā kārakādibhāvena abhiyuttehi lokiyatīti lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0503a:1329_4: Svāyaṃ sassato amaro nicco dhuvoti yadidaṃ amhākaṃ dassanaṃ idameva saccaṃ aviparītaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1329_5: aññaṃ pana asassatotiādi paresaṃ dassanaṃ moghaṃ micchāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1329_9: “Asassato”ti sassatabhāvappaṭikkhepeneva ucchedo dīpitoti sattapi ucchedavādā dīpitā honti.
atk-s0503a:1330_2: Etena sarīraparimāṇo aṅguṭṭhaparimāṇo avayavaparimāṇo paramāṇuparimāṇo attāti evamādivādā dassitā honti.
atk-s0503a:1331_0: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti yaṃ sarīraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1331_3: tadeva sarīranti jīvañca sarīrañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0503a:1331_4: Etena ājīvakānaṃ viya “rūpī attā”ti ayaṃ vādo dassito hoti.
atk-s0503a:1331_5: Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti iminā pana “arūpī attā”ti ayaṃ vādo dassito.
atk-s0503a:1332_0: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti ettha tathāgatoti satto.
atk-s0503a:1332_2: niccadhuvādisaṅkhātaṃ vā tathābhāvaṃ gatoti tathāgatoti voharati,
atk-s0503a:1332_3: so maraṇato idhakāyassa bhedato paraṃ uddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1332_5: Etena sassataggāhamukhena soḷasa saññīvādā aṭṭha asaññīvādā aṭṭha ca nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā dassitā honti.
atk-s0503a:1332_8: Hoti ca na ca hotīti atthi ca natthi cāti.
atk-s0503a:1332_9: Etena ekaccasassatavādā satta saññīvādā ca dassitā.
atk-s0503a:1332_10: Neva hoti na na hotīti iminā pana amarāvikkhepavādo dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1333_0: Ime kira diṭṭhigatikā nānādesato āgantvā sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasantā ekadā samayappavādake sannipatitvā attano
atk-s0503a:1333_1: attano vādaṃ paggayha aññavāde khuṃsentā vivādāpannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1334_7: Phalūpacārena viya hi kāraṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena phalampi vohariyati yathā taṃ “sukho buddhuppādo,
atk-s0503a:1334_10: Ediso dhammoti dhammo aviparītasabhāvo ediso evarūpo,
atk-s0503a:1334_15: So ca titthiyānaṃ vivādo sakalanagare pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0503a:1334_16: Atha bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhā taṃ sutvā “atthi no idaṃ kathāpābhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:1334_17: yaṃ nūna mayaṃ imaṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato āroceyyāma,
atk-s0503a:1334_18: appeva nāma taṃ nissāya satthu saṇhasukhumaṃ dhammadesanaṃ labheyyāmā”ti te pacchābhattaṃ dhammadesanākāle bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1335_0: Taṃ sutvā bhagavā aññatitthiyānaṃ dhammassa ayathābhūtapajānanaṃ pakāsento “aññatitthiyā,
atk-s0503a:1335_6: Tattha atthaṃ na jānantīti idhalokatthaṃ paralokatthaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0503a:1335_11: Anatthaṃ na jānantīti yadaggena te atthaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0503a:1335_15: Te hi vipariyesaggāhitāya dhammaṃ kusalampi akusalaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1335_19: Tathā hi te kammampi vipākaṃ katvā voharanti,
atk-s0503a:1336_0: Iti bhagavā titthiyānaṃ mohadiṭṭhipaṭilābhabhāvena paññācakkhuvekallato andhabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni tamatthaṃ jaccandhūpamāya pakāsetuṃ “bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1336_4: Aññataro rājā ahosīti purātano nāmagottehi loke apākaṭo eko rājā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1336_5: So rājā aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesīti tassa kira rañño sobhaggappattaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ attano opavayhaṃ hatthiṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0503a:1336_8: Tena ca samayena eko jaccandho rājaṅgaṇena gacchati.
atk-s0503a:1336_10: “mahājāniyā kho ime andhā ye evarūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ na labhanti daṭṭhuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1336_11: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imissā sāvatthiyā yattakā jaccandhā sabbe te sannipātāpetvā ekadesaṃ ekadesaṃ hatthena phusāpetvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ suṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0503a:1336_12: Keḷisīlo rājā ekena purisena sāvatthiyā sabbe jaccandhe sannipātāpetvā tassa purisassa saññaṃ adāsi “yathā
atk-s0503a:1336_13: ekeko jaccandho sīsādikaṃ ekekaṃyeva hatthissa aṅgaṃ phusitvā ‘hatthī mayā diṭṭho’ti saññaṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0503a:1336_16: Atha rājā te jaccandhe paccekaṃ pucchi “kīdiso, bhaṇe,
atk-s0503a:1336_18: Te attanā diṭṭhadiṭṭhāvayavameva hatthiṃ katvā vadantā “ediso hatthī,
atk-s0503a:1336_19: nediso hatthī”ti aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ karontā hatthādīhi upakkamitvā rājaṅgaṇe mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1336_20: Rājā saparijano tesaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā phāsukehi bhijjamānehi hadayena uggatena mahāhasitaṃ hasi.
atk-s0503a:1337_6: Hatthiṃ dassehīti yathāvuttaṃ hatthiṃ sayāpetvā dassehi.
atk-s0503a:1337_8: Diṭṭho no hatthīti hatthena parāmasanaṃ dassanaṃ katvā āhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1337_9: Tena purisena sīsaṃ parāmasāpetvā “ediso hatthī”ti saññāpitattā tādisaṃyeva naṃ hatthiṃ sañjānantā jaccandhā
atk-s0503a:1337_23: Attamano ahosīti keḷisīlattā so rājā tena jaccandhānaṃ kalahena attamano pahāsena gahitamano ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1338_3: yathā te jaccandhā acakkhukā ekaṅgadassino anavasesato hatthiṃ apassitvā attanā diṭṭhāvayavamattaṃ hatthisaññāya
atk-s0503a:1338_4: itarehi diṭṭhaṃ ananujānantā aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ āpannā kalahaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1338_5: evameva ime aññatitthiyā sakkāyassa ekadesaṃ rūpavedanādiṃ attano diṭṭhidassanena yathādiṭṭhaṃ “attā”ti
atk-s0503a:1338_6: maññamānā tassa sassatādibhāvaṃ āropetvā “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti abhinivisitvā aññamaññaṃ vivadanti,
atk-s0503a:1338_7: yathābhūtaṃ pana atthānatthaṃ dhammādhammañca na jānanti.
atk-s0503a:1339_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ titthiyānaṃ dhammasabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ jaccandhānaṃ viya hatthimhi yathādassanaṃ micchābhinivesaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1339_1: tattha ca vivādāpattiṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1340_2: jātimattena brāhmaṇā “sassato loko”tiādinayappavattesu imesu eva asāresu diṭṭhigatesu diṭṭhābhinandanavasena,
atk-s0503a:1340_3: imesu vā rūpādīsu upādānakkhandhesu evaṃ aniccesu dukkhesu vipariṇāmadhammesu taṇhābhinandanadiṭṭhābhinandanānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1340_9: atha kho viggayha naṃ vivadanti “na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsi,
atk-s0503a:1340_10: ahaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāmī”tiādinā viggāhikakathānuyogavasena viggayha vivadanti vivādaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0503a:1340_12: Atha vā viggayha nanti naṃ diṭṭhinissayaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhimeva vā viparītadassanattā sassatādivasena aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0503a:1340_14: attano eva vādaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ aviparītaṃ katvā abhinivissa voharanti.
atk-s0503a:1340_16: Janā ekaṅgadassino yatheva jaccandhajanā hatthissa ekekaṅgadassino “yaṃ yaṃ attanā phusitvā ñātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1340_17: taṃ tadeva hatthī”ti gahetvā aññamaññaṃ viggayha vivadiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1343_1: Pañcame sassato attā ca loko cāti rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā taṃ sassataṃ niccanti aññepi ca tathā gāhentā voharanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:1344_0: “Rūpaṃ attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapenti. Vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0503a:1344_1: viññāṇaṃ attā ca loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1345_5: Attāti vā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu eko khandho,
atk-s0503a:1345_9: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ attāti ca lokoti ca yathādassanaṃ dvidhā gahetvā tadubhayaṃ “nicco dhuvo sassato”ti abhinivissa voharanti.
atk-s0503a:1345_12: Sassato ca asassato cāti ekacco attā ca loko ca sassato,
atk-s0503a:1345_13: ekacco asassatoti evaṃ sassato ca asassato cāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1345_14: Atha vā sveva attā ca loko ca attagatidiṭṭhikānaṃ viya sassato ca asassato ca,
atk-s0503a:1345_17: Neva sassato nāsassatoti iminā amarāvikkhepavādo dassito.
atk-s0503a:1345_18: Te hi sassatavāde asassatavāde ca dosaṃ disvā “neva sassato nāsassato attā ca loko cā”ti vikkhepaṃ karontā vivadanti.
atk-s0503a:1346_1: Yathā hi tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā ca attano dhammānudhammaṃ katvā sukhadukkhāni paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-s0503a:1346_2: evaṃ attāva attānaṃ tassa ca upabhogabhūtaṃ kiñcanaṃ palibodhasaṅkhātaṃ lokañca karoti,
atk-s0503a:1346_3: abhinimminātīti attaladdhi viya ayampi tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-s0503a:1346_5: attato parena issarena vā purisena vā pajāpatinā vā kālena vā pakatiyā vā attā ca loko ca kato,
atk-s0503a:1346_7: Sayaṃkato ca paraṃkato cāti yasmā attānañca lokañca nimminantā issarādayo na kevalaṃ sayameva nimminanti,
atk-s0503a:1346_8: atha kho tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ dhammādhammānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ labhitvāva,
atk-s0503a:1346_9: tasmā sayaṃkato ca paraṃkato ca attā ca loko cāti ekaccānaṃ laddhi.
atk-s0503a:1346_10: Asayaṃkāro aparaṃkāroti natthi etassa sayaṃkāroti asayaṃkāro,
atk-s0503a:1346_13: Ayaṃ ubhayattha dosaṃ disvā ubhayaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0503a:1346_15: adhiccasamuppannoti yadicchāya samuppanno kenaci kāraṇena vinā uppannoti adhiccasamuppannavādo dassito.
atk-s0503a:1347_0: Idāni ye diṭṭhigatikā attānaṃ viya sukhadukkhampi tassa guṇabhūtaṃ kiñcanabhūtaṃ vā sassatādivasena abhinivissa voharanti,
atk-s0503a:1347_1: tesaṃ taṃ vādaṃ dassetuṃ “santeke samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1348_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti ettha pana idha jaccandhūpamāya anāgatattā taṃ hitvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho yojetabbo,
atk-s0503a:1349_3: evaṃ diṭṭhigatesu diṭṭhinissayesu āsajjamānā diṭṭhigatikā kāmoghādīnaṃ catunnaṃ oghānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1349_4: saṃsāramahoghasseva vā antarāva vemajjhe eva yaṃ tesaṃ pārabhāvena patiṭṭhaṭṭhena vā ogadhasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1349_5: nibbānaṃ tadadhigamūpāyo vā ariyamaggo taṃ appatvāva anadhigantvāva visīdanti saṃsīdanti.
atk-s0503a:1352_2: Imaṃ udānanti ettha pana diṭṭhitaṇhāmānesu dosaṃ disvā te dūrato vajjetvā saṅkhāre yathābhūtaṃ passato
atk-s0503a:1352_3: ca tattha anādīnavadassitāya micchābhiniviṭṭhassa yathābhūtaṃ apassato ca yathākkamaṃ saṃsārato ativattanānativattanadīpakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1353_0: Tattha ahaṅkārapasutāyaṃ pajāti “sayaṃkato attā ca loko cā”ti evaṃ vuttasayaṃkārasaṅkhātaṃ ahaṅkāraṃ
atk-s0503a:1353_1: tathāpavattaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pasutā anuyuttā ayaṃ pajā micchābhiniviṭṭho sattakāyo.
atk-s0503a:1353_2: Paraṃkārūpasaṃhitāti paro añño issarādiko sabbaṃ karotīti evaṃ pavattaparaṃkāradiṭṭhisannissitā tāya upasaṃhitāti paraṃkārūpasaṃhitā.
atk-s0503a:1353_3: Etadeke nābbhaññaṃsūti etaṃ diṭṭhidvayaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā tattha dosadassino hutvā nānujāniṃsu. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0503a:1353_4: Sati hi sayaṃkāre kāmakārato sattānaṃ iṭṭheneva bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1353_6: Na hi koci attano dukkhaṃ icchati,
atk-s0503a:1353_10: svāyaṃ issaro attatthaṃ vā kareyya paratthaṃ vā.
atk-s0503a:1353_13: Atha vā paratthaṃ sabbesaṃ hitasukhameva nipphajjeyya,
atk-s0503a:1353_16: Yadi ca issarasaṅkhātaṃ aññanirapekkhaṃ niccamekakāraṇaṃ pavattiyā siyā,
atk-s0503a:1353_22: Yathā ca issarahetuko paraṃkāro na sijjhati,
atk-s0503a:1353_23: evaṃ pajāpatipurisapakatibrahmakālādihetutopi na sijjhateva tesampi asiddhattā vuttadosānativattanato ca.
atk-s0503a:1353_25: Ye pana yathāvutte sayaṃkāraparaṃkāre nānujānantāpi adhiccasamuppannaṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti,
atk-s0503a:1353_26: tepi na naṃ sallanti addasuṃ adhiccasamuppannantivādinopi micchābhinivesaṃ anatikkamanato yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:1353_27: ajānantānaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ tattha tattha dukkhuppādanato vijjhanaṭṭhena “salla”nti na passiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1354_0: Etañca sallaṃ paṭikacca passatoti yo pana āraddhavipassako pañcapi upādānakkhandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato samanupassati,
atk-s0503a:1354_1: so etañca tividhaṃ viparītadassanaṃ aññañca sakalaṃ micchābhinivesaṃ tesañca nissayabhūte pañcupādānakkhandhepi
atk-s0503a:1354_2: tujjanato duruddhārato ca “salla”nti paṭikacca pubbeyeva vipassanāpaññāya passati.
atk-s0503a:1354_3: Evaṃ passato ariyamaggakkhaṇe ekanteneva ahaṃ karomīti na tassa hoti.
atk-s0503a:1354_4: Yathā ca attano kārakabhāvo tassa na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:1354_5: evaṃ paro karotīti na tassa hoti,
atk-s0503a:1354_8: Tena ca arahattappattiyā saṃsārasamatikkamo pakāsito hoti.
atk-s0503a:1355_1: na so saṃsārato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1355_3: Tattha mānupetā ayaṃ pajāti ayaṃ sabbāpi diṭṭhigatikasaṅkhātā pajā sattakāyo “mayhaṃ diṭṭhi sundarā,
atk-s0503a:1355_4: mayhaṃ ādāno sundaro”ti attano gāhassa saṃpaggahalakkhaṇena mānena upetā samannāgatā.
atk-s0503a:1355_5: Mānaganthā mānavinibaddhāti tato eva tena aparāparaṃ uppajjamānena yathā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ na paṭinissajjati,
atk-s0503a:1355_6: evaṃ attano santānassa ganthitattā vinibaddhattā ca mānaganthā mānavinibaddhā.
atk-s0503a:1355_8: saṃsāraṃ nātivattatīti “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanavasena attano diṭṭhābhinivesena
atk-s0503a:1355_9: paresaṃ diṭṭhīsu sārambhakathā virodhakathā saṃsāranāyikānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ appahānato saṃsāraṃ nātivattati,
atk-s0503a:1358_2: So hi āyasmā padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle katābhinīhāro kappasatasahassaṃ upacitapuññasambhāro imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1358_3: buddhuppāde uḷāravibhave gahapatikule uppanno bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto gharā nikkhamma
atk-s0503a:1358_4: pabbajitvā katādhikārattā ghaṭento vāyamanto na cirasseva chaḷabhiñño jāto,
atk-s0503a:1358_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti araṇavihāre bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0503a:1358_8: So ekadivasaṃ sāyanhasamayaṃ divāṭṭhānato vihāraṅgaṇaṃ otiṇṇo catuparisamajjhe bhagavantaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ
atk-s0503a:1358_9: disvā “desanāpariyosāne vuṭṭhahitvā vandissāmī”ti kālaparicchedaṃ katvā bhagavato avidūre aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1359_0: Tattha dutiyajjhānato paṭṭhāya rūpāvacarasamādhi sabbopi arūpāvacarasamādhi avitakkasamādhi eva.
atk-s0503a:1359_2: Dutiyajjhānādīhi pahīnā micchāvitakkā na tāva suppahīnā accantapahānābhāvato,
atk-s0503a:1359_3: ariyamaggena pana pahīnā eva puna pahānakiccābhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1359_4: Tasmā aggamaggapariyosānabhūto arahattaphalasamādhi sabbesaṃ micchāvitakkānaṃ pahānante uppannattā visesato “avitakkasamādhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0503a:1360_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato subhūtissa sabbamicchāvitakkasabbasaṃkilesapahānasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1360_1: sabbākārato jānitvā tadatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1361_0: Tattha yassa vitakkā vidhūpitāti yena ariyapuggalena,
atk-s0503a:1361_1: yassa vā ariyapuggalassa kāmavitakkādayo sabbepi micchāvitakkā vidhūpitā ariyamaggañāṇena santāpitā samucchinnā.
atk-s0503a:1361_2: Ajjhattaṃ suvikappitā asesāti niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte attano santāne uppajjanārahā suvikappitā suṭṭhu vikappitā asesato,
atk-s0503a:1361_4: Taṃ saṅgamaticca arūpasaññīti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1361_8: sabbampi vā kilesasaṅgaṃ aticca atikkamitvā atikkamanahetu rūpasabhāvābhāvato ruppanasaṅkhātassa ca vikārassa
atk-s0503a:1361_9: tattha abhāvato nibbikārahetubhāvato vā “arūpa”nti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattāhi maggaphalasaññāhi
atk-s0503a:1361_11: Catuyogātigatoti kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogoti cattāro yoge yathārahaṃ catūhipi maggehi atikkamitvā gato.
atk-s0503a:1361_17: Iti bhagavā āyasmato subhūtissa arahattaphalasamāpattivihāraṃ anupādisesanibbānañca ārabbha pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1364_5: Rājagahe kira ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase bahū dhuttapurisā gaṇabandhanena vicarantā ekamekassa ekamekaṃ vesiṃ ānetvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1364_6: Tato parampi dve tayo chaṇadivase taṃ taṃyeva vesiṃ ānetvā chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1364_7: Athāparasmiṃ chaṇadivase aññepi dhuttā tatheva chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmā vesiyo ānentā purimadhuttehi pubbe ānītaṃ ekaṃ vesiṃ ānenti.
atk-s0503a:1364_8: Itare taṃ disvā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ pariggaho”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1364_11: amhākaṃ pariggaho”ti kalahaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pāṇippahārādīni akaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1364_13: “tena kho pana samayena rājagahe dve pūgā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1365_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ kāmesu gedhaṃ vivādamūlaṃ sabbānatthamūlanti sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1365_1: Imaṃ udānanti antadvaye ca majjhimāya paṭipattiyā ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1366_0: Tattha yañca pattanti yaṃ rūpādipañcakāmaguṇajātaṃ pattaṃ “natthi kāmesu doso”ti diṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā
atk-s0503a:1366_1: vā apurakkhatvā vā etarahi laddhaṃ anubhuyyamānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1366_9: so bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavatī”ti diṭṭhiṃ upanissāya taṃ anissajjitvā katena kammunā anāgate pattabbaṃ anubhavitabbañca.
atk-s0503a:1366_10: Ubhayametaṃ rajānukiṇṇanti etaṃ ubhayaṃ pattaṃ pattabbañca rāgarajādīhi anukiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1366_11: Sampatte hi vatthukāme anubhavanto rāgarajena vokiṇṇo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1366_12: tattha pana saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa phale āyatiṃ āpanne domanassuppattiyā dosarajena vokiṇṇo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1366_16: tassa ca phalena dukkhāturassa ca ubhayatthāpi paṭikārābhilāsāya kilesaphale anusikkhato.
atk-s0503a:1367_0: Tathā yañca pattanti yaṃ acelakavatādivasena pattaṃ attaparitāpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1367_1: Yañca pattabbanti yaṃ micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānahetu apāyesu pattabbaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1368_0: Ye ca sikkhāsārāti yehi yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlabbatādisaṅkhātaṃ sikkhaṃ sārato gahetvā “iminā saṃsārasuddhī”ti kathitā. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1368_9: evametehi yathāvuttehi sīlādīhi saṃsārasuddhi hotīti tāni sārato gahetvā ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā sikkhāsārā
atk-s0503a:1368_11: Ayameko antoti ayaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsavasena attakilamathānuyogasaṅkhāto majjhimāya paṭipattiyā uppathabhūto lāmakaṭṭhena ca eko anto.
atk-s0503a:1368_12: Ayaṃ dutiyo antoti ayaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogo kāmesu pātabyatāpattisaṅkhāto dutiyo vuttanayena anto.
atk-s0503a:1369_0: Iccete ubho antāti kāmasukhallikānuyogo attakilamathānuyogo ca iti ete ubho antā.
atk-s0503a:1369_2: āyatiṃ pattabbe ca kilesadukkharajānukiṇṇe kāmaguṇe attaparitāpane ca allīnehi kilesadukkhāturānaṃ anusikkhantehi,
