atk-s0503a:1369_3: sayañca kilesadukkhāturehi paṭipajjitabbattā lāmakā uppathabhūtā cāti antā.
atk-s0503a:1369_4: Kaṭasivaḍḍhanāti andhaputhujjanehi abhikaṅkhitabbaṭṭhena kaṭasisaṅkhātānaṃ taṇhāavijjānaṃ abhivaḍḍhanā.
atk-s0503a:1369_5: Kaṭasiyo diṭṭhiṃ vaḍḍhentīti tā pana kaṭasiyo nānappakāradiṭṭhiṃ vaḍḍhenti.
atk-s0503a:1369_6: Vatthukāmesu assādānupassino hi te pajahituṃ asakkontassa taṇhāavijjāsahakārīkāraṇaṃ labhitvā “natthi
atk-s0503a:1369_8: attaparitāpanaṃ anuyuttassa pana avijjātaṇhāsahakārīkāraṇaṃ labhitvā “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1369_12: Keci pana “kaṭasīti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1369_13: Tesaṃ yadaggena tato antadvayato saṃsārasuddhi na hoti,
atk-s0503a:1369_15: Apare pana “kaṭasivaḍḍhanā”ti padassa “aparāparaṃ jarāmaraṇehi sivathikavaḍḍhanā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1370_0: Ete te ubho ante anabhiññāyāti te ete yathāvutte ubhopi ante ajānitvā “ime antā te ca evaṃgahitā evaṃanuṭṭhitā
atk-s0503a:1370_2: “Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā”tiādīsu viyassa hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0503a:1370_3: Olīyanti eketi eke kāmasukhānuyogavasena saṅkocaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0503a:1370_5: Kāmasukhamanuyuttā hi vīriyassa akaraṇato kosajjavasena sammāpaṭipattito saṅkocamāpannatā olīyanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:1370_6: attaparitāpanamanuyuttā pana kosajjaṃ pahāya anupāyena vīriyārambhaṃ karontā sammāpaṭipattiyā atikkamanato atidhāvanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:1370_9: “ubho ante anabhiññāya olīyanti eke atidhāvanti eke”ti.
atk-s0503a:1371_2: Gosīlādivasena hi attaparitāpanamanuyuttā ekacce “imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā,
atk-s0503a:1371_3: tattha nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassāmī”ti sassatadassanaṃ abhinivisantā saṃsāre olīyanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:1371_4: kāmasukhamanuyuttā pana ekacce yaṃkiñci katvā indriyāni santappetukāmā lokāyatikā viya tadanuguṇaṃ ucchedadassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1371_5: abhinivisantā anupāyena vaṭṭupacchedassa pariyesanato atidhāvanti nāma.
atk-s0503a:1372_0: Ye ca kho te abhiññāyāti ye ca kho pana ariyapuggalā te yathāvutte ubho ante “ime antā evaṃgahitā evaṃanuṭṭhitā
atk-s0503a:1372_1: evaṃgatikā evaṃabhisamparāyā”ti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya jānitvā majjhimapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0503a:1372_4: Tatra ca nāhesunti tatra tasmiṃ antadvaye patitā na ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1372_6: Tena ca nāmaññiṃsūti tena antadvayapahānena “mama idaṃ antadvayapahānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1372_8: iminā antadvayapahānena seyyo”tiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhimānamaññanāvasena na amaññiṃsu sabbamaññanānaṃ sammadeva pahīnattā.
atk-s0503a:1372_9: Ettha ca aggaphale ṭhite ariyapuggale sandhāya “tatra ca nāhesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1372_10: tena ca nāmaññiṃsū”ti atītakālavasena ayaṃ desanā pavattā,
atk-s0503a:1372_11: maggakkhaṇe pana adhippete vattamānakālavaseneva vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-s0503a:1372_12: Vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ natthi paññāpanāyāti ye evaṃ pahīnasabbamaññanā uttamapurisā,
atk-s0503a:1372_13: tesaṃ anupādāparinibbutānaṃ kammavipākakilesavasena tividhampi vaṭṭaṃ natthi paññāpanāya,
atk-s0503a:1372_14: vattamānakkhandhabhedato uddhaṃ anupādāno viya jātavedo apaññattikabhāvameva gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1375_4: Andhakāropi “timisā”ti na vattabbo hoti abbhamahikādiupakkilesavirahite deve.
atk-s0503a:1375_6: Ayaṃ pana amāvasī ratti devo ca meghapaṭalasañchanno.
atk-s0503a:1376_0: Nanu ca bhagavato byāmappabhā pakatiyā byāmamattappadesaṃ abhibyāpetvā candimasūriyālokaṃ abhibhavitvā
atk-s0503a:1376_1: ghanabahalaṃ buddhālokaṃ vissajjentī andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0503a:1376_2: kāyappabhāpi nīlapītādivasena chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjetvā pakatiyāva samantato asītihatthappadesaṃ obhāsentī tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0503a:1376_3: evaṃ buddhālokeneva ekobhāsabhūte bhagavato nisinnokāse padīpakaraṇe kiccaṃ natthīti?
atk-s0503a:1376_5: tathāpi puññatthikā upāsakā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjākaraṇatthaṃ devasikaṃ telappadīpaṃ upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0503a:1376_10: Pūjākaraṇatthameva hi tadāpi upāsakehi padīpā kāritā.
atk-s0503a:1377_0: Tasmiñhi divase sāvatthivāsino bahū upāsakā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gantvā uposathaṅgāni
atk-s0503a:1377_1: samādiyitvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā mahādānāni pavattetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1377_2: bhikkhusaṅghañca anugantvā nivattitvā attano attano gehāni gantvā sayampi paribhuñjitvā suddhavatthanivatthā
atk-s0503a:1377_3: suddhuttarāsaṅgā gandhamālādihatthā vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā keci manobhāvanīye bhikkhū payirupāsantā
atk-s0503a:1377_5: Te sāyanhasamaye bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā satthari dhammasabhāmaṇḍapato paṭṭhāya gandhakuṭisamīpe ajjhokāse paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinne,
atk-s0503a:1377_6: bhikkhusaṅghe ca bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsante uposathavisodhanatthañceva yonisomanasikāraparibrūhanatthañca
atk-s0503a:1377_8: Atha te bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjākaraṇatthaṃ bahū telappadīpe āropetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:1377_9: vanditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā bhikkhūnaṃ pariyante nisinnā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “bhante,
atk-s0503a:1377_10: ime titthiyā nānāvidhāni diṭṭhigatāni abhinivissa voharanti,
atk-s0503a:1377_13: ucchedādīsu aññataranti ekasmiṃyeva aṭṭhatvā navanavāni diṭṭhigatāni ‘idameva saccaṃ moghamañña’nti paggayha tiṭṭhanti ummattakasadisā,
atk-s0503a:1377_16: Tena ca samayena bahū paṭaṅgapāṇakā patantā patantā tesu telappadīpesu nipatanti.
atk-s0503a:1378_7: āpāthe padīpassa attano āpāthagamane sati paripatitvā paripatitvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1378_12: Tattha keci pāṇakā saha patanena mariṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1379_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ adhipātakapāṇakānaṃ attahitaṃ ajānantānaṃ attupakkamavasena niratthakabyasanāpattiṃ
atk-s0503a:1379_1: viditvā tesaṃ viya diṭṭhigatikānaṃ diṭṭhābhinivesena anayabyasanāpattidīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1380_0: Tattha upātidhāvanti na sāramentīti sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādibhedaṃ sāraṃ na enti,
atk-s0503a:1380_2: Tasmiṃ pana saupāye sāre tiṭṭhanteyeva vimuttābhilāsāya taṃ upentā viya hutvāpi diṭṭhivipallāsena atidhāvanti atikkamitvā gacchanti,
atk-s0503a:1380_3: pañcupādānakkhandhe “niccaṃ subhaṃ sukhaṃ attā”ti abhinivisitvā gaṇhantāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1380_4: Navaṃ navaṃ bandhanaṃ brūhayantīti tathā gaṇhantā ca taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ navaṃ navaṃ bandhanaṃ brūhayanti vaḍḍhayanti.
atk-s0503a:1380_6: diṭṭhe sute itiheke niviṭṭhāti evaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhibandhanehi baddhattā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā diṭṭhe attanā
atk-s0503a:1380_7: cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhidassaneneva vā diṭṭhe anussavūpalabbhamatteneva ca sute “itiha ekantato evameta”nti
atk-s0503a:1380_9: ekantahitaṃ vā nissaraṇaṃ ajānantā rāgādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi ādittaṃ bhavattayasaṅkhātaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃyeva ime viya adhipātakā imaṃ pajjotaṃ patanti,
atk-s0503a:1380_10: na tato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkontīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1383_4: yasmiṃ kāleti vā attho. Evametaṃ, ānandāti, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:1383_5: tathāgate uppanne tathāgatassa tathāgatasāvakānaṃyeva ca lābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1383_6: titthiyā pana nittejā vihatappabhā pahīnalābhasakkārā hontīti yaṃ tayā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1383_9: Cakkavattino hi cakkaratanassa pātubhāvena loko cakkaratanaṃ muñcitvā aññattha pūjāsakkārasammānaṃ na pavatteti,
atk-s0503a:1383_10: cakkaratanameva pana sabbo loko sabbabhāvehi sakkaroti garuṃ karoti māneti pūjeti.
atk-s0503a:1383_12: kimaṅgaṃ pana vivaṭṭānusāripuññaphalūpatthambhassa anantāparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhārassa buddharatanassa dhammaratanassa saṅgharatanassa cāti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1384_0: Bhagavā hi sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattavaradhammacakko anukkamena loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu
atk-s0503a:1384_1: saṭṭhi arahante janapadacārikāya vissajjetvā uruvelaṃ patvā uruvelakassapappamukhe sahassajaṭile arahatte
atk-s0503a:1384_2: patiṭṭhāpetvā tehi parivuto laṭṭhivanuyyāne nisīditvā bimbisārappamukhānaṃ aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ dvādasa
atk-s0503a:1384_3: nahutāni sāsane otāretvā yadā rājagahe vihāsi,
atk-s0503a:1384_4: tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca yathā yathā uparūpari uḷāralābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1384_5: tathā tathā sabbatitthiyānaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyi eva.
atk-s0503a:1385_0: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā ānando divāṭṭhāne nisinno bhagavato ca ariyasaṅghassa ca sammāpaṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0503a:1385_1: pītisomanassajāto “kathaṃ nu kho titthiyāna”nti tesaṃ paṭipattiṃ āvajjesi.
atk-s0503a:1385_3: So “evaṃmahānubhāve nāma puññūpanissayassa dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyā ca ukkaṃsapāramippatte bhagavati,
atk-s0503a:1385_4: ariyasaṅghe ca dharante kathaṃ ime aññatitthiyā evaṃ duppaṭipannā akatapuññā varākā lābhino sakkatā bhavissantī”ti
atk-s0503a:1385_5: titthiyānaṃ lābhasakkārahāniṃ nissāya kāruññaṃ uppādetvā atha attano parivitakkaṃ “yāvakīvañca,
atk-s0503a:1385_8: tayā micchā parivitakkita”nti avatvā suvaṇṇāliṅgasadisaṃ gīvaṃ unnāmetvā supupphitasatapattasassirikaṃ mahāmukhaṃ abhippasannataraṃ katvā “evametaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1385_13: Atha bhagavā tassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ atītepi mayi anuppanne ekacce nīcajanā sammānaṃ labhitvā mama uppādato
atk-s0503a:1386_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti diṭṭhigatikānaṃ tāva sakkārasammāno yāva na sammāsambuddhā loke uppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:1386_1: tesaṃ pana uppādato paṭṭhāya te hatalābhasakkārā nippabhā nittejāva honti,
atk-s0503a:1386_2: duppaṭipattiyā dukkhato ca na muccantīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1387_0: Tattha obhāsati tāva so kimīti so khajjūpanakakimi tāvadeva obhāsati jotati dibbati.
atk-s0503a:1387_1: Yāva na unnamate pabhaṅkaroti tīsupi mahādīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena “pabhaṅkaro”ti laddhanāmo sūriyo yāva na uggamati na udeti.
atk-s0503a:1387_2: Anuggate hi sūriye laddhokāsā khajjūpanakā viparivattamānāpi kaṇṭakaphalasadisā tamasi vijjotanti.
atk-s0503a:1387_4: hatappabho hoti na cāpi bhāsatīti samantato andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā kiraṇasahassena virocanasabhāvatāya
atk-s0503a:1387_5: verocananāmake ādicce uṭṭhite so khajjūpanako hatappabho nittejo kāḷako hoti,
atk-s0503a:1387_6: rattandhakāre viya na bhāsati na dibbati.
atk-s0503a:1388_0: Evaṃ obhāsitameva takkikānanti yathā tena khajjūpanakena sūriyuggamanato pureyeva obhāsitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1388_1: evaṃ takketvā vitakketvā parikappanamattena diṭṭhīnaṃ gahaṇato “takkikā”ti laddhanāmehi titthiyehi obhāsitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1388_4: Na takkikā sujjhanti na cāpi sāvakāti yadā pana sammāsambuddhā loke uppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:1388_5: tadā diṭṭhigatikā na sujjhanti na sobhanti,
atk-s0503a:1388_7: aññadatthu vihatasobhā rattikhittā viya sarā na paññāyanteva.
atk-s0503a:1388_8: Atha vā yāva sammāsambuddhā loke nuppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:1388_9: tāvadeva takkikānaṃ obhāsitaṃ attano samayena jotanaṃ bālalāpanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1388_13: Te hi durakkhātadhammavinayā sammāpaṭipattirahitā na saṃsārato sujjhanti aniyyānikasāsanattā.
atk-s0503a:1388_15: Takkikā hi ayāthāvaladdhikatāya duddiṭṭhino micchābhiniviṭṭhadiṭṭhikā viparītadassanā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ anissajjitvā saṃsāradukkhato na kadācipi muccantīti.
atk-s0503a:1393_1: Cūḷavaggassa paṭhame lakuṇḍakabhaddiyanti ettha bhaddiyoti tassa āyasmato nāmaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1393_3: So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto mahaddhano mahābhogo rūpena apāsādiko dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako.
atk-s0503a:1393_4: So ekadivasaṃ satthari jetavane viharante upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0503a:1393_5: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:1393_6: Tadā sekkhā bhikkhū yebhuyyena āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācanti,
atk-s0503a:1393_9: So tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ pūrento kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhati,
atk-s0503a:1393_18: Te disvā lakuṇḍakabhaddiyopi sekho samāno kālaṃ ñatvā attano cittakallatañca sallekhañca paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0503a:1393_19: dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro sammodamāno dhammadesanaṃ yāci.
atk-s0503a:1393_22: “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyaṃ anekapariyāyena dhammiyā kathāya sandassetī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1394_3: Dhammiyā kathāyāti pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayādipakāsaniyā dhammiyā kathāya.
atk-s0503a:1394_4: Sandassetīti tāniyeva aniccādilakkhaṇāni udayabbayādike ca sammā dasseti,
atk-s0503a:1394_6: Samādapetīti tattha lakkhaṇārammaṇikaṃ vipassanaṃ sammā ādapeti,
atk-s0503a:1394_9: Samuttejetīti vipassanāya āraddhāya saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayādīsu upaṭṭhahantesu yathākālaṃ paggahaniggahasamupekkhaṇehi
atk-s0503a:1394_10: bojjhaṅgānaṃ anupavattanena bhāvanaṃ majjhimaṃ vīthiṃ otāretvā yathā vipassanāñāṇaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati,
atk-s0503a:1394_11: evaṃ indriyānaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇena vipassanācittaṃ sammā uttejeti,
atk-s0503a:1394_13: Sampahaṃsetīti tathā pavattiyamānāya vipassanāya samappavattabhāvanāvasena ceva upariladdhabbabhāvanābalena ca cittaṃ sammā pahaṃseti,
atk-s0503a:1394_15: Anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccīti yathā yathā dhammasenāpati dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0503a:1394_16: tathā tathā tathalakkhaṇaṃ vipassantassa therassa ca desanānubhāvena,
atk-s0503a:1394_17: attano ca upanissayasampattiyā ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā desanānusārena ñāṇe anupavattante kāmāsavādīsu
atk-s0503a:1394_18: kañci āsavaṃ aggahetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyāva anavasesato cittaṃ vimucci,
atk-s0503a:1395_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyassa aññārādhanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1396_3: Vippamuttoti pubbabhāge vikkhambhanavimuttiyā aparabhāge samucchedapaṭipassaddhivimuttīhi sabbappakārena vimutto.
atk-s0503a:1396_4: Ettha ca uddhaṃ vippamuttoti etena pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanapahānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1396_9: Ubhayaggahaṇeneva tadubhayapaṭisaṃyuttattā paccuppanno addhā gahito hoti,
atk-s0503a:1396_14: anāgato atīto paccuppannoti evaṃ tiyaddhasaṅgahite sabbasmiṃ bhave vippamuttoti.
atk-s0503a:1397_1: so rūpavedanādīsu “ayaṃ nāma dhammo ahamasmī”ti diṭṭhimānamaññanāvasena evaṃ nānupassati.
atk-s0503a:1397_2: Tassa tathā dassane kāraṇaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1397_3: Atha vā ayaṃhamasmīti anānupassīti idaṃ yathāvuttāya vimuttiyā adhigamupāyadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1397_6: eso me attā”ti pavattanasabhāvāya maññanāya anadhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā “netaṃ mama,
atk-s0503a:1397_8: na me so attā”ti evaṃ uppajjamānā yā pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminī vipassanā,
atk-s0503a:1397_11: atiṇṇapubbaṃ apunabbhavāyāti evaṃ dasahi saṃyojanehi sabbākusalehi ca sabbathā vimutto arahā ariyamaggādhigamanato
atk-s0503a:1397_12: pubbe supinantepi atiṇṇapubbaṃ kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjoghoti imaṃ catubbidhaṃ oghaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1397_13: saṃsāramahoghameva vā apunabbhavāya anupādisesāya nibbānāya udatāri uttiṇṇo,
atk-s0503a:1400_8: So hi apariyositasikkhattā tadadhimuttattā ca ekantena sikkhanasīlo,
atk-s0503a:1400_9: na pariniṭṭhitasikkho asekho viya tattha paṭippassaddhussukko,
atk-s0503a:1400_10: nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto.
atk-s0503a:1400_11: Atha vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsu sikkhāsu jāto,
atk-s0503a:1400_15: Āyasmā hi lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo paṭhamasutte vuttena vidhinā paṭhamovādena yathānisinnova āsavakkhayappatto.
atk-s0503a:1400_16: Dhammasenāpati pana tassa taṃ arahattappattiṃ anāvajjanena ajānitvā “sekhoyevā”ti maññamāno appaṃ yācito
atk-s0503a:1400_17: bahuṃ dadamāno uḷārapuriso viya bhiyyo bhiyyo anekapariyāyena āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ kathetiyeva.
atk-s0503a:1400_19: kiṃ iminā ovādenā”ti acintetvā saddhammagāravena pubbe viya sakkaccaṃ suṇātiyeva.
atk-s0503a:1400_20: Taṃ disvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva buddhānubhāvena yathā dhammasenāpati tassa kilesakkhayaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0503a:1401_0: Gāthāyaṃ pana acchecchi vaṭṭanti anavasesato kilesavaṭṭaṃ samucchindi,
atk-s0503a:1401_4: Taṃ nirāsaṃ visesena agā adhigatoti byagā,
atk-s0503a:1401_5: aggamaggassa adhigatattā puna adhigamakāraṇena vinā adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0503a:1401_7: tāya pahīnāya appahīno nāma kileso natthi,
atk-s0503a:1401_8: tasmāssa taṇhāpahānaṃ savisesaṃ katvā dassento “visukkhā saritā na sandatī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1401_10: catutthasūriyapātubhāvena viya mahānadiyo catutthamaggañāṇuppādena anavasesato visukkhā visositā taṇhāsaritā nadī na sandati,
atk-s0503a:1401_16: Chinnaṃ vaṭṭaṃ na vattatīti evaṃ kilesavaṭṭasamucchedena chinnaṃ vaṭṭaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ avipākadhammatañca
atk-s0503a:1401_17: āpādanena upacchinnaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ na vattati na pavattati.
atk-s0503a:1401_18: Esevanto dukkhassāti yadetaṃ sabbaso kilesavaṭṭābhāvato kammavaṭṭassa appavattanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1401_19: so āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭassa ekaṃseneva anuppādo eva sakalassāpi saṃsāradukkhassa anto paricchedo parivaṭumabhāvoti.
atk-s0503a:1404_3: Sattāti ayonisomanasikārabahulatāya vijjamānampi ādīnavaṃ anoloketvā assādameva saritvā sajjanavasena sattā,
atk-s0503a:1404_5: Rattāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmakaraṇena chandarāgena rattā sārattā.
atk-s0503a:1404_6: Giddhāti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhijjhanena giddhā gedhaṃ āpannā.
atk-s0503a:1404_7: Gadhitāti rāgamucchitā viya dummocanīyabhāvena tattha paṭibaddhā.
atk-s0503a:1404_8: Mucchitāti kilesavasena visaññībhūtā viya anaññakiccā mucchaṃ mohaṃ āpannā.
atk-s0503a:1404_9: Ajjhopannāti anaññasādhāraṇe viya katvā gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0503a:1404_10: Sammattakajātāti kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjantā appasukhavedanāya sammattakā suṭṭhu mattakā jātā.
atk-s0503a:1404_14: Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ “kāmesū”ti vatvā punapi “kāmesū”ti vacanaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tadadhimuttidīpanatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1404_15: Tena sabbiriyāpathesu kāmaguṇasamaṅgino hutvā tadā vihariṃsūti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1405_0: Tasmiñhi samaye ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe sāvatthivāsino ussavaṃ ghosetvā yathāvibhavaṃ āpānabhūmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1405_1: sajjetvā bhuñjantā pivantā āvi ceva raho ca kāme paribhuñjantā indriyāni paricārentā kāmesu pātabyataṃ
atk-s0503a:1405_3: Bhikkhū sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantā tattha tattha gehe ārāmuyyānādīsu ca manusse ussavaṃ ghosetvā kāmaninne
atk-s0503a:1405_4: tathā paṭipajjante disvā “vihāraṃ gantvā saṇhasukhumaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmā”ti bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1406_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ āpānabhūmiramaṇīyesu mahāpariḷāhesu anekānatthānubandhesu
atk-s0503a:1406_1: ghorāsayhakaṭukaphalesu kāmesu anādīnavadassitaṃ sabbākārato viditvā kāmānañceva kilesānañca ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1407_0: Tattha kāmesu sattāti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena rattā mattā sattā visattā laggā laggitā saṃyuttā.
atk-s0503a:1407_1: Kāmasaṅgasattāti tāyeva kāmasattiyā vatthukāmesu rāgasaṅgena ceva diṭṭhimānadosaavijjāsaṅgehi ca sattā āsattā.
atk-s0503a:1407_4: satte vā dukkhehi saṃyojanato bandhanato saṃyojananāmake kāmarāgādikilesajāte saṃyojanīyesu dhammesu
atk-s0503a:1407_5: assādānupassitāya vaṭṭadukkhamūlabhāvādikaṃ vajjaṃ dosaṃ ādīnavaṃ apassantā.
atk-s0503a:1407_7: oghaṃ tareyyuṃ vipulaṃ mahantanti evaṃ ādīnavadassanābhāvena saṃyojanasabhāvesu saṅgesu,
atk-s0503a:1407_8: saṃyojanasaṅkhātehi vā saṅgehi tesaṃ visayesu tebhūmakadhammesu sattā vipulavisayatāya anādikālatāya ca vipulaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ mahantañca kāmādioghaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1407_10: ekaṃseneva tassa oghassa pāraṃ na gaccheyyunti attho.
atk-s0503a:1410_0: 64. Catutthe andhīkatāti kāmā nāma anandhampi andhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0503a:1412_0: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0503a:1413_0: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate nara”nti. –
atk-s0503a:1414_0: Tasmā kāmena anandhāpi andhā katāti andhīkatā.
atk-s0503a:1414_2: Tattha hi manussānaṃ pavatti bhikkhūhi disvā bhagavato ārocitā,
atk-s0503a:1414_3: idha bhagavatā sāmaṃyeva diṭṭhāti ayameva viseso.
atk-s0503a:1414_4: Satthā sāvatthito nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge aciravatiyaṃ nadiyaṃ macchabandhehi oḍḍitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1414_5: kuminaṃ pavisitvā nikkhantuṃ asakkonte bahū macche passi,
atk-s0503a:1414_6: tato aparabhāge ekaṃ khīrapakaṃ vacchaṃ goravaṃ katvā anubandhitvā thaññapipāsāya gīvaṃ pasāretvā mātu antarasatthiyaṃ mukhaṃ upanentaṃ passi.
atk-s0503a:1414_7: Atha bhagavā vihāraṃ pavisitvā pāde pakkhāletvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno pacchimaṃ vatthudvayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1414_8: purimassa upamānabhāvena gahetvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1415_0: Tattha kāmandhāti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena andhā vicakkhukā katā.
atk-s0503a:1415_2: tannissitesu ca dhammesu atītādivasena anekabhedabhinnesu heṭṭhupariyavasena aparāparaṃ uppattiyā antogadhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1415_3: anatthāvahato ca jālabhūtāya taṇhāya sukhumacchiddena jālena parivuto viya udakarahado sañchannā paliguṇṭhitā
atk-s0503a:1415_5: Taṇhāchadanachāditāti taṇhāsaṅkhātena chadanena sevālapaṇakena viya udakaṃ chāditā,
atk-s0503a:1416_0: Pamattabandhunā baddhāti kilesamārena devaputtamārena ca baddhā.
atk-s0503a:1418_0: Tena taṃ bādhayissāmi, na me samaṇa mokkhasī”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:1419_0: Namuci kaṇho pamattabandhūti tīṇi mārassa nāmāni.
atk-s0503a:1419_1: Devaputtamāropi hi kilesamāro viya anatthena pamatte satte bandhatīti pamattabandhu.
atk-s0503a:1419_6: Macchāva kumināmukhe yathā nāma macchabandhakena oḍḍitassa kuminassa mukhe paviṭṭhā macchā tena baddhā hutvā maraṇamanventi pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0503a:1419_7: evameva mārena oḍḍitena kāmaguṇabandhanena baddhā ime sattā jarāmaraṇamanventi.
atk-s0503a:1419_8: Vaccho khīrapakova mātaraṃ yathā khīrapāyī taruṇavaccho attano mātaraṃ anveti anugacchati,
atk-s0503a:1419_9: na aññaṃ evaṃ mārabandhanabaddhā sattā saṃsāre paribbhamantā maraṇameva anventi anugacchanti,
atk-s0503a:1422_1: Pañcame sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoti āyasmā lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo ekadivasaṃ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0503a:1422_2: saddhiṃ gāmantarena piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco pattaṃ vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā aṃse laggetvā
atk-s0503a:1422_3: cīvaraṃ saṅgharitvā tampi vāmaṃse ṭhapetvā pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena
atk-s0503a:1422_4: samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno attano satipaññāvepullaṃ pakāsento viya satisampajaññaṃ
atk-s0503a:1422_5: sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā samāhitena cittena pade padaṃ nikkhipanto gacchati,
atk-s0503a:1422_6: gacchanto ca bhikkhūnaṃ pacchato pacchato gacchati tehi bhikkhūhi asaṃmisso. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1422_8: Apica tassāyasmato rūpaṃ paribhūtaṃ paribhavaṭṭhānīyaṃ puthujjanā ohīḷenti.
atk-s0503a:1422_9: Thero taṃ jānitvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchati “mā ime maṃ nissāya apuññaṃ pasaviṃsū”ti.
atk-s0503a:1422_10: Evaṃ te bhikkhū ca thero ca sāvatthiṃ patvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0503a:1423_1: Tenassa vaṇṇasampattiyā saṇṭhānasampattiyā ca abhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1423_3: Tenassa anubyañjanasampattiyā ākārasampattiyā ca abhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1423_7: Puthujjanā ekacce chabbaggiyādayo tassāyasmato guṇaṃ ajānantā hatthakaṇṇacūḷikādīsu gaṇhantā parāmasantā kīḷantā paribhavanti, na ariyā,
atk-s0503a:1424_2: Evaṃ kira bhagavato ahosi “ime bhikkhū mama puttassa mahānubhāvataṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0503a:1424_4: taṃ nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1424_5: handāhaṃ imassa guṇe bhikkhūnaṃ pakāsetvā paribhavato naṃ mocessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1425_2: yā tena bhikkhunā asamāpannapubbāti rūpasamāpatti arūpasamāpatti brahmavihārasamāpatti nirodhasamāpatti
atk-s0503a:1425_3: phalasamāpattīti evaṃ pabhedā sāvakasādhāraṇā yā kāci samāpattiyo nāma,
atk-s0503a:1425_4: tāsu ekāpi samāpatti na sulabharūpā, dullabhā,
atk-s0503a:1425_5: natthiyeva sā tena lakuṇḍakabhaddiyena bhikkhunā asamāpannapubbā.
atk-s0503a:1425_8: tattha mahiddhikataṃ pakāsetvā idāni mahānubhāvataṃ dassetuṃ “yassa catthāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1425_14: ayaṃ bhikkhu na yo vā so vā dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimakoti bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito āgacchatīti ca ettakena na oññātabbo,
atk-s0503a:1425_18: tasmā taṃ pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ katvā oloketha,
atk-s0503a:1425_19: taṃ vo dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1426_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyassa mahiddhikatāmahānubhāvatādibhedaṃ guṇarāsiṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0503a:1427_5: Taṃ nelaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ aṅgaṃ etassāti nelaṅgo.
atk-s0503a:1427_12: So pana suparisuddhadhavalabhāvena seto vā hoti rattanīlādīsu vā aññataro.
atk-s0503a:1427_13: Idha pana arahattaphalavimuttiyā adhippetattā suparisuddhabhāvaṃ upādāya “setapacchādo”ti vuttaṃ yathā aññatrāpi “ratho sīlaparikkhāro”ti.
atk-s0503a:1428_2: Āyantanti sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito āgacchantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1428_4: Pakatirathassa hi sukhapavattanatthaṃ akkhasīsesu nābhiyañca upalittānaṃ sappitelādīnaṃ soto savanaṃ sandanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1428_6: Ayaṃ pana chattiṃsatiyā sotānaṃ anavasesato pahīnattā chinnasoto nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1428_9: Rathūpattharassa hi akkhena saddhiṃ niccalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ bahūni bandhanāni honti,
atk-s0503a:1428_11: Ayaṃ pana sabbasaṃyojanabandhanānaṃ anavasesato parikkhīṇattā abandhano,
atk-s0503a:1428_13: Passāti bhagavā therassa guṇehi somanassappatto hutvā attānaṃ vadati.
atk-s0503a:1429_0: Iti satthā āyasmantaṃ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyaṃ arahattaphalasīsena sucakkaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1429_5: saṃyojanādīnaṃ abhāvena abandhanaṃ suparikkhittaṃ suyuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ katvā dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1432_1: Chaṭṭhe aññāsikoṇḍaññoti ettha koṇḍaññoti tassāyasmato gottato āgatanāmaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1432_2: Sāvakesu pana sabbapaṭhamaṃ ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhīti bhagavatā “aññāsi vata, bho,
atk-s0503a:1432_4: Taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttinti taṇhā saṅkhīyati pahīyati etthāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo, nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1432_6: Taṇhā vā saṅkhīyati pahīyati etenāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo,
atk-s0503a:1433_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa aggaphalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1434_0: Tattha yassa mūlaṃ chamā natthīti yassa ariyapuggalassa attabhāvarukkhamūlabhūtā avijjā,
atk-s0503a:1434_1: tassāva patiṭṭhā hetubhūtā āsavanīvaraṇaayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātā chamā pathavī ca natthi aggamaggena samugghātitattā.
atk-s0503a:1434_2: Paṇṇā natthi kuto latāti natthi latā kuto paṇṇāti padasambandho.
atk-s0503a:1434_5: Atha vā paṇṇā natthi kuto latāti rukkhaṅkurassa vaḍḍhamānassa paṭhamaṃ paṇṇāni nibbattanti.
atk-s0503a:1434_7: Tattha yassa ariyamaggabhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahassa attabhāvarukkhassa ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā yaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ mūlaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1434_9: Mūlaggahaṇeneva cettha mūlakāraṇattā bījaṭṭhāniyaṃ kammaṃ tadabhāvopi gahitoyevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1435_0: Taṃ dhīraṃ bandhanā muttanti taṃ catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyayogena vijitamārattā dhīraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1435_2: Ko taṃ ninditumarahatīti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1435_3: Evaṃ sabbakilesavippamuttaṃ sīlādianuttaraguṇasamannāgataṃ ko nāma viññujātiko nindituṃ garahituṃ arahati nindānimittasseva abhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1435_4: Devāpi naṃ pasaṃsantīti aññadatthu devā sakkādayo guṇavisesavidū,
atk-s0503a:1435_6: Kiñca bhiyyo brahmunāpi pasaṃsito mahābrahmunāpi aññehipi brahmanāgayakkhagandhabbādīhipi pasaṃsito thomitoyevāti.
atk-s0503a:1438_1: Sattame papañcasaññāsaṅkhāpahānanti papañcenti yattha sayaṃ uppannā,
atk-s0503a:1438_2: taṃ santānaṃ vitthārenti ciraṃ ṭhapentīti papañcā, kilesā.
atk-s0503a:1439_0: “Rāgo papañco, doso papañco, moho papañco, taṇhā papañco, diṭṭhi papañco, māno papañco”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1440_10: Atthato saddhiṃ nimittehi taṃtaṃpapañcassa pakkhiyo kilesagaṇo.
atk-s0503a:1440_15: tena tena maggena rāgādikilesānaṃ samucchedananti attho.
atk-s0503a:1441_0: Tadā hi bhagavā atītāsu anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhāsu attano jātīsu anatthassa nimittabhūte kilese imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1441_1: carimabhave ariyamaggena bodhimaṇḍe savāsane pahīne paccavekkhitvā sattasantānañca kilesacaritaṃ rāgādikilesasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1441_2: kañjiyapuṇṇalābuṃ viya takkabharitacāṭiṃ viya vasāpītapilotikaṃ viya ca dubbinimociyaṃ disvā “evaṃ gahanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1441_3: nāmidaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ anādikālabhāvitaṃ mayhaṃ anavasesaṃ pahīnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1441_6: “atha kho bhagavā attano papañcasaññāsaṅkhāpahānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1442_0: Tattha yassa papañcā ṭhiti ca natthīti yasmā bhagavā attānameva paraṃ viya katvā niddisati tasmā yassa aggapuggalassa vuttalakkhaṇā papañcā,
atk-s0503a:1442_1: tehi katā saṃsāre ṭhiti ca natthi.
atk-s0503a:1442_7: papañcānaṃ ṭhiti vijjamānatā maggena asamucchedo papañcaṭṭhiti,
atk-s0503a:1442_8: papañcā eva vā avasiṭṭhakusalākusalavipākānaṃ pavattiyā hetubhāvato vaṭṭassa ṭhiti papañcaṭṭhiti,
atk-s0503a:1442_10: Sandānaṃ palighañca vītivattoti yo bandhanaṭṭhena santānasadisattā “sandāna”nti laddhanāmā taṇhādiṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0503a:1442_11: nibbānanagarapavesanisedhanato palighasadisattā palighasaṅkhātaṃ avijjañca vītivatto savāsanapahānena visesato atikkanto.
atk-s0503a:1443_0: Taṃ nittaṇhaṃ muniṃ carantanti taṃ sabbathāpi taṇhābhāvena nittaṇhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1443_2: ekanteneva sabbasattahitatthaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi nānāsamāpatticārehi anaññasādhāraṇena ñāṇacārena ca carantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1443_3: Nāvajānāti sadevakopi lokoti sabbo sapaññajātiko sattaloko sadevakopi sabrahmakopi na kadācipi avajānāti na paribhoti,
atk-s0503a:1443_4: atha kho ayameva loke aggo seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti garuṃ karonto sakkaccaṃ pūjāsakkāranirato hotīti.
atk-s0503a:1446_1: Aṭṭhame ajjhattanti ettha ayaṃ ajjhattasaddo “cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānī”tiādīsu ajjhattajjhatte āgato.
atk-s0503a:1446_4: “Sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu visayajjhatte,
atk-s0503a:1446_8: bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabba”ntiādīsu gocarajjhatte.
atk-s0503a:1446_10: Tasmā ajjhattanti gocarajjhattabhūte kammaṭṭhānārammaṇeti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1446_14: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “ajjhattaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānavasena paṭiladdhaṃ uḷāraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1447_0: Ayañhi thero bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ viharante ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto
atk-s0503a:1447_1: vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno nānāsamāpattīhi divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0503a:1447_2: vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ vihāramajjhaṃ otaritvā bhagavati gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinne “akālo tāva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1447_4: aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle kālaparicchedaṃ katvā yathāvuttaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1447_5: Satthā taṃ tathānisinnaṃ gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva passi.
atk-s0503a:1448_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato mahākaccānattherassa satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāvasena adhigataṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1448_1: katvā samāpajjanaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1449_1: satataṃ kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti yassa āraddhavipassakassa ekadivasaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā sabbasmimpi kāle
atk-s0503a:1449_2: nāmarūpabhedena duvidhepi kāye gatā kāyārammaṇā pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ aniccādisammasanavasena
atk-s0503a:1449_3: satataṃ nirantaraṃ sātaccābhiyogavasena sati upaṭṭhitā siyā.
atk-s0503a:1450_0: Ayaṃ kirāyasmā paṭhamaṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānavasena jhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānamukhena
atk-s0503a:1450_2: So aparabhāgepi yebhuyyena tameva jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva ca vipassitvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
atk-s0503a:1450_4: taṃ vidhiṃ dassento satthā “yassa siyā sabbadā sati,
atk-s0503a:1450_5: satataṃ kāyagatā upaṭṭhitā”ti vatvā tassā upaṭṭhānākāraṃ vibhāvetuṃ “no cassa no ca me siyā,
atk-s0503a:1450_6: na bhavissati na ca me bhavissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1451_0: Tassattho dvidhā veditabbo sammasanato pubbabhāgavasena sammasanakālavasena cāti.
atk-s0503a:1451_1: Tesu pubbabhāgavasena tāva no cassa no ca me siyāti atītakāle mama kilesakammaṃ no cassa na bhaveyya ce,
atk-s0503a:1451_2: imasmiṃ paccuppannakāle ayaṃ attabhāvo no ca me siyā na me uppajjeyya.
atk-s0503a:1451_3: Yasmā pana me atīte kammakilesā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1451_4: tasmā taṃnimitto etarahi ayaṃ me attabhāvo pavattati.
atk-s0503a:1451_5: Na bhavissati na ca me bhavissatīti imasmiṃ attabhāve paṭipakkhādhigamena kilesakammaṃ na bhavissati na uppajjissati me,
atk-s0503a:1451_6: āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ na ca me bhavissati na me pavattissatīti.
atk-s0503a:1451_7: Evaṃ kālattaye kammakilesahetukaṃ idaṃ mayhaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1452_0: Sammasanakālavasena pana no cassa no ca me siyāti yasmā idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1452_3: evaṃ yadi ayaṃ attā nāma nāpi khandhapañcakavinimutto koci no cassa no ca siyā na bhaveyya, evaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:1452_4: no ca me siyā mama santakaṃ nāma kiñci na bhaveyya.
atk-s0503a:1452_5: Na bhavissatīti attani attaniye bhavitabbaṃ yathā cidaṃ nāmarūpaṃ etarahi ca atīte ca attattaniyaṃ suññaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1452_6: evaṃ na bhavissati na me bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1452_7: anāgatepi khandhavinimutto attā nāma na koci na me bhavissati na pavattissati,
atk-s0503a:1452_8: tato eva kiñci palibodhaṭṭhāniyaṃ na me bhavissati āyatimpi attaniyaṃ nāma na me kiñci bhavissatīti.
atk-s0503a:1452_9: Iminā tīsu kālesu “aha”nti gahetabbassa abhāvato “mama”nti gahetabbassa ca abhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1453_0: Anupubbavihāri tattha soti evaṃ tīsupi kālesu attattaniyaṃ suññataṃ tattha saṅkhāragate anupassanto anukkamena
atk-s0503a:1453_2: Kāleneva tare visattikanti so evaṃ vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhito yogāvacaro indriyānaṃ paripākagatakālena
atk-s0503a:1453_3: vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya maggena ghaṭitakālena ariyamaggassa uppattikālena sakalassa bhavattayassa
atk-s0503a:1454_0: Iti bhagavā aññāpadesena āyasmato mahākaccānassa arahattuppattidīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1457_1: Navame mallesūti mallā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0503a:1457_2: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “mallā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1457_9: Thūṇaṃ nāma mallānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmoti puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya majjhimadesassa avadhiṭṭhāne malladese thūṇanāmako brāhmaṇabahulatāya brāhmaṇagāmo.
atk-s0503a:1457_17: na tesaṃ savanantarāyo ahosīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1457_24: Gahapatikāti khattiyabrāhmaṇe vajjetvā ye keci agāraṃ ajjhāvasantā vuccanti,
atk-s0503a:1458_6: Bhagavā ca anuttarena ariyamaggena sabbaso samitapāpo.
atk-s0503a:1458_19: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya nekkhammādhigamasaddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1458_20: Udapānaṃ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresunti pānīyakūpaṃ tiṇena ca bhusena ca mukhappamāṇena vaḍḍhesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1459_0: Tassa kira gāmassa bahi bhagavato āgamanamagge brāhmaṇānaṃ paribhogabhūto eko udapāno ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1459_1: Taṃ ṭhapetvā tattha sabbāni kūpataḷākādīni udakaṭṭhānāni tadā visukkhāni nirudakāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1459_2: Atha thūṇeyyakā ratanattaye appasannā maccherapakatā bhagavato āgamanaṃ sutvā “sace samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā dvīhatīhaṃ vaseyya,
atk-s0503a:1459_3: sabbaṃ imaṃ janaṃ attano vacane ṭhapeyya,
atk-s0503a:1459_4: tato brāhmaṇadhammo patiṭṭhaṃ na labheyyā”ti tattha bhagavato avāsāya parisakkantā “imasmiṃ gāme aññattha udakaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:1459_6: evaṃ samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ gāmaṃ na pavisissatī”ti sammantayitvā sabbe gāmavāsino sattāhassa udakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1459_7: gahetvā cāṭiādīni pūretvā udapānaṃ tiṇena ca bhusena ca pidahiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1459_9: “udapānaṃ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1460_0: Tattha muṇḍakā samaṇakāti muṇḍe “muṇḍā”ti samaṇe “samaṇā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya,
atk-s0503a:1460_5: Etamhāti yo udapāno tehi tathā kato,
atk-s0503a:1460_7: Kiṃ pana bhagavā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vippakāraṃ anāvajjitvā evamāha –
atk-s0503a:1460_10: Jānanto eva bhagavā attano buddhānubhāvaṃ pakāsetvā te dametvā nibbisevane kātuṃ evamāha,
atk-s0503a:1460_13: Dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko pana satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ajānanto thūṇeyyakehi kataṃ vippakāraṃ ācikkhanto “idāni so,
atk-s0503a:1461_3: Thero dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre “na kho tathāgatā tikkhattuṃ paccanīkā kātabbā,
atk-s0503a:1461_4: kāraṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ bhavissati dīghadassinā”ti mahārājadattiyaṃ bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā udapānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1461_5: Gacchante there udapāne udakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hutvā uttaritvā samantato sandati,
atk-s0503a:1461_6: sabbaṃ tiṇaṃ bhusañca uplavitvā sayameva apagacchi.
atk-s0503a:1461_7: Tena ca sandamānena salilena uparūpari vaḍḍhantena tasmiṃ gāme sabbeva pokkharaṇīādayo jalāsayā visukkhā paripūriṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1461_9: Sabbo gāmappadeso mahoghena ajjhotthaṭo mahāvassakāle viya ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1461_10: Kumuduppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīni jalajapupphāni tattha tattha ubbhijjitvā vikasamānāni udakaṃ sañchādiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1461_11: Saresu haṃsakoñcacakkavākakāraṇḍavabakādayā e udakasakuṇikā vassamānā tattha tattha vicariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1461_12: Thūṇeyyakā taṃ mahoghaṃ tathā uttarantaṃ samantato vīcitaraṅgasamākulaṃ pariyantato samuṭṭhahamānaṃ ruciraṃ
atk-s0503a:1461_13: pheṇabubbuḷakaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā evaṃ sammantesuṃ “mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa udakupacchedaṃ
atk-s0503a:1461_15: ayaṃ pana mahogho tassa āgamanakālato paṭṭhāya evaṃ abhivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1461_19: yathā yaṃ mahogho uṭṭhahitvā amhākaṃ gāmampi otthareyya.
atk-s0503a:1461_20: Handa mayaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsitvā accayaṃ desentā khamāpeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1462_0: Te sabbeva ekajjhāsayā hutvā saṅghasaṅghī gaṇībhūtā gāmato nikkhamitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1462_1: Upasaṅkamitvā appekacce bhagavato pāde sirasā vandiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1462_6: Evaṃ pana katvā sabbeva ekamantaṃ nisīditvā “idha mayaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1462_8: bhoto ceva gotamassa gotamasāvakānañca udakappaṭisedhaṃ kārayimha,
atk-s0503a:1462_10: So pana udapāno acetanopi samāno sacetano viya bhoto guṇaṃ jānanto viya sayameva sabbaṃ tiṇaṃ bhusaṃ apanetvā suvisuddho jāto,
atk-s0503a:1462_11: sabbopi cettha ninnappadeso mahatā udakoghena paripuṇṇo ramaṇīyova jāto,
atk-s0503a:1462_13: Mayaṃ pana manussāpi samānā bhoto guṇe na jānimha,
atk-s0503a:1462_15: sādhu no bhavaṃ gotamo tathā karotu,
atk-s0503a:1462_16: yathāyaṃ mahogho imaṃ gāmaṃ na otthareyya,
atk-s0503a:1462_18: taṃ no bhavaṃ gotamo accayaṃ paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti accayaṃ desesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1462_20: taṃ vo mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā”ti tesaṃ accayaṃ paṭiggahetvā pasannacittataṃ ñatvā uttari ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0503a:1462_21: Te bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacittā saraṇādīsu patiṭṭhitā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1462_22: Tesaṃ pana āgamanato puretaraṃyeva āyasmā ānando taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajāto pattena
atk-s0503a:1462_23: pānīyaṃ ādāya bhagavato upanāmetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1463_0: Tattha mukhato ovamitvāti sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇādiṃ mukhena chaḍḍetvā.
atk-s0503a:1463_1: Vissandanto maññeti pubbe dīgharajjukena udapānena ussiñcitvā gahetabbaudakogho bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0503a:1463_2: therassa gatakāle mukhena vissandanto viya samatittiko kākapeyyo hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1463_3: Idañca therassa gatakāle udakappavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1463_4: Tato paraṃ pana pubbe vuttanayena tasmiṃ gāme sakalaṃ ninnaṭṭhānaṃ udakena paripuṇṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1463_7: atha kho bhagavato puññānubhāvena parittadesanatthaṃ rājagahato vesāligamane viya.
atk-s0503a:1463_8: Keci pana “thūṇeyyakānaṃ bhagavati pasādajananatthaṃ tesaṃ atthakāmāhi devatāhi kata”nti.
atk-s0503a:1463_11: yathā bhagavato puññānubhāvenayeva tathā udakuppattiyā paridīpitattā.
atk-s0503a:1464_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ adhiṭṭhānena vinā attanā icchitanipphattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1465_1: āpā ce sabbadā siyunti yassa sabbakālaṃ sabbattha ca āpā ce yadi siyuṃ yadi upalabbheyyuṃ yadi ākaṅkhāmattapaṭibaddho,
atk-s0503a:1465_3: tena udapānena kiṃ kayirā kiṃ kareyya,
atk-s0503a:1465_6: kissa pariyesanaṃ careti yāya taṇhāya vinibaddhā sattā akatapuññā hutvā icchitālābhadukkhena vihaññanti,
atk-s0503a:1465_8: mūle vā chinditvā ṭhito mādiso sabbaññubuddho kissa kena kāraṇena pānīyapariyesanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1465_11: taṇhāya mūlaṃ mūleyeva vā chedakoti attho.
atk-s0503a:1465_12: Atha vā mūlato chettāti mūlato paṭṭhāya taṇhāya chedako.
atk-s0503a:1465_14: yo bodhiyā mūlabhūtamahāpaṇidhānato paṭṭhāya aparimitaṃ sakalaṃ puññasambhāraṃ attano acintetvā lokahitatthameva
atk-s0503a:1465_15: pariṇāmanavasena paripūrento mūlato pabhuti taṇhāya chettā,
atk-s0503a:1465_16: so taṇhāhetukassa icchitālābhassa abhāvato kissa kena kāraṇena udakapariyesanaṃ careyya,
atk-s0503a:1465_17: ime pana thūṇeyyakā andhabālā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ ajānantā evamakaṃsūti.
atk-s0503a:1468_1: Dasame rañño utenassāti utenassa nāma rañño,
atk-s0503a:1468_5: “antepura”nti pana padaṃ apekkhitvā sambandhepetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1468_9: bhaddavatiyaṃ seṭṭhino dhītā ghosakaseṭṭhinā dhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapitā pañcasataitthiparivārā rañño utenassa
atk-s0503a:1468_12: vitthārato pana ādito paṭṭhāya sāmāvatiyā uppattikathā dhammapadavatthumhi vuttanayena veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:1468_13: Māgaṇḍiyassa nāma brāhmaṇassa dhītā attano mātāpitūnaṃ –
atk-s0503a:1473_0: Bhagavatā desitaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā satthari baddhāghātā māgaṇḍiyā aparabhāge raññā utenena mahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapitā bhagavato kosambiṃ upagatabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1473_1: sāmāvatīpamukhānañca pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ upāsikābhāvaṃ ñatvā “āgato nāma samaṇo gotamo imaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1473_4: imāsampi sāmāvatīpamukhānañca kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti anekapariyāyehi tathāgatassa tāsañca anatthaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0503a:1473_5: vāyamitvāpi asakkontī punekadivasaṃ raññā saddhiṃ uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantī cūḷapitu sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “sāmāvatiyā
atk-s0503a:1473_6: pāsādaṃ gantvā dussakoṭṭhāgāratelakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā dussāni telacāṭīsu temetvā thambhe veṭhetvā
atk-s0503a:1473_7: tā sabbā ekato katvā dvāraṃ pidahitvā bahi yantaṃ datvā daṇḍadīpikāhi gehe aggiṃ dadamāno otaritvā gacchatū”ti.
atk-s0503a:1474_0: Taṃ sutvā so pāsādaṃ abhiruyha koṭṭhāgārāni vivaritvā vatthāni telacāṭīsu temetvā thambhe veṭhetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0503a:1474_1: Atha naṃ sāmāvatīpamukhā itthiyo “kiṃ etaṃ cūḷapitā”ti vadantiyo upasaṅkamiṃsu. “Ammā,
atk-s0503a:1474_2: rājā daḷhikammatthāya ime thambhe telapilotikāhi bandhāpeti,
atk-s0503a:1474_4: mā me santike hothā”ti vatvā tā āgatā gabbhesu pavesetvā dvārāni pidahitvā bahi yantakaṃ datvā ādito paṭṭhāya aggiṃ dento otari.
atk-s0503a:1474_6: anamatagge saṃsāre vicarantīnaṃ evameva agginā jhāmattabhāvānaṃ buddhañāṇenapi paricchedo na sukaro,
atk-s0503a:1474_8: Tā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā adhigataphalāya viññātasāsanāya khujjuttarāya ariyasāvikāya sekkhapaṭisambhidāpattāya
atk-s0503a:1474_9: satthārā desitaniyāmeneva dhammaṃ desentiyā santike sotāpattiphalassa adhigatā antarantarā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena
atk-s0503a:1474_10: yuttappayuttā gehe jhāyante vedanāpariggahakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontiyo kāci dutiyaphalaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1474_12: Atha bhikkhū kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā pacchābhattaṃ bhagavato ārocetvā tāsaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1474_13: Bhagavā ca tāsaṃ ariyaphalādhigamaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1480_0: Gāthāhi ovadiyamānā vedanāpariggahakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontiyo vipassitvā dutiyatatiyaphalāni paṭilabhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1480_2: pubbe tādisassa kammassa akatattā ca tato pāsādato bahi ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1480_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0503a:1480_11: pubbe katakammassa pana yuttameva tāhi laddha”nti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0503a:1481_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente aṭṭha paccekabuddhā rañño nivesane nibaddhaṃ bhuñjanti.
atk-s0503a:1481_3: eko nadītīrasamīpe ekasmiṃ tiṇagahane samāpattiyā nisīdati.
atk-s0503a:1481_4: Athekadivasaṃ rājā paccekabuddhesu gatesu tāhi itthīhi saddhiṃ udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo tattha gato.
atk-s0503a:1481_5: Tā itthiyo divasabhāgaṃ udake kīḷitvā sītapīḷitā visibbitukāmā taṃ tiṇagahanaṃ upari visukkhatiṇasañchannaṃ
atk-s0503a:1481_6: “tiṇarāsī”ti saññāya parivāretvā aggiṃ datvā tiṇesu jhāyitvā patantesu paccekabuddhaṃ disvā “rañño paccekabuddho jhāyati,
atk-s0503a:1481_8: sudaḍḍhaṃ naṃ karissāmā”ti sabbā ito cito ca dāruādīni āharitvā tassa upari rāsiṃ katvā ālimpetvā “idāni jhāyissatī”ti pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1481_9: Tā paṭhamaṃ asañcetanikā hutvā idāni kammunā bajjhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1481_10: Paccekabuddhaṃ pana antosamāpattiyaṃ sace dārūnaṃ sakaṭasahassampi āharitvā ālimpentā usumākāramattampi gāhetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0503a:1481_11: tasmā so sattame divase uṭṭhāya yathāsukhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1481_12: Tā tassa kammassa katattā bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa
atk-s0503a:1481_13: vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate imināva niyāmena gehe jhāyamāne jhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1482_0: Yasmā pana te imasmiṃ attabhāve ariyaphalāni sacchākaṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1483_0: Rājāpi kho uteno “sāmāvatiyā gehaṃ kira jhāyatī”ti sutvā vegena āgacchantopi taṃ padesaṃ tāsu daḍḍhāsuyeva sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:1483_1: Āgantvā pana gehaṃ nibbāpetvā uppannabalavadomanasso māgaṇḍiyāya tathā kāritabhāvaṃ upāyena ñatvā ariyasāvikāsu
atk-s0503a:1483_2: katāparādhakammunā codiyamāno tassā rājāṇaṃ kāresi saddhiṃ ñātakehi.
atk-s0503a:1483_3: Evaṃ sā saparijanā samittabandhavā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:1484_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sāmāvatīpamukhānaṃ tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ aggimhi anayabyasanāpattihetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1484_1: māgaṇḍiyāya ca samittabandhavāya rājāṇāya anayabyasanāpattinimittaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1485_1: bhabbarūpova dissatīti yo idha sattaloko bhabbarūpova hetusampanno viya hutvā dissati,
atk-s0503a:1485_2: sopi mohasambandhano mohena paliguṇṭhito attahitāhitaṃ ajānanto hite na paṭipajjati,
atk-s0503a:1485_7: tato eva bhavarūpova sassatasabhāvo viyassa attā dissati,
atk-s0503a:1486_2: Sassatoriva khāyatīti na kevalañca mohasambandhano eva,
atk-s0503a:1486_3: apica kho upadhibandhanopi ayaṃ andhabālaloko avijjātamasā parivārito.
atk-s0503a:1486_5: yena ñāṇena aviparītaṃ kāme ca khandhe ca “aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti passeyya,
atk-s0503a:1486_6: tassa abhāvato yasmā bālo andhaputhujjano aññāṇatamasā samantato parivārito nivuto,
atk-s0503a:1486_7: tasmā so kāmūpadhi kilesūpadhi khandhūpadhīti imesaṃ upadhīnaṃ vasena ca upadhibandhano,
atk-s0503a:1486_8: tato eva cassa sopadhissa passato sassato viya nicco sabbakālabhāvī viya khāyati.
atk-s0503a:1486_11: attā sabbakālaṃ vijjati upalabbhatīti añño asassati aniccoti lokassa so upadhi micchābhinivesavasena ekadeso viya khāyati,
atk-s0503a:1486_14: Passato natthi kiñcananti yo pana saṅkhāre pariggahetvā aniccādivasena vipassati,
atk-s0503a:1486_15: tasseva vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ passato jānato paṭivijjhato rāgādikiñcanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:1486_17: Tathā apassanto eva hi avijjātaṇhādiṭṭhiādibandhanehi saṃsāre baddho siyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1491_1: Pāṭaligāmiyavaggassa paṭhame nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāyāti amatadhātusannissitāya asaṅkhatadhātuyā pavedanavasena pavattāya.
atk-s0503a:1491_4: Samādapetīti tameva atthaṃ te bhikkhū gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0503a:1491_5: Samuttejetīti tadatthagahaṇe ussāhaṃ janento tejeti joteti.
atk-s0503a:1492_0: Atha vā sandassetīti “so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggā taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1492_1: nayeneva sabbathā tena tena pariyāyena tesaṃ tesaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ sammā dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1492_2: Samādapetīti “iminā ariyamaggena taṃ adhigantabba”nti adhigamapaṭipadāya saddhiṃ tattha bhikkhū ninnapoṇapabbhāre karonto sammā ādapeti gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0503a:1492_3: Samuttejetīti etaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavanti “mā sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ pamādaṃ antarāvosānaṃ āpajjatha,
atk-s0503a:1492_5: tasmā sīlavisuddhiādivisuddhipaṭipadāya uṭṭhahatha ghaṭayatha vāyameyyāthā”ti nibbānādhigamāya ussāheti,
atk-s0503a:1492_10: amatañca santantiādinā ca anekapariyāyena nibbānānisaṃsappakāsanena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittaṃ tosento hāsento sampahaṃseti samassāseti.
atk-s0503a:1493_1: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti “atthi kiñci ayaṃ no attho adhigantabbo”ti evaṃ sallakkhetvā tāya desanāya atthikā hutvā.
atk-s0503a:1493_2: Manasi katvāti citte ṭhapetvā anaññavihitā taṃ desanaṃ attano cittagatameva katvā.
atk-s0503a:1493_3: Sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvāti sabbena kārakacittena ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā desanaṃ āvajjetvā,
atk-s0503a:1493_5: Atha vā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvāti sabbasmā cittato desanaṃ sammā anu anu āharitvā.
atk-s0503a:1493_8: sabbasmā cittato pavattaṃ desanaṃ bahi gantuṃ adento sammā aviparītaṃ anu anu āharitvā attano cittasantānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1493_13: Tameva upalabbhamānopi hi savane avikkhepo satisaṃvaro viya cakkhundriyādīsu sotindriyepi vattumarahatīti.
atk-s0503a:1493_14: Ettha ca “aṭṭhiṃ katvā”tiādīhi catūhipi padehi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tapparabhāvato savane ādaradīpanena sakkaccasavanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1494_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassā nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammakathāya savane ādarakāritaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1494_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ nibbānassa tabbidhuradhammadesanāmukhena paramatthato vijjamānabhāvavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1495_3: Nanu ca udānaṃ nāma pītisomanassasamuṭṭhāpito vā dhammasaṃvegasamuṭṭhāpito vā dhammapaṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāro,
atk-s0503a:1495_5: idha kasmā bhagavā udānento te bhikkhū āmantesīti?
atk-s0503a:1495_7: Nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttañhi bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā nibbānaguṇānussaraṇena uppannapītisomanassā udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1495_8: Idha nibbānavajjo sabbo sabhāvadhammo paccayāyattavuttikova upalabbhati,
atk-s0503a:1495_10: Ayaṃ pana nibbānadhammo katamapaccaye upalabbhatīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetoparivitakkamaññāya te ca saññāpetukāmo “atthi,
atk-s0503a:1495_13: na ekantatova te paṭiggāhake katvāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1495_16: Nibbānañhi maggaphalañāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvato rūpādīni viya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtānīti kāraṇaṭṭhena “āyatana”nti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:1495_17: Ettāvatā ca bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvaṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0503a:1496_1: idha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ vijjamānattā asaṅkhatāyapi dhātuyā bhavitabbaṃ tappaṭipakkhattā sabhāvadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1496_2: Yathā hi dukkhe vijjamāne tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhampi vijjatiyeva,
atk-s0503a:1503_0: Apica nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvavicāraṇaṃ parato āvibhavissati.
atk-s0503a:1504_0: Evaṃ bhagavā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvaṃ sammukhena dassetvā idāni tabbidhuradhammāpohanamukhenassa sabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1504_2: Tattha yasmā nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhāravidhurasabhāvaṃ yathā saṅkhatadhammesu katthaci natthi,
atk-s0503a:1504_6: yattha yasmiṃ nibbāne yassaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuyaṃ neva kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu atthi,
atk-s0503a:1504_10: Iti catumahābhūtābhāvavacanena yathā sabbassapi upādārūpassa abhāvo vutto hoti tannissitattā.
atk-s0503a:1504_11: Evaṃ anavasesato kāmarūpabhavassa tattha abhāvo vutto hoti tadāyattavuttibhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1504_12: Na hi mahābhūtanissayena vinā pañcavokārabhavo ekavokārabhavo vā sambhavatīti.
atk-s0503a:1505_0: Idāni arūpasabhāvattepi nibbānassa arūpabhavapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1505_3: Tattha na ākāsānañcāyatananti saddhiṃ ārammaṇena kusalavipākakiriyabhedo tividhopi ākāsānañcāyatanacittuppādo natthīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1505_5: Yadaggena ca nibbāne kāmalokādīnaṃ abhāvo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1505_9: yvāyaṃ “itthattaṃ diṭṭhadhammo idhaloko”ti ca laddhavohāro khandhādiloko,
atk-s0503a:1505_10: yo ca “tato aññathā paro abhisamparāyo”ti ca laddhavohāro khandhādiloko,
atk-s0503a:1505_12: Na ubho candimasūriyāti yasmā rūpagate sati tamo nāma siyā,
atk-s0503a:1505_14: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana yattha rūpagatameva natthi,
atk-s0503a:1505_17: tasmā candimā sūriyo cāti ubhopi tattha nibbāne natthīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1506_0: Ettāvatā ca anabhisametāvīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anādimatisaṃsāre supinantepi ananubhūtapubbaṃ paramagambhīraṃ
atk-s0503a:1506_1: atiduddasaṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ atakkāvacaraṃ accantasantaṃ paṇḍitavedanīyaṃ atipaṇītaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ vibhāvento
atk-s0503a:1506_4: tadāyatana”nti tassa atthibhāvā tesaṃ aññāṇādīni apanetvā “yattha neva pathavī …pe…
atk-s0503a:1506_5: na ubho candimasūriyā”ti tadaññadhammāpohanamukhena taṃ vibhāveti dhammarājā.
atk-s0503a:1507_3: yattha saṅkhārapavatte kutoci kassaci āgatiṃ na vadāmi yathāpaccayaṃ tattha dhammamattassa uppajjanato.
atk-s0503a:1507_4: Evaṃ tasmimpi āyatane nibbāne kutoci āgatiṃ āgamanaṃ neva vadāmi āgantabbaṭṭhānatāya abhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1507_5: Na gatinti katthaci gamanaṃ na vadāmi gantabbaṭṭhānatāya abhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1507_6: Na hi tattha sattānaṃ ṭhapetvā ñāṇena ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ āgatigatiyo sambhavanti,
atk-s0503a:1507_10: tampi āyatanaṃ gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ viya na āgantabbatāya na āgati,
atk-s0503a:1507_15: uppādanirodhābhāvato ceva tadubhayaparicchinnāya ṭhitiyā ca abhāvato na ṭhitiṃ na cutiṃ na upapattiṃ vadāmi.
atk-s0503a:1507_16: Kevalaṃ pana taṃ arūpasabhāvattā apaccayattā ca na katthaci patiṭṭhitanti appatiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1507_18: Arūpasabhāvattepi vedanādayo viya kassacipi ārammaṇassa anālambanato upatthambhanirapekkhato ca anārammaṇameva taṃ “āyatana”nti vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1507_19: Ayañca evasaddo appatiṭṭhameva appavattamevāti padadvayenapi yojetabbo.
atk-s0503a:1507_20: Esevanto dukkhassāti yadidaṃ “appatiṭṭha”ntiādīhi vacanehi vaṇṇitaṃ thomitaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1507_21: eso eva sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa anto pariyosānaṃ tadadhigame sati sabbadukkhābhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1507_22: Tasmā “dukkhassa anto”ti ayameva tassa sabhāvoti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1510_1: Dutiye imaṃ udānanti imaṃ nibbānassa pakatiyā gambhīrabhāvato duddasabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1510_2: Tattha duddasanti sabhāvagambhīrattā atisukhumasaṇhasabhāvattā ca anupacitañāṇasambhārehi passituṃ na sakkāti duddasaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1510_13: kāmādīsu ca bhavesu namanato tanninnabhāvena pavattito sattānañca tattha namanato taṇhā natā nāma,
atk-s0503a:1510_20: Ettha ca “duddasa”nti iminā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇehi rāgādikilesehi cirakālabhāvitattā sattānaṃ apaccayabhāvanā
atk-s0503a:1510_21: na sukarāti nibbānassa kicchena adhigamanīyataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1510_22: Na hi saccaṃ sudassananti imināpi tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
atk-s0503a:1510_24: Tañhi kenaci pariyāyena asantasabhāvābhāvato ekanteneva santattā aviparītaṭṭhena saccaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1510_25: Na hi taṃ sudassanaṃ na sukhena passitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1510_26: sucirampi kālaṃ puññañāṇasambhāre samānentehipi kasireneva samadhigantabbato.
atk-s0503a:1511_0: Paṭividdhā taṇhā jānato passato natthi kiñcananti tañca nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena abhisamentena
atk-s0503a:1511_1: visayato kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca ārammaṇappaṭivedhena asammohappaṭivedhena ca paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1511_4: evaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena asammohato ca paṭividdhā taṇhā hoti.
atk-s0503a:1511_5: Evañca cattāri saccāni yathābhūtaṃ ariyamaggapaññāya jānato passato bhavādīsu natabhūtā taṇhā natthi,
atk-s0503a:1511_7: tatova kammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ asambhavoyevāti evaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamahetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:1514_1: Tatiye atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvāti tadā kira bhagavatā anekapariyāyena saṃsārassa ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0503a:1514_2: pakāsetvā sandassanādivasena nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammadesanāya katāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi –
atk-s0503a:1514_3: “ayaṃ saṃsāro bhagavatā avijjādīhi kāraṇehi sahetuko pakāsito,
atk-s0503a:1514_4: nibbānassa pana tadupasamassa na kiñci kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1514_7: Atha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ parivitakkasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1514_8: Imaṃ udānanti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vimatividhamanatthañceva idha samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ “nibbānaṃ nibbānanti vācāvatthumattameva,
atk-s0503a:1514_9: natthi hi paramatthato nibbānaṃ nāma anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā”ti lokāyatikādayo viya vippaṭipannānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1514_10: bahiddhā ca puthudiṭṭhigatikānaṃ micchāvādabhañjanatthañca imaṃ amatamahānibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvadīpanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1515_0: Tattha ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti sabbānipi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni.
atk-s0503a:1515_1: Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ajātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1515_3: sayameva vā na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1515_4: evaṃ ajātattā abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti akataṃ,
atk-s0503a:1515_6: na asaṅkhatasabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ asaṅkhatanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1515_7: Paṭilomato vā samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:1515_9: Evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe “siyā nu kho ekeneva kāraṇena kata”nti āsaṅkāya “na
atk-s0503a:1515_11: Evaṃ apaccayampi samānaṃ “sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1515_12: “Ayañcetassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattā”ti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1515_13: Evametesaṃ catunnampi padānaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ viditvā “tayidaṃ nibbānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0503a:1515_14: bhikkhave”ti paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1516_2: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti vatvā tattha hetuṃ dassento “no cetaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1516_6: yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā,
atk-s0503a:1516_7: idha loke jātādisabhāvassa rūpādikkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ anavasesavūpasamo na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya.
atk-s0503a:1516_8: Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesakilese samucchindanti.
atk-s0503a:1516_9: Tenettha sabbassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa appavatti apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0503a:1517_0: Evaṃ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anvayavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1517_12: dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīhi anekehi suttapadehi, “atthi,
atk-s0503a:1517_14: ajāta”nti imināpi ca suttena nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sambhavo sabbalokaṃ anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena desito,
atk-s0503a:1517_15: tasmā yadipi tattha apaccakkhakārīnampi viññūnaṃ kaṅkhā vā vimati vā natthiyeva.
atk-s0503a:1517_18: yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ rūpādīnañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0503a:1517_19: evaṃ taṃsabhāvānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1517_22: Kiñca bhiyyo saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ api anulomañāṇaṃ kilese samucchedavasena pajahituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:1517_23: Tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
atk-s0503a:1517_25: Iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato
atk-s0503a:1517_26: tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa ariyamaggañāṇassa tadubhayaviparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1517_30: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti idaṃ nibbānapadassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakaṃ vacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā.
atk-s0503a:1517_32: taṃ aviparītatthaṃ paramatthaṃ yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā,
atk-s0503a:1517_35: tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāramattavuttisabbhāvato seyyathāpi sīhasaddo.
atk-s0503a:1517_36: Atha vā attheva paramatthato asaṅkhatā dhātu,
atk-s0503a:1517_38: Evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1520_1: Catutthe atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvāti tadā kira bhagavatā anekapariyāyena sandassanādivasena
atk-s0503a:1520_2: nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammadesanāya katāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi –
atk-s0503a:1520_3: “ayaṃ tāva bhagavatā amatamahānibbānadhātuyā anekākāravokāraṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassentena anaññasādhāraṇo ānubhāvo pakāsito,
atk-s0503a:1520_5: kathaṃ nu kho paṭipajjantehi amhehi ayaṃ adhigantabbā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1520_6: Atha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttaparivitakkasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1520_7: Imaṃ udānanti taṇhāvasena katthaci anissitassa passaddhakāyacittassa vīthipaṭipannavipassanassa ariyamaggena
atk-s0503a:1520_8: anavasesato taṇhāpahānena nibbānādhigamavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1521_0: Tattha nissitassa calitanti rūpādisaṅkhāre taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nissitassa calitaṃ “etaṃ mama,
atk-s0503a:1521_2: Appahīnataṇhādiṭṭhikassa hi puggalassa sukhādīsu uppannesu tāni abhibhuyya viharituṃ asakkontassa “mama vedanā,
atk-s0503a:1521_3: ahaṃ vediyāmī”tiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhigāhavasena kusalappavattito cittasantānassa calanaṃ kampanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1521_5: Anissitassa calitaṃ natthīti yo pana visuddhipaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanto samathavipassanāhi taṇhādiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0503a:1521_7: tassa taṃ anissitassa yathāvuttaṃ calitaṃ avakkhalitaṃ,
