atk-s0503a:1522_2: Passaddhīti vipassanācittasahajātānaṃ kāyacittānaṃ sārambhakarakilesavūpasaminī duvidhāpi passaddhi hoti.
atk-s0503a:1522_3: Passaddhiyā sati nati na hotīti pubbenāparaṃ visesayuttāya passaddhiyā sati anavajjasukhādhiṭṭhānaṃ samādhiṃ
atk-s0503a:1522_4: vaḍḍhetvā taṃ paññāya samavāyakaraṇena samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ yojetvā maggaparamparāya kilese
atk-s0503a:1522_5: khepentassa kāmabhavādīsu namanato “natī”ti laddhanāmā taṇhā arahattamaggakkhaṇe anavasesato na hoti,
atk-s0503a:1523_0: Natiyā asatīti arahattamaggena taṇhāya suppahīnattā bhavādiatthāya ālayanikanti pariyuṭṭhāne asati.
atk-s0503a:1523_1: Āgatigati na hotīti paṭisandhivasena idha āgati āgamanaṃ cutivasena gati ito paralokagamanaṃ peccabhāvo na hoti na pavattati.
atk-s0503a:1523_2: Āgatigatiyā asatīti vuttanayena āgatiyā ca gatiyā ca asati.
atk-s0503a:1523_3: Cutūpapāto na hotīti aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanaṃ na hoti na pavattati.
atk-s0503a:1523_5: pacchinne ca tasmiṃ kuto vipākavaṭṭassa sambhavo. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1524_0: Iti bhagavā idhāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesato vaṭṭadukkhavūpasamahetubhūtaṃ amatamahānibbānassa ānubhāvaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā pakāseti.
atk-s0503a:1527_3: So hi bhikkhusaṅgho sīlādiguṇavisesayogenapi mahā tattha sabbapacchimakassa sotāpannabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:1527_5: Āyusaṅkhārossajjanato paṭṭhāya hi āgatāgatā bhikkhū na pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1527_8: So kira aḍḍho mahākuṭumbiko bhagavato paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpanno hutvā attano ambavane satthuvasanānucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1527_10: dvārakoṭṭhakayuttaṃ vihāraṃ katvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0503a:1527_12: “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ viharati cundassa kammāraputtassa ambavane”ti.
atk-s0503a:1528_5: Apare pana “sūkaramaddavaṃ nāma ekaṃ rasāyana”nti bhaṇiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1528_6: Tañhi cundo kammāraputto “ajja bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti sutvā “appeva nāma naṃ paribhuñjitvā cirataraṃ
atk-s0503a:1529_0: Tena maṃ parivisāti tena mamaṃ bhojehi.
atk-s0503a:1529_4: Tena abhihaṭabhikkhāya paresaṃ aparibhogārahato ca tathā vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1529_5: Tasmiṃ kira sūkaramaddave dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu devatā ojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1529_6: Tasmā taṃ añño koci sammā jīrāpetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1529_7: tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā parūpavādamocanatthaṃ “nāhaṃ taṃ, cunda,
atk-s0503a:1529_9: Ye hi pare upavadeyyuṃ “attanā paribhuttāvasesaṃ neva bhikkhūnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1529_12: “tesaṃ vacanokāso mā hotū”ti parūpavādamocanatthaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0503a:1531_5: Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0503a:1531_6: Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena asallakkhitadhammo viya aparāparaṃ parivattanaṃ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamāno viya adhivāsesi.
atk-s0503a:1531_7: Bhagavato hi veḷuvagāmakeyeva tā vedanā uppannā,
atk-s0503a:1531_8: samāpattibalena pana vikkhambhitā yāva parinibbānadivasā na uppajjiṃsu divase divase samāpattīhi paṭipaṇāmanato.
atk-s0503a:1531_9: Taṃ divasaṃ pana parinibbāyitukāmo “koṭisahassahatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārentānaṃ vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1531_10: aparimitakālaṃ upacitapuññasambhārānampi bhave sati evarūpā vedanā pavattanti,
atk-s0503a:1531_11: kimaṅgaṃ pana aññesa”nti sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ samāpattiṃ na samāpajji,
atk-s0503a:1532_0: Cundassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvātiādikā aparabhāge dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā gāthā.
atk-s0503a:1532_1: Tattha bhuttassa ca sūkaramaddavenāti bhuttassa udapādi,
atk-s0503a:1532_5: siniddhabhojanaṃ pana bhuttattā tanukā vedanā ahosi,
atk-s0503a:1532_7: Etena yvāyaṃ “yassa taṃ paribhuttaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya aññatra tathāgatassā”ti sīhanādo nadito,
atk-s0503a:1532_10: Yasmā taṃ paribhuttaṃ bhagavato na kiñci vikāraṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0503a:1532_11: kammena pana laddhokāsena uppādiyamānaṃ vikāraṃ appamattatāya upasamento sarīre balaṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0503a:1532_12: yena yathā vakkhamānaṃ tividhaṃ payojanaṃ sampādesi,
atk-s0503a:1532_14: māraṇantikattā pana vedanānaṃ aviññātaṃ apākaṭaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1533_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ roge uppanne kusināraṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:1533_2: Parinibbāyituṃ nāma na katthaci na sakkā,
atk-s0503a:1533_4: mayi kusināraṃ gate mahāsudassanasuttadesanāya aṭṭhuppatti bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1533_5: tāya yā devaloke anubhavitabbasadisā sampatti manussaloke mayā anubhūtā,
atk-s0503a:1533_7: taṃ sutvā bahū janā kusalaṃ kattabbaṃ maññissanti.
atk-s0503a:1533_8: Subhaddopi kattha maṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanapariyosāne saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pabbajitvā
atk-s0503a:1533_9: laddhūpasampado kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā mayi dharanteyeva arahattaṃ patvā pacchimasāvako nāma bhavissati.
atk-s0503a:1533_10: Aññattha mayi parinibbute dhātunimittaṃ mahākalaho bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1533_12: Kusinārāyaṃ pana parinibbute doṇabrāhmaṇo taṃ vivādaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo vibhajitvā dassatīti imāni
atk-s0503a:1533_13: tīṇi kāraṇāni passanto bhagavā mahatā ussāhena kusināraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1534_3: Bhagavā hi attano ānubhāvena tadā padasā agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:1534_4: aññesaṃ pana yathā paduddhārampi kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0503a:1534_5: tathā vedanā tikhiṇā kharā kaṭukā vattiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1535_9: kakudhāpi nadī vimalavālikā samokiṇṇā setavaṇṇā sandati.
atk-s0503a:1535_12: Ramaṇīyāti manoharabhūmibhāgatāya ramitabbā yathāvuttaudakasampattiyā ca manoramā.
atk-s0503a:1539_0: Evaṃ vuttesu dasasu hatthikulesu kāḷāvakasaṅkhātānaṃ yaṃ dasannaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1539_1: taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassāti evaṃ dasaguṇitāya gaṇanāya pakatihatthīnaṃ koṭisahassabalappamāṇaṃ sarīrabalaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1539_2: Taṃ sabbampi tasmiṃ divase pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya caṅgavāre pakkhittaudakaṃ viya parikkhayaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0503a:1539_4: Etasmiṃ antare pañcavīsatiyā ṭhānesu nisīditvā mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā āgacchanto sūriyatthaṅgamanavelāya
atk-s0503a:1539_5: bhagavā kusināraṃ pāpuṇīti evaṃ “rogo nāma sabbaṃ ārogyaṃ maddanto āgacchatī”ti imamatthaṃ dassento sadevakassa
atk-s0503a:1540_0: Sīhaseyyanti ettha kāmabhogīseyyā petaseyyā tathāgataseyyā sīhaseyyāti catasso seyyā.
atk-s0503a:1540_3: kāmabhogī vāmena passena seyyaṃ kappentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-s0503a:1540_9: migarājā dakkhiṇena passena seyyaṃ kappetī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā.
atk-s0503a:1540_17: jāṇunā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:1541_0: Gantvāna buddhoti imā gāthā aparabhāge dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā.
atk-s0503a:1541_2: Appaṭimodha loketi appaṭimo idha imasmiṃ sadevake loke.
atk-s0503a:1541_3: Nhatvā ca pivitvā cudatārīti gattānaṃ sītikaraṇavasena nhatvā ca pānīyaṃ pivitvā ca nadito uttari.
atk-s0503a:1541_4: Tadā kira bhagavati nhāyante antonadiyaṃ macchakacchapā, udakaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1541_6: sabbo ca so bhūmibhāgoti sabbaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇameva ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1541_7: Purakkhatoti guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarubhāvato sadevakena lokena pūjāsammānavasena purakkhato.
atk-s0503a:1541_9: Tadā bhikkhū bhagavato vedanānaṃ adhimattabhāvaṃ viditvā āsannā hutvā samantato parivāretvāva gacchanti.
atk-s0503a:1541_11: Pavattā bhagavā idha dhammeti bhāgyavantatādīhi bhagavā idha sīlādisāsanadhamme pavattā,
atk-s0503a:1541_13: Ambavananti tassā eva nadiyā tīre ambavanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1541_14: Āmantayi cundakanti tasmiṃ kira khaṇe āyasmā ānando udakasāṭikaṃ pīḷento ohīyi,
atk-s0503a:1541_17: Pamukhe nisīdīti vattasīsena satthu purato nisīdi “kiṃ nu kho satthā āṇāpetī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1541_19: Evaṃ anuppattaṃ atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0503a:1542_1: vippaṭisārassa uppādako koci puriso siyā api bhaveyya.
atk-s0503a:1542_2: Alābhāti ye aññesaṃ dānaṃ dadantānaṃ dānānisaṃsasaṅkhātā lābhā honti,
atk-s0503a:1542_6: Uttaṇḍulaṃ vā atikilinnaṃ vā ko taṃ jānāti,
atk-s0503a:1542_7: kīdisampi pacchimaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā tathāgato parinibbuto,
atk-s0503a:1542_8: addhā tena yaṃ vā taṃ vā dinnaṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-s0503a:1543_0: Nanu ca yaṃ sujātāya dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā tathāgato abhisambuddho,
atk-s0503a:1543_5: Bhagavā hi sujātāya dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto,
atk-s0503a:1543_6: cundena dinnaṃ bhuñjitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutoti evaṃ parinibbānasamatāyapi samaphalāni.
atk-s0503a:1543_7: Abhisambujjhanadivase ca aggamaggassa hetubhūtā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajji,
atk-s0503a:1544_0: “Yassa cetaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā anuttaraṃ appamāṇaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja viharati,
atk-s0503a:1545_0: Sujātā ca aparabhāge assosi “na kira sā rukkhadevatā,
atk-s0503a:1545_2: taṃ kira piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0503a:1545_4: Tassā idaṃ sutvā “lābhā vata me”ti anussarantiyā balavapītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0503a:1545_7: mayhaṃ kira piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā satthā attanā cirakālābhipatthitāya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0503a:1545_8: parinibbuto”ti sutvā “lābhā vata me”ti anussarato balavapītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0503a:1545_9: Evaṃ anussaraṇasamatāyapi samaphalāni dvepi piṇḍapātadānānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:1547_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ dānassa mahapphalatañceva sīlādiguṇehi attano ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:1547_1: anupādāparinibbānañcāti tividhampi atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1548_0: Tattha dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānaṃ dentassa cittasampattiyā ca dakkhiṇeyyasampattiyā ca dānamayaṃ puññaṃ upacīyati,
atk-s0503a:1548_2: Atha vā dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti deyyadhammaṃ pariccajanto pariccāgacetanāya bahulīkatāya anukkamena
atk-s0503a:1548_3: sabbattha anāpattibahulo suvisuddhasīlaṃ rakkhitvā samathavipassanañca bhāvetuṃ sakkotīti tassa dānādivasena
atk-s0503a:1548_4: tividhampi puññaṃ abhivaḍḍhatīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1548_7: Veraṃ na cīyatīti pañcavidhaveraṃ na pavaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1548_8: adosapadhānattā vā adhisīlassa kāyavācācittehi sayaṃmanto suvisuddhasīlo khantibahulatāya kenaci veraṃ na karoti,
atk-s0503a:1548_12: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti kusalo pana ñāṇasampanno suvisuddhasīle patiṭṭhito aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu
atk-s0503a:1548_13: attano anurūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā upacārappanābhedaṃ jhānaṃ sampādento pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ kāmacchandādiakusalaṃ
atk-s0503a:1548_15: So tameva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāresu khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1548_16: ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggena anavasesaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ akusalaṃ samucchedavasena jahāti.
atk-s0503a:1548_17: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti so evaṃ pāpakaṃ pajahitvā rāgādīnaṃ khayā anavasesakilesanibbānena,
atk-s0503a:1548_18: tato paraṃ khandhanibbānena ca nibbuto hotīti evaṃ bhagavā cundassa ca dakkhiṇasampattiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1548_19: attano ca dakkhiṇeyyasampattiṃ nissāya pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1551_2: Mahatāti idhāpi guṇamahattenapi aparicchinnasaṅkhyattā gaṇanamahattenapi mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0503a:1551_4: Tassa kira gāmassa māpanadivase gāmaggahaṇaṭṭhāne dve tayo pāṭalaṅkurā pathavito ubbhijjitvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1551_8: Heṭṭhā vuttanayena sāvatthiyaṃ dhammasenāpatino cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā tato nikkhamitvā rājagahe vasanto tattha
atk-s0503a:1551_9: āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa ca cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā tato nikkhamitvā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ vasitvā aturitacārikāvasena
atk-s0503a:1551_10: janapadacārikaṃ caranto tattha tattha ekarattivāsena vasitvā lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto anukkamena pāṭaligāmaṃ
atk-s0503a:1552_1: Te kira bhagavato paṭhamadassanena keci saraṇesu,
atk-s0503a:1552_3: keci saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0503a:1552_5: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti pāṭaligāme kira ajātasattuno licchavirājūnañca manussā kālena kālaṃ gantvā
atk-s0503a:1552_6: gehasāmike gehato nīharitvā māsampi aḍḍhamāsampi vasanti.
atk-s0503a:1552_7: Tena pāṭaligāmavāsino manussā niccupaddutā “etesañceva āgatakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti ekapasse issarānaṃ bhaṇḍappaṭisāmanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1552_11: ekapasse gilānānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti sabbesaṃ aññamaññaṃ aghaṭṭetvā vasanappahonakaṃ nagaramajjhe mahāsālaṃ kāresuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1552_14: Te tattha gantvā hatthakammasudhākammacittakammādivasena supariniṭṭhitaṃ susajjitaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ
atk-s0503a:1552_15: taṃ dvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya oloketvā “idaṃ āvasathāgāraṃ ativiya manoramaṃ sassirikaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1552_16: kena nu kho paṭhamaṃ paribhuttaṃ amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assā”ti cintesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1552_17: tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe “bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ anuppatto”ti assosuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1552_18: Tena te uppannapītisomanassā “amhehi bhagavā gantvāpi ānetabbo siyā,
atk-s0503a:1552_19: so pana sayameva amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0503a:1552_20: ajja mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ idha vasāpetvā paṭhamaṃ paribhuñjāpessāma tathā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1552_21: bhikkhusaṅghe āgate tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āgatameva bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1552_24: Iti tīhi ratanehi paribhutte pacchā amhākañca paresañca paribhogo bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1552_25: evaṃ no dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā etadatthameva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1553_0: Yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti kiñcāpi taṃ taṃ divasameva pariniṭṭhitattā devavimānaṃ viya susajjitaṃ supaṭijaggitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1553_4: tasmā bhagavato ruciṃ jānitvāva paññāpessāmā”ti cintetvā te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1553_5: idāni bhagavato ruciṃ jānitvā tathā paññāpetukāmā yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1553_6: Sabbasanthariṃ āvasathāgāraṃ santharitvāti yathā sabbameva santhataṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1553_7: evaṃ taṃ santharitvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva “gomayaṃ nāma sabbamaṅgalesu vattatī”ti sudhāparikammakatampi
atk-s0503a:1553_8: bhūmiṃ allagomayena opuñjāpetvā parisukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ na paññāyati,
atk-s0503a:1553_9: evaṃ catujjātiyagandhehi limpetvā upari nānāvaṇṇakaṭasārake santharitvā tesaṃ upari mahāpiṭṭhikakojavādiṃ
atk-s0503a:1553_10: katvā hatthattharaṇādīhi nānāvaṇṇehi attharaṇehi santharitabbayuttakaṃ sabbokāsaṃ santharāpesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1554_0: Āsanānañhi majjhaṭṭhāne tāva maṅgalathambhaṃ nissāya mahārahaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha yaṃ yaṃ mudukañca manoramañca paccattharaṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1554_1: taṃ taṃ paccattharitvā ubhatolohitakaṃ manuññadassanaṃ upadhānaṃ upadahitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakāvicittaṃ
atk-s0503a:1554_2: vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadāmapupphadāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā samantā dvādasahatthe ṭhāne pupphajālaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0503a:1554_3: tiṃsahatthamattaṭṭhānaṃ paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā pacchimabhittiṃ nissāya bhikkhusaṅghassa pallaṅkaapassayamañcapīṭhādīni
atk-s0503a:1554_4: paññāpetvā upari setapaccattharaṇehi paccattharāpetvā sālāya pācīnapassaṃ attano nisajjāyoggaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1555_1: Evaṃ bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgho ca yathāruciyā hatthapāde dhovissanti,
atk-s0503a:1555_2: mukhaṃ vikkhālessantīti tesu tesu ṭhānesu maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa pūretvā vāsatthāya nānāpupphāni ceva
atk-s0503a:1555_3: udakavāsacuṇṇāni ca pakkhipitvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā patiṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1556_0: Telappadīpaṃ āropetvāti rajatasuvaṇṇādimayadaṇḍadīpikāsu yodhakarūpavilāsakhacitarūpakādīnaṃ hatthe ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarajatādimayakapallikāsu
atk-s0503a:1556_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ettha pana te pāṭaligāmiyā upāsakā na kevalaṃ āvasathāgārameva,
atk-s0503a:1556_3: atha kho sakalasmimpi gāme vīthiyo sajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā gehadvāresu puṇṇaghaṭe kadaliyo ca ṭhapāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1556_4: sakalagāmaṃ dīpamālāhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ viya katvā “khīrapake dārake khīraṃ pāyetha,
atk-s0503a:1556_8: buddhā nāma appasaddakāmā hontī”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1557_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamīti “yassa dāni, bhante,
atk-s0503a:1557_1: bhagavā kālaṃ maññatī”ti evaṃ kira tehi kāle ārocite bhagavā lākhārasena tintarattakoviḷārapupphavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1557_3: saṃvidhāya timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento nivāsetvā suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena padumakalāpaṃ parikkhipanto viya,
atk-s0503a:1557_4: vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalena gajakumbhaṃ pariyonandhanto viya,
atk-s0503a:1557_13: bālasūriyo viya ca attanā nisinnacārumaṇḍapato nikkhami.
atk-s0503a:1558_0: Athassa kāyato meghamukhato vijjukalāpā viya rasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasadhārāparisekapiñjarapattapupphaphalasākhāviṭape
atk-s0503a:1558_2: Tāvadeva attano attano pattacīvaramādāya mahābhikkhusaṅgho bhagavantaṃ parivāresi.
atk-s0503a:1558_3: Te ca naṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā
atk-s0503a:1558_4: vattāro vacanakkhamā codakā pāpagarahino sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā.
atk-s0503a:1558_5: Tehi parivuto bhagavā rattakambalaparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇakkhandho,
atk-s0503a:1558_9: Mahākassapappamukhā pana mahātherā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā maṇivammavammitā viya mahānāgā
atk-s0503a:1558_10: parivārayiṃsu vantarāgā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā kule vā gaṇe vā alaggā.
atk-s0503a:1559_5: sayaṃ buddho anubuddhehi parivārito pattaparivāritaṃ viya kesaraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1559_13: anupamena buddhavesena aparimāṇena buddhavilāsena pāṭaligāminaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0503a:1560_0: Athassa puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1560_1: tathā pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇapassato vāmapassato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1560_2: uparikesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvaṭṭehi moragīvarājavaṇṇā asitā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1560_3: heṭṭhāpādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1560_5: nakhānaṃ maṃsavimuttaṭṭhānato odātā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1560_6: rattapītavaṇṇānaṃ sambhinnaṭṭhānato mañjeṭṭhavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1560_8: Evaṃ samantā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā vidhāvamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikādīhi
atk-s0503a:1560_10: cātuddīpikamahāmeghato nikkhantavijjulatā viya ca disodisaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1560_11: Yāhi sabbe disābhāgā suvaṇṇacampakapupphehi vikiriyamānā viya,
atk-s0503a:1561_4: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitānaṃ dvattiṃsasūriyānaṃ dvattiṃsacandimānaṃ dvattiṃsacakkavattīnaṃ dvattiṃsadevarājānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1561_5: dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānaṃ viya virocittha,
atk-s0503a:1561_6: yathā taṃ dasahi pāramīhi dasahi upapāramīhi dasahi paramatthapāramīhīti sammadeva paripūritāhi samatiṃsapāramitāhi
atk-s0503a:1561_7: alaṅkataṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dinnena dānena rakkhitena sīlena katena kalyāṇakammena
atk-s0503a:1561_8: ekasmiṃ attabhāve samosaritvā vipākaṃ dātuṃ okāsaṃ alabhamānena sambādhappattaṃ viya nibbattitaṃ nāvāsahassabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0503a:1561_11: pañcavīsatiyā gaṅgānaṃ sambhinnamukhadvāre ekato rāsibhūtakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1562_0: Imāya buddhasiriyā obhāsamānassapi bhagavato purato anekāni daṇḍadīpikāsahassāni ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1562_2: ceva nīlapītādivaṇṇasugandhacuṇṇāni ca cātuddīpikamahāmeghavissaṭṭhā salilavuṭṭhiyo viya vippakiriṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1562_3: Pañcaṅgikatūriyanigghosā ca buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇāsaṃyuttā thutighosā ca sabbā disā pūrayamānā mukhasambhāsā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1562_5: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā padasahassehi gamanavaṇṇanaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0503a:1570_0: Unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā.
atk-s0503a:1574_0: Aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake.
atk-s0503a:1576_0: Na cāpi saṇikaṃ yāti, gacchamāno samāhito.
atk-s0503a:1577_0: “Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, disañca vidisaṃ tathā;
atk-s0503a:1582_0: Tosayanto bahū satte, gāmaṃ seṭṭho upāgamī”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1583_1: Evaṃvidhesu kālesu bhagavato sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1583_6: tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ asamatthā.
atk-s0503a:1583_7: Sakalampi hi kappaṃ vaṇṇentā pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0503a:1583_10: pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena pupphagandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi pūjiyamāno āvasathāgāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0503a:1583_12: “atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1584_0: Pāde pakkhāletvāti yadipi bhagavato pāde rajojallaṃ na upalimpati,
atk-s0503a:1584_1: tesaṃ pana upāsakānaṃ kusalābhivuddhiṃ ākaṅkhanto paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanatthañca bhagavā pāde pakkhāleti.
atk-s0503a:1584_2: Apica upādinnakasarīraṃ nāma sītaṃ kātabbampi hotīti etadatthampi bhagavā nhānapādadhovanādīni karotiyeva.
atk-s0503a:1584_4: Tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nhāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭakena vodakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1584_5: katvā jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā rattakambalena paliveṭhetvā pīṭhe ṭhapitā rattasuvaṇṇaghanapaṭimā viya
atk-s0503a:1598_0: Pāṭaligāmiye upāsake āmantesīti yasmā tesu upāsakesu bahū janā sīlesu patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0503a:1598_1: tasmā paṭhamaṃ tāva sīlavipattiyā ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā pacchā sīlasampadāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1599_2: Ettha ca “dussīlo”ti padena puggalassa sīlābhāvo vutto.
atk-s0503a:1599_3: So panassa sīlābhāvo duvidho asamādānena vā samādinnassa bhedena vāti.
atk-s0503a:1599_12: Gahaṭṭho hi yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti yadi kasiyā yadi vāṇijjāya yadi gorakkhena,
atk-s0503a:1599_13: pāṇātipātādivasena pamatto taṃ taṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1599_15: Māghātakāle pana pāṇātipātādīni karonto daṇḍavasena mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati.
atk-s0503a:1599_16: Pabbajito dussīlo pamādakāraṇā sīlato buddhavacanato jhānato sattaariyadhanato ca jāniṃ nigacchati.
atk-s0503a:1600_0: Pāpako kittisaddoti gahaṭṭhassa “asuko amukakule jāto dussīlo pāpadhammo pariccattaidhalokaparaloko salākabhattamattampi
atk-s0503a:1600_1: na detī”ti parisamajjhe pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
atk-s0503a:1600_2: Pabbajitassa “asuko nāma thero satthu sāsane pabbajitvā nāsakkhi sīlāni rakkhituṃ,
atk-s0503a:1600_5: chahi agāravehi samannāgato”ti evaṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
atk-s0503a:1601_0: Avisāradoti gahaṭṭho tāva avassaṃ bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne “koci mama kammaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0503a:1601_5: Pabbajitopi bahubhikkhusaṅghe sannipatite “avassaṃ koci mama kammaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0503a:1601_6: atha me uposathampi pavāraṇampi ṭhapetvā sāmaññato cāvetvā nikkaḍḍhissatī”ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0503a:1601_8: Ekacco pana dussīlopi samāno susīlo viya carati,
atk-s0503a:1602_0: Sammūḷho kālaṃ karotīti dussīlassa hi maraṇamañce nipannassa dussīlakammāni samādāya pavattitaṭṭhānāni āpāthaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0503a:1602_4: sattisatena pahariyamāno viya aggijālābhighātena jhāyamāno viya ca hoti.
atk-s0503a:1603_2: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā.
atk-s0503a:1603_5: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasaṅkhātā ayā apetattā,
atk-s0503a:1603_9: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati.
atk-s0503a:1603_11: vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti vinipāto.
atk-s0503a:1604_4: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā,
atk-s0503a:1604_6: na tu vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā petamahiddhikānampi vijjamānattā.
atk-s0503a:1604_8: So hi yathāvuttenaṭṭhena “apāyo” ceva “duggati” ca sabbasampattisamussayehi vinipatitattā “vinipāto”ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0503a:1605_3: Sīlasampannoti parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇañca katvā sīlassa samādānena sīlasampanno.
atk-s0503a:1605_5: Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokanti ettha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati,
atk-s0503a:1606_0: Pāṭaligāmiye upāsake bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti aññāyapi pāḷimuttāya dhammakathāya ceva āvasathānumodanakathāya ca.
atk-s0503a:1606_1: Tadā hi bhagavā yasmā ajātasattunā tattha pāṭaliputtanagaraṃ māpentena aññesu gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu ye sīlācārasampannā kuṭumbikā,
atk-s0503a:1606_2: te ānetvā dhanadhaññagharavatthukhettavatthādīni ceva parihārañca dāpetvā nivesiyanti.
atk-s0503a:1606_3: Tasmā pāṭaligāmiyā upāsakā ānisaṃsadassāvitāya visesato sīlagarukā sabbaguṇānañca sīlassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
atk-s0503a:1606_4: tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ sīlānisaṃse pakāsetvā tato paraṃ ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya,
atk-s0503a:1606_7: yojanikamadhukaṇḍaṃ cakkayantena pīḷetvā madhurasaṃ pāyamāno viya pāṭaligāmikānaṃ upāsakānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ
atk-s0503a:1606_8: pakiṇṇakakathaṃ kathento “āvāsadānaṃ nāmetaṃ gahapatayo mahantaṃ puññaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1606_11: mayā ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutte pana dhammaratanenapi paribhuttoyeva hoti.
atk-s0503a:1606_12: Evaṃ tīhi ratanehi paribhutte aparimeyyo ca vipāko,
atk-s0503a:1606_13: apica āvāsadānasmiṃ dinne sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hoti,
atk-s0503a:1606_14: bhūmaṭṭhakapaṇṇasālāya vā sākhāmaṇḍapassa vā saṅghaṃ uddissa katassa ānisaṃso paricchindituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0503a:1606_15: Āvāsadānānubhāvena hi bhave nibbattamānassapi sampīḷitagabbhavāso nāma na hoti,
atk-s0503a:1606_16: dvādasahattho ovarako viyassa mātukucchi asambādhova hotī”ti evaṃ nānānayehi vicittaṃ bahuṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā –
atk-s0503a:1608_0: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0503a:1612_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
atk-s0503a:1617_0: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1618_0: Evaṃ ayampi āvāsadāne ānisaṃsoti bahudeva rattiṃ atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāmaṃ āvāsadānānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0503a:1618_1: Tattha imā gāthā tāva saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā,
atk-s0503a:1619_1: Yassa dāni kālaṃ maññathāti yassa gamanassa tumhe kālaṃ maññatha,
atk-s0503a:1619_6: Tiyāmarattiñhi tattha nisīditvā vītināmentānaṃ tesaṃ sarīre ābādho uppajjeyyāti,
atk-s0503a:1619_7: bhikkhusaṅghepi ca vippabhātasayananisajjāya okāso laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0503a:1619_9: Suññāgāranti pāṭiyekkaṃ suññāgāraṃ nāma tattha natthi.
atk-s0503a:1619_10: Tena kira gahapatayo tasseva āvasathāgārassa ekapasse paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā kappiyamañcaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1619_11: tattha kappiyapaccattharaṇaṃ attharitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakāgandhamālādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0503a:1619_12: telappadīpaṃ āropesuṃ “appeva nāma satthā dhammāsanato vuṭṭhāya thokaṃ vissamitukāmo idha nipajjeyya,
atk-s0503a:1619_13: evaṃ no idaṃ āvasathāgāraṃ bhagavatā catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1619_14: Satthāpi tadeva sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0503a:1619_16: Tattha pādadhovanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva dhammāsanā agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:1619_22: Upāsake uyyojetvā dhammāsanato oruyha yathāvutte ṭhāne sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0503a:1619_23: Evaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavatā catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1620_0: Sunidhavassakārāti sunidho ca vassakāro ca dve brāhmaṇā.
atk-s0503a:1620_2: magadharaṭṭhe vā mahāmattā mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgatāti mahāmattā.

atk-s0503a:1652_8: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā satthu vattaṃ dassetvā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1652_9: mayhaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ vibhāvento ākāse nisīditvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā parinibbāyeyyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1652_10: Evaṃ sante ye mayi assaddhā appasannā,
atk-s0503a:1652_13: Evañca so āyasmā cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0503a:1652_15: “atha kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1653_0: Tattha parinibbānakālo meti “bhagavā mayhaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānakālo upaṭṭhito,
atk-s0503a:1653_6: ‘Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pubbe maṃ amūlakena pārājikena anuddhaṃsesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1653_8: Tesaṃ saddahitvā aññepi puthujjanā mayi agāravaṃ paribhavañca karonti.
atk-s0503a:1653_9: Imañca dukkhabhāraṃ niratthakaṃ vahitvā kiṃ payojanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1653_10: tasmāhaṃ idāneva parinibbāyissāmī’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā satthāraṃ āpucchī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1653_12: Na hi khīṇāsavā aparikkhīṇe āyusaṅkhāre paresaṃ upavādādibhayena parinibbānāya cetenti ghaṭayanti vāyamanti,
atk-s0503a:1653_13: na ca paresaṃ pasaṃsādihetu ciraṃ tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0503a:1653_14: atha kho saraseneva attano āyusaṅkhārassa parikkhayaṃ āgamenti. Yathāha –

atk-s0503a:1657_7: Thero hi tadā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “bhagavā kappasatasahassaṃ

atk-s0503a:1657_21: Saha adhiṭṭhānena sabbo kāyo agginā āditto ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1657_22: Khaṇeneva ca so aggi kappavuṭṭhānaggi viya aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ masimattampi tattha kiñci anavasesento adhiṭṭhānabalena jhāpetvā nibbāyi.
atk-s0503a:1657_25: Tattha vuṭṭhahitvā parinibbāyīti iddhicittato vuṭṭhahitvā bhavaṅgacittena parinibbāyi.

atk-s0503a:1660_0: Tattha abhedi kāyoti sabbo bhūtupādāyapabhedo catusantatirūpakāyo bhijji,
atk-s0503a:1660_4: Nirodhi saññāti rūpāyatanādigocaratāya rūpasaññādibhedā sabbāpi saññā appaṭisandhikena nirodhena nirujjhi.
atk-s0503a:1660_5: Vedanā sītibhaviṃsu sabbāti vipākavedanā kiriyavedanāti sabbāpi vedanā appaṭisandhikanirodhena niruddhattā
atk-s0503a:1660_10: Vūpasamiṃsu saṅkhārāti vipākakiriyappabhedā sabbepi phassādayo saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā appaṭisandhikanirodheneva niruddhattā visesena upasamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1660_11: Viññāṇaṃ atthamāgamāti viññāṇampi vipākakiriyappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodheneva atthaṃ vināsaṃ upacchedaṃ agamā agacchi.
atk-s0503a:1661_0: Iti bhagavā āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa pañcannampi khandhānaṃ pubbeyeva kilesābhisaṅkhārupādānassa
atk-s0503a:1661_1: anavasesato niruddhattā anupādāno viya jātavedo appaṭisandhikanirodhena niruddhabhāvaṃ nissāya pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1664_1: Dasame tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0503a:1664_2: caranto anukkamena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavane viharantoyeva yesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa
atk-s0503a:1664_5: yepi ca mettiyabhūmajakehi katena abhūtena abbhācikkhaṇena there gāravarahitā puthujjanā,
atk-s0503a:1664_9: Tesu “tatrā”ti iminā “bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesī”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ vuccamānataṃyeva joteti.
atk-s0503a:1664_11: nāssa āmantane koci antarāyo ahosīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1664_16: Jeṭṭhattā seṭṭhattā āsannattā sabbakālaṃ sannihitattā dhammadesanāya visesato bhājanabhūtattā ca.
atk-s0503a:1665_1: Bhadanteti āmantitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāravena satthu paṭivacanadānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1665_2: Tattha “bhikkhavo”ti vadanto bhagavā te bhikkhū ālapati.
atk-s0503a:1665_6: “Bhadante”ti iminā satthari ādarabahumānagāravadīpanavacanena te bhikkhū attano sussūsataṃ ovādappaṭiggahagāravabhāvañca paṭivedenti.
atk-s0503a:1665_7: Bhagavato paccassosunti te bhikkhū bhagavato vacanaṃ patiassosuṃ sotukāmataṃ janesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1665_8: Etadavocāti bhagavā etaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi. Dabbassa,
